1b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ sUr+ya ma
1b2(dkon brtsegs): hruH/ d+hu na nam mi
1b3(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyisangs rgyas kyi
2a1(dkon brtsegs): / zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// dam
2a2(dkon brtsegs): dadang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 
2a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/  ma ldan 'das rgyal
2a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i khang na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rol/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong
2b1(dkon brtsegs): gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / ngan song sel dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
2b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang blan
2b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub las/ phyir mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu
2b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ lha bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par
2b5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / byang chub sems
3a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i tshangs pa bzhi khri nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig go/ 
3a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang / lha ma yin gyi
3a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po phrag rtsub dang / lha ma yi na gyi dbang po rab dga' dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi po thams cad
3a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang g.yog lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa dang thabs gcig go/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / 
3a5(dkon brtsegs): lce dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po chuH dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po gas can dang / klu'i rgyal po gan
3a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi thub pa dang / klu'i rgyal pos 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang
3b1(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po bdud las rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba'i bla ma la sogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'di lta
3b2(dkon brtsegs): ste rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dngargyal po
3b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po thams cad kyang / g.yog brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa dang / gnod
3b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin kum bi ra dang / 'brog gnas da/ nga / khab spu dang / yid bzangs dang / blo gros bzang po dang / dbyibs bzangs dang / 
3b5(dkon brtsegs): kun nas kha dog dang / gnod sbyin mi 'khrugs pa dang / de dag dang gnod sbyin gzhan brgya stong dang yang thabs gcig go/ yang de'i tshe bcom ldan
3b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por nye bar gnas shing bzhugs te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / 
3b7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag dang / 'khor bzhi rnams
4a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas nas/ mchod cing gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang / bca'
4a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / myang ba dang / na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gso sman dang / yo byad bzang po mang po bzhes so// yang de'i tshe// 
4a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu/ 
4a4(dkon brtsegs): lnga bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongasu/ bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol
4a5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po'i
4a6(dkon brtsegs): char chen po ni mngon par 'bebs/ sil snyan brgya stong ni dkrol nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim du bsod snyoms kyi
4a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir gshegs te/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu phyung ngo // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
4b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas zhabs gang dang gang du gzhag pa'i zhabs gzhag de dang der pad+ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam/ 'dab ma ni gser/ chu ba ni dngul/ ze ba ni
4b2(dkon brtsegs): bai DUr+ya/ snying po ni nor bu bzang po dang ldan pa rnams byung ste/ pad+ma de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te 'dug pa dag
4b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag pad+ma de dag dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i khyab kyi grong
4b4(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen po la lan bdun du bskor ba byed cing tshigs bcad pa 'di dag smraso// skye bo rnams la phan mdzad ded dpon gang // yon gyi gnas gang dge ba
4b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams mdzad pa// shAkya khyu mchog blo bzhi bdag nyi nga che// 'jig rten mgon po de ni grong du gshegs / lha yi gnas su gang rnams rtsen pa dang // de bzhin
4b6(dkon brtsegs): rga dang 'chi las thar 'dod dang // bdud kyi sde rnams 'pham par gang 'dod pa// des ni shAkya seng ge mchod par gyis// 'gro ba rnams la phan zhing thugs brtse'i phyir// bskal
4b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bya bar spyad pa rnam spyod pa// thub pa rnams kyi sgra yang rnyed par dka'// thub pa de ring rgyal po'i khab gshegs bzhed// zas skom de bzhin gos dang bzhon pa dang // bu dang bu mo
4b8(dkon brtsegs): chung ma rnams dang ni// sbyin pa dpag med bsam yas gang btang ba// kun mkhyen de ni rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs// lag pa rkang pa mig dang rna ba dang // sna dang yan lag dam / 
5a1(dkon brtsegs): mgo btang ste// kun btang yon tan ldan pa gtang pod pa// des ni kun mkhyen ye shes mchog brnyes so// sbyin dang dul dang sdom la gang bslabs shing // skye bu
5a2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa tshul khrims ma nyams pa// bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa// zhi ba'i thugs de grong du deng gshegs so// sdug bsngal bying ba'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas// 
5a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gang spyod cing // bsam gtan mtha' yas mnyam pa med dang ldan// tshangs dbyangs de ni de ring grong khyer gshegs// drang srong chen po de ye shes rab ni/ 
5a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs med na mkha'i khams ltar dpag tu med// bde gshegs de yi yon tan gzhan dag kyang // spyod pa dang dani rnam par smin pas sbyangs// blo ldan gang gis bdud kyi sde
5a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom zhing // mi g.yo go 'phang mya ngan med pa brnyes// chos kyi 'khor lo tshul bzhin rab skor te// chos kyi dbangaphyug de ni grong khyer gshegs// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis
5a6(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa'i sku// bde gshegs 'gyur bar su dag 'dod pa ni// snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems zhog ste// mchod pa'i phyir ni de yi thang du song // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spang ba dang / de bzhin
5a7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pa// de ni ston pa'i thangad du nyer song la// mchod pa rnams mang mtha' yas myur du gyis// tshangs pa dang ni lha yi dbang phyug dang // brgya byin nyid ni thob par
5a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod cing // lha yi bde bas rtag tu rtse dga' ba// de ni thub pa mchod phyir nye bar song // gling bzhi'i bdag po rgyal por 'gyur bya zhing // rin chen mchog bdun rang gis thob pa dang // bu mchog
5b1(dkon brtsegs): stong rnams kyang ni gang 'dod pa// sems can mchog la des myur mchod par gyis// khyim bdag tshong dpon khams kyi rgyal po dang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang g.yog 'khor dam pa dang / 
5b2(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod 'phel ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa// de ni deng song thub la mchod pa gyis// gang su rnam par grol dang 'grol ba kun// thub pa rnams kyi chos mchog thos nas te// 'dren pa
5b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sgra yang 'dir dkon gyis// de phyir chos nyan du ni deng myur deng // de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag tshigasu bcad pa de dag gis
5b4(dkon brtsegs): bskul nas// skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i phur ma thogs/ gser dang / dngul gyi me tog
5b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi phur ma thogs/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba/ ngan thogs pa/ rnga bo che dang / dung dang rdza rnga dang / kharaHdang / pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang / sgra snyan dang / gling bud
5b6(dkon brtsegs): khar dkrol dang / kim pa dang / na ku la dang / pi wang thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas yid la byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed
5b7(dkon brtsegs): pas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob cing 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa sgo'i
5b8(dkon brtsegs): them pa la bzhags ma thag tu de nas grong khyer thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ lha dang mi'i sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra byung / lha'i me tog gi char yang rab tu
6a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'bru ste/ sems can long ba rnams ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa rnams ni rna bas smra thos/ sems can smras pa rnams ni dran pa thogs/ 
6a2(dkon brtsegs): can yid brel ba rnams ni rtse gcig pa thob/ sems can gcer bu rnams ni gos rnyed/ sems can dkris pa rnams ni zas rnyed / sems can dngul po rnams ni nor rnye // de'i tshe na sems
6a3(dkon brtsegs): can gang yang 'dod chags kyis gzir ba med de/ zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis ma yin no// 
6a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang nga / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / phan tshun du pha dmar 'du shes par gyur te/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs
6a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas skyes bu seng ge che// stobs bcu grong khyer na ma gshe// gas tshe// de yi mong la skye bo rnams// bde ba rgya cher dri med 'thob// long bas mig rnams mthong bar gyur// 'on pa/ 
6a6(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i rgyu yang skye// myos pa dag ni dran pa rnyed // yid brel rtso cig de bzhi no// gcer bu dag ni gos rnyed// bkres pa dag gis zas thob po// skyes bu gang su dbul po yang // dga'
6a7(dkon brtsegs): bar nor rnams rnyed par gyur// lha rnams bye ba mang po yang // mkha' la gnas shing stobs rab mchod// smra ba'i seng ge mchod pa'i phyir// me tog char kyang rab tu 'bebs// rnga dang
6a8(dkon brtsegs): rdza rnga sil snyan dung // nyams dga' byed pa dpag med pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni bsod nams kyis// grong khyer 'jug tshe sgra yang byung // grong khyer kun tu rab g.yos te// de tshe nyams dga'
6b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gnas// skye bos ngo mtshar 'di mthong nas// dga' ba shin tu rgya chen 'thob// 'dod chags kyis ni mi gzir zhing // de tshe khro blun ser sna med// nga rgyal la sogs nyes pas kyang / 
6b2(dkon brtsegs): gzir ba de tshe ma lus med// dga' bas khyab cing dang ba ste// mi rnams pha mar 'du shes gyur// gang tshe sangs rgyas stobs bcu po// skye bo bde phyir grong gshegs tshe// mi yi ma yin sil snyan// 
6b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams// ma dkrol bar ni sgra yang 'byung // 'jig rten lha min lha mir bcas// bde gshegs 'od kyis rgyas par gang // de ltar gang tshe sangs rgyas ni// 'grol phan phyir grong gshegs pa/ de tshe
6b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshar rmad byung ba// rnam pa mang po rab tu dga'// de nasabacom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa dang / tshong dpon shing sa la chen po lta bu sdig bcom
6b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa grong bar zhi ga na 'dug ste// byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dbang
6b6(dkon brtsegs): po zhi ba thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu byon pa bsdams pa/ glang po ltar dbang po thul ba/ mtsho ltar dang ste rnyog pa med cing
6b7(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku legs pa brgyan pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa
6b8(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dad par gyur to// de sems shin tu dad nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
7a1(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
7a2(dkon brtsegs): sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das gal ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
7a3(dkon brtsegs): po chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu spyod// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
7a4(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu 'tshal ba de lta bu yang / yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur/ de de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sde dgra bcom la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul
7a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dbang gi phyir grong bar gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhug so// phyog sa gcig tu bzhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mthong nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dag kyang lhags par gyur to// 
7a6(dkon brtsegs): bar snang las kyang lnga bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
7a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
7a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu sbyong la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongasu 'dzin to// chos
7b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
7b2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa'o// de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud par bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub kyi phyir sems bskyed nas/ mi dge ba'i las gang yang
7b3(dkon brtsegs): mi spyod pa'o// ci mi spyod ce na 'dod chags mi spyod/ zhe sdang mi spyod/ gti mug mi spyod/ khyim pa'i rtags la sred pa mi spyod de/ rab tu byung nas kyang rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang / tshig su bcad pa
7b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod cing // gang rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa de la gnas pa yin no// de la rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
7b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'o// chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos tham sa cad ces bya ba ni phung po dang / khams dang skye mched dang / 
7b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnamaso// phung po lnga rab tu rtogs pa ji ltar rab tu rtogs she na/ phung po lnga rnams sgyu mo lta bu dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / 
7b7(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par rab tu rtogs pa ste/ ji ltar rab tu rtogs pa yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba de ltar rab tu rtogs pa'o// gang gi tshe yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 
7b8(dkon brtsegs): mi shes/ rlom semasu mi byed/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe/ rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni phung po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po rab tu rtogs pa de chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa
8a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ rigs kyi bu 'dzin rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa zhes bya'o// de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams yong su mi gtong ngo // 
8a2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ji ltar bdag gis/ chos de dag yongasu shes par gyur pa de ltar sems can thams cad la ston kyang sems can dang chos kyang mi dmigs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
8a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig po 'di dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu sbyong / 
8a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa/ de lta bu yang yong su 'dzin to// bcom ldan 'das/ kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu
8a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems pa' sdig bcom mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba des shing ta la
8a6(dkon brtsegs): bdun srid du bar snang la mngon par 'phags so// 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha dang mir bcas
8a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye dgu'i srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// 'di ni
8a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gis tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma dang kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'ang 'phro ba 'di lta ste/ sngon
8b1(dkon brtsegs): po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas
8b2(dkon brtsegs): khyab par byas nas/ slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs
8b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
8b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin// 'dren pa khyod ni ngargyal ba'i stobs la mnga'// khyod ni thams cad
8b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen par 'jig rten grags// ci yi slad du 'ju/ ma pa 'di bstan gsungs// thub pa chen po 'das/ pa ma lus mkhyen// de bzhin ma 'ongs ma lus
8b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang mkhyen// da ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa// ci slang khyod kyis 'dzum pa 'di 'dzad gsungs// rab 'bring tha ma'i sems dang ldan pa yi// sems can thams
8b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi ni spyod pa mkhyen// chags grol srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin// mi 'dul kha lo bsgyur ba lung bstan gsol// lha rnams bye ba khrag khrig kun lhags te/ 
8b8(dkon brtsegs): skyon ma mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing // skye bo chos spyod 'di dag kun sdod kyis// thub pa chen po mtshungs med gsung dbyung gsol// khyod ni ye shes pha rol phyin// 
9a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'// spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa// ci zhig slang du 'dzum pa bstan// bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong
9a2(dkon brtsegs): lha 'di dag/ chos rnams btsal ba'i slad du 'dir lhags te// de bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag/ dam pa'i chos rnams nyan par 'tshal ba mchis// 
9a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sil snyan rnams// rab tu bzang zhing mang ba brdung bar bgyid// skye bo mang po the tshom 'tshal ba kun// thub pa deng 'dir the tshom myur
9a4(dkon brtsegs): bcad gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo byang
9a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'a/ di shing rta la bdun srid du steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom
9a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom
9a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rims nad med pa
9a8(dkon brtsegs): la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'jig rten
9b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'byung ste/ kun dga' bo dper na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang nyan thos phun sum
9b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang
9b3(dkon brtsegs): drug de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yang de las mi lhag mi thub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs de nas gshegs te mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim gal ba
9b4(dkon brtsegs): der gshegs nas byon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gdan dbashams pa la bzhugs so// dge slong gi dge 'dun dmas kyang stan ci 'os pa dag la 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma
9b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun pa/ zhugs par rig nas/ bdag nyid lag bdar te/ bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / myang ba bzang po mang pos
9b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshim par byas so// bstabs te tshim par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa bshos gsol ba dang lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag
9b7(dkon brtsegs): bcabs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ras bcos bu zung ring thang med pa sku la gsol to// sku la gsol nas kyang bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag
9b8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ stan ran pa zhig blangs nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
10a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gnod sems dang / zab dang zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa gang nas 'byung ba lags/ mi shes pa ci las skye ba lags/ 
10a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ji ltar 'gag pa lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po
10a3(dkon brtsegs): ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa las/ gnod sems dang za ba dang zhe sdang dang 'chab pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la
10a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas yon tan dang / nyes pa mi shes te/ debs na mi shes pa zhes bya'o// gang ngar 'dzi ngan pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba
10a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du yongasu shes pa de la ni shes pa 'am/ min sa pa zhes gdags par mi nus so// de bas nargyal po chen po khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gar
10a6(dkon brtsegs): yang 'gro ba dang / gang nas kyang 'ong bar mi gdags pa de ltar bslab par bya'o// rtul po chen po gang gar yang mi 'gro gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de la chos gang yang 'gro ba 'am
10a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med do// gang la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa de la skye ba med 'gag pa med de/ gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de shes pa'o// shes pa de ji lta bar mi shes pa'ang de bzhin no// 
10a8(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges par 'byung ba 'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa'i phyir ro// gang gi tshe nges par 'byung ba'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos
10b1(dkon brtsegs): de gang yang mi shes pa de'i tshe ye shes can zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das
10b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag par skabs 'di kho nar 'gum
10b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus bgyid par gyur na ni bdag nying mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
10b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par bzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshe dgas nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe yang chos kyi sbyin pa la 'du bar
10b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das zas phyis len pa spangs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhan nas zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas/ 
10b6(dkon brtsegs): khang du gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzhengs nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te/ byon nas/ 'di
10b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste chos yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du nang du yang dag
10b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jog las langs nas 'i'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gal ba dang bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum
11a1(dkon brtsegs): bskor 'byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khro nga // 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa yang nang du yang dag 'dzag las langs te/ lha'i bu bran khri nyis stong rnams
11a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongasu bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la 'drer dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
11a3(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du
11a4(dkon brtsegs): bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
11a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal/ gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra yang byang chub sems dpa' lnga po d+mo tsam gyis yongasu bskur cing / mdun du
11a6(dkon brtsegs): bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rgyal po
11a7(dkon brtsegs): maskyes dgra yang dpung gis tshogs yan lag bzhis yang su bskor cing / mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gal ba dang bcom ldan 'das gala' da
11a8(dkon brtsegs): dong sa phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo ngas phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rgyal papo'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang srog chags bye ga khrag khrig pargya
11b1(dkon brtsegs): stong du ma ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
11b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
11b3(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems
11b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po sdig bcom gyis gang 'di byang chub sems dpa da' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa la brtsams te/ yongasu zhus pa de'i
11b5(dkon brtsegs): lan bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo tsam zhig bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
11b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa yong su 'grub pa de la brtsams te/ ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa
11b7(dkon brtsegs): dang thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi sde rnams pham par bgyid pa dang gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs
11b8(dkon brtsegs): pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab
12a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong bar
12a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob ste byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar
12a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par rab tu bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di
12a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba 'dus shing mchis pa gang rnams bcom ldan 'das las chos mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba
12a5(dkon brtsegs): dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur te/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas ji ltarathos pa bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par 'gyur ba dag
12a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'di lta bu'i chos bstan par byas na 'khor 'di lta bu ni mi mdzes kyis ngas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon
12a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'du bya ba mngon par byas nas/ phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re rer yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bkye la/ 'od zer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
12a8(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing / de dag 'od zer de dag gis zil gyis mnan nas phyir mig gi dbang
12b1(dkon brtsegs): po la snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyi 'od kyang mi mngon/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang / nor bu dang / glog dang / me dang / skar ma'i gzugs dang / sems can
12b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi 'od kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ba dang / gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / btang bzung dang / 
12b3(dkon brtsegs): btang bzung chen po dngari'i rgyal po ri rab dang / de ma yin pa bzhan ri'i rgyal po nag po dag dang / de ma yin pa'i gzhan nag po dag dang rtsig pa dang / shing dang / nags tshal de dag
12b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'od zer de dag gis thal byung du snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba/ mngon par 'du bya'o// snyam du dgongs so// 
12b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i 'od zer ba kye nas/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra mdzad pa dang gsung gsal ba'i sgra des phyogs bcu kun
12b6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag sgras go bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad
12b7(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal po
12b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang mi grag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
13a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ 
13a2(dkon brtsegs): re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
13a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags shes bya ba zhig gnas te/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags shes bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po
13a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems pa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing chos ston pa'i spyan snga na/  shing ta la bdun srid tsam du bar snang la 'phags te lus mi
13a5(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs kyi rje/ sa ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di
13a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni sgra tsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'i lus mi snang mod kyi/ bshad pa yang grag la sgra yang 'byin te/ 
13a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs yongs su grub pa yang mi snang ngo // sgra ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin no// gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no snyam mo// de ltar rab tu shes pas byang/ 
13a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa thob ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags des snang ba chen po de yang
13b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das/ 
13b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bcom ldan 'das
13b3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags bcom ldan 'das
13b4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba 'di lta bu ni sngon chad ma mthong ngo // de skad ces// gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
13b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal brtsegs rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsa/ la to// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
13b6(dkon brtsegs): nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
13b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
13b8(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste chos bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag btang ste gsung gsal ba'i
14a1(dkon brtsegs): s+thA b+hU / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po de la byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen brgyas
14a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
14a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag la yang blta ba dang / 
14a4(dkon brtsegs): chas de yang nyan du mtshal bcom ldan 'ad sangs bka' stsal rigs khyo de 'dus la bab par shes nas de nas
14a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug khri sum sta gis yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdar
14a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'di lta ste dper naskyes bu stobs po ches lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig thang cig yud tsa mo de nyid la/ 
14a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nasa'ajig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags de'i tshe byang
14a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge
14b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog gi tshogs chen pos pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to// 
14b2(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra yang byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas kyang legs par brgyan par gyur
14b3(dkon brtsegs): to// spos mchog gis kyang yang dag par bdugs te gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i longs spyod dang khyad par med par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems
14b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang
14b5(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der/ dong ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'a ngas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
14b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe lho phyogs su
14b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa zhes bya ba de na/ 
14b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i dge
15a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dun dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor cing chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams med
15a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo/ yang sangs rgyas kyis zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ci'i phyir lag na rin
15a3(dkon brtsegs): po che zhes bya zhe na/ yang rigs kyi bu de nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i cha/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
15a4(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed du 'dod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gis byugs nas lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // chos rin po che'i sgra dang / dge
15a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'gru/ sa dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rin po che'i sgra
15a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ngo // byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // de dag dang gzhan yang chos rin po che'i sgra sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
15a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ste// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu de lag na rin po che zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung gsal ba'i sgra
15a8(dkon brtsegs): de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyi bsgyings pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
15b1(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng
15b2(dkon brtsegs): ge'i rtsal gyi bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang
15b3(dkon brtsegs): lags rkyen gang lags bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung
15b4(dkon brtsegs): dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi kha mas mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegarngas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
15b5(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs/ pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad
15b6(dkon brtsegs): med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste dam pa'i chos bsgrags pa'i phyir ba spu'i khong bu thams cad nas 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra
15b7(dkon brtsegs): phyung ngo // yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed de/ der byang chub sems
15b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings
16a1(dkon brtsegs): / pade la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi
16a2(dkon brtsegs): mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lnga blte ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur
16a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de la yang blta ba dang chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod der song ste/ 
16a4(dkon brtsegs): ci rung de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / da zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis khebs pa'i sems can rnams dang phrad bas na 'jig rten gyi khams de ni sdug bsngal bsho
16a5(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stsal
16a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des don gyi dbang
16a7(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig gzigs na bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag kyang mchis bzhin du de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongasu 'dzin/ bcom ldan 'das
16a8(dkon brtsegs): des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des de ci nas kyang sems can ngan pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang
16b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos bstan par bya'o zhes yun ring po nas smon lam btab par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs/ 
16b2(dkon brtsegs): pa shAkya thub pa de ni de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
16b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang
16b4(dkon brtsegs): phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i slad du dmachi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su
16b5(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dka' ba mdzad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i spangs
16b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'di lta bu ni 'byung bar dka'o// de mthong ba yang rnyed par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song la/ rigs kyi bu
16b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rab tu bsgrim pa gyis shig/ smras par gyur ta re/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bsnyernyan par
16b8(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba'o// de na sems can gzhan de dag kyang gtum zhing khro ba dag go// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ni rin po ches bcom
17a1(dkon brtsegs): // ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro bar
17a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der smras par 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la ni rjes su chags pa 'ang ma mchis/ khong khro ba yang ma mchis na bdag ci'i slad du smras par
17a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la sems can thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par gshe zhing spros te/ brdegs shing btsogs nas bong ba dang mtshon gyis btab kyang bzod
17a4(dkon brtsegs): par spro ste/ sems can gang la'ang gnod par bgyi ba'i sems mi bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings
17a5(dkon brtsegs): pa des rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khoral bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed las gang byang chubasems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa
17a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ba de rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dar deng shig/ bcom ldan 'das des tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas
17a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che
17a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dar mchi'o zhes gsol to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin
17b1(dkon brtsegs): po che byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas sangs
17b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ni rin po che 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das shAkya
17b3(dkon brtsegs): thub pa de'i thad du 'gro zhing / sems can tshad med pa la ji ltar bde bar bya snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches nga'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong
17b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g.yas/ dpas bkab nas/ lag pa des las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba byung ba dang / btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung
17b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de bzhin du bzhon pa dang / gos dang / gser dang dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / su dag ci 'dod par
17b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa thams cad de las byung bar gyur pa dang sems can gang chos don du gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa de dag gis kyang lag pa de las chos thos par gyur pa dang / de nas sems can dpag
17b7(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par gyur pa dang / sems can gang nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu bde ba dang ldan
17b8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu 'di bstan
18a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
18a2(dkon brtsegs): mag zis brag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor babyas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i 'dra de dag la 'khar dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ 
18a3(dkon brtsegs): rang de'i chen phyogs su sa sa rgyas kyi zhing 'dinasasangs rgyas kyizhi ga khrag khrig brgya snang ga'i klung / sri na gnyis kyi khrim skyed 'das pan 'di sngon gyi khams na dzub cu
18a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal ba zhes bya ba ltar yang bzhugs te'i tshe sal chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
18a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bai DUr+ya'i bzang po 'ba' zhigalas mngon par grub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing den nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par
18a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhag pa med do sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gis yongs su gang ngo // yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams 'gro yang rung // 'ong
18a7(dkon brtsegs): yang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / ldang yang rung / 'chag kyang rung ste/ de dag gis bai DUr+ya'i sa chen po de las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs
18a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal po de mthong ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ shin tu byas pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ 
18b1(dkon brtsegs): 'is chen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas chos kun 'dri ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang de dag la lung ston to// de dag kyang chos thos nas
18b2(dkon brtsegs): pa thob bo// 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i dbus su yang nor bu rin po che chen po mngon par grub ste/ 
18b3(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zum pa dang / me tog kha bye ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par
18b4(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma dang zla bar mngon pa yang med/ nyi mtshan du mngon pa yang med do// yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs
18b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros shes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'
18b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das
18b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go
18b8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gtsam chu 'jug nas byang chum sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu 'artsegs pa'i rgyal po de la 'di
19a1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lag
19a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma
19a3(dkon brtsegs): snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang
19a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa dag nas/ 
19a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste chos bsgra ga pa'i phyir spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra byung ngo // de skad
19a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig
19a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen
19a8(dkon brtsegs): bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
19b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros byang chub sems dpa 'bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
19b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas
19b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
19b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thang du 'gro bar bya snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dadapa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji ltar stong
19b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang ngag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshen rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa'i
19b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me yang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa dang / 
19b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen pa yi btags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag dang / gshen rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad
19b8(dkon brtsegs): bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral zhing bde ba mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste dper na dge slong bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/ skad cig de nyid la sems
20a1(dkon brtsegs): can de dag bde rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas skad cig de nyid la sems can gang dag 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gas/ khro ba'amang rgyal lam/ 
20a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chab pa'am/ 'tshig pa 'am/ phrag dog gam ser sna 'am/ g.yo ba 'am/ tha ba 'am/ gnod sems kyis gzer ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams
20a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang skad cig de nyid la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / phan tshun du pa mar 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas te/ 
20a4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas byang chub sems
20a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan// 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste
20a6(dkon brtsegs): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la ldan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang
20a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// / bam po gnyis pa/ yang de'i tshe byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bad+hAr/ 
20a8(dkon brtsegs): krung stong phrag drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
20b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa med de/ 
20b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig 'chang ba sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ bud med kyi ming yang med cing mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes so// byang chub
20b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon zhing dkyil mo krung bcas par brdzus te 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya
20b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to// // de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed de/ de ltar byang
20b5(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snodal 'jug pa gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gnas/ sems mi g.yeng
20b6(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba rjes su gtong ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ mtshan ma med pa la yang dag par bsgrub pa/ smon lam med pa tshol ba/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang
20b7(dkon brtsegs): bral ba/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched rab tu rtogs pa/ 'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa de la mngon par dad pa/ chos thams cad rab tu
20b8(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa de dag la yongs su rtog pa med pa/ rtog pa yang dag par chad pa de yang mi mthong ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'
21a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan bskur ma 'artsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de'i smon lam gyi khyad par ni 'di lta ste sems can
21a2(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthong na de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi legs par brgyan par 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan
21a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das sA la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung
21a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha del te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba
21a5(dkon brtsegs): byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos
21a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di dang gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po 'di 'jig
21a7(dkon brtsegs): rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung ba des/ rigs
21a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung drug khri sum stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
21b1(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed ces bya ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba lta yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston/ 
21b2(dkon brtsegs): to/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems
21b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bsdu ba dang 'di lta ste chos bsgrags pa'i phyir spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'jig rten
21b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams de mi mjed ces bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das des bkra' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can 'dod chags la mi mjed/ zhe sdang la mi
21b5(dkon brtsegs): mjed/ gti mug la mi mjed/ sdug bsngal la mi// mjed de/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed// ces bya'o// gsol pa/ 
21b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag la la spros pa dang / mi snyan par brjod pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / brdegs pa bzod cing dang du len par bgyid pa mchis sam/ 'dod chags kyi
21b7(dkon brtsegs): sems skyes pa sel tam/ de bzhin du zhe sdang gi sems dang / gti mug gi sems sel ba mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag las
21b8(dkon brtsegs): gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can de dag las phal cher ni gnod sems dang tha ba dang zhe sdang mang ste/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis kun tu
22a1(dkon brtsegs): dkris so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab bo// gal te sems can de dag bzod par 'gyur na ni de yang rung na/ bcom
22a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ltar mi bzod pas na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab po// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rigs kyi
22a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa
22a4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang dul ba dang / nges pa dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag ni sems can thams cad kyis spros bsdigs mtshon gyis btab kyang / ji snyam mi mjed nga 'dod chags dang / 
22a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis mi 'phrogs so// rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa de dag gi ming gis 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces brjod do// bcom ldan 'das de
22a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yang de na sems can kha cig sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa mu cor smra ba/ khro ba gtum pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol ba/ 
22a7(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mi gus pa/ phrag dog la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can de dag gis de tsam du spros shing smad de/ gnod par byas shing
22a8(dkon brtsegs): skur kyang bcom ldan 'das de snying rje che bas bzod cing / dang du len te sa dang mnyam pa'i sems rjes su chags pa dang / khrong khro ba med pas de bsti stang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed de/ 
22b1(dkon brtsegs): bsti stang du ma byas kyang 'dud par mi byed de/ de spros shing brgyad kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ mi 'phrogs mi chags mi skyo ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi
22b2(dkon brtsegs): mjed ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i skar ma brtsegs
22b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag 'jig rten gyi khams der de tsam smad pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du ma skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// / 
22b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang dang shar gyi mtshoms na 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan
22b5(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs
22b6(dkon brtsegs): te 'tsho zhing bzhes so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sems can rnams rab tu bde ba dang ldan no// 'di lta ste dper na 'gog pa la snyoms par bzhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/ 
22b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyang bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no// yang rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis rgyan pa der lo bya ba brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa bas ni/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi
22b8(dkon brtsegs): mjed du tha na se gol togs pa tsam du sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du bskyed na/ gang nyin mtshan du yongs su dag par gnas pa lta
23a1(dkon brtsegs): smos kyang ci dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan
23a2(dkon brtsegs): pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
23a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o// 
23a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyodade'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ de nas byang chub/ sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i
23a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
23a6(dkon brtsegs): mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das
23a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro snyam nas/ de de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin
23a8(dkon brtsegs): po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu bab/ sil snyan brgya stong yang 'khrol/ mu tig gi rgyan phreng brgya stos
23b1(dkon brtsegs): yang mngon par 'phyang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan brgya stong mngon par 'byung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang
23b2(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa de dag
23b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis rang rang gis lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
23b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'irgyal pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
23b5(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das
23b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
23b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du sbyar te phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams
23b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/ rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa la yongasu zhus te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ de dag
24a1(dkon brtsegs): / thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
24a2(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / 
24a3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba/ de dag thams
24a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsungagasal ba'i sgra chen po de yang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'o// dadas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste
24a5(dkon brtsegs): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan
24a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa ji snyed pa de dag nas/ byang chub sems
24a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med cing / 
24a8(dkon brtsegs): khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang / chu zhing ci 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku'i yongs su grub pa yang de 'dra/ 
24b1(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / nyan thos chen po phun sum tshogs
24b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ci 'dra ba dang / longs spyod dang kun spyod pa ci 'dra de 'dra bar 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas
24b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems
24b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho chen po de mthong nas stan las lang sa ta bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.ya sa pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
24b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gso la to// phyogs bcu rnams su grags pa mtha'
24b6(dkon brtsegs): yas blo// 'jig rten lhar bcas 'dir ni lam me ste// thub pa'i thugs ni sems can thams cad kyis// tshad gzung mi nus de phyir khyod bsam yas// phyogs bcu dag nas
24b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal sras dpag med pa// chos tshol slad du de ring 'dir lhags shing // bcom ldan 'das la kun kyang gus bcas nas// smra ba'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu gsungs/ 
24b8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa// tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin blo rnams kyis// seng ge ltar ni 'jig med khyod mdzes te// na mkha' dag la nyi ma bzhin du gsal// 
25a1(dkon brtsegs): lha dang klu dang lha min gsang ba pa// dge bsnyen po mo dge slong dge slong ma// thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyis// bcom ldan
25a2(dkon brtsegs): phan bzhed chos ni bshad du gsol// khyod ni 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma 'ongs dang // da ltar yang ni shin tu nges par mkhyen// lus can mos pa ji bzhin khyod gzigs la/ 
25a3(dkon brtsegs): the tshom chen po sel ba'i chos bshad gsol// thub pa rgyal sras ji ltar spyad pas na// zhing rnams dag pa rdul med 'thob par 'gyur// ji ltar smon lam 'grub pa
25a4(dkon brtsegs): 'thob 'gyur ba// de ni 'dren pas bdag la myur bshadagasol// ji ltar ser sna'i dri mas mi gos shing / ji ltar tshul khrims ma nyams 'gyur ba dang / 
25a5(dkon brtsegs): bsdigs pa dang ni de bzhin skur pa dang // brnyas pa dag/ kyang thub pa ji ltar bzod// sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzer ba yi// 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal
25a6(dkon brtsegs): bzlog slad du// bskal pa bye ba mang por rgyal sras rnams// ji ltar brtson 'grus tsom shing sprod par 'gyur// rtag tu sems ni rtse gcig mnyam bzhag cing // bsam gtan
25a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa spyod yul rnam dag ste// pad+ma chu yi nyes pas mi gos ltar// ji ltar 'dod pa dag gis gos mi 'gyur// thub pa ji ltar zab mo'i chos smra zhing // mkhas pa 'jig rten
25a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i blo ldan 'gyur// brtan pa ji ltar bdud sde bcas bcom nas// byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
25b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gangan de la bzhugs
25b2(dkon brtsegs): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bzod pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa sgrub pa dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do// 
25b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bdag bdan bting du bcug ste/ 
25b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang / mod+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' ma stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byung chub sems dpa' rnams gdan 'ding du bcug pa las na/ 
25b5(dkon brtsegs): gtam 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gi phyir brtsam sa nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongasu spangs pa'i gtam zhig 'byung ste/ nyan thos dang rang
25b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams ni chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin pa lta zhig snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
25b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba mngon par byas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi 'bum pa/ rin po che du mas spras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba/ shing
25b8(dkon brtsegs): ngal 'jam zhing reg na bde ba bshams nas/ khri de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das khri snga mde
26a1(dkon brtsegs): / las bzhengs nas/ seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
26a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
26a3(dkon brtsegs): smon lam yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub kyi bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / brtson 'grus com pa
26a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen la bsten pa ste/ shA 'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// 
26a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gcig dang ldan na byang chub sa/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su sbyong
26a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing 'dod pa dang 'dun
26a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bskyed pa ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshig 'di skad ces gal te bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tu ma byung na sangs rgyas thams cad
26a8(dkon brtsegs): bsdus par gyur cig ces smras te/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// 
26b1(dkon brtsegs): du byung chub sems dadu di myur srub ni skye bathams sa du smra thas/ de bzhin ga shegs pa rnams byung yang rlung ma cung srung dug dun myi par ljim gyi gnas nas 'byung ba/ 
26b2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i bu / shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ro'i bu rab tu 'thung ba la mngon par
26b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu yong su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgon po'i gnas la dga' ba rnyed pa dang / 
26b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi skyed yul yang 'thob pa dang /  ma dang bu po dang bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam par snang ba nga
26b5(dkon brtsegs): zede 'gror 'gro po'i chos la brten pa dang sngon/ gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa btsun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang / del
26b6(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams dga' ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu po
26b7(dkon brtsegs): dedag yong su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad dgrol bar 'dod
26b8(dkon brtsegs): bas rgyun tu rab tu 'byung ba dang mngon par 'byung ba la shin tu dga' bar bya'o// shA ri'i bu chos gcig po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing
27a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sngon/ 
27a2(dkon brtsegs): lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byung
27a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa mi 'dod nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam la mi dga'/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang mi bsten/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la mi slob/ 
27a4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi ston gzha na yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug cingarang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang de bzhin
27a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o// shA ri'i bu de la
27a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos dang rang
27a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gi dge 'dun rab tu rnyed pa dang de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan/ 
27a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su sgrogs shing chos ston pa dang 'di lta ste brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid
27b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rgya chen po bskyed pa dang / mir gyur na yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba
27b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / g.yog 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o// shA ri'i bu de
27b3(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa dang / rang
27b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pas/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gcig yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na de ni de bas
27b5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// shA ri'i bu de ci phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas skyes pas ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ sangs
27b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'byung ba med na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod na sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su
27b7(dkon brtsegs): gdags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems la rab tu 'god pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu
27b8(dkon brtsegs): chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yong su 'dzin to// 
28a1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam la mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa/ 
28a2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// gsum gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang / zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / 
28a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o// shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di
28a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs par grong du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dar 'khor la chos ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par kha da zas za ba dang / mi 'jigs par gtsug lag khang
28a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'jugs pa dang mi 'jigs par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par lung 'jog pa dang mi 'jigs
28a6(dkon brtsegs): par slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang / mi 'jigs par byams pa dang ldan pas 'khor la rjes su ston pa dang mi 'jigs par gos dang zas dang mal cha dang / 
28a7(dkon brtsegs): na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad la spyod pa dang / des smras pa gzung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs
28a8(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu po de dag 'thob po// shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu yongs su 'dzin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 
28b1(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dir sdig pa mi 'dod pa min/ de shes kyis khe mi 'dod pa yin/ de grags pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de khyim yongs su mi 'dzin pa yin/ de khyim la
28b2(dkon brtsegs): ser sna med pa yin/ de gos dang zas dang mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa yin/ nges smras pa gzung bar 'os pa yin/ 
28b3(dkon brtsegs): lnga dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa yin/ de sangs rgyas kyi sems la sems bskyed pa yin te/ shA/ 
28b4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu dgon pa la
28b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na yon tan gyi phan yon bcu yong su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di 'du 'dzin rnam par spong ba dang / rab tu
28b6(dkon brtsegs): dben pa la brten pa dang / de bsam gtan la sems dmigs par 'gyur ba dang / bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams 'dod pa dang / de'i lus bde ba
28b7(dkon brtsegs): dang mi 'bral ba dang / de'i tshangs par spyod pa bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / tshegs chung ngus ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / des tsheg dang yi ge bstan pa rnams chung mi
28b8(dkon brtsegs): za ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su
29a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu
29a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa
