29a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bden pa smra ba yin/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ nga rgyal tshar
29a4(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa'i phyir zhugs shing phrag dog dang ser sna yongs dasu spangs pa yin pha rol 'byor pa la yid dga' da ba yin no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bden par
29a5(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi ga zhe na/ 'di lta ste de'i kha nas ut+pa la'i dri dang 'byung nga ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha'
29a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing tshig 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung phun sum tshogs pa yongs su
29a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba'i phan yon yin no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ 
29a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ gang 'di ngan 'gror skye ba rnam par spong ba ste/ 'di lta ste rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rta'i skye gnas dang / de bzhin du gzhan smad par skyong ba
29b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spong ba dang / mi smad par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan byiphyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis
29b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni phrag dog dang ser sna yongasu spangs/ 
29b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste de gtong ba'i sems la mi rmongs pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba'i dus na sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang
29b4(dkon brtsegs): de tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'ongs na khyim gyi sgo gcod da par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i gtong ba dang len pa la su yang phrag dog mi byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag
29b5(dkon brtsegs): ni phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i
29b6(dkon brtsegs): phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bdag gis sems can 'di dag gzung ste bdag 'di dag gi ched du go cha bgos nas 'di dag la bde bar sbyar bar bya ba yin na/ sems
29b7(dkon brtsegs): can 'di dag ni rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar 'tsho'o zhes dga' ba rnyed pa dang / de'i longs spyod rgyal po dang rkun po dang / me dang chu la sogs pa dang / bgo
29b8(dkon brtsegs): skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa/ 
30a1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa de'i tshe/ de la rgyal po yang dga' bar 'gyur ba na/ sems can gzhan lnga smos kyang ci dgos/ de longs spyod dang kun tu spyad pa rgya chen po la sems/ 
30a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon
30a3(dkon brtsegs): lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las
30a4(dkon brtsegs): mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa jilta/ dbu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing / yongs su sbyong ste lnga gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub
30a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kun tu tshol zhing de gang la chos nyan pa de la byang
30a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas ji ltar yon tan 'dri dag yongs su bsgrubs pa de kun 'dri zhing des chos de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
30a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi gling yongs su das par skye bar smon de tshul khrims sangs su dag par 'gyur roste/ de tshul khrims mangs su dag pas gang dang gang du slo pa
30a8(dkon brtsegs): de nga de gyis te/ de ri gyes nas de sangs rgyas kyi shing 'angs su dag pa la sems ga / can byas sa kun su mtshogs pas byang chung sa mas pa
30b1(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin te/ des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas shing
30b2(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thang du song nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar spyad na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongasu
30b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin ces kun tu zhus nas de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen te/ gang rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su
30b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag ston cing / yang dag/ par rab tu 'chad de/ des de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub
30b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan zhing / bya ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de mi shes pa yongasu sbyong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yongs su spong ngo // de la ye shes ni gang
30b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni gang zhe na/ ye shes shes bya ba ni gang dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni ye shes te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o// bya ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar
30b7(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de la rgyu ni gang / 'byung ba ni gang zhe na/ rgyu zhes bya ba
30b8(dkon brtsegs): ni gang 'di tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste/ gang las phyin ci log bzhi la sems can rnams gnas par 'gyur ba'o// de ni tshul bzhin la btson pa/ 
31a1(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de la tshul bzhin sbyong ba gangazhen/ gang 'ad tshas thams cad yid la byed po ste/ 'byung ba yang de nyid yin no// shari'i du gnan ya
31a2(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes/ ning gang ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so// de la sangs rgyas kyang bo nyid gang / zhing gi ba nyid ni gang
31a3(dkon brtsegs): zhen sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam mo// zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming tsam mo// gang ming tsam de dben par shes shing / ji ltar chos
31a4(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa ste/ shA ri'i dbu chos lnga po de dag dang ldan no// byang chub stem sa dpa' smon lam las mi g.yo zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing
31a5(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su sbyong ngo // shA ri na Ta gzhan yang ches drug dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur
31a6(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su 'dzin te/ 
31a7(dkon brtsegs): drug gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa po sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba ste/  mngos po gang langs pa yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'dod par 'gyur bde
31a8(dkon brtsegs): dag yongs su gtang yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / yid dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas 'di ltar gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
31b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la mngon par smon pas/ bdag gis sbyin pa chen po dang / theg pa chen po dang / bya ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis/ 
31b2(dkon brtsegs): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par mi nus so snyam du rtog go// des de ltar brtags nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ des
31b3(dkon brtsegs): rang gi lus dang srog yongs su gtang yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur na/ gzhan nor gyi rnam pa dang / chung ma dang / bu po dang bu mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shA ri'i bu
31b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du sems gang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na/ da shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
31b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bdog pa thams cad yongasasu gtong ba yin te/ de'i phyir de byang chub thob na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// 
31b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa yang rung rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la
31b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gnas pa yin te/ de srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las mi 'da'o// gang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par bzung ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
31b8(dkon brtsegs): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes dga' ba rnyed cing / mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ mngon
32a1(dkon brtsegs): par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa snad de/ de tshangs par spyo cing bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do// de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'phru
32a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi tshul dang ldan par yang dag par so sor rtogs par 'gyur// yang dag par so sor rtogs pa la gnas pa ni rab mo la bzod pa skye'o// bzod pa skyes pa ni lta 'drung
32a3(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur ro// lta ba drang po ni yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro/ yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas pa ni khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ 
32a4(dkon brtsegs): de khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bas skrag par 'gyur ro// skrag pas 'byung ba tshal lo// 'byung ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji lta
32a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag sdug bsngal ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang / bzhin te/ bdag gis sems can 'di dgra thams cad kyi khung khye nye bar ni ba
32a6(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par 'di dag gi bde ba'i rgyu gzhan med snyam mo// de de ltar sa sor rtag pa na sring rje chen po 'thob bo// de cher snying rjebs thams cad mkhyen pa mdzob kyi bar du mgo nga
32a7(dkon brtsegs): gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du 'dun 'grus mi 'dorar// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzod pa'i gom gyon cing bzod pa'i skabs dang ldan pa min gyi/ 
32a8(dkon brtsegs): dargyal gyi stobs dang ldan pa ma yin// ngas rgyas brgyad/ brdzogs pajigs pang pa 'gyu /  mal mi 'khrug gad pa masemams/ 
32b1(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed de/ gal te bdag la sems can de dag gis ri rab tsam gyi tho bas brdegs shing bskal pa bye ba'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par gshe yang bdag gi gnod sems/ 
32b2(dkon brtsegs): dang tha ba dang / zhe sdang gis sems bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni ma bslabs pa bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
32b3(dkon brtsegs): la slob par 'dod pa'o snyam nas/ de ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyis spros pa dang / brgyad pa dang / brdegs pa de lta de lta bur snying rje chen po bskyed de/ bdag gis
32b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag bskyab par bya'o// bdag sems da can 'di dag gi don du go cha bgos nas/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ba yin te/ bdag gis 'di
32b5(dkon brtsegs): dag 'khor ba las yong su thar par bya'i/ bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems dang / tha ba dang zhe sda nga gi sems bskyed par ni mi bya'o snyam mo// de de ltar
32b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i go cha bgos pas/ phun sum tshogs pa bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di la rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum
32b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum chog
32b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa dang / chos can pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos la nan tan byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba phun sum tshogs
33a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnyed pa dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzod pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phun sum tshogs pa bcu po/ 
33a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'thob po// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos yongasu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams shing yi dmal brtan pa yin no// 
33a3(dkon brtsegs): de 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gal te bdag gis sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar yang 'khor bar bya'o zhes tshul 'di dang / brtson 'grus
33a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsom pa 'di dang / spyod pa 'di dang / sems ni da ba 'di dang / yi dam 'di dang / dge ba'i bsam pa 'di dang / snying rje'i sems 'dis sems can 'di dag
33a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi ched du bskal pa de snyed du 'khor bar bya/ sa te/ 'di ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag yongasu mi gto ngo snyam nas/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo
33a6(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu gang bar byas te/ sems bskyed pa sems
33a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa tsam la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa ste/ tshul 'di dang stobs bskyed pa 'dis phyi ma'i mtha
33a8(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye bar sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha'i
33b1(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed na/ de de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// shA ri'i bu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpas yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob ste/ bcu
33b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ des 'di lta ste des byis pa'i spyod pa spangs pa yin/ des sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongasu bzung ba yin/ des 'khor ba la nye bar 'du shes bskyed pa yin// 
33b3(dkon brtsegs): des snying rje chen po yongasu bzung ba yin/ sngon dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur ba yin/ nad nyung ba yin/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
33b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyi bka' bzhin byas pa yin/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug chung ba yin/ jid ltar bstan pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa
33b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag 'thob po// 
33b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rje su dran zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni thugs rtse gcig pa
33b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa'o snyam nas de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhud pa'i rjes su 'gro bar bya na sems
33b8(dkon brtsegs): g.yengs pa dang brjed ngas pas ni gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas te/ gnas 'di thob par mi nus so snyam nas de chags pa thams cad dang / yongasu 'dzin pa thams cad dang / 'thob
34a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bkur bsti thams cad dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal la chags pa thams cad dang / grogs po dang / gla mi dang khyim la sred pa thams cad/ 
34a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu btang ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sems can thams cad ni bdag gis yongs su mi gtang ngo snyam nas/ dgon pa rab tu dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ bse ru
34a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar gcig pu spyod cing de dgon pa rab tu dgon pa dag tu gnas nas/ phyogs gcig tu sems can rnams la byams pas khyab par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi
34a4(dkon brtsegs): bar du tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sems can tham sa cad la byams pas khyab par byed do// byams pa da la gnas nas bsam gtan la bsam gtan par 'gyur// 
34a5(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang gis gaN+DI/ klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong / gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gang+gA'i
34a6(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stong du byas pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gang rab tu dben pa 'dod cing dgon pa log su phyogs te/ 
34a7(dkon brtsegs): gom pa bdun bor na 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// ches myur du byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu bcu po 'di dag ni dben pa na gnas shing / 
34a8(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dran pa dang ldan pa yin// blo gros dang ldan pa yin/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin/ 
34b1(dkon brtsegs): mos pa dang ldan pa yin/ myur du spobs pa rab tu thob pa yin/ gzungs sgrub pa yin+da/ skye ba dang 'jig pa la mkhas pa thob pa yin// tshul khrims kyi phung po las mi nyams/ 
34b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ lce rnams kyang de la rim gro byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi 'byor pa la mi 'dod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu bcu po de dag ni dben pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan la bsam gtan
34b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de 'di ltar shes rab gang nas
34b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung snyam du nye bar rtog cing // de 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i gnas las byung ba ste/ shes rab byung ba las chos dkar
34b5(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad rnam par 'phel lo snyam nas/ de shes ra la slob ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / sngags kyi gnas dang / 
34b6(dkon brtsegs): sman gyi gnas dang / gang bya dka' ba dang / sgrub dka' ba'i las de dag thams cad la slob po// bslab nas kyang de 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ gang 'jig rten pa'i shes
34b7(dkon brtsegs): rab 'di ni yid 'byung ba ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar ma yin/ 'gog par ma yin/ zhi bar ma yin/ mngon par shes par ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs par
34b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub par ma yin/ dge sbyong ma yin/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyis 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab gang gis shin tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i bzo rnam pa de lta
35a1(dkon brtsegs): bu dang sngags rnam pa de lta bu dang / sman rnam pa de lta bu dang / shes rab rnam pa de lta bu yongs su btsalo snyam nas/ de chos thams cad
35a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi thog ma yongasu tshol lo// de chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongasu tshol ba na chos gang yang chos gang la yang nye bar 'jog pa'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rje su mi
35a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // yang dag par rjesu mi mthong bas/ rab tu zhi ba la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab tu zhi bar spyod pa la gnas nas/ yongasu yid mi 'chad do// yongasu yid mi 'char
35a4(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ de sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i daphyir bsams bzhin du srid pa 'dzin te/ shA ri'i bu chos
35a5(dkon brtsegs): drug po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdo/ na par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing smon lam las mi nyams
35a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos
35a7(dkon brtsegs): bdun dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong ngo // bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste bdog pa
35a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongasu gtong zhing / sbyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyang skyon med la tshul khrims de la rlom sems kyang med pa dang / bzod cing des la sems de yang
35b1(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la lus dang ngagra dang sems de yang mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan yang yongasu sgrub la/ de yang mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan/ 
35b2(dkon brtsegs): la bsam gtan pa dang / shes rab kyang yongasu rdzogs par byed la/ de rtogs pa yang med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyang rjesu dran li de mtshan ma yang sel ba ste/ shA ri'i bu
35b3(dkon brtsegs): chos bdun po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa yang yongasu 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu
35b4(dkon brtsegs): chos brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yod/ dasu sbyong ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ phrog dog med pa dang / 
35b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyan sbyin pa dang / sems rgya che ba dang / chos smra ba la sti stang byed pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang / kun bged pa'i ngang tshul can
35b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing
35b7(dkon brtsegs): yang yongasu sbyong ngo // // bam po gsum pa// shA ri'i bu chos dgu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing
35b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yong su dag par byed de/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus sdom pa dang / ngag sdom pa dang / yid sdom pa dang / 'dod chags bsal ba dang / 
36a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang bsal ba dang / gti mug bsal ba dang / slu ba med pa dang / mdza' ba brtan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brnyas pa med pa ste/ shA ri'i/ 
36a2(dkon brtsegs): bu chos dgu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu sbyong bar byed do// shA ri'i bu chos bcu dang ldan
36a3(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yong su dag par byed do// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thos na
36a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs
36a5(dkon brtsegs): shing snying rje ba dang / lha rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shi/ nga snying rje ba dang / mi rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dbul ba dang / mu ge dang rkun po dang
36a6(dkon brtsegs): rang rta dang dmigs gi gnod pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba ste/ de 'di snyam du ci nas kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi/ 
36a7(dkon brtsegs): dgas kyi yul med cing bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dang / bgo ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / sems can rnams kyang tshe dpag tu med par gyur te/ nga'i ba med cing yongasu
36a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par ma byas kyi bar du brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo // snyam du sems
36b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu dag par byed do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang / 
36b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' me tog khyer zhing de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du song nas 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ me tog 'di ji lta dri zhim la kha/ 
36b3(dkon brtsegs): dog bzang zhing blta na sdug ste/ yid du 'ong ba dang mdzes pa de bzhin du bdag byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang me tog sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang / rin po che sna
36b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan par gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ bye ma dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang byug pa dang / bzhon pa
36b5(dkon brtsegs): dang gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man
36b6(dkon brtsegs): shel lam byi ru'i bar du gang ci 'bul yang rung ste/ de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sgrub pa'i don tu yongasu bsngo zhing tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pas byung
36b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa de'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni su la yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i
36b8(dkon brtsegs): tshig mi brjod cing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig sha stag brjod de/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang gis kyang yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos te/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra
37a1(dkon brtsegs): sha stag thos par 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bde ba yongasu mi tshul zhing gzhan bde bas dga' bar 'dzin te/ 
37a2(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams bde ba'i dam pas tshim par 'gyur ro// shA ra'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba bcu'i las
37a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par blangs shing bsgrub ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thams cad
37a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshes sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing 'byung ba'i shes rab can
37a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yul gang na 'dug kyang rung ste/ yul der skyes pa 'am bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ sems
37a6(dkon brtsegs): can gang ji snyed cig des mthong ba de thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug cing su la'ang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi brjod cing / gzhan du na sangs rgyas
37a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis theg pa'i gtam sha stag brjod de/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
37a8(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thob par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan
37b1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi rnyed pa mi 'phrog cing / gzhan gyis thob na dga' bar 'dzin te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang ji snyed/ 
37b2(dkon brtsegs): cig skyes pa de thams cad mi 'phrogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos kyi 'thob pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge slong ngam/ 
37b3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ma 'am/ su la'ang rung ste nyes pa byung bas mi rgol la bdag nyid kyang dam pa'i chos la sbyor te// de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni nyes pa'i ming yang ye med
37b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de drag ni nyes pa med pa'i chos can yong su dag par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems
37b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos 'dod cing chos don du gnyer la yongasu yid/ chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ ci skad/ du thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pas de byang chub thob
37b6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag smyos pa de dag thams cad chos 'dod cing chos don du gnyer ba dang / yongasu yi 'chang ba med pa'i rang bzhin can te/ 
37b7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnga bo che dang dung dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang
37b8(dkon brtsegs): bi wang rgyud gcig pa dang sgra stan dang / khar bkrol dang / gling bu dang / pi wang dang / ba laM ki dang / kim pa la sogs pa rol mo sil snyan gyi yo byad yid du
38a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sgrub pa'i/ 
38a2(dkon brtsegs): don du yongs su bsngo ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sil snyan brgya stong ma dkrol ma brdungs par sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la
38a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' brjed ngas pa'i sems can rnams la dran par 'gyur ba'i gdam ngag gis 'dems te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams
38a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyi zas can du 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tsho gas pa las brtsams te/ bskal pa 'am bskal
38a5(dkon brtsegs): pa las lhag par chos bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ spobs pa la mtha' thug pa med mod kyi/ mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub
38a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis gang thos nas de yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur bar mdor bstan to// shA ri'i bu chos gsum dang
38a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / ji ltar bsams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par
38a8(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bag yod par gnas pa dang / ji skad du thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa dang / smon lam gyi khyad par te/ 
38b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing ji ltar bsams pa'i sangs rgyas
38b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas
38b3(dkon brtsegs): legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni bag mchis pa la gnas so// byang chub ni nan tan la gnas so// 
38b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis 'grub po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
38b5(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams/ cad ni bag yod pa la gnas so// byang chub ni nan tan la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
38b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis 'grub pa'o// shA ri'i bu sngon ngas ci ltar smon lam btab pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu grub po// 
38b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu brag yod pa la gnas pas smon lam yongs su rdzogs so// shA ri'i bu ngas nan tan byas pas byang chub thob po// shA ri'i bu bag med par gnas shing tshig gi
38b8(dkon brtsegs): las lhur len pa dang / nan tan med pas nyan thos kyi sa yang sgrub par mi nus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos te/ shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang
39a1(dkon brtsegs): / chub sems dpa' yung dag pa'i mang du ga dgas par drum 'dra' ba 'aspyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa/ 
39a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab par bya'o// de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stongs so'i stan los langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis kyang mgrin
39a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab par bgyi'o// nan tan
39a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su sgrub par bgyi'o// bag mchis par dganas par bgyi'o// smon lam yong su rdzogs pa dar bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa
39a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// ji ltar bsams pa'i smon lam yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du bya chub sems pa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// de nas
39a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang
39a7(dkon brtsegs): lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di skad du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol
39a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'di dag thams cad bskal pa brgya phrag stong 'das nas bla na med pa yang
39b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu dper na seng ge zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang
39b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du 'byung ba ngas gzigs pa bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag smon lam bkod pa zhes bya ba sha stag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 
39b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na
39b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji 'dra ba de 'dra da bar lhag chad med par 'gyur te/ tshe'i tshad da ni ma gtogs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
39b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di dag gi tshe'i tshad ci tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re zhing tshe'i tshad bskal
39b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu bcur 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa
39b7(dkon brtsegs): stan las langs te bla gos drag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
39b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags na/ bcom
40a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de'i sangs/ 
40a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing ni ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags
40a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i
40a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhonur dgus la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
40a5(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras parigs kyi bu khyod kyi sa kho bo la ji khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
40a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs sam/ 'on te ma zhugs shes de dris shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gal te kho bo byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na ni de'i phyir
40a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na kho bo yang dag par zhugs pa med pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod sems
40a8(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ma zhugs sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
40b1(dkon brtsegs): can dmig su med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gal te khebs sems can zhig dmigs na ni de byur kha ba yang de dag gdan du byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug na/ rigs kyi/ 
40b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi phyir sems can yang medasrog kyang med/ gang zag kyang med pa de'i phyir kho bo 'jug pa med do// ldog pa med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod sangs/ 
40b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ches la ma zhugs sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de tso'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ste/ chos gang
40b4(dkon brtsegs): zag pa med cing 'ongs su gtogs pa med la/ mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med pa de ni sangs rgyas su zhugs pa yin te/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas su zhugs
40b5(dkon brtsegs): pade dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas su zhugs pa de dang mi 'dra bamed do// rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du khyod sang+yas kyi chos kyi don du ma zhugs sam zhes smras
40b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lung ston cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems gzugs byang chub tu ston tam/ 'on te gzugs
40b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin nam gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dngagazugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid
40b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu smon/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am 'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/ gzugs
41a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin nyid dam/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dam gzugs kyi chos nyid byung
41a2(dkon brtsegs): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ gzugs byang chub tu smon pa med do// gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / gzugs kyi
41a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid dang / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi chos nyid ni byang chub tu smon pa med do// 
41a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste// gzugs kyi chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// smras pa/ 
41a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa shes pa byang chub tu smon tam/ rnam par shes/ 
41a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub tu smon tam/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems rnam par shes pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ 
41a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
41a8(dkon brtsegs): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni byang chub tu smon pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub tu smon pa med do// rnam par shes pa ni byang chub
41b1(dkon brtsegs): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ma d+ha'o// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
41b2(dkon brtsegs): phung po lnga po dag las phyi rol tu bdag gam/ bdag gi zhes bya bar gdags par nus sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar yin na
41b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu smon pa'i chos de gang zhig yod/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'ang gang zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod lta bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
41b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po gzhan dag gi dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pas kho bo byang chub tu smon pa med do// kho bo mngon parardzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes bshad na/ bstan pa
41b5(dkon brtsegs): de thos pas byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams skrag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni skrag pa med pa ste/ 
41b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha' ni skrag pa med do// skrag par med par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'ang chos ston te/ gang skrag pa de ni skyo bar 'gyur ro// gang skyo bar gyur
41b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni rnam par grol lo// gang rnam par grol ba de ni bcings pa med par 'gyur ro// 
41b8(dkon brtsegs): gang bcings pa med pa de ni chags par mi 'gyur ro// gang chags pa med pa de ni 'gro ba med do// gang 'gro ba med pa de ni 'ong ba med do// gang 'ong ba med pa de ni smon pa med/ 
42a1(dkon brtsegs): gang snyan pa med pa don ldan lam 'drebs pa med do// gang spyan lam 'debs pa med pa den ldog pa med do// gang thug pa med pa don byer ldan
42a2(dkon brtsegs): bste/ ci las phyir ldog ce na/ bdag tu 'dzin pa las phyir ldog ga/ sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / chad par
42a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa las phyir ldog go// rnam par rtog pa las phyir ldog go/ nam phyir ldog pa de ni de'i tshe 'gyur ba med
42a4(dkon brtsegs): pas phyir mi ldog ste/ gang las phyir mi ldog ce na// stong pa nyid las phyir mi ldog go/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 
42a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam sa las phyir mi ldog go// de la gang las phyir mi sna rtag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bral ba
42a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// khongs su gtogs pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// dmigs pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// 
42a7(dkon brtsegs): len pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// dor ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// rgyu ba med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa dang ming tsam du zad pa dang / stong pa
42a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rdul med pa dang / rdul dang bral ba dang
42b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi ba med pa dang / yid la bya ba med pa dang / mi ldan pa med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / blangs pa med pa dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
42b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de dag ni chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang las 'di dag ni
42b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi cho sa rnamaso zhes bya bar brjod par bya ba'i gnas mi dmigs so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs par
42b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de dag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang 'jigs par ma gyur pa de dag ni ci'ang mngon par rdzogs
42b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsams shing de skad du ston/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu grang 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni rnam par
42b6(dkon brtsegs): rtog par 'gyur te/ gang rnam par rtog pa de dag ni 'di snyam du bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pas/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
42b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa ji snyed du skyes par gyur pa de snyed du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang dag de lta bu'i sems mi bskyed pa de dag ni byang chub tu dmigs pa med cing
42b8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed do// byang chub kyi sems su dmigs pa med pas rnam par rtog pa med do// gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtogs pa de'i tshe ci'ang mngon par rdzogs par
43a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgyab med do/ ci'i phyir ci yang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyab med ce na/ byang chub de mi dmigs pas de phyir mngon par rdzogs par
43a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya ba med do// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ na mkha'i khams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam
43a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu co bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam par bstan mod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// 'jal dpal
43a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na namakha' ji/ lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ byang chub ji lta ba/ na mkha' yang de bzhin te/ na mkha' dang byang chub
43a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med do// gang gis de lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid shes pa de ni nu zad kyang shes pa med la/ des ma shes pa'ang ga
43a6(dkon brtsegs): yang med do// bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong khri nyis stong nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par tshul lo// lha dang mi khri ba ni sdong chos la chos kyi
43a7(dkon brtsegs): mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go// srog chags dgu khri drug stong gis sngon ma bskyed pa las/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
43a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par
43b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
43b2(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kha rog chos rnams ma skyes pa la bdag rnam par rtog tu ma gzhugs/ rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig
43b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyad par bya'o zhes zer na/ de nyid de'i log par lta ba chen por 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu
43b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ni sems gang byang chub tu bskyed par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ de lta bdag gis sems de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
43b5(dkon brtsegs): bas byang chub tu'ang sems ma bskyed do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal rjes su mthong zhes bya ba'i tshig de'idon gang yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pas
43b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu yang dag par rje su ma mthong zhes bya ba ni mnyam po nyid bstan to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces bya smras pa/ rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni
43b7(dkon brtsegs): gang la tha dad pa med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig tu bstan pas ro gcig tu brjod cing / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
43b8(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par byang ba med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang rtag pa med pa dang / mi skye ba med pa dang / mi 'gag pa dang / nga'i ba med pa dang / yongasasu 'dzin pa med pa dang / dor ba
44a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir chos ston cing / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos de lta bu mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid ces
44a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos nyid khong du chud pa de ni khams la tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gcig tu yang yang dag par rjes su
44a3(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong ba 'di ni mnyam pa nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi mnyam pa med pa'o// mi mnyam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod ma nas dag pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ 
44a4(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhonur
44a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa 'di ni 'di ji srid cig nas ngas bla na med pa yangadag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes bgyi bar mi ston te/ 'khor 'di dag ni nyan par 'tshal lo
44a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ de yang ci tsam du byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ sems kyang mi dmigs
44a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de tsam du zab pa'i bzod pa dang ldan te/ des byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs pas/ ngas 'di srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyedo zhes bya bar mi ston nas/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal
44a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med
44b1(dkon brtsegs): pa brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag bdun 'das pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
44b2(dkon brtsegs): 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga
44b3(dkon brtsegs): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu cu rtsa
44b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po zhes bya bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'ad sa de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po
44b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de chos ston to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das/ de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'
44b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa ni de nyis 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ rigs kyi bu rgyal
44b7(dkon brtsegs): po na mkha' zhes bya ba de bu dang / chung ma dang gnyen 'dab dang / 'khor du bcas pa las gzhan med cing skye ba med pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs nyan
44b8(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi dge 'dun dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du zhal zas kyi rnam pa kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / na bza' sar
45a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / pho brang khang pa brtsegs pa gsar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / rim gro kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang
45a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis rim gro byas par gyur to// de ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu de gcig pu dben pa na gnas shing gnyis su med par/ 
45a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dug 'dug pa'i yid la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed par gyur te/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas kyang de dag nges pa med pa'i sems kyi 'dus byas na/ 
45a4(dkon brtsegs): don dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yongasu bsngo bar bya'o snyam denas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dbargya byin du bsngo 'am/ tshangs par bsngo 'am/ 
45a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los bsgyur bar bsngo 'am/ nyan thosu bsngo 'am/ rang sangs rgyas su bsngo ba 'am/ gang du bsngo snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu rgyal po de sems de
45a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar skyes ma thag tu steng gi bar snang las lha mang pos sgra bsgrag pa/ rgyal po chen po de ltar dma' ba'i sems ma bskyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyi bsod nams kyi phung
45a7(dkon brtsegs): bo yangs pa byas kyis/ rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig ces byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal po na mkha' de dga' ba dang / 
45a8(dkon brtsegs): mchag tu dga' bachen po skyes par gyur te/ des 'di snyam du bsams so// bdag ni byang chub las phyir mi ldagag// de ci'i byar zhe na/ lha rnams kyis bdag gi sems
45b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu shes te/ sgra bsgrags so snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po na mkha' de srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 
45b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom
45b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i
45b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btu dade nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de ga sol pa/ khyod kyi spyan sngar dam chos zhu// skyes bu
45b5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa mchog skye bar// rnam pa gang gis 'gyur ba de/ rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsung // rnam 'dren khyod la mngon sum du// mchod pa yangs par gyi
45b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kyang rtsa mangs sems kyis bgyid gyur gyis// gang yang yongasu bsngo ma bgyis// bdag ni gcig pu dben gnas tshe// 'di 'dra'i sems shig skyes par gyur// bdag gis
45b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams che bsags na// ji ltar yongasu de bsngo snyam// tshangs par bsngo 'am brgya byin nam/ gling bzhi'i dbang phyug thob par ram// 'on te nyan thos dngos por 'am// rang rgyal thob pa
45b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir bsngo snyam// de ltar sems bskyed de ma thag/ lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod pa ni// dma' ba'i sems kyis bsod nams 'di// rnam par chud gson ma byed cig/ sems can kun la phan
46a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir// smon lam rlabs chen gdab par gyis// byang chub sems rab bskyed byas shing // 'jig rten rnams kyi don kyang gyis// de bas chos kyi dbang phyug
46a2(dkon brtsegs): gtso/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag zhu ste// thub pa ji ltar sems bskyed na// rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye bar 'gyur// ye shes de ni gang gis 'thob/ don de bdag la bstan du gsol/ 
46a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ni bskyed byas shing // thub pa khyod 'dra ba dag kyang smon// de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen pos shes par gyis
46a4(dkon brtsegs): rim gyis khyod la bstan par bya// chos rnams thams dang rkyen bzhin te// 'dun pa'i rtsa la rab tu gnas/ gang gis smon lam ci btab pa// de 'dra'i 'bras bu
46a5(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// rgyal po ngas kyang sngan chad ni/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed gyur// sems can kun la phan don du// ngas ni smon lam dam pa btang
46a6(dkon brtsegs): smon lam ji ltar btab tshul du// ngas ni 'bras bu thob par gyur// byang chub dam pa ngas thos pas// nga yi bsam pa rdzogs par gyur// rgyal po chen po brtan gyis la// mi 'gyur sem
46a7(dkon brtsegs): ni bskyed par gyis// gal te spyod pa spyad byas na// khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur// thub pa'i gsung de thos gyur nas// rgyal po de ni dga' bar gyur// 'jig rten kun gyis
46a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du// seng ge'i nga ror chog 'od brjod// 'khor ba tha ma med pa yi// sngon gyi tha ma ji srid pa// de srid sems can pan don du// spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bya// 
46b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga 'dir// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// 'gro ba thams cad 'gron gnyer ste// dbul zhing phongs pa dgrol bar bya// de ring pa na/ 
46b2(dkon brtsegs): chad gal te yang // bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed na// phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur// byang chub nam zhig
46b3(dkon brtsegs): thob par du/ tha ba'i sems dang gnod sems dang // phrag dog dang ni ser sna yang // de ring phan chad mi bya'o// tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad// sdig pa'i 'dod pa yongs
46b4(dkon brtsegs): gtang / tshul khrims sdom dang nges pa la// sangs rgya sa rjesu bslab par bya// bdag ni byang chub rings chu dal du// 'tshang rgyar mos shing spro ba med// phyi mthar
46b5(dkon brtsegs): thug gi bar du yang // sems can gcig phyir spyadapar bya// tshad med bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyang bar bya// phyogs rnams bcu pa
46b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du// bdag gi ming ni thos par bya// bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar dogs pa med// bdag gi lhags bsam rnam par dag/ bdag dbang 'di ni
46b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa rnams// lus dang ngag gi las rnams kyang // rnam pa kun tu bdag gis spangs// yid kyi las kyang sbyang bar bya// mi dge'i las ni spyad mi bya// ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te/ 
46b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon du 'gyur zhe na// bden pa des ni sa 'di yang // rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur cig/ bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod pa// ma nor yang dag smras she na// bden pa des ni mkha'// 
47a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyings las// sil snyan dag gi sgra grag shog/ bdag la gal te g.yo med cing // de bzhin thab med ce na// man dar yi me tog bzang // bden pa de ni char du la
47a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag don du nges pa yi// tshig bden de skad brjod pa dang // phyogs bcu mtha' yas thams cad kyi// bye ba'i zhing rnam rab tu g.yos// de yi mod la mkha' dbyings nas// sil snyan
47a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba'i sgra yang byung // me tog man da ra ba dag/ mi 'greng bdun srid bab par gyur// rgyal po de yi rjes bslabs te// srog chags bye ba nyi shu yis// 'dron par bdag cag 'gyur
47a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon ces/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang bsgrags// de ltar de srog chags bye ba phrag/ nyi shu po rnams thams cang kyang // rgyal po mchog gi rjes slab cing // byung
47a5(dkon brtsegs): chub tu ni zhugs par gyur// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po namakha' zhes bya byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na
47a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis de ltar mi lnga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/ 'jam dpal
47a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis byang chub tu sems bskyed phyin chad bskal pa gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das par gyur to// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas
47a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang bskal ba gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das par gyur te/ de nas nye bar bzung nas 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yong su rdzogaso// 'di byang chub sems
47b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sa bcu thams cad yongasu rdzogs so// 'di sangs rgyas kyis yong su rdzog so// 'di sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyang yongasu rdzogs te/ bar 'ga' yang des
47b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur snyam pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par ma gyur to// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
47b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar/ rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu po de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang
47b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don du sangs rgyas
47b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bya ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bar yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// de dag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis sbyin pa
47b6(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par btsud do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la yang dag par btsud de// thams cad la yang bsnyen
47b7(dkon brtsegs): bkur dang yongasu spyad par byaso// thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos bzung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ma gtogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs log su sangs rgyas
47b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi khri bzhi stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i dbyings shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge
48a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dun tshad med pa dang / sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par bzhugs pa te/ de da ltar yang bzhugs shing 'tsho'o bzhe so// sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ srog
48a2(dkon brtsegs): chags brgya stong phrag bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam
48a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras// 'jam dpal gal te de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang yongasu rdzogs byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang yongasu rdzogs
48a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sa yang yongasu rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos/ thams cad kyang yongasu rdzogs na/ ci'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
48a5(dkon brtsegs): mi rgya de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon pa ra bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu sangs
48a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos yongasu rdzogs na yang dang yang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar medo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des byang chub thob par gyur pas thob zin pa ni bzod pa thob par mi bya'o// smras pa/ 
48a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu rdzogs zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid yongasu rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs pa'o/ na ma
48a8(dkon brtsegs): yong su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs pa'o// de ltar na mkha' dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su
48b1(dkon brtsegs): dbyer med do// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs pa gang yin zhes de skad zer ba la/ gang gzugs yongasu rdzogs pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed/ 
48b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / gang rnam par shes pa yongasasu rdzogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs pa'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gzugs yongasu rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu tshor ba dang // 'du shes
48b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongasasu rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gzugs kyi rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ 
48b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni mthong ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos gang / dag pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa de la yongasu
48b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa 'am/ 'grib par 'gyur ba yod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni med do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar chos gang ya
48b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa yang med/ 'grib pa yang med pa de ni yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ cis yong su rdzogs pa shes bya/ smras pa/ des chos ji ltar shes pa de ltar
48b7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes 'jug par 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe ye shes 'jug par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gang gi tshe mi rtog rnam par mi rtog de'i tshe/ yongasu rdzogs pa
48b8(dkon brtsegs): 'am 'grib par byed pa med do// gang yongasu rdzogs pa'am 'grib par med pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na gzugs kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni
49a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs yongasu rdzogs pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par
49a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yongasu rdzogs pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
49a3(dkon brtsegs): smraso/ 'jam dpal de ltar khyod yun ring po nas bzod pa thob kyang / bdag gis byang chub thob par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang skye ba med na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis
49a4(dkon brtsegs): da ji ltar sems can gzhan dag byang chub la yang dag par gzud par bya/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can gang yang byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud do// de ci'i
49a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa dang / sems can dben pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gang gis sems can dmi/ gas pa des ni byang chub kyang dmigs// gang gis byang chub
49a6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa de ni byang chub la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzud par byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis ni byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ sems can yang mi dmigs pas de ltar byang chub la
49a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams 'dzud par mi byed// mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub tu smon pa byed pa'ang med/ de las ldog pa'ang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pas/ de ltar/ 
49a8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid la smon pa med do// ldog pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed rnams la gang nas kyang 'ong ba dang / gang du yang 'gro ba med de de ni mnyam pa nyid do// rigs kyi bu mnyam pa
49b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid ces bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig ste/ stong pa nyid la smon pa gang yang med do// rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du de ltar yun ring po nas bzod pa thob na ji ltar ci'i phyir
49b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems mi bskyed ces zer ba ni/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems gang gis byang chub thob par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par
49b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni mi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems la gzugs med cing bstan du med pas/ byang chub kyang ming tsam ste/ yid las byung ba ma yin
49b4(dkon brtsegs): pas/ byang chub ces bya ba'am/ sems shes bya ba/ ni ming tsam ste/ ming gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed/ pa med pa'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de las bsams
49b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bdag gis byang chub ji ltar thob par bya snyam du/ sems bskyed pa med do zhes smras pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems de ni ma skyes pa ste/ ma skyes pa
49b6(dkon brtsegs): la skye ba med do// gang skye ba med pa de la thob pa dang mngon par rtog par bya ba gang zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang
49b7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la rlom sems med cing mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar rdul tsam gyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed mi 'gog pa de ltar rtog pa de ni mang/ 
49b8(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lta bas zhugs te mnyam pa nyid la chos
50a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mi dmigs shing / ma dmigs pas gcig pa'am tha dad par mi byed cing rlom sems mi byed pa 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// chos thams
50a2(dkon brtsegs): cad gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu lus kyis mngon du byas shing shes kyang lus la'ang mngon par zhen pa med/ sems la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa 'di ni mngon par
50a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa thob pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal thob pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni rgyu ba med pa'i tshig ste/ de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o// de'i rgyu ba khams
50a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum na tha snyad du 'di yin no zhes bstan du med de/ 'phags pa rnams kyi thob pa gang yin pa de ni brjo dad par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni gnas med
50a5(dkon brtsegs): cing rgyu ba med pas de'i phyir brjod par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de ni thob pa med pa las tho / pa'i sgrar brjod pa ste/ de ni chos gang yang thob pa yang ma
50a6(dkon brtsegs): yin ma thob pa yang ma yin pas/ de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o// // bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
50a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
50a8(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid
50b1(dkon brtsegs): la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
50b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang byang chub la mngon par dga' ba de la dris shig/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal
50b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod byang chub la mngon par dga' ba yin nam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang mngon par dga' ba de ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'o// gang
50b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de ni sred pa'o// sred pa ga dang la yod pa de ni skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba gang la yod pa de la tshor ba yod do// gang la tshor ba yod pa de la
50b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na kho bo byang chub la mngon par dga' ba med do// byang chub tu dmigs pa med pas de'i phyir mngon par dga' ba med do// rigs
50b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de lta mod kyi// 'on kyang gang khyod kyis 'di skad du khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur zhes smras pa ni de la bdag gis bdag bstod par mi nus te/ 
50b7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad thugasu chud pa mngon du bzhugs bzhin du bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bdag nyid kyi brjod na/ de ni
50b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis khyod nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
51a1(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam ston cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod las smon lam de dag thos nas/ byang chub
51a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag kyang spyod pa da lta bu yongasu rdzogs par byed do// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
51a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' la slar mi bzlog ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bstan par bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo
51a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
51a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba dag bdag la nyan cing smon lam de dag thos nas
51a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang yongasu rdzogs par bgyid la de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid na/ bdag gis bstan par bgyi'o// de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
51a7(dkon brtsegs): btsugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug du g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal
51a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag gis smon lam
51b1(dkon brtsegs): btab pa ni nam bdag gis phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas bltas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji skad pa de
51b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag thams cad bdag gis byang chub la yang dag par btsud pa dang / bdag gis byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa dang / bdag gis sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud pa dang / de bzhin
51b3(dkon brtsegs): du bdag gis tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la yang dag par btsud pa dang / bdag gis bskul ba dang / bdag
51b4(dkon brtsegs): gis rjes su bstan par gyur par ma mthong ba de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'i/ nam bdag
51b5(dkon brtsegs): gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcur rnam par bltas kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid la ma bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu gang yang mthong
51b6(dkon brtsegs): bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab po// de nas 'khor de'i
51b7(dkon brtsegs): nang nas byang chub sems dpa' la la 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar gyur snyam pa dang / 
51b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis thugasu chud nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon
52a1(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrags pa'i sbrul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes zul la zhig skyes par gyur te/ des stong gsu/ 
52a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdul phra rab tu glags shing / bshig ste thal bar byas nas/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag
52a3(dkon brtsegs): brtsis shes pa'am/ brtsis la shin tu mkhas pa dag gis brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zheH'am/ stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe'am/ 'bum phrag 'di skyed
52a4(dkon brtsegs): cig yod do zhe 'am/ bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yodado zhe 'am/ bye ba stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do//  zhe 'am/ bye ba brgya stong 'bum phrag 'di snyed
52a5(dkon brtsegs): cig yod do zhes shes pa'am/ bgrang ba'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ tshad bzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bde bar
52a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi spun sgrib pa med pas bltas na/ 
52a7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces
52a8(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig la gang+gA'i klung du ma'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tsam gyis tha gu yangs par yongasu ma grub cing / 
52b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i phyir rin po che brgya stong 'bum phrag du ma las grub pa dang / rin po che brgya stong 'bum phrag du mas spras pa/ sred pa'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam du ma gyur gyi bar du
52b2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi bar smon lam btab bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
52b3(dkon brtsegs): der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i tshad tsam gyi byang chub kyi shing skyes te/ byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad rgyas shing khyab par
52b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po// bcom da ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis byang chub kyi shing de'i drung du bdag 'dug pa'i tshe/ bla na med pa yang
52b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'ang sa pa'i bar du byang chub kyi shing drung de nas ma langs
52b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang bdag gi sprul pa phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya na gas+ho 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag du dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur
52b7(dkon brtsegs): cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ming tsam yang ya med
52b8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang dang tha ba dang 'chab pa med pa/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yong su dag par spyod pa sha stag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang la sangs rgyas kyi
53a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag cing mngal du skye ba med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon cing / dkyil ma
53a2(dkon brtsegs): bkrung bcas par brdzus te byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de shin tu dag par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong/ 
53a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs med par gshegs shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa de dag theg pa gsum las brtsams te/ mos pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston pa ma gtogs par sangs
53a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing / byang chub sems dpa' yongasu gang bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po// de nas bcom
53a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpa
53a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
53a7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems de bzhin gshegs pa de ci'i phyir kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
53a8(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu gzigs pa des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa kun gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / sems
53b1(dkon brtsegs): can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu da ltar byung
53b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus sam/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan gang
53b3(dkon brtsegs): gis thos pa de dag ni mi 'gyur ba la zhugs pa dang / mos pa chung ba'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
53b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas de'i phyir de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa de kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya'o// de nas bco dam ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
53b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis dga' ba'i zas dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i
53b6(dkon brtsegs): smon lam mdzad pa lta bu'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag
53b7(dkon brtsegs): kha zas kyi 'du shes shig skyes par gyur na de ma thag tu skad cig de la de dag gi lag pa g.yas par ro bro ba brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyis gang ba'i snod mngon du 'byung
53b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur la/ snod de dag byung ma thag tu de dag 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma phul/ sems can dbul zhing
54a1(dkon brtsegs): phongs pas sdug bsngal ba dang / mgon med par gyur pa dang / yid btags kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa gang dag lo stong phrag du mar yang mchi
54a2(dkon brtsegs): ma'i thal ba 'ga' yang mi rnyed pa de lta bu dag yongs su tshim par ma byas par bdag nyid kyis bza' ba ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o zhes bgyi bar dran pa thob par gyur cing / de'i mod/ 
54a3(dkon brtsegs): la de dag mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su grub par gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing na mkha' las mchi ba dang / rlung ltar thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shugs kyis
54a4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa dag tu phyin nas khangs de las de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
54a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa la yang phul sems can phongs shing ltogs pa dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams dang / yid btags kyi
54a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyang yongasu tshim par bgyis nas de dag la chos bstan te/ skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der slar mchi bar gyur cig ces
54a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis ni bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems
54a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag gos rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod pa dang ldan par gyur te/ bsams pa tsam gyis ci la dga' ba'i gos rin po che dge sbyong
54b1(dkon brtsegs): gi tshul dang 'thun pa rung ba dag byung bar gyur la/ gos rin po che de dag byung ma thag tu 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gi gos 'di lta bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
54b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams lam phul bar bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyad pa ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o snyam pa'i dran pa thob par gyur nas de dag gi sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams
54b3(dkon brtsegs): tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu mchis shing gos de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bka' ste slar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mchis nas/ 
54b4(dkon brtsegs): ci dga' ba'i gos rin po che la spyod par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems
54b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de da ga thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan
54b6(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dag la phul nas slad kyis bdag cag yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad ma mchis pa dang / sangs
54b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de na mi dge ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing don sdug bsngal gyi sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na skyon du 'gyur ba'i
54b8(dkon brtsegs): sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa yid du mi 'ong ba ma mchis par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam btab po/ 
55a1(dkon brtsegs): denas mam ldan 'das la byung chu ba sems dpa' sems 'dzin pas ge thal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa sgyus 'dus
55a2(dkon brtsegs): sna sa nga du ma ldan sa gags gas rgyu shA kun r+dz+dza seMnas
55a3(dkon brtsegs): nas sular// ga / sus spyan 'a ma / gang ma stegs tu 'ju smra
55a4(dkon brtsegs): ldacu 'das kyis pa/  yul pa rigs bu 'jig rten gyi khams don kyi grogs mgos/ su 'byung 'a ni ma khams sa
55a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di tsha pa me sang du 'dus gang 'a smras rlung pa de nas sus gru sa pa ma gyur pas nas sa nas so// 
55a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gin tshun lam 'di ltar btab ste/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi shing de rin po ni bye ga khrag khrig brgya stong du mas gang zhing / nor zichen pa dum
55b1(dkon brtsegs): ming brjod na yang lo bye ba brgya stong thogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nor bu rin po che de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su gang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'ang de la byang chub/ 
55b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gser las grub par mthong bar dga'o snyam na yang des gser las grub par mthong ba dang / dngul las grub par mthong bar
55b3(dkon brtsegs): dga'o snyam na yang dngul las grub par mthong ba la gzhan gyis gser las grub par mthong ba ma mchis par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bai DUr+ya las grub pa dang / 
55b4(dkon brtsegs): shel las grub pa dang / mu tig dmar po las grwa dab pa dang / rdo'i snying po las grub pa dang / sdug las grub pa dang / de bzhin du rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu
55b5(dkon brtsegs): las grub pa dang / tsan dan las grub pa 'am/ a ka ru las grub pa 'am/ ta gar las grub pa 'am/ ta ma la'i lo ma las grub pa'am
55b6(dkon brtsegs): tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po las grub pa'am/ tsan+dan dmar po las grub pa'am su rnam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa de dag gis de bzhin du mthong ste/ phan tshun nas
