55b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par mthong ba yang ma mchis par 'gyur ba dngasangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub kyi shing de las 'od 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
55b8(dkon brtsegs): rang rang las 'od byung bas snang zhing gsal ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi mngon/ skar ma dang rin po che dang zhugs dang glog gam sems can gzhan
56a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi 'on kyang mi mngon pa dang / gang dag ji tsam du 'od kyis khyab par dga' ba/ ban sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
56a2(dkon brtsegs): steng du de ngag gi 'od kyis gsal bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis me tog kha phye ba dang / kha zum par 'gyur/ 
56a3(dkon brtsegs): bdang / gang dus dang tshod rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su spyad par 'tshal ba de bzhin du de'i 'grub pa ma gtogs par nyin mtshan gyi ming yang ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
56a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing de na grang ba dang tsha ba yang ma mchis/ rga ba dang // na ba dang / 'chi ba yang ma mchis te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
56a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'tshal ba de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu/ mchis shing dga' ldan gyi gnas su tshe bas parabagyis nas/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs
56a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nga'i steng gi bar snang las sil snyan bltar mi gda' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra 'byin pa dang / sil
56a7(dkon brtsegs): snyan de dag las kyang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgra mi 'byung gi/ gzhan du na pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub sems
56a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bur mos pa'i sgra de lta bu thos par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
56b1(dkon brtsegs): ngag de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta bar 'tshal na/ 'chag gam 'gro 'am/ 'ong ngam sdod dam/ 'chis kyang rung ste/ gang dag der sangs rgyas la blta ba'i yid la bgyi
56b2(dkon brtsegs): ba skyes ma thag tu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa de de nyid na
56b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs par mthong bar gyur cing / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de mthong ma thag tu de dag gi the tshom mam/ nem nur ram/ yid gnyis sam/ chos kyi
56b4(dkon brtsegs): som nyi gang ci mchis pa yongasu chad par gyur te/ bstan mi 'tshal bar chos kyi tshig de'i don yongs su 'tshal bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam btab bo// 
56b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khragakhrig brgya stong du mas mgrin cig tu smras pa/ gang 'di kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba mtshan de ni tshul
56b6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra ba ste// sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi
56b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing der skyes par gyur pa lta ci smos te/ gang dag gis lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag gis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i ming thos pa de
56b8(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis ni sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar blta'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
57a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dag gang gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi mtshan brjod pa pas ni/ gang gis/ 
57a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming brjod na/ 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan brjod
57a3(dkon brtsegs): pa lta mos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bskal pa re re zhing sems can gyi don ji snyed du byas pa'i sems can gyi don de ni sangs rgyas bye ba
57a4(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang ma mdzad do// de nas 'khor de'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang da/ lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
57a5(dkon brtsegs): dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye/ ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa la
57a6(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces brjod pa dang / de'i mod la srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa
57a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasasu smin par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag
57a8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ 
57b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ni 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
57b2(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyan dang / smon lam gyi brgyan dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma dang / spyod pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa'i rgyan gang ji snyed cig mthong ba las nyan thos kyi
57b3(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa dang / snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par de dag thams cad bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi nang du 'dus pa dang / khongs su chud par
57b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab ste/ bcom lda na 'das bdag 'tshal na bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
57b5(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa las brtsams te/ rnam pa gzhan dang ga zhan du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis sugalas gzhan ma mchis par bshad dam/ de bas
57b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang ring du bshad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam gyi rnam pa gang ci 'dra ba de la de bzhin
57b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par dbang du gyur pa gzhan gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
57b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ni
58a1(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med do// dus gasdum kun tu 'jug // de nas 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'jam
58a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de brjod pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
58a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yod pa de gnyis 'dra 'am/ 'on te mi 'dra snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
58a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtogs pa thug das kyis thugasu chud nas byang chub sems pa dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la
58a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rmi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i cha sa rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs na/ 
58a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu blangs pa de dang / phyi na las pa de gnyis gang mang bar 'gyur/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das blangs pa ni nyung / slad na las pa ni
58a7(dkon brtsegs): tshad ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i chas rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig
58a8(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa de tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i lhag ma ji snyed
58b1(dkon brtsegs): cig yod pa de tsam du ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o// 
58b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs
58b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan la la mnga' bar gyur tam mnga' bar 'gyur ram/ da ltar la la na de lta bu mnga' ba
58b4(dkon brtsegs): lta yang bzhugs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu yod de/ sangs rgyas/ da kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing
58b5(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams smon lam la rab tu gnas pas mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
58b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mnga' ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pas da ltar bzhugs te/ 
58b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshegs tshad pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs
58b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
59a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de gnyis
59a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs te lhag chad med do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gos bgos pa/ 'jug pa chen pos zhugs pas gang 'di 'jam dpal
59a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid la gnas pa bzhi yod de// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang 'di dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 
59a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gau ming bstan du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na mchis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
59a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa
59a6(dkon brtsegs): de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
59a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu
59a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gcig ni 'od kyi tog ces bya ste/ shar phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go/ gnyis pa
59b1(dkon brtsegs): ni ye shes bla ma zhes bya ste/ lho phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go// gsum pa ni zhi ba'i dbang po zhes bya
59b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ nub phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go// bzhi pa ni smon lam blo gros shes bya ste/ byang phyogs
59b3(dkon brtsegs): logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa 'di lta bu
59b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mdzad de// rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dumadzad pa de mngon par mdzad pas/ bcom ldan// 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan
59b5(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang kun tu snangabar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub se mas dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor zhing mdun gyis
59b6(dkon brtsegs): bltas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sngon chad ma mthong ma thos shing bsam gyis mi khyab la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa de dag kyang
59b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pa'i lag na skyu ru ra'i 'bru 'dug pa mthong ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas kun tu snang bar gyur to// 
59b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po de yang su tha mal par dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong mnga' ba ste/ 'dzam bu'i chu
60a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i gser gyi ri bo ltar mdzes shing lha me ldan ne ljang de bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong/ 
60a2(dkon brtsegs): tsam du gyur pa sha stag gis bskor cing mdun gyis byas te byang chub kyi shing yon tan bkod pa du mas rab tu brgyan pa'i drung na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing sprul pa bye
60a3(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par sprul pa mdzad do// sprul pa de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por dong zhing sems can rnams la
60a4(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa / rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
60a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs phun sum tshogs pa mdzang ngam/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems
60a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong stan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis kyang mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang 'jam
60a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba'i spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu bsgrub par bgyi'o// denas
60a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ 
60b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu mang po mthon par gyur te/ de dag gis 'jig rten
60b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
60b3(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
60b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
60b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dang 'bargyad khri bzhi stong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de
60b6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu sgrub pa'i phyir sems bskyed de/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las
60b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa bcu drug gis ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par bsam pa thag pas tshig brjod dede dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang
60b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'gyur ro// lhag ma rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni de
61a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar mi 'gyur yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi
61a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar
61a3(dkon brtsegs): lhag chad med par 'gyur ro// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas gces spras byed pa la ltos/ tshig tu brjod par
61a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra yang gang gis lhag pa'i bsam pas bsam pa thag pa nas tshig tu brjod pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
61a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bzhin du gyur to// gang gis dma' ba'i sems dang dad pa tsam gyis/ tshigs tu brjod pa de dag kyang las dma' ba des bskal pa/ 
61a6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cur 'khor baphyir bsgril te pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa 'od kyi ga
61a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ye shes bla ma dang / zhi ba'i dbang po dang / smon lam blo gros dag kyang phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtsegs pa bai DUr+ya'i mdog tu 'dug pa mtshungs pa med par bzang ba dag gi nang du
61a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ lnga bye la khrag khrig brgya stong du mas ying su bkar cing mdun du 'dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rnam padrug tu gas par byed/ me tog gi char chen por
61b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni sgra 'byin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis 'ong bar snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
61b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad 'is nye ga/ cher g.yos par gyur pa dang / phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtsegs pa bzhi mchi bar
61b3(dkon brtsegs): gda' bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas bskul nas/ de bzhin gshegs
61b4(dkon brtsegs): ba la blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ong bar gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring po ma lon par de mod la byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag lhags te/ 
61b5(dkon brtsegs): lpags nas kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de dag nas babasanas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
61b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nasaphyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byang chub
61b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag 'khod ma dag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phyogs bzhi nas snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
61b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'ongs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gos gyon pa 'jug pa chen pos yang dag par zhugs pa
62a1(dkon brtsegs): yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis skyes bu dam pa 'di dag la rimagro bskyed la chos dris shig/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag na
62a2(dkon brtsegs): smon lam nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang su
62a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis bdag cag mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur 'khor ba phyir
62a4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyil bar gyur cig/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bud med gcig/ gis bdag cag gi ming thos na yang myur du bud med kyi lus
62a5(dkon brtsegs): las 'gyur bar shog shig ces bya bar de lta bu'i smon la/ ma dang ldan pa dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bstan to/ rdzu 'phrul de dag
62a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir brtul ba mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang ma snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
62a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan ni sgyu ma sprul pa'ang bgyid/ sgyu ma ma mchis par yang bgyid do// bcom
62a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang skye ba'ang skye/ 'gag kyang 'gag ste/ gang las skye ba dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// bcom ldan
62b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das mnyam pa nyid la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas byang chub
62b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub ji lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ 'jam
62b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ gang sus kyang ma thob ma bshig cing gang la yod pa'am med par chags pa dmigasu med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas smras pa/ 
62b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal byang chub de ji tsam du yod pas kyang mi 'thob/ med pas kyang mi 'thob bam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir
62b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ chos thams cad ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa ste/ yod par ma gyur mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir thob par/ 'gyur ba med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal tshul
62b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa'i chos bstan pas/ de skad du ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras po/ rigs kyi bu tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba gang yin/ 
62b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang phung po rnams kyang mi mthong / khams dang skye mched rnams kyang mi mthong la/ dmus long yang ma yin/ sha'i mig can
62b8(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa dang / chos gang la yang 'phel ba dang / 'grib par mi mthong ba 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa zhes
63a1(dkon brtsegs): la/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' se ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sras smras pa/ gang de bzhin cad dang ma 'gal
63a2(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'di dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sa/ 
63a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya bar tha dad du mi 'byed cing/ gang 'di dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig la 'jug pa 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// 
63a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas smras pa gang de bzhin nyid la yang zhugs la/ de bzhin nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / 
63a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni zab mo zhes bya bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de/ ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
63a6(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa mi zad pas smras pa/ chos thams cad kyi zad pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu zad pa ste/ gang chos thams cad mi zad pa chos ston pa de ni chos nyid las 'gal bar
63a7(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa legs par sems pas smras pa/ gang
63a8(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas bsam du med pa la yang 'jug/ bsam du med pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu
63b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral bas smras pa gang 'dod chags dang / shin tu bral ba de ni mtshan ma thams cad las 'dod chags pa yang med/ 
63b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral ba yang med/ rjes su chags pa yang med/ khong khro ba'ang med/ rmongs pa yang med/ gcig tu byed pa yang med/ gnyis su
63b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'ang med// byed pa yang med/ mi byed pa yang med len pa yang med/ 'dor ba yang med de de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu
63b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos smras pa gang rgya mtsho lta bur zab cing gti dang dpag dka' ba'i chos la zhugs pa de chos la'ang
63b5(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du chos ston cing bdag dang gzhan du rlom sems su mi byed pa de ltar bstan pa
63b6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// zla ba'i bla ma gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa gang sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i
63b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis zla ba lta bur gyur kyang sems can thams cad de dag la'ang rlom sems su med pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// 
63b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ gang mya ngan thams cad rgyun bcad pa de ni mya ngan med cing zhum par 'gyur ba med do// 
64a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni mya ngan gyi thugs rngu dang ldan pa'o// de la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa ste/ 
64a2(dkon brtsegs): gang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing chos ston pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med pas smras pa
64a3(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dod pa'i khams la yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang mi dmigs/ 
64a4(dkon brtsegs): ba de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig/ tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu lta/ pas smras pa/ gang chos ston na gang 'di stong pa nyid kyi
64a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du ston la/ stong panyid kyis kyang rlom sem su mi byed/ mnyam pa nyi kyang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi
64a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongasu dag pas smras pa/ gang chos ston pa'i tshe 'khor gsum dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'khor gsum
64a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ bdag mi dmigs pa dang / chos nyan pa mi dmigs pa dang / chos la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa'o// 'di ni 'khor gsum yong su dag par chos bstan pa zhes bya ste/ 
64a8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro bgrub pas smras pa/ gang chos thams cad 'du ba med par shes shing / ji ltar shes
64b1(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du yang ston la 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// 
64b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' zab mor spyad pas smras pa/ gang chos thams cad kyi zab pa nyid kyang shes la/ chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gang snyan pa dang / gang
64b3(dkon brtsegs): la snyan pa dang / gang bstan pa de yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems
64b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po dag gis so/ so nas rang rang gi spobs pa ston par gyur to// tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i cho na byang chub sems
64b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bye ba phrag bdun cu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob/ par gyur to// srog chags bye ba khrag khrigabargya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par
64b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to// dge slong bdun stong ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha dang mi'i skye rgu las
64b7(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig dgu cu rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng
64b8(dkon brtsegs): ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed
65a1(dkon brtsegs): cig tu 'gyur/ de'i sku tshe'i chang na ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur ngan ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ 
65a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sem
65a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sbas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ji srid cig na bla na med
65a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe na mkha'i khams gzugs can du gyur pa de'i tshe
65a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub mngon par rgyu/ gas par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon
65a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
65a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub
65a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis mtshan mor gyur la/ zla ba'i 'od kyis nyi mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs
65b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu de lta yin gyis su byang chub tu smon pa de la dris shig/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub tu mi smon tam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ 
65b2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal nyid kyang byang chub la/ byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dpal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ 'jam dpal zhes
65b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni ming tsam mo// ming gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa ste stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
65b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka'/ stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das
65b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa mthong ngam/ thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
65b6(dkon brtsegs): gis mthong ngo thos so// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// bde bar gshegs pa de ni bgrang du ma mchis
65b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ yul ma g+ha d+ha'i til gyi dong nas til gyi 'bru gcig gcig blangs na rigs kyi bu til gyi 'bru gcig po de ji lta ba de
65b8(dkon brtsegs): lta bur ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus par blta'o// byin til gyi lhag ma las pa ltar ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur
66a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par blta'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong / 
66a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar glags te/ rdul phra rab tu byas pa de la rigs kyi bu rdul phra rab ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa
66a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhugs par byas kyang / brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyur ro// stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang / 
66a4(dkon brtsegs): bgrang ba dang / rgyur yang smos par mi 'gyur ro// rigs da kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
66a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ tshad med grangs med par 'gyurabar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu
66a6(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu glags te/ thal bar byas pa de las skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul pha rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen
66a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas der rdul phra rab kyi rdul cig bzhag ste/ skyes bu des tshul de bzhin du shar phyogs logs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zad du dkod par
66a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/ de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/ des kyang lho phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re nas tshul de bzhin du bor te/ de bzhin du phyogs bcur skyes
66b1(dkon brtsegs): bu de lta bu re res tshul de dang 'dra bar de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul zang zad du re re nas bor na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
66b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya phrag ni
66b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba stong phrag ni 'di skad cig yod do// bye ba brgya stong brag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// 
66b4(dkon brtsegs): gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// mi 'khrugs pa ni 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya bar tshad bzung bar nus
66b5(dkon brtsegs): sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu
66b6(dkon brtsegs): bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab de dag bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te/ 
66b7(dkon brtsegs): rdul phrag rab ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad btags te/ rdul phra rab tu glags na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ rdul phra rab de dag brtsis shes pa 'am/ 
66b8(dkon brtsegs): brtsis la mkhas pas brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba
67a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig ma nga// bye ba bcu stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba khrag khri/ 
67a2(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong drug ni 'di snyed drug mdzad// gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yo // dkrigs phrag ni 'di skad cig yang // mi 'khrugs pa'i srog ni 'di sad
67a3(dkon brtsegs): cog yod de zhes bya bar shes pa 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ gzhal ba'am/ tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpe de la ni sems can rnams mos pa
67a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyi/ don 'tshol ba'am/ gzhal ba'am/ dgrang ba'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
67a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas ni rdul phra rab de dag bgrang ba / tshul gyis brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// brgya stong gi phrag ni
67a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya stong gi phrag ni
67a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ 
67a8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag par gong du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
67b1(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das gal te ye shes chen pa de lta bu'i slad du byang chub sems/ 
67b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i skur thugs par sems can dmyal ba chen por bsreg kyang / bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges
67b3(dkon brtsegs): bas pa / mashes chen pan sams na ma la/ lam na' sa byas pa/ sa ju na/ 
67b4(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ sems can mos pa chung ngu dung / le lo che ba dang / brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs par su zhig de lta bu'i ye shes chen po la 'dod pa/ 
67b5(dkon brtsegs): mi bskyed/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di bstan po'i/ srog chags khri byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drung chus
67b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcur skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong/ 
67b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu phyin te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te/ mtha
67b8(dkon brtsegs): ba de thams cad rdul phra rab tu glags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i bskal par da dung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi
68a1(dkon brtsegs): tha'angs dpal ga gyur pa'i rgyun laman pasas rgyas ma / yang ga par 'jam pa na bsas kyis ma gyur / dang
68a2(dkon brtsegs): tsha' rang kyang bsam byas ma khyab/ byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun yang bsam kyi mi khyab par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng
68a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mngan par bsgrags pa'i skas 'ongs pos shes pa/ sa mildan 'das 'das s+ho/ 'ang med pas gzhan du byung ba 'di skar bskal pa zhing du sa skyebam myed pa
68a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa / ma sa smra chen pa ma gsasadapas kyis smras pa/ sa kyi ngas
68a5(dkon brtsegs): mthakhams 'a mam du kA/ sa/ ba pyid dang / dus dpas dang / bsu bsal pa brgyad/ bskal babyung dang / 
68a6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba dang / brgal pa khrig ga dang / bskal pa khrag khrag phrag brgya stong dang / gtams dang / dkrigs dang / mi 'khrugs pazhig 'das sa snyam du sems sas/ sa / 
68a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal don ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ namakha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chas
68a8(dkon brtsegs): thams ca sa la / zur yang du chud de/ ngas kya ma ma rnam par mi dag pa de sang yang du chung bden 'di sum du gags cag 'das par gyur to// sem bcas 'das pa gru
68b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du lo 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to zhes rnam par mi rtog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang la yang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do// rigs
68b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na na mkha'i khams ni skal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang / skyo zhing yongasu yid chad pa med de na mkha'i khams la skye ba
68b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am 'jig pa'am/ tshig pa 'am/ 'gyes par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na mkha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub
68b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par shes pa de ni skyo ba dang / yongs su yid 'chad pa'i se/ rnams mi bskyed do// rigs kyi bu gang la na mkha'i khams
68b5(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ba de la ni 'tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yid 'chad/ pa med g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ 'chi ba med/ rga ba med// / 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med do// / 
68b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming 'ad la yang 'tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yi 'chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba
68b7(dkon brtsegs): med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming de shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 
68b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu gzhan yang dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bcom
69a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sems can gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang
69a2(dkon brtsegs): klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang // gzhan la rgya cher ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag 'di skad du bdag cag gis gang 'di sangs
69a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// bklag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// gzhan dag la
69a4(dkon brtsegs): yang rgya cher bstan par bya'o// zhes tshig tu brjod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
69a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par ba sgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
69a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ 'jug par bgyid dam/ gzhan dag lnga rgya cher bstan pa dang / gang 'jam dpal gzhon
69a7(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab po zhes sems bskyed pa des bsod nams ci tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang
69a8(dkon brtsegs): la las phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyis spyan sgrib pa med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig gzigs pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste/ 
69b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba dang / rnam grangs de bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad yang dag par blangs pa la gnas te/ 
69b2(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par
69b3(dkon brtsegs): byed dam/ 'jug par byed dam/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston tam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i bar du sems bskyes cing // gom pa/ 
69b4(dkon brtsegs): bdun 'dor na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// brgya stong
69b5(dkon brtsegs): gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya
69b6(dkon brtsegs): stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// de nas
69b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun nas snang bar sgyu ma lta bu byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de ltar 'jam dpal
69b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de snyoms par bzhugs ma thag tu 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur pa dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas
70a1(dkon brtsegs): mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
70a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dug cing / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa stod par mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar 'jig rten gyi
70a3(dkon brtsegs): khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por cig car du snang bar gyur pa ni smon lam dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi khyad par ngo mtshar che'o snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyes
70a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sa dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
70a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming sangs
70a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya
70a7(dkon brtsegs): bar yang zung shig/ byang chub kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor der phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs
70a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char chen po phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag
70b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing 'di skad du/ kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma sangs rgyas/ deng ni bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i seng ge'i sgra dang / bkod pa
70b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
70b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub la phyir mi ldog par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal
70b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyi sa mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / phyogs bcu nas/ 
70b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin/ dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
70b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'jam
70b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste 'dus pa bcwa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// / sho log stong sum brgya bzhi bcu'o// / rgya gar
70b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / 'dzin mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ 
71a1(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pi ta pu tra sa ma ga man nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yab dang sras 'jal ba zhes bya ba theg pa
71a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
71a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grol ba/ grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dul ba dul ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ zhi bzhi pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rgal ba rgal
71a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa thang la phyin pa thang la phyin pa ra'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa dbugs phyin pa'i
71a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge slong dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan ba/ nyon mongs pa bcom pa nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge sbyong dge sbyong gi 'khor dang ldan pa
71a6(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa bsal ba sdig pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig pa bsal ba'i chos can sdig pa bsal ba'i chos can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ rig pa
71a7(dkon brtsegs): can rig pa can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ khrus byas pa khrus byas pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrogs pa po sgrogs pa po'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa byang ba nyon mongs pa byang ba'i 'khor dang ldan
71a8(dkon brtsegs): g.yan lag lnga rnam par bas la ba yan lag lnga rnam par gsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yod rnam par dang ba yid/ 
71b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsnyen bsang dang bral ba bsnyen bsing dang bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsrung
71b2(dkon brtsegs): ba gcig pa bsrung ba gcig pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dran pa'i sgo srungs phun sum tshogs pa dran pa'i sgo bsrung phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa rton pa
71b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyi tshe ba'i bden pas bsal ba nyi tshe ba'i bden pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ gtsal ba spangs pa gtsal ba spangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa
71b4(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin pa mthar phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ don gyi mthar thug pa don gyi mthar thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan dpa/ bdag nyid bsgoms pa bdag nyid sgoms pa'i 'kho
71b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rnam parartog pa yongasu chad pa rnam par rtog pa yongasu chad pa'i 'khor
71b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 
71b7(dkon brtsegs): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 
71b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa 'phags pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / mdab ma dang lcug ma dang / shun brags kyi skyon dang bral ba dag pa/ snying po la gnas pa/ shAkya'i yul na ser skya'i/ 
72a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na/ lnga sde dang / grags byin dang / 'char ka dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / g.ya 'od srung dang / chu klung rang
72a2(dkon brtsegs): srung dang / 'od srung chen po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu la sogs pa dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad
72a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen
72a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byas pa khyed pa byas 'a khur bor ba bdag gi don rje su thob pa/  srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems can
72a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag/ dang thabs gcig ste/ de'i tshe nam gyi tho rangs kyi res la/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu
72a6(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bltas te/ bla gab med pa na bzhug so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun cang mi smra ba/ 
72a7(dkon brtsegs): la gzig so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon
72a8(dkon brtsegs): bar dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshol cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u 'di n+ya stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas
72b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ldangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgya
72b2(dkon brtsegs): po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u 'di n+ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u 'di
72b3(dkon brtsegs): n+ya khyod ni bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/ de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags sbyin dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / chu
72b4(dkon brtsegs): klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang / 'od srung chedan po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal dkyi bu chen pos kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
72b5(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po za sa gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o// de skad cesagasol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
72b6(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyang bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal
72b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig bcom ldan 'das bzhed snyam ste/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos
72b8(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la gnas shing dge slong
73a1(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na khang pa brtsegs pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i
73a2(dkon brtsegs): khyams sgo byang phyogs su lta ba'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ste/ nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu
73a3(dkon brtsegs): chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la shar cing / dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ngo // 
73a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces/ 
73a5(dkon brtsegs): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma/ mngon par dad par bya bar nus so zhes dgongs shing
73a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhad do// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de lta yin gyis khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar dad pa bskyed cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
73a7(dkon brtsegs): 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen po rigs rnams ni dad par bya bar shin du dka' ste/ rgyal po'i rigs
73a8(dkon brtsegs): ni lhag par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' ste/ tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste dper na
73b1(dkon brtsegs): shing khur bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ shing khur brgya yang rung ste/ bsher bag med cing skam la lo mang du lon pa zhig yod la/ de la mi
73b2(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig gis me btang na/ me'i phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de la yang la la zhig gis mar ram/ 'bru mar zhig gtor na/ me'i phung po de bas ches cher 'bar te/ de'i
73b3(dkon brtsegs): steng ngam drung gi 'khor du 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka'o// tshe
73b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste dper na glang po che mche ba can kha gdangs pa'i so phrag tu 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po
73b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang
73b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ni de lta mod kyi 'on kyang khyod ni dge slong 'char ka 'dis rgyal po zas gtsang mngon par dad par bya bar nuso zhes
73b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs shing bzhed pa yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par
73b8(dkon brtsegs): byed par dgongs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'char ka ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed do zhes dgongaso// de nas
74a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la bka' stsal ba/ 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang bar gyis shig/ de ci 'phyir zhe na/ 
74a2(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni yang na nges dad par bya'i/ yang na khyed kyis ngang par bya'o// 'char ka nga'i nyan thos ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na khyod ni 'di ltar rigs dang par byed/ 
74a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kal tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka bzang po la nyan par byos// khyod na
74a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs dang byed mchog rab yin gyis// shAkya'i rig sa rnams dga' ba bskyed pa yi// rgyal po'i dang pa rab tu dad par byos// rgyal po'i rab de dad par
74a5(dkon brtsegs): byos nas ni// rigasu lha dag dang ni mi rnams la/ mtha' dbus med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis// mi yi dam pa myur du dad par byos// da lta na ni shAkya
74a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po de/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtog pas dkrug shing nyams// ri yi ngos nas dbab 'dril ji bzhin du// brtson 'grus rtsol ba thams cad btang ste gnas/ 
74a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug nyams pa rjes su dran byed pas// yid la gnod 'gyur sems la yid kyang stor// dper na tshong pa nor dang bral ba dag/ rjes su dran zhing nyon mongs gnas pa
74a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ni/ lha yi gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing // lha rjes 'dod pa rjes su dran pa bzhin// rgyal ba'i bstan la mngon par mi shes shing // rgyal ba sde nyams snying rjer/ 
74b1(dkon brtsegs): smre sngags 'don// nga yi rin po che ni sna bdun dang // mi yi phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po dang // longs spyod dag ni rjes su dran byed cing // sa bdag de ni snying rje smre sngags
74b2(dkon brtsegs): 'don/ mdangs 'phrog byed pa'i srin po stobs can gyis// ji ltar mi zhig yongasu non gyur na// bdag kyang mi shes gzhan yang mi shes ltar// sa yi bdag po de yang de
74b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nos ti se'i gangs kyi ri bos bsgribs gyur na// ji ltar mi dag blta bya mi mthong ba// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos bsgribs pas na// rgyal pos blta bar bya ba mi
74b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // gnyid kyis log gam shi bas myos gyur pa da'i// mis ni rang gi sems kyang mi shes te// de bzhin rgyal po chen po mos gyur pas// rgyal po
74b5(dkon brtsegs): des kyang dge ba mi shes so// dper na khyim thab shi bas myos pa yi// bud med snying rjer smre sngags 'do na byed pa// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas
74b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po de yang snying rjer smre sngags 'don// de lta bas na 'char ka thabs mkhas pas// khyod kyis 'dir ni rgyal po dad par gyis// nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal bar byos
74b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bslang bar gyis// 'char ka khyod ma gtogs par srid pa yi// 'gro ba dag na bskal 'thun spyad med pas// rgyal po'i sems ni rab tu dad bya
74b8(dkon brtsegs): bar ta gang gis nus pa'i dge slong gang yang med// 'char ka sngon gyi dus na byung ba ni// 'das pa'i dus na sa yi bdag po zhig/ ming ni bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba ste// sa skyong byed pa
75a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grags pa byung // de na chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan// srag chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mdzod// rgya mcha'i mtha' mar thug pa'i/ 
75a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin/ chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po des kyang bsgyangs// grong dang grong khyer dag kyang mngab nye zhing // bza' shing 'bras bu me tog rgyas pas gang // 'phags pa'i
75a3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo dag dang shed las skyes// sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang // dri za brgya mang dag gis gang ba ste// sdong du mtsher ma ru shing ngan pa med// 'jam zhing dge sbyong
75a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi tshogs kyis spra'o/ chu klung 'bab stegs bde ba sa rab tu brgyan// drang srong tshogs brgya rjes su rgyub ste// skye ba'i dka' chos rnams kyis kun du bsgrubs/ 
75a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan song lam ngan rnams ni rab tu bcad // de nas sems can thams cad lha gnas 'dong // rgyal po de la/ bu dag yod pa ni// sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mthong ba ste/ 
75a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyed pa can// yon tan mang pos bgos pa'i blo gros ldan// ming ni blo gros snying po zhes bya ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// 'dod
75a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la skyon du lta ba can// mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben la dga'// rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba des// lha yi pho brang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog 'dir// na chung tshogs
75a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis kun nas mdun bdar te// 'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras// bu yi dam pa khyod lang yis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba gang ma byas// 'dod pa rnams la khyod yid ci
75b1(dkon brtsegs): yi byir/ ma mos nga la bu khyod myur du smos// srid pa'i 'gro ba'i yon tan mkhas bgyis te// bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba bskyed// bud med rin chen 'khor dang 'grogs
75b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyis te// yul la dga' zhing mos pa bskyed par gyis// dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag/ de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na// dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga'
75b3(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pa 'dod pa de dag bu cig khyod la bstabs// de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// nga dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang 'thun// rnam thos bu yi gnas dang 'dra ba yi// 
75b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang gis brgyan can khyim 'dir spyod// 'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing // lha mo dadra la sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa// rol mo'i sgra yi tshul dang glu la
75b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas/ bsnyen bkur sems shing yon tan yid kyang 'phrog/ mig ni pad+ma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste// bim pa'i mdzo ga 'dri mchu mdzes yid du 'ong // so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med/ 
75b6(dkon brtsegs): cing bzang // 'bral ba'i smin ma legs shing mgul pa sdug/ brla ni glang po che yi sna yang 'dra// phrag so shas rgyas thal gong legs dang 'dra// lag dang rkang pa'i mthil ni zangs kyi mdog/ 
75b7(dkon brtsegs): sor mo byin gyis pra bas legs dang ldan// lce ni zangs mdog 'dra la srab cing dag/ tshig ran 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan// so ni thags bzang so rnams rang rod med// mche ba rab dkar
75b8(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi rgyan dang ldan// lto ba 'phyang nger 'dug cing lte bsdug/ sta zur yangs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra// byin pa glang po che yi so 'dra zhing // mnga' rgyu snying po legs par skyes pa bzhin// dregs
76a1(dkon brtsegs): bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang 'dra// gzhan du mi sems yid kyis khyod la lta// rtse ba 'dod cing daral bab dang ldan// gzhon nu snying rje ltos la/ 
76a2(dkon brtsegs): rtse bar byos// bu cig khyod dang bud med 'di dag gi/ mdog bzang ba dang dar la bab pa yang // shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin ltung gis// nga rgyal thong la 'dod pa bstan par
76a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis// blo gros snying po ldan des smra ba yi// pha dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad smras// yab cig khyod ni med par gsungs pa legs// gang dag tshig gis grags pa ma smad med
76a4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig/ bsams te/ gtan la phab la rgyal po gson// ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod la bdag/ sems mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra/ 
76a5(dkon brtsegs): gson rdza sa yi bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni/ mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te// mi mkha/ sa skye bo dag gis yang dag bsams// mkhas pa rnams
76a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis de dag rtag tu smad// long ba ma lags ci yi rgyu zhig gis// long ba'i tshig gis lam gol 'dzin par bgyid// thang la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na// mgon med chus kher ba la
76a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa bskyed// grol ba ji lta bur na bcings pa yi// tshig gis brtson ra der ni 'dug par bgyid// sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na// nyam ngar gnas la 'dod pa bskyed
76a8(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid/ sa bdag 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing // 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gi chus khyer ba// long ba chus khyer brtson rar gnas pa dang // nyam ngar gnas 'drar bdag ni de snyam
76b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ mi yi bdag po khyod ni long ba bzhin// bdag ni mig can khyad par mthong ba lags// khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags// bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la rnam par
76b2(dkon brtsegs): smod/ 'dod pa dag ni dug gi lo ma bzhin// sbrul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste// rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra// me yi phung po shin du 'bar ba bzhin// blo gros
76b3(dkon brtsegs): snying po ldan pas de skad du// smre sngags 'don pa'i pa dang 'khor la smras// rin chen sna bdun dag la ma bltas par// rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung // sbrul gyi lpags rnying
76b4(dkon brtsegs): brjes pa ci 'dra dang // ngar snabs brngubs pa'i thal ba bzhin spangs te// blo gros snying po ldan pa chags med dpar// sdig dang rnam par bral ba rab tu byung // gzhon nu
76b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// blon po'i bu zhig rje su ra/ ba byung ba// ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste// blo gros snying po'i rjesu rab tu byung // gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung
76b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas ni// grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa lnga// ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur// 'dod pa rnams la skyon du
76b7(dkon brtsegs): lta bas na// mi yi seng ge de ni 'dod khams 'das// tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya'i phyir// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas// de ltar gzhon nu rab tu byung bas na// 
76b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de bu la ma dad gyur pa dang // zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas// legs par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems// de tshe blo gros
77a1(dkon brtsegs): snying po gzhan snyam mam// nga nyid de yi tshe na der gyur te// 'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems// bden pa
77a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// sa bdag zas gtsang 'di nyid de yi tshe// rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems// rjes su rab byung / 
77a3(dkon brtsegs): zlas byin gzhan snyam mam// khyod nyid de tshe de yi dus na ni// bden pa 'phel ba dad par byed pa yin// de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir// rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon
77a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed cig/ sa skyong byed pa 'di ni dang gyur na// skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang da ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bas khas
77a5(dkon brtsegs): blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zhag de 'das nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang / sham thab sa bgos lhung bzed thogs/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
77a6(dkon brtsegs): chen por song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na shAkya stong tsam zhig dang dgos pa zhig gi ched du 'dus shing 'khod do// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bcom
77a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ser skye'i gnas su byon te/ ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na shing n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas
77a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so// gal te gzhon nu de khyim na gnas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang
77b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / 
77b2(dkon brtsegs): rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che ste 'di bdun no// de la bu dpa' brtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi
77b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur ba zhig des gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing / mtshon gyis bda'
77b4(dkon brtsegs): med la/ mnyam ste mi mnyam pa med cing chos dang 'bru na pas legs par bab nas/ bskal pa rdzogs paralegs par bskyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste/ de ltar gyur na
77b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la da/ bang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing / rim gror byas pa dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas
77b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mchod par byas pa dang / dbang phyug gi dbang chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ltar bdag cag ni gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang
77b7(dkon brtsegs): bral bar gyur to snyam mo// des de snyam du bsams nas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed par su 'ang ma 'gro shig/ la la zhig nga'i bu
77b8(dkon brtsegs): de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na de'i lus la gnod pa'i chad pas bcad do// de'i tshe shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas/ 
78a1(dkon brtsegs): song bar gyur te/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ 
78a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa leg so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig na byon
78a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyan mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'
78a4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin du ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAts+tsha
78a5(dkon brtsegs): bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smraso// dga' bri 'i bzhin de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhug so// 
78a6(dkon brtsegs): mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// shAkya'i bu shin du legs par sad kyis
78a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang shAkya'i bu dag bri bzhin tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas 'khor de nas byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa
78a8(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon tshe dang ldan pa 'chag byon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig na
78b1(dkon brtsegs): byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la stan mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci la
78b2(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam shin du ma mnyel tama?/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'a
78b3(dkon brtsegs): kas shAkya'i bu shin du legs par sad la 'di skad ces smras so// shin du legs par sad de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde
78b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// 
78b5(dkon brtsegs): shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang / shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad/ gnas dben pa na
78b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pa mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang
78b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig na byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang
78b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin du ma mnyel tam/ 
79a1(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral la 'di skad/ 
79a2(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral bcom ldan 'das la stan mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhug so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi
79a3(dkon brtsegs): mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyi sa 'o brgyal ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag pa/ 
79a4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson pa byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / shAkya'i bu de dag dgis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa
79a5(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnye na bkur bya bar 'dod na/ bdag cag gis de lta mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas
79a6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i bu la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir su yang ma 'gro zhig/ la la zhig de la blta ba'am bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song na lus la gnod pa'i chang pas bcong ngo zhes bka' stsal
79a7(dkon brtsegs): to// de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'am bsnyen bkur byed du 'dod par mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'chang/ 
79a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni shin du nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na/ ji ltar bdag gis de'i drung du 'gro bar bya snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsams so// 'on
79b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bdag gis na mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis shing ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la dkyil mo bkrung bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas tshe
79b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'char kas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa des na mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas bar snang la dkyil mo
79b3(dkon brtsegs): dkrung bcas te/ rgyal po zas btsang ma ga la ba der song ngo // rgyal po zas btsang mas kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas na mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phag
79b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snang la dkyil mo dkrung bcas da shing 'ong ba mthong nas de la thal mo sbyar te tshigs dang su bcad nas smras pa/ tshon bsgyur gos can khyod na
79b5(dkon brtsegs): gang nas 'ongs/ khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar byos/ khyod la gang dgos de yang myur du sbyin// / brtul shugs grub pa mthong bar shin du dka'// de skad ces
79b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa// rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu// bdag la chos kyi rgyal po gang na bzhugs/ 
79b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te// bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa'i bshos bkur ro// yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba// khyod la mi
79b8(dkon brtsegs): mchog sras mnga' grags pa thob// gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar// ston gyi nyi ma'i gung gi 'od dang 'dra// ji ltar sprin med na mkha'i nyi ma ni
80a1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs rnams kun du 'od byed mngon par 'bar/ de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// mngon shes mnga' bas phyogs rnams kun du snang / 
80a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar ba na/ srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang // de bzhin rgyal po glang ba khyod kyi sras// mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhug
80a3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar nyams zil non sgyur ma rnams/ nyin par 'ong stong lam mer mi rung ba// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod sras kyis// zil gyis man pas mu stegs gzhan mi snang // ji ltar
80a4(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma'i zil gnon zla ba ni/ na mkha'i dbyings dan 'od stong nyid mi snang // de bzhin khyod sras zil ma nan mu stegs rnams// nyi ma'i zil non zla bzhin
80a5(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba med// seng ge'i nga ro thos nas phra mo rnams/ shugs kyis rmongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du/ ri sul gseb tu byer nas 'khra zhing gnas/ 
80a6(dkon brtsegs): stag gi nga ro gzhan gyis bzod par dka'// de bzhin rgyal ba drang srong chen po'i gsung // dpag med nga ro mu stegs gzhan thos na// shes rab dman pa srid pa
80a7(dkon brtsegs): rtser byin kyang // gsung thos pas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la// spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang stsal// snang ba
80a8(dkon brtsegs): mdzad cing rdul dang rnam par sbyangs// ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon par shar// bde dang mi bde la mgo nyis rab tu bstan// lam dang gol ba'i lam
80b1(dkon brtsegs): yang rgyal bas bstan// lam stor skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud// 'dam du bying ba rnams kyang thang la bton// ji ltar skom pa'i sa la sprin gyis ni// sgang dang gshod
80b2(dkon brtsegs): bcas char gyis ngoms par byed// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba lhar bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad// ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i ri sul nags
80b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa dang gel pa nags tshal shing rnams dang // khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang // me tog sna tshogs kyis ni sa mdzes pa// de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang
80b4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres bco brgyad chos mnga'i sdong po la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang // 'bras dbu smras pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes// ji ltar rgyu
80b5(dkon brtsegs): mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ri// lha yi gnas gyur mi ba skul rnam par mdzes// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes
80b6(dkon brtsegs): bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin lha dbang po// lha yi stan la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes/ 
80b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i stobs can zab mo'i 'brug bsgrags te// thugs rje chen po'i glog phreng rir ldan pas// dran pa nyer bzhag char rgyun mdab 'grogs te// rgyal ba klu mchog de ni chos
80b8(dkon brtsegs): char 'bebs// yongs dag dkyil 'khor tshul khrims rab kyi zer// ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'joms shing // ye shes nyi zer sred pa'i sred pa sems// 
81a1(dkon brtsegs): chun rnamam can 'ju rnas pas tan smras// bang ba 'ang bsas sa rgyas sumatsho brten par bya// tshul khrims nam dgaca ba brtan par mu// ta 'dzin la
81a2(dkon brtsegs): na maman 'dug/ drung chub san lag me tig spang ba'i spyong// dngag med bye rdzun rgyal pa'i snang po bsten// rdul khrims nags mtha' bsrend pa'i sa
81a3(dkon brtsegs): na pa baphreng banag su/ snang pal na me stan me skyed smras/ dab skangs san se 'ang smras// dub
81a4(dkon brtsegs): smras ma smras// rgyal pa rgyul nga dus zung sa// rgyam sa gamasnangs// rgya man
81a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa tshul khrims gte dang yon tad dbugags brtan/ bsam gtan dang pa'i naganas nye bar bsgrubs// ye shes kyis bsrungs par pa'i gyung lu na// 
81a6(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon gos pan gtang mngang // dge bsas su bzung bas sngag bcom ste/ nyan mangs zhe mdzang dge bsnyen bka' stsal pa wA dpaH
81a7(dkon brtsegs): na pam sal pa kyang khris semanas pa chub thams ma hrI~M thams kyis 'byu / @#
81b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad lam char chen rlan gyis sbrengs// thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras bu su la/ khyod kyi sras ni klu chen 'brug sgra sgrogs// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang zag mchog
81b2(dkon brtsegs): de bde bar 'ongs sam ci// bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa mngal lam// de yi lus la ngal bas dub med dam// thang gnas ud pa la bzhin mi rnyes sam// 'char kas
81b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can// dges shing bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te// thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug gnas bcas pas// gser gyi
81b4(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma lta bur rgyal mi rnyes// rgyal pos smras pa// sngan chang rdza rnga rnga bran sgras bskul zhing // gling bu'i sgra snyan nga ros bskul byas te// bud med glu yi dbyangs
81b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bslang bslang na// da ltar sang na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam// 'char kas smras pa/ bsam ga/ tan dgongs pas ting 'dzin zhi yul can// ting 'dzin
81b6(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste// brnal lam bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na// sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes// rgyal pos smras pa/ che ba'i rkyen 'os
81b7(dkon brtsegs): mal mchog bshams pa la// me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te// bud med tshogs kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na// da lta mun par nyal na cis mi rmongs// 
81b8(dkon brtsegs): 'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags pa gzims mal gzims pa ni// byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs// dga' bI gnas pas dgyes dang ldan
82a1(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ srid med btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'// rgyal pos smras pa// shAkya dpa'abos de dag mdun du bdar// bstan bcos mkhas
82a2(dkon brtsegs): dang rtse zhing dga' byas te// gzhal med khang 'dra'i khyim du dga' byas na// nga yi bu de nag mthar ji ltar dga'// 'char kas smras pa/ chos kyi byung bzhi sems ldan rnams kyis/ 
82a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar// zhi ba'i dgon par zhi ba'i bston mdzad pas// ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so// rgyal pos smras pa/ sngan chang gzhon nu khyim
82a4(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa'i tshe// yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar zhim byugs/ rgyal po'i rkyen du 'os pas khrus byas na// nags kyi mtha' na thub pa su yis bkru/ 'char kas smras pa
82a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims gtsang 'bab stegs chos chu rdzing bu ste// thub pa de/ bkru gzhan yang bkru ba mdzad// sku la mi gsher/ sras dang bcas su 'bog/ rang yang rgal la skye bo phal
82a6(dkon brtsegs): chen sgrol// rgyal pos smras pa/ gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i phreng bas brgyan// rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gos mchog bzang gyon gyon// tsan dan zhim pos shing mdab legs par bris
82a7(dkon brtsegs): nags chen de gseb thub pa su yis brgyan// 'char kas smras pa/ tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan phreng bas brgyan// khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin bsam gtan brgyan// mngon
82a8(dkon brtsegs): shes rig pa rnam thar brgyan pa'i sku// rnam grol gzi mnga' thub pa nags na mdzes// rgyal pos smras pa/ rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gri mtshon thogs pa'i// dpa' bo gsum
82b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'ongs pas lus bsrungs te// bla re gdugs kyis rtag tu dag ba dgab pa// gcig pu nags na 'dug na su yis bsrung // 'char kas smras pa/ byams pa'i stobs
82b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis thub pa yongs bsrungs te// de dpung ye shes nyan thos zham ring g.yog/ yon tan tshogs la nges pas 'jigs mi mnga'// stobs bcu dgyes pa mnga' zhing mi 'jigs brnyes// / 
82b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos smras pa/ nga yi bu yi yon tan khyod kyis smras// chos legs spyod cing dub med brjod pa thob// khyod kyang zan zo bsod snyoms bkur bar gyis// bdag kyang mi yi
82b4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po bltar 'gre'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa'i char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan
