82b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog dge sbyong / gi tshogs yongs su sdud pa drang srong chen po ste/ dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ dge sbyong gi rgyal
82b6(dkon brtsegs): bo lam me/ lhan ne lgang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la zla ba nya ste yongs su rgyas pa'i tshe/ skar ma'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba ni/ lam
82b7(dkon brtsegs): me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// rgyal po che po 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma ni ston gyi dus na shin du
82b8(dkon brtsegs): lam me lhan ne ljang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na shin du lam me lhan ne lgang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal por rab
83a1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa ni lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang de dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 
83a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni chos bzangs lha'i mdun sa na gnas na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na
83a3(dkon brtsegs): lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang / lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i tshogs/ 
83a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na gnas na lam me lhan ne lhang nga'o// de bzhinadu bcom ldan 'das kyang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste
83a5(dkon brtsegs): dper na mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni tshangs pa bye ba phragastong gis bskor na lam me lhan na lhang nge'o// de bzhi na du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhug
83a6(dkon brtsegs): na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'di thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos su
83a7(dkon brtsegs): zad na/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma bcas pa nyid kyi tshe/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos rab tu g.yos
83a8(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul kun du rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun du rab tu ldeg/ chem che ma rab tu chem chem kun du rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur rab tu
83b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ur 'ur kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun du rab tu 'khrugs shing snang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba lta ci smos// btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten paras
83b2(dkon brtsegs): la gom pa bdun bor ba dang / steng gi bar snang las chu'i rgyun grang dro rnam gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis kyis khrus byas pa dang / de'i lha'i khri bzang po dbus gser las byas pa byung
83b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / steng gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs dang rnga yab dang bcas pa byung ba lta 'ang ci smos/ btsas ma thag tu lha thams cad phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa dang / gang gi tshe btsas nas
83b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe mngon par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang 'khrul/  pa med pa/ rtag tu dam bcas pa la brtan pa/ ji skad smras pa de ltar byed pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi gcod
83b5(dkon brtsegs): bar brtson 'grus brtan po yang dag par smra ba/ slu ba med pa lta ci smos/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
83b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ brgal nas bsgral bar bya'o zhes smras pa lta ci smos snyam ste/ des de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i dam bcas pa de dran nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 
83b7(dkon brtsegs): blon mchog ldan pa gang zhig bltam ma thag/ nor ba med pa'i gsung ni brjod mdzad de// gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig/ 
83b8(dkon brtsegs): bltam par gyur ma thag nyid du// 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes// mgon po mnyam pa med pa'i gsung brjod pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// su zhig rmi lan
84a1(dkon brtsegs): / meba'i dus na yang // brdzun gyi tshig ni nam yang ma gsus te// daltar gsungs pa de dag mdzad mdzad pa// de la mkhas pa su nig sa
84a2(dkon brtsegs): ches ka gser gyi phung po gangs ri mnyam pa yis// gang zhig chags par bya bar mi nus shing // gang zhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches
84a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshon rnon 'dra ba'i ngag rngub tshig rnams kyis// gang zhig khro bar bya bar ma nus shing // zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// chags
84a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur dang zhe sdang rmongs gyur pas// gang zhig thul ba dar nus par ma gyur te// shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ 
84a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang // longs spyod/ dag la rtog pa'i rnam pa yis// gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid
84a6(dkon brtsegs): mi chesarmad du byung ba rnam pa brgyad dag gis// ngo mtshar 'dzin yang mi nus te// dpal stug ldan zhing lag tu mi dam pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ 
84a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dag gis brjod pa'i tshig snyan pa// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshigs gis kyang // gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches
84a8(dkon brtsegs): don gyi tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang // chos dang 'dod la nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis// gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// dri ma
84b1(dkon brtsegs): med stobs mtha' yas ldan gyur pa// gang zhig grong khyer cho na 'byung ba'i tshe// dpung rnams kyis ni thub par ma gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// byang chub dam/ 
84b2(dkon brtsegs): par mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir// gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nas su// 'chi med rgyu phyir ri dgas spyod mdzad pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// byang chub dam pa
84b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir// zhan pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis// lo drug bar du dka' thub drag sprad pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// 'jig rten la ni phan dang
84b4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i phyir// byang chub dam pa don du gnyer ba na// lo drug lon pa'i tha mar tshong ku gsol// de yi gsu dang la su zhig yid mi ches// gang la lo drug bar du
84b5(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyis ni// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'bangs te glags pa tsal kyang // de la glags ni rnyed par ma gyur pa/ de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig 'dod
84b6(dkon brtsegs): chags zhe sdang bral gyur cing // su la cung zad tsam yang mi slong la// 'jig rten dag gi don ni mdzad gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig gzhan
84b7(dkon brtsegs): la gsan pa ma mdzad par// rtogs par dka' ba rab tu zhi ba yi// byang chub bla na med mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig tshangs pa/ 
84b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis gsol btab pas// bcom ldan 'das kyi de yi tshig gsan te// nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad pa na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bdag la
85a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs brtse don gyi phyir// shAkya'i grong khyim du ni byon gyur te// shAkya'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// brgal
85a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang gis// sngon gyi thugs dam bcas par dgongs mdzad de// bdag cag srid pa'i rgyun las sgrol mdzad pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ 
85a3(dkon brtsegs): de dus dbab de ltar dus mkhyen pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de yi dus mkhyen te// 'dren pa dus su thugs brtse mdzad pa na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// mi yi 'dren pa
85a4(dkon brtsegs): yi ni sku mchog la// lta ba'i don du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes// rgyal po des ni rang gi sems kyis su// nga snyam du ni rjes su bsam pa byas// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas
85a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar ring zhig rjes su bsams nas// tshe dang ldan pa/ 'char ka la smras pa/ dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal
85a6(dkon brtsegs): po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyi don du bsam byas te// khyod nyid dad par bya phyir bdag 'dir 'ongs// stobs bcu mnga' la dad pa'i sems skyed na// 
85a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa bud med dag kyang mtho ris 'dong // stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan tshang med ldan// drang srong chen po shAkya dga' mdzad pa// 'dir smyon rgyal po thugs dang skyed cig dang / khyod kyi
85a8(dkon brtsegs): grags pa tshad med 'jig rten 'byung // khyod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste// stobs bcu thugs rje thugs brtse che 'da' ba// chu khrod pad+ma ji bzhin chags med par// stobs bcu chags
85b1(dkon brtsegs): med thugs mnga' spyod pa mdzad// srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las brgal gyur nas// 'gro ba mang po chu bo che las sgrol// rkang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thang 'don gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la
85b2(dkon brtsegs): ni dad pa bskyed// srid pa'i zug rngu bzhi po kun bton te// sman pa'i gtso bo skye dgu'i zug rngu 'byin// gso ba byed pa mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog/ 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed// 
85b3(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi sde chen dpag med pa ma mdzad de// nag po'i phyogs rnams sder bcas yongs mnan nas// mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub rnyed 'gyur gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed// 
85b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'grol zhing chos kyang bstan pa dang // 'chi med/ zhi ba mi la bshad gsol zhes// mi dbang la ni lha dang / dang gsol 'debs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa
85b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed// phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs rnams zil mnan te/ ston pa dpag yas 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems na bye ba tshad med 'dul mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog lani
85b6(dkon brtsegs): dad pa bskyed// rnam dag spyan mnga' de ni 'gro ba dag/ mun pa rab rib stug po bsgribs pa yi// mig skyong rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed/ 
85b7(dkon brtsegs): rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa nyon mongs la// rga shi med mchog mi la ston mdzad cing // 'chi med gnas su sems can don mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed// me chen
85b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyis bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'di// mes tshigs la sprin chen char ba bzhin// bzhi gnyis dam pa'i sprin gyis char 'bebs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed// dri gsum
86a1(dkon brtsegs): dri ma spangs shing skyon bsal te// dri ma gsum las skye bo grol mdzad cing // stobs bcu rnam par snang ba spyod mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la na
86a2(dkon brtsegs): dad pa bskyed/ skye dgu kun la pa bzhin thugs brtse bas// stobs bcu thugs rje mnga' ba byams par dgongs// thugs rje thugs rtse sems can grol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni/ 
86a3(dkon brtsegs): dad pa bskyod// bcom ldan de ni ma dul sems can 'dul// thugs rje mnga' ba ma zhi zhi mdzad cing // rgod pa rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang pa
86a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems// rgya ma tsho la ni lha'i bu ji ltar// stobs bcu thugs rje chem dnga' sgrol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa
86a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed 'tshad med yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa/ thugs rje chen po dang ba'i thugs kyis spyod// yun ri nga 'khrugs pa'i skye bo dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog
86a6(dkon brtsegs): la ni dad pa bskyed// nor bu rin chen chu dngas byed pa bzhin// rgyal ba skye bo dang bar spyod mdzad cing // mi yi 'tha' rnyog rab tu dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed// 
86a7(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin chen rang bzhin yongs dag pa// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su bskyed// rgyal ba de bzhin skyon bsal dag pa'i thugs// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongasu bskyed// 'jig
86a8(dkon brtsegs): rten gcol dad pa thob gyur na// lha dang mi dag sdug bsngal khur yang 'dor// srid pa'i rgyud spangs zhi ba mchog tu 'dong // 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed// bdag gis yon
86b1(dkon brtsegs): tan phyogs gcig brjod pa ni// na mkha'i dbyings la mkha' lding rjes bzhin te// bdag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan mthar phyin min// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed/ 
86b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka las legs par bshad pa yang thos// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu yang nyid kyis
86b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon du mthong / sngon bdag brgal nas skyes bu khyu mchog khyod kyang bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes dam bcas pa yang rjesu dran nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob par gyur to// de ltar
86b4(dkon brtsegs): dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ki la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong khyod ni nga'i bu/ chos las skyes pa'i bu yin na/ khyod bdag zan
86b5(dkon brtsegs): zo la bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te song shig/ nga yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir phyi bzhin/ 'ong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de ltar rgyal
86b6(dkon brtsegs): po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas nas zan zos te bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos khyer nas song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// 
86b7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni dge slong 'char kas dad par byed te/ deng skye bo phal po che'i don du 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te/ 
86b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bdag gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la leg so zhes gnang ste/ 'char
87a1(dkon brtsegs): ka leg so legs so// de ring rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byas pas khyed kyis bsod nams mang du bskyed do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
87a2(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ring dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed pa de la gal te gzugs shig yod na ni/ 
87a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su yang bsod nams kyi phung po de mi shong ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni de tsam du dpag tu
87a4(dkon brtsegs): meng do// bam po gnyis po/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas/ byag bcabs lhung bzed bkrus te/ mtshan ma'i rnam pa'ang
87a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu mdzad do// mtshan ma'i rnam pa de mdzad pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'di lta ste/ 
87a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur
87a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ byang phyogs su brten te steng gi bar snang la gnod
87a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung yang dri za bye ba
87b1(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par gyur to// des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
87b2(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogs logs su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun
87b3(dkon brtsegs): la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul bum bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
87b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par gyur te/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ma/ go bos phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs logasu brten pas/ steng gi bar snang la grul bum gyi tshogs kyis
87b5(dkon brtsegs): bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya
87b6(dkon brtsegs): stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
87b7(dkon brtsegs): nub phyogs log su brten te steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// lha'i
87b8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin steng gi bar snang la thal mo sbyar te// bcom
88a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// de bzhin du lha'i dbang po 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga'
88a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i dbang po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po 'od gsal dang / 
88a3(dkon brtsegs): dag rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rig kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris nas mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
88a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khod par gyur nasabacom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi da bar snang la re re zhing yang g.yog lha'i bu bye ba khrag
88a5(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan cig tu bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug pa ragyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag
88a6(dkon brtsegs): bzangs ris kyang lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang ldan cig tu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las
88a7(dkon brtsegs): bskum pa tsam gyis lha ma yin gyis dbang po thag bzangs ris lha ma yin gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom
88a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// bya'i rgyal po mdab bzang
88b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri drug stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar khong par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
88b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu rgyal po'i khab tha dad pa nas lhags pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang 'dug par gyur to// 
88b3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du// ma lus rdzogs gyur zla ba nya ba yis// skar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// 
88b4(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' zla ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes// zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor zhal mnga' ba// mun pa rab rib sel cing dri gsum 'joms// rtog ge can tshogs zil
88b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis mnan nas ni// mkha' la skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes// nyi ma 'od zer brgya mi lus 'dzin pa// ston gyi dus na mun sel rnam
88b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzes shing // lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas su// nyi ma de ni pad+ma'i kha yang 'byed// nyi ma 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas// stong
88b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni/ mi yi nyi ma rnam par mdzes gyur cing // nyan thos pad+ma'i tshal mchog kha yang 'byed/ 
88b8(dkon brtsegs): lha yi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni/ 'dun sar lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba/ lha yi tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/ 
89a1(dkon brtsegs): bde sogs khyimathab sbyin ldan rnam par mdzes// rkang gnyis dbang po dpal sdug stobs bcu yang // dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun
89a2(dkon brtsegs): bdar stong gsum na// rtog ge tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// lha yi rgyal po mtha' bral dbang byed pa// 'tha' bral
89a3(dkon brtsegs): bzang po lhas mchod btsur byas pa// 'tha' bral bzang po lnga tshogs nang bzhugs te// 'tha' bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mdzes// gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu
89a4(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba yang // lamangan ngan 'gror 'gro ba zil mnan nas// yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston ma/ dzod cing // stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab
89a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes/ lha yi rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de/ dga' ldan gnas na lha yi tshogs kyis bskor/ lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas ni// sngon gyi
89a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu mdzes// de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yang // lha mi lha min tshogs kyis bla mar byas// 'khor brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni// skyes bu
89a7(dkon brtsegs): seng ge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes// lha yi dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni// lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas su// rang gi bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas na/ 
89a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing // stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba po// ma dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba
89b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po yang // skye bo zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// lha yi rgyal po dbang bsgyur byed pa ni// lha'i gnas 'dug cing lha tshogs zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
89b2(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid kyis// rnam par mdzes par gyur pa ji bzhin du// de ltar rgyal po stobs bcu'i spyod pa dag/ sngon chad spyad pas lha mi zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid
89b3(dkon brtsegs): kyisatargyal ba de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na ni tshangs pa yang // tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gis zil mnan te// shin tu snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan
89b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag/ yongs su brjod pa byed cing mngon du mdzes/ de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa 'drar gyur pa// dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshegs rnams kyis// mdun du bdar/ 
89b5(dkon brtsegs): te bden pa'i gtam gsung zhing // 'jig rten gsum po dag na mngon du mdzes// nyan par 'dod pa lha dang mi rnams dang // lto 'phye chen po dag ni dus mkhyen
89b6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi// gsung rnams kyis ni rab tu ston pa mdzad// bya lam na mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid// rgya mtsho bum pas gzhal du rung
89b7(dkon brtsegs): yang srid/ ri rab srang la gcal du rung yang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi nus so// rgyal po mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u ste dang pa'o// // de nas
89b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka song nas ring po ma lon par rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang shAkya rnams la bsgo ba// grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni gang 'di
90a1(dkon brtsegs): dmar reng 'char ba'o// dmar reng shar na nyi ma 'char bar shes so// grogs po dag de bzhin du dge slong 'char ka yang bcom ldan
90a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i snga ltas yin te// dge slong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin no// grogs po dag du
90a3(dkon brtsegs): bas na bzhon pa'i mchog mchog rnams stod de sta gon gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ring kho na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu blta na sdug pa de blta zhing 'dong ngo // lha leg
90a4(dkon brtsegs): so zhes gsol nas// shAkya rnams kyis rgyal po zadas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te/ theg pa'i mchog rnam sa myur du bstad do// de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma ser
90a5(dkon brtsegs): kye'i gnas dang / n+ya gra ta'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal bar gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du cug cing / bye ma gtsang ma 'dal du bcug ste/ 
90a6(dkon brtsegs): nyams dga' ba dang / me tog silams gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba mang pos brgyan te/ skabs skabs su gar mkhan dang / glu mkhan dang / gyang dang
90a7(dkon brtsegs): bum rnga thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo dang / glu'i cha byad dang / yo byad thogs pa dag dkod par gyur to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gzhon pa'i mchog dang // ches
90a8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang / bdag nyid kyang gzhon pa'i mchog la zhon te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe shA
90b1(dkon brtsegs): la la'i bzhon pa'i mchog ni rnam pa 'di lta ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang sngo la/ rta sngon po rnams kyis drangs shing / rgyan rnams kyang sngo la dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ 
90b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rgyan sngon po can gyis bskor ba/ gdugs dang / ral gri dang / thod dang / nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang / lham rgyan can sngon po dang ldan pa/ kha tshar ma bcad pa'i ras
90b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon po gyon cing rgyan sngon po thog pa'i zhal ta pa rnams zhal ta byed pa/ rgyan sngon po can gyi lcags thogs dang khrid pa du ma dang ldan pa/ rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng ba sha stag
90b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to// shAkya la la'i da bzhon pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag
90b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang thams cad ser ba nas thams cad du dmar ba dang tha ma sa cad du dkar ba dang / thams cad du bkrab dang / shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan khra bo can gyi
90b6(dkon brtsegs): mi brgya phrag re res bskor ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// shing rta de dag re re'i phyi bzhin du yang glang po che brgyad khri gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan
90b7(dkon brtsegs): can gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stags bshams te/ glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa/ bkra ba
90b8(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa/ brgyad khri bzhag nas 'dong bar gyur to// glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha brgyus pa
91a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bshams te 'dong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang shAkya rnams rgyang
91a2(dkon brtsegs): ring po nas 'ong ba gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong ba de dag gis shAkya ser
91a3(dkon brtsegs): sku'i gnas nas 'ong ba 'di dag la ltos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag/ shAkya rnams ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bskyed mos tshal du 'dong ba dang rje su 'gron/ 
91a4(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// ser skya zhes bya'i grong khyer dam pa/ denas// rgyal po zas gtsang mi yi khyu mchog de/ 'khor dang bcas te ji ltar 'ong gyur pa// de ltar bstan gyis/ 
91a5(dkon brtsegs): khyed rnams de nyon cig/ shing rta brgya stong mchog dang ba ces pa dag/ legs par rgyan cing mdzes par spras nas ni// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas// 
91a6(dkon brtsegs): mi yi dbang po dam pa byung bar gyur// shing rta sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba dang // rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang sngo ba ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa
91a7(dkon brtsegs): ngag kyang sngo/ lcags kyang sngo zhing thag srang rnams kyang sngo// dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni sngon po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng pas mdzes
91a8(dkon brtsegs): par byas/ shing rta ser zhing rgyan yang ser ba dang // rta yang ser zhing ser po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang ser po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang ser// lcags
91b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang ser zhing thag srang rnams kyang ser// dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni ser ba 'gos can te// rgyal mtshan ser po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas
91b2(dkon brtsegs): shing rta dmar zhing rgyan kyang dmar ba dang // rta yang dmar zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dmar// lcags
91b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang dmar zhing thag srang rnams kyang dmar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par
91b4(dkon brtsegs): byasaHshing rta dkar zhing rgyan kyang dkar ba dang // rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan dam lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa
91b5(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang dkar// lcags kyang dkar zhing thag srad rnams kyang dkar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams da nga bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te// rgyal
91b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta bkra zhing brgyan kyang bkra ba dang // rta yang bkra zhing bkra ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang bkra ba ste// de bzhin
91b7(dkon brtsegs): gos kyi dam pa dag kyang bkra/ lcags kyang bkra zhing thag srad rnams kyang bkra/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni bkra ba'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan
91b8(dkon brtsegs): khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du// glang po brgyad khrir tshang ba bshams pa ni// gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis legs par brgyan// glang
92a1(dkon brtsegs): chen rnams ni gser gyis chal par brgyan// de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi/ khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni bzhags nas// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyun gyis/ 
92a2(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa yi// shing rta rnams kyis phyi bzhin 'breng bar bshams// de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu yang // rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis dga' bar brgyan// rgyal po'i cha
92a3(dkon brtsegs): 'os rgyal po mtsham stabs can// glang po de dag rnams ni byi bzhin 'breng // rab tu dri zhim kha dog lnga pa yi// me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram// dar gyi lda ldi dag
92a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab tu bres// bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs pa dar brgyan// glu mkhan gar mkhan rnams dang kyang rnam ngas dang // bum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas/ 
92a5(dkon brtsegs): rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yang // rab tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin 'brang // rgyal po gshegs pa 'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rgyal po
92a6(dkon brtsegs): zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rnams rta babs sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas bzhon pa la babs te/ rkang thang go 'khor gyis yongasu bskor nas mdun du bdar te n+ya gro ta'i kun
92a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ra bar dong ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas mi gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi na mkha' la rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon
92a8(dkon brtsegs): par dad pa'i phyir 'chag cing bzhugs par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chags pa'i g.yas phyogs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zham 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// 
92b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zham 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chags pa'i zham 'bring du lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang / yongasu dga' ldan dang
92b2(dkon brtsegs): rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs 'dzin cing gsil yab kyis g.yob par gyur to// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / 
92b3(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
92b4(dkon brtsegs): log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das
92b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chag pa'i nub phyogs log su thog ma la bla gos phrag pa ga/ cig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad na/ sa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba
92b6(dkon brtsegs): btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang
92b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / 
92b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / lha'i spos kyi phye ma rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan dang / klu
93a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang la sgra 'byin par gyur to// mi las 'das pa'i glu'i nga ro yang bar snang las byung bar gyur to// sprin las spros kyi
93a2(dkon brtsegs): char zam zim yang 'bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char yang 'bab par gyur to// de nas nga'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul
93a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas lha dang mi rnams kyang gcig gis gcig mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mdzad do// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lha de dag bcom ldan
93a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de la mchod pa byed pa yang mthong / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas/ kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 
93a5(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa ni/ ngo mtshar te sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i/ tshe/ 'di skad du nga la ni gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la
93a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang bar 'gyur ba ngo mtshar mi che ste/ ngas ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha dang mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
93a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang ba de ni 'di yin par lta ste/ bdag ni mi'i 'khor can du zad bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang mi'i 'khor can du gyur to snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bla gos phyogs
93a8(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bgos te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bltam ma thag tu sus
93b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma brten par sa chen po la gom pa bdun bzhud de/ phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gsungs brjod pa/ nga ni 'jig rten na mchog/ nga ni 'jig rten na gtso// nga ni 'jig rten na rab ste/ ngas
93b2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos btugs te phyag bgyis so// gang gi tshe bcom
93b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong du bzhud nas 'dzam+bu'i grib ma bsil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ nyi ma yol yang 'dzam+bu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de ma btang ste/ lha'i bu gzhon nu drug
93b4(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar nas/ phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so// da yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du phyag 'tshal
93b5(dkon brtsegs): lo zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra sa so// gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bltam nas// / sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhud de// nga ni 'jig rten 'di
93b6(dkon brtsegs): na mchog ces gsungs// de tshe mkhas pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal lo// gang tshe thub chen zhing pa'i grong bzhud de// 'jom+bu'i grib mas bzhugs pa ma btang zhing // lha bu gzhon nu
93b7(dkon brtsegs): drug gis btud gyur pa// de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// de yang 'di dang khyod la lan gsum dung / thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje che mnga' lha
93b8(dkon brtsegs): mis mchod pa gtso// khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag ci smos// mtshan ni don grub lags zhes sngon brjod pa// pa dang ma yis bsams te btags pa lags// khyod kyis bsam
94a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas na// ngan grub lags par bdag gis dgadong 'tshal/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe bcom ldan
94a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel ba bshams so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin
94a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi ras bcos bu yog par bting ngo // steng du yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i bla re bres so// de nas bcom ldan 'das par snang gi 'chags de nas babs te gdan khri bsham pa
94a4(dkon brtsegs): la bzhugs so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang 'khor dang dbacas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshadal te phyogs cig tu 'dug go// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha
94a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bar snang la 'khod par gyur to// 'di la 'dri ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ser skya zhes
94a6(dkon brtsegs): bya grong khyer dam pa yi// n+ya gro da yi rab nyams dga' bar// rgyal po zas gtsang de dang gang gi tshe// 'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yi tshe// skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te
94a7(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang mkha' lding dbang po dang // klu tshogs rnams dang de bzhin grul bum dang // dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus
94a8(dkon brtsegs): te/ mi 'am ci yi tshogs dang mi rnams dang // de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha// rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gzugs kyi khamasu gtogs pa yi
94b1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang // 'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas pa dag dang // 'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus// dge sbyong dag dang de bzhin
94b2(dkon brtsegs): bram ze dang / spyod pa can dang kun du rgyu dag dang // gcer bu pa dang mu stegs gzhan mang po// log lam rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus// sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid
94b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa yis/ rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yi sems// yongasu smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir// de yi tshe na 'dus pa chen por gyur// sngan chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs
94b4(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa'i// tshig gis 'khor rnams yongasu tshim par mdzad// da ni rgyal ba rgyal po zas gtsang la/ 8/ rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab tu bstan par bzhed// bcom
94b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis// gzhon nu khyo// da ni sa bdag chen po yi// rgyal por gyur zhes/ mkhas pas lung bstan gyis// khab nas ma byung
94b6(dkon brtsegs): shig ces mngon gsol pa// gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// rin chen sna bdun dag dang ldan par 'gyur// 'byophyo
94b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur// chos la gnas shing sa yang skyong ba ste// gling bzhi dbang bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur// mi yi bdag dang mi yis mchod par 'ong
94b8(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' des skal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med nas// bdag ni rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smras kyis/ 
95a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs// 'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis// bdag la srub mdzad par bzhed pas na// de wAn/ 
95a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul las rgyal po chen po khyod// bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mi re// rgyal po chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni// rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis rul sbal gcig cig 'phangs// rgya mtsho
95a3(dkon brtsegs): rlabs ni phyir log gyur pa na// ru sbal de ni khron pa'i nang du lhung // de la khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal gyis// rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gnas 'dir 'ongs kye// nga yi the tshom skyes pa/ 
95a4(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa'i phyir// myur du nga la smos shes de skad smras// / khron pa'i nang gi ru sbrul de nyid la// rgya mtsho'i ru dasbal blo chen des smras pa// nga ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs
95a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bkur bkur te// khron pa 'dir ni de ring porabar gyur// rgya mtsho'i rlabs chen de ni phyir log song // nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus te// nga ni
95a6(dkon brtsegs): rlabs dang bral bar gyur pas na// ru sbal khyod kyi khron par gnas 'cha'o// de la khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal gyis// rgya mtsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam 'am// 'on te khron pa 'di
95a7(dkon brtsegs): bas che ba zhig/ dris lan nga la myur du smros shes smras// rgya mtsho'i ru sbal blo rgya chen po des// khron pa'i ru sbal de la tshig smras pa/ khron pa'i ru sbal khyod ni byis pa ste/ 
95a8(dkon brtsegs): blo rgya chung zhing shes pa rab tu zhan// nga ni lan tsha can gyi chu der btsas// yun ring dus nas de na skye skye yang // rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par mi nus na// dbus lta shes par ga la nus
95b1(dkon brtsegs): shes smras/ de ltar mi yi bdag po khyod kyis kyang // bdag gi mthu ni thugasu mchud de/ gling bzhi pa yi mchod pa rnams kyis ni/ khyod kyis bdag la slu ba mdzad par bzhe
95b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// chad pas mi gtsang mtshon chas 'da' med par// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa thob
95b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyang bzhed nas// de phyir 'khor chen po ni de dag dang // sems can rnams la thugs kyis dgongs
95b4(dkon brtsegs): ba mdzad/ rgyal po zas gtsang sems ni mgu bya'i phyir// / thugs kyis yongasu bskul ba mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag ma lus par// de yi tshe na de ni/ 
95b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur// rgyal po 'dun par byas po'i le'u ste gsu ma pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris bcom ldan 'das
95b6(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa bya ba'i sems thog mar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang bcas pas bcom
95b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa thog mar byas te/ de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che'i rin thang yod pa dang / rin thang med pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod
95b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir bul lo// rin po che gzhan rgya mtsho chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te mchod par phul lo// rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rta khrag khrig phrag
96a1(dkon brtsegs): drug cu yang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag re re zhing rta cang shes khrag khrig phrag drug cu mngon par sprul to// rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer
96a2(dkon brtsegs): ka'i dra ba can la rkang lag gi rgyan gser las byas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dbyar 'dab can/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go// 
96a3(dkon brtsegs): rta cang shes de dag gi rgyan du bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re dag kyang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag kyang gser gyi rgyal mtshan can gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go/ yid
96a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/ shing rta ded ga 'dod na ni rjes su 'dong / shing rta de dag sdod na ni sdod pa sha
96a5(dkon brtsegs): stag go/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag la yang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par dpyangs so// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag kyang rin
96a6(dkon brtsegs): po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang ldan par mngon par sprul to// shing rta'i rgyan dang rta'i rgyan dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyong na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na
96a7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas sgra phyung na snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyan na bde ba 'byung ba de bzhin du shing rta'i rgyan de
96a8(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang ldan pa'i rta de dag dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag blung gis bskyod na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur te/ shing rta de dag gi 'phang gis
96b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad drug cu bsgribs te 'khod par gyur to// shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin yang rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// shing rta de dag thams
96b2(dkon brtsegs): cad la yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la ni rol mo byed// la la ni sil snyan byed/ la la ni
96b3(dkon brtsegs): glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni tsan ngan dang ud pa la'i phye mas 'thor// la la ni a ga ru dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi rdzas kyi phye mas
96b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thor/ la la ni gser dngul gyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / 6\u0f7f/  dang man du sha/ ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka
96b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya snar khro bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi me tog mngon par sprul cing bcom ldan
96b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / shel gyi me tog dang / bai dUr+ya'i me tog dang / spug gi me tog dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog dang / 
96b7(dkon brtsegs): rdo'i snying po'i me tog gis mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni rin po che sna bdun dang / dbyig gis snyim pa bkang zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni na bza' dang rgyan
96b8(dkon brtsegs): 'bul lo// la la ni sku rags dang zhabs kyi rgyan dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdug dang / gdu du dang gdu bya ma dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / 
97a1(dkon brtsegs): gser srung dang / mu tig gi do shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / sen mo do dang / gya ro dang / mgul rman sna tshogs 'thor bar gyur to// la la ni tshong tshong/ 
97a2(dkon brtsegs): bshibs pa/ la la ni mgo brgyan/ la la ni rna cha gdub kor/ la la ni gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa/ la la ni rin po che'i phreng ba gser gyis spras pa/ la la ni gser gyi dra
97a3(dkon brtsegs): bal la ni gser gyi phreng ba dang / nor bu'i phreng ba dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thog so// la la ni gser gyi gdugs dang / dngul gyi gdugs dang / bai dUr+ya'i gdugs dang / shel gyi gdugs dang / 
97a4(dkon brtsegs): spug gi gdugs dang / rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang / dmu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tha/ 
97a5(dkon brtsegs): dad pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan kha dog sna tshe gas dang / tshon sna tshogs can mang po thog so// la la ni spos chu'i 'char 'bebs shing / 'khod par gyur to// 
97a6(dkon brtsegs): la la ni bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod par gyur to// mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// mi phul khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rkang gnyis gtso la phyag 'tshal/ 
97a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod la do zla yong ma mchis// 'jig rten gsal la phyag 'tshalo// ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba'i ri la phyag 'tshalo// yon tan rdzogs
97a8(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs sel la phyag 'tshalo// spyod dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshalo// gnas pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'// le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'
97b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams shing brtul ba nyid// nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshal// rin pa che'i pho brang gi rdal bstan sdug pa mdzes pa rin pa chesna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag rnguH/ 
97b2(dkon brtsegs): cu yang mngon par sprul to// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag re re zhing yang bzhugs sa khrag khrig phra drus cu bcu mngon par sprul to// bzhugs sa de dag re re zhing ba gam bkra ba blta na sdug pa rin po/ 
97b3(dkon brtsegs): che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can brgya phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// ba gam de dag re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba lta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig
97b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtse dgas pa de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra ba blta na sdug dpa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu
97b5(dkon brtsegs): drug cu mngon par sprul to// de la gser gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni dngul/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni dUr+ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni spug/ ka zhu ni mu
97b6(dkon brtsegs): tig dmar po// sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ dngul gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni gser/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni bai dUr+ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ ka ba
97b7(dkon brtsegs): ni spug/ ka zhu ni mu tig dmar po// sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// bai dUr+ya'i khyams kyi gdung phya ma ni shel/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni gser/ them pa dang kha khyen
97b8(dkon brtsegs): ni dngul ka ba ni spug/ ka zhu ni mu tig dmar po sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin sha stag go// shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung bya ma ni bai dUr+ya/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar
98a1(dkon brtsegs): ni smug/ them pa dang khal khyer ni rdo'i snying po// ka ba ni gser/ ka zhu ni dngul/ sa gzhi ni mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// spug gi khyam/ 
98a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni rdo'i snying po/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni mu tig dmar po/ them pa dang khal khyer ni gser/ ka ba ni dngul/ ka zhu ni shel/ sa gzhi ni bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin can
98a3(dkon brtsegs): stag go/ mu tig dmar po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni spug/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni rdo'i snying po// them pa dang khal khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni gser/ ka zhu ni bai dUr+ya/ sa gzhi
98a4(dkon brtsegs): ni ke ke ru'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// rdo'i snying po'i khya/ mas rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni mu tig dmar po// gral bu dang sgro 'phar ni gser/ them pa dang lal khyer ni
98a5(dkon brtsegs): dngul ka ba ni bai dUr+ya/ ka zhu ni ke ke ru/ sa gzhi ni shaM gyi rang bzhin can sha stag go// khyams de dag tu yang seng ge'i khri rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can lcam
98a6(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs bting ba ka tsa la ni 'di'i steng g.yogs can/ mtha' gnyisu brten ma bzang po bkod pa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// seng ge'i khri de dag gi/ 
98a7(dkon brtsegs): rkang rten rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can dag la/ ras bcos bu sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ shing bal las byas pa'i shin tu phra ba dang / srin bal las byas pa'i shin tu phra ba dang / zar ma'i
98a8(dkon brtsegs): shun pa las byas pa'i shin tu phra ba dang / shun phrags las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / ka shi ka las byas pa shin tu phra ba bye ba phrag drug cu drug cu bting bar gyur to// seng ge'i khri de dag
98b1(dkon brtsegs): gi re re'i ngos gnyis su yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i bsil yab thogs pa gnyis gnyis mngon par sprul te/ seng ge'i khri de dag
98b2(dkon brtsegs): la lha ma yin gyi bu mo gzhon 'khod pa dag la g.yog po/ khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to//

98b4(dkon brtsegs): shel gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ dngul gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan ser po yu ba dmar po gser gyis da spras pa dag btsugs/ bai dUr+ya'i khyams rnamasu ni rgyal
98b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dmar po yu ba ser po shel gyis spras pa dag pa tsugs// shel gyi khyams rnamasu ni rgyal mtshan kar po yu ba bai dUr+ya gser gyis smras pa dag btsugs
98b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna tshogs kyi khyams rnams ni/ rgyal mtshan khra bo gser gyi yu ba bai dUr+yas spras pa dag btsug so// de la rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog ser po/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni/ 
98b7(dkon brtsegs): tog sngon po/ rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po/ rgyal mtshan dkar po rnams ni tog dmar po// rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan rnams ni tog rin po che sna bdun pa sha stag go// 
98b8(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag par snang gi na mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to// de 'di lta ste dper na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
99a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi glang po che sa srung gi bu ni bar snang gi na mkha' las 'gro zhing sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bskyed mos tshal yongs 'dus rtol du nye bar 'jog go/

99b3(dkon brtsegs): chus kyang rdzab tu gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri ngas khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jim

99b7(dkon brtsegs): tu mi bskul ba/ lhar bcas 'jig rten mi 'jigs stsol ba po/ khyod la bdag ni skyabasu nye bar mchi// gang la dga' ba'i yid kyis skyabs song na// log ltung dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur
99b8(dkon brtsegs): ba// de la bdag ni skyabasu nye bar mchi// dpe med byang chub 'tshal ba'i slang du'o// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag ni bshig bcom zhing // mya ngan las brgyal nyon mongs dog gyur la/ 'dren
100a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa/ khyod la bdag ni smrab su nye bar mchi// rgadang 'chibs nyen par gyur pa yi// lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das/

100a5(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'angs la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe steng gi bar sna nga la lha'i tsan dan dang / ud pa la dang / a ga ru dang /

100b1(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi char mngon par bab po// lha dang lha ma yin gyi spos chu'i char yang mngon par bab po// spos chu'i char de babs pas ser skya'i gnas kyi
100b2(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer chen po nas khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu man chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur to// spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri nges kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par
100b3(dkon brtsegs): gang bar gyur to// sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar lha ma yin/ 
100b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la la na gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe bar snang las lha ma yi na gyi lha rdzas kyi sil snyan gyi sgra dag byung ngo // sil snyan
100b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte/ na gyi khamasu grag par gyur to// theg pa chen po la/ yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can gang dag gis sgra thos
100b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la la/ 
100b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dag bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir la la ni glu len
100b8(dkon brtsegs): la la ni sil snyan byed/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul bsgyur/ la la ni tsan dan dang / ud pa la dang / a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i bye ma 'thor/ la la ni lha'i ma tog
101a1(dkon brtsegs): man d+ha ra ba dang / man d+ha ra ba chen po dang / man rdzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru shra ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang mdog dkar dang / 
101a2(dkon brtsegs): mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen dang / sprul pa'i me tog dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / 
101a3(dkon brtsegs): rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog rnams 'thor zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni na bze'i dang / rkang gdub dang / sku
101a4(dkon brtsegs): rags dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gdub bu dadang / gdub bu tham pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum da dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser skud dang / 
101a5(dkon brtsegs): mu tig gi ngo shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / ser mo rnga dang / gya do dang / mgul rgyan tshogs dang / rna cha dang / rna cha gdub 'khor dang / tshong tshong gshibs pa dang / 
101a6(dkon brtsegs): mgo rgyan dang / phreng ba'i lda ldi dang / spos kyi lda ldi dang / nor bu'i lda ldi dag 'thor zhing me tog gi bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu'i bla re dag thog so// la la ni spos chu'i
101a7(dkon brtsegs): char 'beb so// la la ni phye ma'i char 'bebs so// la la ni mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni rin po ches snyim pa
101a8(dkon brtsegs): bkang / la la ni gser gyis snyom pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// yang brten gang la gnas bcas nas// gang zag
101b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog la mchog gyur pa// de 'dra ba yi grogs po dang / rtag par rgyun du phrad par shog/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab
101b2(dkon brtsegs): sim gyis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom
101b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// stobs bcu brtson bden khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'jigs 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la ma 'dres nges par gyur pa po// 
101b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor brgyad dmi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mthar phyin thad gnas
101b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba bying ba sgrol la phyaga' tshal lo// sems can 'grogs kyang rgod pa me na nga' zhing // 'gro ba kun las thugs ni rnam grol te/ 
101b6(dkon brtsegs): pad+me chu yis mi gos 'dra ba po// blo zab bsam mi khyab la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid bsten// rnam pa kun du mtshan ma thams cad bzhig/ 
101b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni gang du'ang smon pa yong mi mnga'// mi gnas na mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshalo// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing
101b8(dkon brtsegs): rta bzang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing gser phye dag gis gtor nas
102a1(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ sa dang bar snang dang ni lha yul na'ang // bde gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchi
102a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mar bzung nas phyin ci log zhugs pa'i// 'gro ba smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen// 'di na byed pa tshor ba sems can med// gang zag med cing bdag gir bya ba med// chos kun stong
102a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing byed pa kun la dben// rang bzhin med cing g.yo med zhi zhes bstan// su zhig bde gshegs bstan pa 'dir mos te// chos kun byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba// de 'dir 'dren pa'i srasu
102a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ste/ ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yab ltar spyod// rnam 'dren khyod la bdag bstod bsod nams gang skyes te/ ji ltar rgyal ba mkhyen pa yis ni mkhyen gyur pa// dge ba'i rtsa
102a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de kun ma lus mtha' dag 'dir// 'gro la rtsal gyis tha/ mas cad sangs rgyas 'grub par shog// bam po gsum pa// lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis
102a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
102a7(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byed cing dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te tshig su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chu las pha rol rnam brgal ba/ 
102a8(dkon brtsegs): brgal nas skye bo rgyun gyis rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing // bde gshegs pha rol thang bde 'jigs pa med 'jog pa// spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi zhabs la gtug// blo mchog khyod kyis
102b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad kun du mkhyen// phyin ci log lta thib por rab zhen blo ldan te// 'khrul pa smig rgyu lta bur ma shes gyur rnams la// mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par
102b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad nga mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu 'dra zhing mig yor mtshungs shes rab tu bstan// thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos kyi sras mchog bskyed// srid pa gsum po
102b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag na mi chags spyad pa spyod// dngos po log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba dang // gzhan gyi dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen// byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga'
102b4(dkon brtsegs): lta burata mi dbang khyod kyi sras kyis 'tshal nas spyad pa spod // lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis kyang bcom
102b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba/ byed cing me tog skya snar khra bo rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su
102b6(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// mi mchog khyod kyi sku yis ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten zil gyis mnan// ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang // rgya mtshos pa rjes chu bzhi no// 
102b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan// gzugs kyis gzugs kyi dam pa dang // gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis mnan// dper na nyi mas me khyer bzhin// gzi brjid phung
102b8(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid kyis// sems can gzi ldan zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me min// nyi mas me khyer zil brlag bzhin// ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis// 'jig rten gsum kun/ 
103a1(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me yin// nyi mas zla 'od zil brlag bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin/ 
103a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po bde mchog gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bos mngon
103a3(dkon brtsegs): par gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// 'dren pa'i blo gros zhi ba'o// zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba yi// 'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad// char
103a4(dkon brtsegs): pas rdul rnams zhi bgyid bzhin// 'bar zhing chos da tshul 'bar mdzad pa// glugs sbyin gyis ni me de bzhin no// nags btang nags mes shing bsreg ltar/ 
103a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyon mongs dra ba bsreg/ skal pa bye ba khrag khri ga ni// dpag tu med par dag rtsa 'dzin// nyon mo/ ngas thams cad 'joms mdzad de// bdud rtsis lus zhugs
103a6(dkon brtsegs): dug bzhin no// mun pa mun nag sel mdzad de// mun khung sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin// chos kyi tshul yang ston mdzad de// nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde
103a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan
103a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing rin po che'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ gdul dka' mi bzang sems ni khyod
103b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis btul// g.yul las dpa' bas g.yul ngor dpa' bo bzhin// shin du tshar gcod rang gis dbang du mdzad// thugs dul mi bsnyengs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// khyod kyis dbang po
103b2(dkon brtsegs): thul cing dgra yang bcom// gang du'ang mi snyengs mi bskyod bde ba bsnyengs/ khyod ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'khrugs// rnam pa kun tu dug ni ma lus bcom// mthu chen khyod kyis
103b3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa legs bsgoms te// khyod kyi thugs ni ngag dang byams la mnyam// thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros bshig/ 'gro ba kun du khyod ni bzhud mi mnga'// shes rab rnam grol
103b4(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i sred pa bskams// shes rab rnam dag khyod kyi thugs dag kyang // chos rnams kun la thugs ni chag das mi mnga'// thams cad zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med
103b5(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas ji/ ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig pa/ zang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che
103b6(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po yang phul nas tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
103b7(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni// chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni brdar btags tshig tu zad// chos rnams chos kyi ngo bo
103b8(dkon brtsegs): yis/ rnam pa kun du mi dmigs so// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs// ming ni ming gis dben pa ste// mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no// chos
104a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste// ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad // rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang // bshad ba ci yang ma mchis te// gang gis kyang ni/ 
104a2(dkon brtsegs): ma bshad cing // su la'ang bshad pa ma mchis so// khyod kyi sras po mi mchog rnams// chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni// chos rnams la yang mi chags par// rnam par spyod do thub pa che// 
104a3(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta/ 
104a4(dkon brtsegs): la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi ngo shal yang phul nas tshi gas su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
104a5(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa// dgra zla ma mchis khyod la bdag bstod do// tshul/ khrims dang ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs// des ni/ 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis// de phyir khyod ni
104a6(dkon brtsegs): dgra thul mtshungs ma mchis/ khyod kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na// gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan// sbyin pa'i stobs kyis mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/ 
104a7(dkon brtsegs): dpe byang phun sum tshogs shing gzugs dag kyang // tshul khrims stobs kyis khyod ni mi bskyed de// skye bo mkhas pas so sor bsam mi lang // khyod ni tshul khrims ldan zhing thugs kyang dag/ mi mi
104a8(dkon brtsegs): seng ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor// shes rab stobs kyis khyod mtshungs 'ga' ma mchis// des na mi bsnyengs 'jig rten gsum btul nas// 'khor du seng ge lta bur sgra bsgrags te// rtog ge
104b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi blo gros zil gyis mnan// lA ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang // bcom ldan 'dra/ 
104b2(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing rin po ches snyem pa bkang te gtor nas tshig su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan
104b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mngon par bstod ngo // thub pa chen po skye bo tshogs pa 'di// dang ba'i yid kyis khyod kyi zhal du blta// kun gyis rgyal ba mdun na bzhugs par mthong // de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas
104b4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjo dad pa la// skye bo bsam pa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung // de ni rgyal ba'i sangs
104b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig/ brjod pa las// 'khor gyi tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal zhing // 'gro bas rang don ji lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal// de ni
104b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// gsung gcig rab tu brjod pa mdzad pas ni// gcig la 'jogs gi gzhan ni dgag pa mdzad// 'dren pa su dag ma bslabs rtogs par mdzad// de ni
104b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po btang bzung gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas
104b8(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshig su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
105a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod pa// rgyags dang nga rgyal sdig pa'i lta ba spyod pa gang // yid dga' rab tu dang bas mi dbang bde gshegs kyi// blo la mngon par dga' ba de dag bag mchis te/ 
105a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras// chos rnams 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis te// rmi lam dga' ba thams cad tshad ma ma lags 'dra// rmi lam dga' spyod ma mchis
105a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang ni 'du shes mchis// de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs// ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing chu yi zla ba 'dra// byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyid
105a4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo dga' ba// mkha das pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni rmongs mi bgyid// rgyal ba khyo/ da kyis bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang // mi mchog dam
105a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag mi dal yong mi mchi// chos rnams thams cad rmi/ lam 'dra bar rnam brtags nas// yang dag mthong ba/ de dag ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// de nas thag bzangs
105a6(dkon brtsegs): ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag gis mchod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu byas nas byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems kyis tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te// rab tu dga'
105a7(dkon brtsegs): nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma
105a8(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs// lha ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang thugasu chung nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
105b1(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'ong bar kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar ba
105b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste phyir logs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
105b3(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig la gzur nas pus mo g.yas
105b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lhangs la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde dar leg su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'ad das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshig su bcad de zhus pa
105b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan bzhid rgyu zhig ma mchis par// mi yi seng gi 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// drang srong chen po ci sleng la/ dzum pa mdzad// skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang
105b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs te lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas// 'jig rten phan bzhed khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na// lha mi rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// de thos bdag cag rnams ni
105b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur// de ring su dogs med rgya chen po sems// 'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig go// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen nas// mi yi seng ge 'dzum pa mdzad par
105b8(dkon brtsegs): gyuraHde ring yang su dag pa'i yid kyis su// mi yi mchog la dad pa gang gis bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen te// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// bde gshegs
106a1(dkon brtsegs): zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// 'di ltar bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di// su yis dpung bcas bdud ni deng bcom zhes// 'khor 'di di ring the tshom
106a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bar gyur// drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal// the tshom 'tshal ba'i som nyi bcad du gsol// mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi// the tshom sbyar te legs par bcad du gsol/ 
106a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten pan
106a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa// de'i 'bras bu ma lus bstan pa ra bya// bstan pa de ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir// lha min rnams kyis
106a5(dkon brtsegs): nga mchod 'di byas te// de dag sems ni ci la'ang chag/ sa med pas// na mkha'i ngos la lag 'thil chag/ sa med bzhin// lha min tshogs kyis dad pa'i yid byas/ 
106a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag ngal mchod pa 'di byas pas// blo can de dag lha min ris bor te// mtho ris dong nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag phyi dus rgyal ba mi seng ge/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bya ba snyed// bsnyen
106a7(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas nas yid 'ong skal pa la// de dag thams cad mtshan mthun rgyal bar 'gyur// de tshe bde gshegs khrag khrig drug cu'i rnams// 'jig rten sgron ma phyogasu grags pa ste/ 
106a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag mi gnas chos ni ston mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'grel bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing // shin tu yangs shing snyoms ma med par 'gyur
106b1(dkon brtsegs): de tshe khrag khrig drug cur tshang ba yi// rgyal ba rnams kyis stong gsum sbyong bar 'gyur// de dag ngan song thams cad sel bar mdzad// de dag zhing der dga' bar spyod par 'gyur// brtan pa de/ 
106b2(dkon brtsegs): dag mi khom thams cad sbyor// bla na med pa'i theg pa ston par 'gyur// de dag tshe yi tshad du 'gyur ba ni// bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang // rnam par 'dren pa de dag 'tsho bar
106b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad// thub pa de dag mya ngan 'das gyur te// 'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu zhi gyur nas// bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar ni/ 
106b4(dkon brtsegs): rang byung rnams kyi dam chos gnas par 'gyur// bde bar ga shegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed da kyi skye bo 'dul// dgra las rgyal ba'i rgyal bar mtshan
106b5(dkon brtsegs): mthun 'gyur// zhing dang tshad dang chos gnas 'gyur ba'ang 'thun// bde gshegs de dag khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i / skyes pa bud med yongasu smin mdzad de// bla na med
106b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i theg pas 'dems par 'gyur// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang 'dzin// rgyal bas lha min de dag lung bstan pa// 'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen pos gsungs// lha dang bcas
106b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas// yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skyes par gyur// lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos
106b8(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi mchod pa rnam pa de lta bu de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te// 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig
107a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dum ngan// 'di lta bu rnam par smin bachub snyas nas/ dem tsha sems pas mnyam par banag pas bskal pagrangs med pa yang rjes su dran na/ 
107a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sring ba'i rgyung de dang der 'chi' ba dang skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
107a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis phyir mi ldog pa brnyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go// de nas
107a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa'adi srung chen pas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge deza ba bdag nyid chen po rjes dran par gyur nas 'disnyam 'du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsababs/ 
107a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na/ de'i thugs bskyed pa gcigs/ yang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ma skyed na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khang pa de dag thams cad mi'i lus
107a6(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa de skyed du sems can re res bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod pa byas kyang / de dag gi zugs bskyed pa gcig la yang lan len pa
107a7(dkon brtsegs): mi nus sa snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ nga mtshar dang dad pathob par gyur nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de mngon pa
107a8(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa/ thub pa byang chub gzhol ba yi// thugs bskyed pa ni re re la'ang // lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 'dis// ma tsam mi spyod mi seng ge/ de lta'i yon tan mthar byin te/ lha dang / 
107b1(dkon brtsegs): mi yis mchod gyur pa// tsan ngan phur ma ri rab tsam// mi mchog khyod la mchod par 'os// mi yi seng ge khyod la ni// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed mang ba'i// rgya mtsho rab tu bkang ba yi/ 
107b2(dkon brtsegs): spos chu dag gis mchod par 'os// yon tan chen po mnga' ba la// gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// me tog tshogs ni ri bo tsamaM// khor yug chen po mnyam mchod 'os// 
107b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba sgron ma rang byung ba// mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam// 'bru mar rgya mtsho'i chu snyed kyi// mar me rnams kyis mchod par 'os// mthu chen mnga' ba de lta bur// yon tan pha rol phyin
107b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ta gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba// me tog mchod rten mtsho dad par 'os// mi dbang mchod pas thugs brtse ba/ da rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis// bskal pa khrag khrig
107b5(dkon brtsegs): rnamasu yang // sems can mchog la mchod par 'os// yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba khyod// rin po che'i rgyal ma tshan gyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste/ 
107b6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bsam yas mchod par 'os// mi yi seng ge khyod la ni// bskal pa khrag khrig dpag med par// gaN+DI bye ma ches mang ba'i// ba dan rnams kyis mchod par 'os// drang srong chen po
107b7(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i stag/ lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang // gzhan yang sems can gang tshogs pa// brtag zung dpe la gsan du gsol// gal te gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnam
107b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su// mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la// de dag re re'i mgo bo yang // gang+gA'i bye ma snyed gyur te// mgo bo de dag re re zhing // de snyed kha dang ldan gyur la// 
108a1(dkon brtsegs): kha rnams de dag re re zhing // lce dang kha yi grangs mnyam la// gad+hA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// bskal par bstod pa bgyis kyang ni// rgyal ba de dag spobs mi bas/ khyod
108a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yon tan mthar mi byin// rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi// pha rol tu ni phyin par gyur// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag leg so legs so// 
108a3(dkon brtsegs): nga'i nyan thos rnams ni drang por gyur pa// ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa/ chos su gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshang mar gyur pa sha stag gnas te/ de dag nga'i yon tan gyi tshogs la 'jug pa
108a4(dkon brtsegs): sha stag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs dpa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste// yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o// dge slong dag de/ 
108a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs kha'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin ga gas pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// 
108a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du shong bar mi 'gyur
108a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyis tshad gzung bar brjod kyang brjod pa/ 
108a8(dkon brtsegs): mi nus/ bsams kyang bsams par mi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can du bsdu bsdus pa sems
108b1(dkon brtsegs): can gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du ma bskyed pa cig kyang med de/ sems can gyi khams ni tshad med pas sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de
108b2(dkon brtsegs): snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo // sems can gyi khams ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can gyi khams ji ltar mi zad pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod na ma/ 
108b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo // sems can de ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du skyes pas/ sems can thams cad kyis mchod kyang lan lon par mi nus// 
108b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing dang da bcas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnga chen po'i sems/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i
108b5(dkon brtsegs): don du 'byung ba ni sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba 'di da ga mya ngan las 'das pa la ji ltar gzhol bar 'a/ gyur zhes te/ zang zing med pa'i phyiraro// de bzhin gshegs
108b6(dkon brtsegs): pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyi don du zang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
108b7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa dpag tu med pa/ bgrang du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
108b8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
109a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des/ sems bskyed pa re re'i gang+gA'i klung / 
109a2(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la phan par dgongs par gyur te/ don kyang mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang 'jig
109a3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gyur te/ yongasu dag cing ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad yongasu chad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i
109a4(dkon brtsegs): tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni log par nges pa'i sems can gyi skye bo yang med par gyur to// lta ba'i rnam pa yong med par gyur to// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yod med
