109a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongasu ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems cad yong med par gyur/ to// ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / 
109a6(dkon brtsegs): las 'byung ba yong med par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring po nas sems can rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la btsud cing btams te/ rje su bstan cing bslabs
109a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyiraro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par 'gyur te/ 
109a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar la la ni 'dod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i
109b1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// de dag bde ba de la yang spyod la bde ba de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa med par/ 
109b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ bung ba me tog gi khu bas nye bar 'tsho yang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongasu spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// 
109b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na/ bar snang la yang rgyu ba'i bya ni bar snang la yang rgyu la de la mngon par chags pa medado// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongasu spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin
109b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dbang po'i rtog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i mi dga' ba me dang / rmongs par 'gyur ba med de/ gzhan yid bde bar 'gyur ba
109b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba sha stag la yongasu spyod de/ de ni 'di ltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa/ de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyir// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sngon byang
109b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe mi dge ba'i las yongasu bzlog ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la btsud pas de dag la las gang gis sdug bsngal gyis tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa dbang med par
109b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba mi dge ba'i las de lta bu yong me do// ma bsags pa'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mi 'byung ngo // de dag gis rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis
109b8(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa rnams la sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngon par 'dus ma byas te/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug
110a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i de mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus
110a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas nyams su mi bde nyi ma mi 'char ro// rlung nyam su mi bde ba mi ldang ngo // char nyam su mi bde ba mi 'bab po// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i
110a3(dkon brtsegs): tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can de dag la lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjesu 'breng ba bstan cing bshad pas sems
110a4(dkon brtsegs): can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de las bstan pa de thos nas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cang shes pa mngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'breng
110a5(dkon brtsegs): bar yongasasu bsgrubs pas las de'i rnam par smin pa de dag la/ rmongs par 'gyur ba'am yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba/ med do// rmongs pa rnams la rgyu gang gis bde ba yang ma
110a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba med do// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing nga na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med cing bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa
110a7(dkon brtsegs): med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa des btams pa de dag ni chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to// de dag 'chag na yang chos nyid la
110a8(dkon brtsegs): sems shing chos la mos pas zhan pas yid kyis chags te chos la mos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du 'greng ba dang / 'dug
110b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nyal ba dang / sad pa dang / spyod lam thams cad du yang sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag la yang bam spangs pa med de/ de'i phyir yang bam
110b2(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung // yang dag pa'i spong ba yod pas de dag la skyo ba med de/ de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// 
110b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dge la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug
110b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yang med de// de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gan das pa'i phyir// de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal
110b5(dkon brtsegs): yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag chos thams cad/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// sdug pa dang bra la ba'i sdug bsngal ni sdug pa las 'byung ste/ de'i phyir de
110b6(dkon brtsegs): la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// sems can de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ngo // 'di ltar do na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyu ba med pa'i phyiraro// gzhan du na
110b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yod do// 'di lta ste mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni don dam pa'i chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog de
110b8(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i tshe ngas gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/ de ni 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag legs par
111a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir// dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa bzhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis
111a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongasu bzung ba dang / nyes par brtsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dge
111a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa bas sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
111a4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom lda na 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa de la dge slong
111a5(dkon brtsegs): dag ji snyam du sems/ sems zhan pa dang / sems dma' ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bas
111a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongasu smin par bya bar nus
111a7(dkon brtsegs): sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dang bzhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang / tshul khrims
111a8(dkon brtsegs): zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang / thos bzhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i thos pa'i bar dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i brtson
111b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi bar dang / dran pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i bar dang / ting 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang / shes rab zhan pa nas nyes pa
111b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar gyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrubs pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag
111b3(dkon brtsegs): gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongasu smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
111b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legaso leg so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / sems zhan pa dang / dad pa dang tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan
111b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yod su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug
111b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongasu bzung ba dang / nyes par bsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed kyi don bya ba 'am/ de dag phan par bsam
111b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongasu smin par bya bar mi nus so// 
111b8(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag cang mi zer bar/ 
112a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khod do// de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod
112a2(dkon brtsegs): den de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des
112a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi
112a4(dkon brtsegs): mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chos ston gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la ba snyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o// de
112a5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal ga zhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
112a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i
112a7(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa 'am brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam
112a8(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga 'dir gnas par gyur to// des
112b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ce gsol to// 
112b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni bcom
112b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bgyi ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas
112b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la cho dag pa mi mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis/ sems can
112b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa mi mnga' ste/ la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang / dag par smra na rgyal ba gtso bo// rgyal ba dam pa/ rgyal
112b6(dkon brtsegs): ba mchog/ rgyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid lags par brjod pas yang dag par brjod do// de skad ces smras nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshig su bcad
112b7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di dag smras// dpa' bo rnams ni thabs mkhas te// sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing // sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir// dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul/ 
112b8(dkon brtsegs): bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang // da dung chog pa'i 'du shes bsal// byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug/ stong gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi// 
113a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing rnams ngag mdzad pas// ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa// rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal// da dung dang po thugs bskyed par
113a2(dkon brtsegs): de dang der ni yongs bstan te// da dung du yang 'dren pa khyod// sangs rgyas mang po ston pa mdzad// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis// gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad// chos
113a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings la chags mi mnga'/ khyod kyis gang yang mkhyen mdzad de// brgya byin tshangs pa'i cha byang dang // la lar bdud kyi cha byad kyis// sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ 
113a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rnams kyis rtogs mi nus// bud med cha byad spyo pa mdzad// dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang gang/ 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te// pad+ma chus mi chags pa
113a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// 'dren pa sna tshogs mkhas can gyi// 'jig rten 'arje yi rjes 'jug mdzad// des na skye dgu 'di dag rnams/ gdugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan brjod// la lang bltam pa/ 
113a6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bstan// la lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan// la la na ni 'khor lo bskor// la lar spyad pa spyod pa mdzad// sems can 'dul ba'i don srang du// dgyes shing mgur len rol pa mdzad// bshums
113a7(dkon brtsegs): mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad// sems can sus kyang yong ma 'tshal/ 'dod chags mi mnga' chags pa'i tshul// 'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs pa ltar// sems can rnam par 'dul don du// 'dren
113a8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan te// byis pa ma lags byis tshul gyis// sems can rnam par gdul don du// 'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// smyos/ 
113b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ma lags smyos pa'i tshul// zha ba ma lags zha ba lhur// rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs kyis// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad// de ltar bsam yas mgon po khyod// dam pa'i chos kyang
113b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam mi khyab// dpa' chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sems can thub chen 'drar gyur cig/ sngon byung ba 'od srung chen pos zhus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bya'i rgyal po mngar
113b3(dkon brtsegs): bzangs brgyad khri drug stong gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la
113b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la ma tshong pa'i don du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa shin du bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par
113b5(dkon brtsegs): sprul lo/ lha'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig da mar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no// khang pa brtsegs pa de
113b6(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi dra ba ris bkra ba blta na sdug pa rim bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// rin po che sna bzhi ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dAr+ya dang / shel lo// gser gyi
113b7(dkon brtsegs): lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni gser/ shar ba rnams ni dngul/ dngul gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / gdang bu rnams ni dngul/ shar ba rnams ni gser/ bai dUr+ya'i lan kan
113b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni bai dUr+ya/ shar ba rnams ni shel/ shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni shel/ shar ba rnams ni dngul las byas pa'o// khang pa brtseg
114a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bkra ba blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar
114a2(dkon brtsegs): gser dang / dngul dang / bai dA r+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkra ba blta na sdug pa 'di lta ste
114a3(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi dra ba dang / dngul gyi dra ba dang / bai dUr+ya'i dra ba dang / shel gyi dra ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dang / spug gi dra ba dang / rdo'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas bkab par 'gyuraro// gdugs bkra ba blta
114a4(dkon brtsegs): nasdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to// de dag kyanga'adi ltar gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi rin po che sna padun las bsgrubs pa sha stag/ rgyal mtshan bkra ba bstan
114a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te// rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel da nga rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa sha stag ste/ rgyal
114a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan sngon po rnams ni rtog ser po can/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po can/ rgyal mtshan dmar po ni tog dkar po can sha stag sngon par sprul to// ba dan kha dog sna tshogs can bkra
114a7(dkon brtsegs): ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur to// bla re bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul par gyur to// bla re de dag kyang gser skud kyi bla re dang / dngul skud
114a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bla re dang / bai dUr+ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla ra dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re ste/ rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stago// de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab
114b1(dkon brtsegs): bzangs de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / gdugs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / ba dan brgyad khri drug stong po/ 
114b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / bla re brgyad khri drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / de dag thams cad steng gi bar snang la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas so// 'di lta ste dper
114b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing na mkha' las song ste yongs 'dus brtol du gzhog go// de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / gdug
114b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag dang / bla re de dag par snang gi na mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'dangs la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to// de nas
114b5(dkon brtsegs): mngab bzangs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la la na gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs cig du 'khod de
114b6(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing tshig su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rga dang 'chi las rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rga dang 'chi las rnam 'grel
114b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sems can gzhal yas kha lo bsgyur la phyag 'tshalo// khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchiso// bdag cag rnams kyang sred med bu'i lus ldan zhing
114b8(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus shin du mdzes byas pa'i// sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ bdag cag
115a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'dom gang 'od kyi gzi ldan zhing // mngon 'phags gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te/ spyod lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing // 'gro ba rnam sbyong mya
115a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan zla bar shog/ bdag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan zhing // shes rab ldan pas mchog tu gyur par shog/ da ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod lta bur// skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas grub par
115a3(dkon brtsegs): shog/ 'dren pa 'jig rten mkhyen la khyod lta bur// bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang // ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyi mthar phyin cing // 'jig rten mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen du shog
115a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos med dang mi laN+Dadra gnas pa med pa dang // brag chen mkha' 'dra bar ston byed cing / ji ltar rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin du shog// de nas bcom ldan
115a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po mdab bzang de dag lhag pa'i bas pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas tshe dang ldan pa/ thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ 
115a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum mdzad 'di yi rgyu rkyen gang lags pa// 'jig rten phan mdzad thugs rje mnga' bas gsungs// mdapa
115a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyis te// bla re na mkha' rgyas par gang bar bstan// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar bskyed// rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol// 'gro ba thams
115a8(dkon brtsegs): cad thal mo rab sbyar cing // dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khod// mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal// rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol// mi mchog khyod la
115b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khong dag mchi ba ni// 'gro ba thams cad the tshom med 'gyur zhing // the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur// 'dis ni sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyis shes mchis// 'khor 'di 'jig
115b2(dkon brtsegs): med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// yongasu sbyang shing shin du skyon bsal bas// rgyal bas lung bstan de dag mngon dga' ste// slob ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin// the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom
115b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad du gsol// rab tu dga' mdzad rjesu sman pa mdzad// dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'di 'dus gyur gyis// rang byung mkha' lding 'gro ba jir 'gyur gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das
115b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ thams cad zil gnon stobs bcu brtson 'grus bden// rgyal ba dbang po thub pa de bzhin gshegs// 'dren pa
115b5(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad ldan gsungs dbyangs kyis// mdab bzang 'gro ba rta thul dka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan
115b6(dkon brtsegs): paH/ de yi 'bras bu dga' ba'i yid kyis nyon// the tshom sol la rab tu dga' ba bskyed// bla na med pa'i byang chub zhi tshol zhing // stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis// 'dren pa 'jigs
115b7(dkon brtsegs): med 'gyur ba btsal ba'i phyir// mdab bzang dbang pos nga la mchod legs byas// ma 'dres bco brgyad chos ni smra ba yi// sred med bu lus shin du 'khregs pa dang // sum cu gnyis mtshan dang / 
115b8(dkon brtsegs): byang bzang po rnams// yongasu btsal phyir nga la mchod pa byas// rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang // gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang // phun tshogs zhing dang 'gro ba
116a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam dgrol ba// 'di dag kun btsal don du mchod pa byas// de dag nga la dga' bas mchod pa byas// dud 'gro'i gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas// lha dang brtul zhugs mthun par
116a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'dong // 'di ni ngan song srid pa'i tha ma yin// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du// de dag lha mi'i nang na gnas gyur cing // rnam 'dren khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas// de dag dbang po thul
116a3(dkon brtsegs): nga'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag zhing du ngan song mi 'byung ste// mi khom mi 'byung tshad med mi ldan med// rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun du mdzes// ri rab rgyal mtshan bskal la rab 'byung 'gyur
116a4(dkon brtsegs): lo ni bye ba brgyad bcu bzhi bgrangs par// 'jig rten pa na phyir 'dren pa de dag bzhugs// 'jig rten phan phyir rnam 'a de dren mnyam gzhag pas// lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i
116a5(dkon brtsegs): don mdzad 'gyur/ skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi/ 'du sa pa nga rgyal spangs pa brgyad bcu 'gyur// de tshe skyob pa rngu/ la dang bral rnams kyi// shin tu sems 'dul bye ba brgyad
116a6(dkon brtsegs): bcu 'byung te 'dren pa de dag 'gro ba'i ngal bsal phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur// mi dag de ltar 'di rnams nga rgyal tshe// mngab bzang lusu gyur nas stobs po che// 'di dag
116a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus shig na// drang srong dka' thub drag po'i tshogs chen gyur// stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa drug tshang ba ste// dka' thub sprad de rdzu 'phrul phun sum btsal// de dag rdzu 'phrul
116a8(dkon brtsegs): thub nas nga rgyal gyis// dga' ba dka' thub drag dang ldan par gyur// tshul khrims ma zhig de dag nags mdab tu// tshe zad shi 'phos gyur te lus kyang zhig/ nga rgyal des ni mkha' lding
116b1(dkon brtsegs): mkha' 'gror 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul sems kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes// tshul khrims dag pas rgyal ba'i bstan la dang // nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed// na mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i
116b2(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste drug pa'o// / bam po bzhi pa// de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang / na mkha' lding gi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong
116b3(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa yang thos nas mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te// de dag dga' mgu yid rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir
116b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugabai dUr+ya'i dra ba lnga ldir bkye ba/ mu tig dmar po'i dra ba sa bskor ba/ gser gyi yu ba can/ bai dU'i thur ma brgyad stong
116b5(dkon brtsegs): bkye ba/ rin po che'i chun po dpyangs pa/ bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// rta sngon po/ kha dog sngon po snga na po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ga rgyan sngon pos brgyan
116b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bai dUr+ya'i srab kyis bsrabs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// nor bu skar mdog gi bla re khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu yod pa/ nges 'khor de dag thams cad yog pa gcig
116b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang steng gi bar snang la mngon par sprul to// de la rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bkra ba mig tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug bres par mngon par sprul to// bla re de'i kho ra khor yug du
116b8(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par sprul te breso// rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khrung rkang ngag mngon par sprul to// klu'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ 
117a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas klu'i bu mo de dag rta sngon po de dag la zhon nas rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs steng gi bar snang la bres te na mkha' las 'dong zhing / rol mo'i sgra bye ba phrag dgu bcu cu drun
117a2(dkon brtsegs): po de dag len cing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed la/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mthor/ lha'i a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ud pa la'i phye ma
117a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / me tog sna tshogs kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ me tog ut+pal dang / tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ spos sna tshogs kyi phreng
117a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / na bza' dang rgyan dag kyang 'bul te/ lha ma yin gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du mchod pa rgya cher byaso// de nas de dag gis rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag
117a5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang gis rol mo'i sgra de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang
117a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// nor bu'i skar mdog gi bla re de dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi de dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dag dang / khrung khrung rkang dkar
117a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las 'di lta ste dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgya dang ldan pa mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur snyan la/ de lta bu'i yid du 'ong zhing mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to// 
117a8(dkon brtsegs): sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sgra de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
117b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang / spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur to// me tog gi char
117b2(dkon brtsegs): de bab pa'i tshe spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngang byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go// spos chu'i char de bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab
117b3(dkon brtsegs): tu'agyur te/ spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang
117b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// // de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu ba cu rtsa drug dang / rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rol mo
117b5(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis bcom lnga na 'das la mchod pa byas nas rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag par snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyi
117b6(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa
117b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag kyang smra so// klu'i bu mo mkhas pa de dag yid rangs dga' mgu yid kyi su// byang chub zhi pa tshol zhing shAkya thub la de ring mchod pa chen po byas// rgyan gyis lags brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug
117b8(dkon brtsegs): gi gdugs rnams sngon sprul te/ bde bar gshegs la mchod cing rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral// rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te// kha dog
118a1(dkon brtsegs): sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba'i rtal rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan// de dag thams cad bar snang dong nas thung la rta yis mchod pa byed// klu yi bu ma de dag dang ba'i yid kyis rngub
118a2(dkon brtsegs): la mgos phyag 'tshal// mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas klu yi sil snyan gyis// mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po byas// sil snyan de dag bde bar
118a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag/ sgra re zos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs// de dag rnams kyis der sprul mkha' la bla re chen po cig tu gyur/ phyogs
118a4(dkon brtsegs): bcur dpag tshad drug cur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad kheb par gyur// nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog gi gzi ba/ rdzing phyogasu 'bar zhing gsal// klu yi bu mo dga' nas
118a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i don du rgyal la mchod pa byas// gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing / 'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten
118a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa grub par shog/ ji ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'dre ba ltar// chos kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol// chos rnams
118a7(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing lbu ba lta bur nyam chung la// char rgyun chu la phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad btags nas ni// 'gro
118a8(dkon brtsegs): bai dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi/ sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur mchis shing brdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/ skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa// 
118b1(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs// de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan// ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin
118b2(dkon brtsegs): khrigs gyur na ri ltar gda' ba yang // yang dag tu na ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis// de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid// shes pas
118b3(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis// yang dag tu na 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod bstan pas// des na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas
118b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mi phyed 'gyur// khyod kyi sras rnams chos kyis yongasu ni ma nas rdzab la zam pa 'dra// 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul min 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang // de lta lags pas
118b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon// skra bas dang dpung dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rtsa log khyod de la skyabasu mchi// gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du
118b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod// sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa
118b7(dkon brtsegs): thugasu chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten na ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod
118b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad// dpal sdug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yong ma mthong // mi yi dbang po dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs// de thos lha mi lha min
119a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang klu yi bu mo bsang ba pa// dri ba rnams kyang skyong ba'i dgongs pa zos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnams 'dren khyod kyis
119a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen// rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yong ma mchis// de ltar bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ 
119a3(dkon brtsegs): de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yid rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur// thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi// 'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas
119a4(dkon brtsegs): yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur/ byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur// bde ga/ gshegs khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad don thos rang 'byung nyid
119a5(dkon brtsegs): du nges par 'byung // 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshol gyur te// sdug pa sngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la som nyi gang
119a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba ta de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol// drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsal the tshom khum// rgyal ba gang gis di ring
119a7(dkon brtsegs): yid ni rnam par spangs shing bdud bcom thul// su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// 'di ni su yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di
119a8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsol// zos nas bdag cag yid rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur// khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal// 'dzum rgyu dga'
119b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tsom bsal du gsol// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gsung sgra yang dag zos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur
119b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul leg so rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris// klu yi bu mos mchod de
119b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa na phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan// de yi 'bras bu bstan gyis yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon// gang gi don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga yi tshig la
119b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon// klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rnam ga de zhig blo ldan ngogs med legs par gnas// 'di ni byed med
119b5(dkon brtsegs): tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med// chos rnams 'di dag brdzun zhing smig rgyu mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo/ 
119b6(dkon brtsegs): gros yang dag ngas shes so// rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po med mthong lags// mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu rma 'dra// byang chub gzhal yas/ 
119b7(dkon brtsegs): gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong // nga la gzhal yas mchod pa de byas pa dang 'gro ba stong skyes pas// klu las shi 'phos nas ni lha gnas brgya byin gnasu 'gro bar 'gyur// sum cu
119b8(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gsum song ste lha yi nang du dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas// ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab bral lha nang gnas su lha yi dga' ba spyod// lha
120a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur bde gshegs sras rnams den tshe yi chang du gnas par 'gyur// rdul ba'i sras rnams 'tha bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe chang zang pa dang / dga' ldan gnas ma
120a2(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag de na lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod// pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas// 'gro ba thams
120a3(dkon brtsegs): cad stong par rtogs rigs blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur// skyob rnams kyi dran pa rdo la bskos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams// de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas de lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni// tshe
120a4(dkon brtsegs): tshad yongasu zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ dbade gshegs ma spang grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te// mi gnas blo gros ljon pa tshe tshang
120a5(dkon brtsegs): bar du gnas na gnas par gyur// de dag gnas der rab 'phru la gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni// mkhas pa tshe za da blo gros ldan pas chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas// 'dren
120a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam pa dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can// chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag la gnas de na gnas shing lha yi dga'
120a7(dkon brtsegs): ba spyod par 'gyur// bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs// bsam gtan bsam pas
120a8(dkon brtsegs): tshangs gnas ma smang grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur// tshangs pa'i gnasu bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas// der gnas dpe med gyur cing byang chub yid
120b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur// de dag bskal par tshangs gnas mthun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang // thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni
120b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas byed// mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med// bsam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi// kun du grol
120b3(dkon brtsegs): yid drang srong phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan// mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo cig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur// bde bar gshegs dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi pa yongs tshol
120b4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas// kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir// rang byung dgongs pa khams
120b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum lam las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston/ tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol ba ra 'gyur// tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang byung bsam pa nye
120b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung mthar thugs shes nas ni// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la// ci nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston// de dag tshangs
120b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas de na gnas shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir// phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod// rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang
120b8(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur// dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur// lha dang klu dang mi dang mdab bzang dag dang lha min bcas pa dang // dri za grul bum mi 'am ci tshogs
121a1(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs spyang chos kyi stobs rnyed pa// de dag thams cad yid rangs thal sbyar bde bar
121a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs la mgos phyag 'tshalo// klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// ri nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong lung bstan pa yang thos yong su rdzogs par
121a3(dkon brtsegs): rig nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing
121a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa'am// ma gzigs pa da'am/ ma gsan pa'am/ mngon du ma mdzad pa gang yang me dad cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs
121a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ yang dag par mthong ba/ nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtod pa/ 'di mthong ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba ni ngo
121a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshar rmad du 'byung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o// 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa rgod pa mi brtan pa mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan
121a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongasu shes pa dang / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa/ drang por zhugs pa/ rigs par zhugs pa/ mthun par
121a8(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa dang / 'di lta bur bud med gyur pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug mi bzad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs rab la 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// 
121b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam ste/ ngo mtshar thob pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam+bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par byas/ 
121b2(dkon brtsegs): te thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyis khyab par byaso// spos kyi dri'i ngad des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas sems can gang dag gis spos kyi/ 
121b3(dkon brtsegs): dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen
121b4(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun tshad mu tig dmaradapos pus mo nub tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas so// n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba de yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin
121b5(dkon brtsegs): po ches chal par bkang ngo // klu'i me tog gi mdun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa dag mngon par sprul to// klu'i rol mo sil
121b6(dkon brtsegs): snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te sgra phyung ngo // klu'i me tog gi mdun khang de la yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi bye ba phrag dgu bcu bres so// rin po che sna bdun gyi
121b7(dkon brtsegs): ka ba de dag kyang bai dUr+ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan to// 'dun khang de'i gzhi yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches yog par byas par gyur to// 'dun khang de'i gzhi ni 'jam pa bsgrur
121b8(dkon brtsegs): du rung ba ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa/ kha dog bai dUr+ya ltar 'dug pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba nyams dga'
122a1(dkon brtsegs): ga sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mi dang lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba lta bu'o// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang na/ nor bu la las/ 
122a2(dkon brtsegs): ni me 'byung / la la las ni chu 'byung ba sha stag ste/ de la'ang la la las ni chu kha dog sngon po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog ser po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog dmar po 'byung / la la las
122a3(dkon brtsegs): ni chu kha dog dkar po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung / nor bu la las ni bde bar bsil ba'i rlung 'byung / nor bu la la las ni de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dag bsam pa
122a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'byung / la la las ni snum gyi bya ba byed/ la la las ni me long gi bya ba byed de/ 'khor thams na dad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i nang du snang bar gyur te/ ser
122a5(dkon brtsegs): skya'i gnas na sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snangabar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis
122a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang nor bu rin po che dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur
122a7(dkon brtsegs): to/ 'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og nas kyang klu'i mthus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'thon par gyur to// rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me
122a8(dkon brtsegs): tog gi lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / spos kyi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i lha lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mu tig gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog rtsegs
122b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'thon par gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo la sogs
122b2(dkon brtsegs): pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du bsgri ste/ rkang gis dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ nor bu rin po che ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis bcom
122b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// 'dun khang gi gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par 'thon pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi/ 
122b4(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to// klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// de nas klu bye
122b5(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan ga/ sum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te cang mi zer bar
122b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnam pas rje su dran par byed cing mig mi 'dzums par blta la 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// 
122b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rje su dran par byas nas/ so so nas bla gos phrag pa cig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas
122b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas tshig su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// mtshan brgya
123a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa// da// 'thub gyes pa dri sang thugs can+da// rin chen 'byung gnas bcas papas sA sa te/ 
123a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs khyod ni grong khyer mngon par byung // me drug par du dka' thub dka' mdzad de// rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsim brnyes kyang // bi gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum pa
123a3(dkon brtsegs): thub pa khyed kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyod// ji ltar 'dren pa lha mi'i bla mkhyod// 'gro la pon bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de// 'jig rten mgon pa sdug bsngal bta
123a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ te de thos pas kyang bdag cag yong mi dga'// / thub pa dbu dang spyan ni btang ba dang // byang chub se dmas ni ji ltar bsgrub mdzad pa// bde bar gshegs
123a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na// de thos pas kyang ba gcag bde mi 'gyur// gang tshe ka ling rgyal po ba zod smra bas// zhabs dang phyag dang snyan rnams
123a6(dkon brtsegs): brngubs gyur te// de bzhin shangs bcang rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag ying mi dga'// phug ron skyab su mchis pa ma btang ste// gang tshe 'dren
123a7(dkon brtsegs): khyed sring la btsal gyur pa/ rgyal ba'i dathos pas kyang mi bde ste/ bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal tshe// bdag cag mi 'tshal ma lags ci zhe na// bde ba
123a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs la 'gro ba gnang bgyis pa// ngan song mun par ltung bas bde gshegs kyi// sdug bsngal spyod badrin nas mi dga' lags// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'angags
123b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / bde gshegs spyod pa mi 'tshe blor gyur dang // sgrub pa'i tshe na de la mi gnod pa// 'jig rten 'dren pa spyod bde bka' stsal gsol// mtha' yas blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la/ 
123b2(dkon brtsegs): thub pa klu tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson// ji ltar khyod kyi bzhin du spyod 'gyur ba// de ltar bder gshegs byang chub lam bstan gsol// rga shi ma mchis go 'phang 'thor 'tshal zhing // 
123b3(dkon brtsegs): klu tshogs 'di rnams thob pa bsgom par gnas// 'gro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul 'gyur ba'i// brtul zhugs spyod pa bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i
123b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs// lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugasu chud nas nga'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni chos nyid de sangs rgyas bcom
123b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog du ma'i 'od zer bcom lda na 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
123b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul gyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ 
123b7(dkon brtsegs): brtul zhugs bzang po dge sbyong thub pa rnams// rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dren pa bde gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba// mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka'/ 
123b8(dkon brtsegs): sul gsol// tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni// 'dzum rgyu nyan 'tshal khyod kyi zhal du blta// yid ni zhum gyur the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis// mkhas pa the tshom rnam par
124a1(dkon brtsegs): bsal du gsol// 'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thub// de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su dga'// gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te// rmongs par bgyis
124a2(dkon brtsegs): nas yid ni mi dgar bgyis// tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis// bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis// bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// 
124a3(dkon brtsegs): shAkya seng ge bka' stsol the tshom khum// sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing // 'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal du blta// tshogs kyi slob dpon the tshom bsal du gsol// 'dren
124a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// de thos skye bol dadi dag dgar 'gyur te// rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul ya dang rtogs par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rnams
124a5(dkon brtsegs): tshim bgyis na/ gzhan du mi sems nan tan gnas para'agyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta/ thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// thub mkhas
124a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis// tshangs 'dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis// rta thul skyon med sems kyis dang byos la// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de mnyan par bgyis// klu
124a7(dkon brtsegs): yi bdag po 'di dag dang gyur te// 'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa byas// skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yongasu tshol// snying rje chen pos rnam
124a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dren med pa yi// 'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsten// 'gro bas byang chub rgya chen thob bya la// 'dren pa dag ni skyo bar yong mi 'gyur// zhi gnas dge ba ye shes stobs
124b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan stobs// mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon med pa// rnam thar sgo gsum yongasu bsgoms nas su// shin du yongs dag yid can bde bar 'gro// 'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs
124b2(dkon brtsegs): gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas// mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang snying rje thub// 'gro la snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas// snying brje ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can// 'jig
124b3(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral nas// de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur// rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed cing // 'jig rten gtam gyi
124b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyud la 'jug pa ste// de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med dathob// de na bdud med mu stegs tshogs kyang med// 'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi// rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba
124b5(dkon brtsegs): kun mos byed// bde gshegs bka' dang tshig rnam sa thams cad dang // bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur// srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi
124b6(dkon brtsegs): sprad spyod cing // rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur// mtshungs med thub pa bde bar myur du yang // yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur// thob nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par
124b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te skye bo kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan// 'gro ba thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi/ dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes par 'gyur// phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag
124b8(dkon brtsegs): rang byung dgongs min cung zad byed mi 'gyur// de dag kun du chos rtogs dran dang ldan// bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med thob par 'gyur// de dag tshig thos sems can gang yang ni// 
125a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyur ba med// bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi// 'gro ba 'chi med yang dag thob par 'gyur// de tshe 'gro bas rgyal
125a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dgongs legs rtogs// rga ba dang ni na dang 'chi ba dang // mya ngan smre sngags 'don las yongasu dgrol// tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur// klu yi bsam pa shAkya seng ge la/ 
125a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zhus nas ji ltar de dag rnams// gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyi// ye shes 'jug 'gyur de skad sras la bstan// klu rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba yi// rgyal
125a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste// de la yid ni rab tu zhi gyur nas// dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs so// // klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// 
125a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos
125a6(dkon brtsegs): nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur to// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi mnga' rgya chen po mnga' zhing / 
125a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/ 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rgya che zhing yongasu rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba 'am dma' bar mi
125a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tshom mi mnga' zhing yon tan thams cad yong su rdzogs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas mchod pa/ 
125b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu dag pa zhes kyang mtho ba 'am dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing / ngo mtshar du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar shin tu che'o snyam mo// de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag gis
125b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag nyid kyi mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste gser gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / 
125b3(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / bai dUr+ya'i skud pa'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla ra dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re sha stago/ rin po che'i bla re de
125b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag la yang me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i lnga ldi mngon pa dar sprul te/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni dadangul gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye/ dngul gyi skud
125b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bla re rnams la ni gser gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi pa kye/ bai DUr+ya'i blo re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ shel gyi bla re rnams la
125b6(dkon brtsegs): ni bai DUr+ya'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ mu tig dmar po'i bla re rnams la ni spug gi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ spug gi bla re rnams la ni mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi phre
125b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lnga ldi bkye/ rdo'i snying po'i bla ra rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye ba sha stag mngon par sprul to// shing rta bkra ba blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyang mngon
125b8(dkon brtsegs): par sprul te/ de dag kyang gsar nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du shing rta de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thur ma brgya pa gser gyi yu ba can dang / bai DUr+ya'i yu ba can dang
126a1(dkon brtsegs): shel gyi yu ba can bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul to// gdugs de dag la rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste gser
126a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang / dngul gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang / bai DUr+ya'i me tog gi lnga ldi dang / shel gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lnga ldi dang / klu'i nor bu'i
126a3(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi lda ldi sha stag go/ mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul to// de dag gis gdugs de dag dang me tog gi phreng ba de dag gi gzugs byas so// grul bum gyi
126a4(dkon brtsegs): rol mo sil snyan dag kyang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag re re zhing yang bla re de dag re re rjes su 'breng bar gyu dar to// de nas grul bum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi
126a5(dkon brtsegs): shing rta de dag la zhon te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang bla re dang me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'ad/ sa la mngon par gtor te/ mchod pa byed cing bcom
126a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to// bskor nas shing rta de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig du 'khod de/ 
126a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs mnga' dbang can// thub pa chen po mi mtho mi mnga' ste// ri yi rgyal po ldan po
126a8(dkon brtsegs): ri 'dra ba/ mchod pa rgya che 'di dag bzhes su gsol// 'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang // tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'// 'dren pa khyod kyis ting 'dzin
126b1(dkon brtsegs): ni bsgrubs pas// shes rab ldan pa dregs pa yong mi mnga'// rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba sgyu 'drar mkhyen// rang bzhin stong ste rmi lam dag 'dra dang // chu zla na mkha'i smig rgyu lta/ 
126b2(dkon brtsegs): bur ni/ bde bar gshegs pas 'gro ba 'di dag gzigs// dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang gyur kyang // grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun na med// gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam
126b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas 'gro 'di gzigs// mchod pa 'di kun brag cha ji bzhin te// shing rta gdugs dang bla re sil snyan dang // me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar/ 
126b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa brag cha ji bzhin de dag de ltar gda'/ da 'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang // sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur shog/ rmi lamo
126b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gis// rtogs bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin bstan par bgyi// nad dang rga shi sa yongasu brtses gyur pa'i// skye bo mthong nas bdag
126b6(dkon brtsegs): cag 'di rnams kyis kyang // byang chub myur thob rga shi med pa'i gnas// gang thos grol 'gyur 'gro la bstan par gyis// bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas// 
126b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can blo stor rnams la bstan par bgyi// thub pa 'khrugs med chos rnams rab ston pa// mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan
126b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis grol bum de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de
127a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol// ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad de// rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhas la mtshar mi mnga'// ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na/ 
127a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum rgyu legs par bka' stsal nyan par 'tshal// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas// 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom som nyi 'tshal// the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom
127a3(dkon brtsegs): khum ta mi yi dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag 'gyur// de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yab mthong // deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa
127a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyis la mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// de ring 'du/ sa byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas// gang gis 'dubyed gyur pa'i yid cig bcom// gang zhig yang dag mtha'
127a5(dkon brtsegs): la mi g.yo gnas// rnam dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan 'tshal// da ring su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom// thub pa ston pa deng sus mnyes par gyis// 'dren pa su zhig
127a6(dkon brtsegs): de ring gting rnyed gyur// the tshom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal// 'dzum mdzad de yi don ni mnyan slad du// 'gro ba kun kyang thal mo sbyar cing gnas// 'dren pa the tshom 'tshal
127a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i the tshom sol// rkang gnyis dam pra lung yang bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs
127a8(dkon brtsegs): par drisate 'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongasu dris pas na// 'gro ba'i don yangs khyod kyis byas par gyur// de don bstan byas rta thul mnyan par gyis// grul bum tshogs kyis nga la mchod
127b1(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ mtshar med nga mthong nas ni ngam gyur te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ de dag rnams kyis de ring nga mchod de// zhi ba'i chos la
127b2(dkon brtsegs): blo gros rnam par btang // lam stor skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing // bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed// snying rje bas ni nga la mchod pa byas// rab tu lam stor rnams la
127b3(dkon brtsegs): byams par bsams// mkhas pa de dag las de byas pas na// grul bum skye gnas shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzung // brgya byin lha yi drung du 'gro bar 'gyur// thugs thub byams
127b4(dkon brtsegs): don mdzad ston drung du 'dong // des ni cung zad yang dang yang bstan te// phyir zhing chos la the tshom med par 'gyur// / de dag bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// zhing nas zhing du
127b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rgyu byed cing // bdag nyid chen po'i chos la ma chod pa byed// go cha chen po rab tu bgos byed kyis/ de dag skye bo med par 'jig rten khams// khrag khrig 'tha'
127b6(dkon brtsegs): yas rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te// ngo mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag zhing rnams gang tu 'gro rgyu ba// der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung // 
127b7(dkon brtsegs): bar shes/ de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na// ngo mtshar med par skye bo rnam grol byed// rgyal ba ngo mtshar med pa zhing sbyong zhing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med zhi ba tshol// 
127b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas te// 'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro// de ltar 'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung bstan cing // bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bsal te/ 
128a1(dkon brtsegs): grul bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu nges thob nas/ 'gro ba the tshom bsal te dga' bar 'gyur// grul bum lung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu 'o// de nas den
128a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dri za bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin rnams dang // namakhar lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams dang / grul bum rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang
128a3(dkon brtsegs): thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med pa yang
128a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par bka' stsal/ bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bstan te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba yang bstan la/ chos gang la ya dang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag 'a bstan pa 'di ni ngo
128a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshar rmad do snyam nas de dag gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
128a6(dkon brtsegs): mos par gyur te/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// 
128a7(dkon brtsegs): glang po ches srung gi bu de dag re re zhing mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ mgo bo re re zhing so bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ so re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re zhing yang pad+ma dun
128a8(dkon brtsegs): bdun/ pad+ma re re zhing yang mdab ma bye ba phrag stong stong / mdab ma re re zhing lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lha'i bdug spos thogs pa
128b1(dkon brtsegs): bdun bdun zhing pad+ma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul to// glang po ches srung gi bu de dag gi mgo re re la yang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs nas rin po ches
128b2(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi dra ba dag gis gzugs byas pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lnga ldi bres pa'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug mngon par sprul to// glang po che'i mgo thams cad la yang lha'i
128b3(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi bla re sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bres pa sha stag mngon par sprul to// de nas dri ba de dag glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la zhon te lha'i rol mo'i
128b4(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan len cing na mkha' las rgyu ste/ bcom ldan 'das dal lan sum cu rtsa drug du bskor ba byas nas lha'i tsan da/ don gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor
128b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu gtor to// lha'i a ka ru'i phye ma dang / lha'i ta ma la'i phye ma dang / u t+pa la'i bye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba
128b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor
128b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu gi tor to// gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom
128b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor to// spos kyi bla re de dag la spos kyi ngang 'byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go// lha'i spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang la
129a1(dkon brtsegs): / mngon par bab po// spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos tshun
129a2(dkon brtsegs): rdza ba de'i dris stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri tshor bar gyur pa dang / rol mo sil snyan de dag gi sgra
129a3(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar dri za re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir glang po ches
129a4(dkon brtsegs): srung gi bu mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la lha'i bu mo glu le dan pa dang gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gi mchod de skye bo tham das cad kyang 'dun par byas so// lha'i bu mo de dag las la
129a5(dkon brtsegs): la ni lus kyi tshul bsgyur// la la ni tsan dan dang a ka ru dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor// la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma
129a6(dkon brtsegs): 'thor/ la la ni me tog man d+ha ra ba dang man+dA ra ba chen po nas skya snar khra bo dang skya snar bkra chen gyi bar gyi me tog dang sprul pa'i me tog rnams 'thor/ la la ni gser gyi me tog nas rdo'i snying po'i/ 
129a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyi me tog dang / dbyigs dang / gser dang / rin po che snying pas blangs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ la la ni na bza' dag 'thor/ la la ni zhabs kyi rgyan dang sku rigs dang
129a8(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa'i bar dag 'bulo// la la ni gser gyi dra ba dag 'dzin la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang rin po che'i ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang tshon sna tshogs
129b1(dkon brtsegs): can 'dzin/ la la ni lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs te/ lha ma yin gyi bu mos tshig su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de nas dri zad
129b2(dkon brtsegs): dngag glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu de dag la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed byed pa las glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag las babs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan
129b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan
129b4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs srid pa mthar 'byin pa// srid pa'i bcing da sa las 'gro po rnams grol mdzad// khyod 'dra srid gas dam gang na'ang ma mchis te// khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs
129b5(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshan mchog mnga'// mi mchog khyod kyis sa chen 'a di steng du// grags pa mtha' yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan// 'gyur bgyid chos ni gang yang ma mchis la/ 
129b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod// bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid// brjod pa tsam ste gzhan ni ci ma mchis// tha snyad gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis// 'on kyang
129b7(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs khyod kyi 'gro ba spong // bde bar gshegs pas song med 'ongs med dang // gnas med rang bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang // chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstan// rgyal
129b8(dkon brtsegs): ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan// chos rnams gang yang bya ba byed pa mchis// 'jig rten gtso bo bya ba'ang yongasu bstan// bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la// 
130a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan// shing rta yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi sems kyang // shing
130a2(dkon brtsegs): rta'i bgyi ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur// de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// chos ni chos las yongs su bskul mi bgyid// chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma/ 
130a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis chos rnams chos la nye bar mi brten te// chos rnams gang yang ma skyes mchi ma mchis// 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs// kun rdzob de yang de ni ma mchis te/ 
130a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'di kun kun rdzob ji bzhin zhes// tshogs kyi sgo dab dpon khyod kyis yongs dag gsungs// mig gi ra/ nga bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la// bde bar gshes
130a5(dkon brtsegs): pas bya ba rnam par gzhag/ chos tshul 'di 'dra yongasu bstan pa na// 'jig rten mkhas pas shin tu ngo ma tshar mdzad// de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid
130a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te// nor ba'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba rnams// chos kyis chos kyi tshul la gzung bgyis te// zhi ba'i go 'bang 'chi med thob par bgyi// rnam par 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar// 
130a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dran pa bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten mkhas// bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan par shog/ ji ltar bde gshegs khyod
130a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin bdag cag gis// nga rgyal bsgrubs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba// mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgya las yongasu dgrol/ 
130b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur la// g.yo yi zhags pas zin cing mu ma mthong // yongs 'thob spre'u
130b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar rgod pa yongasu dgrol// ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yi// sna tshogs yongs skyo gnyid kyis log gyur cing // bdag nyid
130b3(dkon brtsegs): las kyi 'bras bu chung zin dgrol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chung nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
130b4(dkon brtsegs): rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa// bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa ma dadzad// 'dren pa rgyu ma mchis par mi 'dzum na// bde gshes
130b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni myur du gsungs// nem nur gnod gyur rnam sa kyi the tshom sol// bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum mthong nas// skye bo 'di dag the tshom rnyed par 'gyur// 'dzum
130b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don ni de dag nyan par 'tshal// thub chen 'gro ba the tshom bsal du gsol// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su zhig zhugs// the tshom bral zhing som nyi bsal bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das
130b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas// mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad// su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du// blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur// gang gi blo gros
130b8(dkon brtsegs): dran rtogs blo mkhyen nas// bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad// 'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs btang ste// bde gshegs 'dzum don zhal nas thob par dga'// sor bcu
131a1(dkon brtsegs): thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing // dag pa'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du blta// nyon mongs dral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa// dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub
131a2(dkon brtsegs): chen 'jig rten mig/ 'gro ba yang gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol// rgyal ba thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad
131a3(dkon brtsegs): de slar bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas bshad pa// khyod kyis don dris mthun zhing legs pa ste// 'dzum pa de yi don ni lung bstan pa// skye bo'i tshogs chen don ni de ring
131a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phel/ 'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul mnyan par gyis// rnam par 'dren pa 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// de ni ma log par ya dang ngas bstan gyis// bstan pa de la dga' ba'i sems kyis
131a5(dkon brtsegs): nyon te dri za 'di rnams chos kyi rjes snyegs shing // bde bar ga shegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas// chos nyid 'byung bar rgyu ra ba med pa ste// chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin/ 
131a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas// rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur// gang gis chos gang rjesu brjod bya ba// des ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsungs// de dag nga yi tshig de rtogs kyu
131a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rta med glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas// byang chub rga med 'chi med tshol byed cing // dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do// nor ba'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni// thams cad mkhyen pa
131a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid du 'di dag mos// 'di dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pa// dri za'i ris bor dga' ba'i yid gyur te// blo gros bzang rnams lha rnams lha yul pa// brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag
131b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa// bye ba khrag khrig mang la mchod byed 'gyur// zhing nas zhing du rje su rgyu byed cing // de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan// de dag bde gshegs spyod pa yongasu
131b2(dkon brtsegs): skyong sa de dag zhing yang rtag par yongs dag 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems can ni// khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston// 'gro ba 'di dag rang bzhin stong rig nas// bod gshegs
131b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa// rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste/ 
131b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'i// bskal pa rnams rdul med gnas par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i da lam 'di rjesu ston// rgyal ba thub pa nyon mongs bcom pa
131b5(dkon brtsegs): yis/ de ltar de tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan// rta thul gyis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus pa// dri za lung bstan pa ni bshad/ pa mdzad// dri za lung bstan yid du 'thad 'gyur ba// de thos
131b6(dkon brtsegs): nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'// der ni bde bar gshegs kyi gsung thos na// shAkya thub la thams cad skyabasu dong // dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / bam po lnga pa
131b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad bcus lha ma yin rnams nas// dri za'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga'
131b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de chos nyid la 'jug pa yang thos nas ston pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
132a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'dod pa/ 
132a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ tshigasu bcad ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
132a3(dkon brtsegs): par bstod pa// mngon shes stobs ni kun du mtha' yas te// rgya mtsho'i chu 'dzin pad+ma 'tshal dang 'dra// de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa// mi yi seng ge khyod la 'di ltar bstod
132a4(dkon brtsegs): rirab srang la gzhal bar nus kyang dga'// gzi brjid chen po nam mkha' gzhal rung gda'// shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs// tshad gzung dag
132a5(dkon brtsegs): par nus pa yong ma mchis// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thug su chud// skye bo drang rung mi rung btul min pa// de dag las/ kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun
132a6(dkon brtsegs): du mtha' yang yas// de dag ci 'dra'i khams la brten pa dang // de dag sems rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang // de dag mos pa ci 'dra ma lus mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun du mtha'
132a7(dkon brtsegs): yang yas// 'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod// mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen// brag dog rnam pa'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste// de bas mtshungs med kun du mtha' yang
132a8(dkon brtsegs): yasate'agro ba 'di dag lam rgyung gar 'khyams pa// de dag mtshungs med rnams kyis rab tu mkhyen// de la ye shes rgyun du rab 'byung bas// de bas mtshungs med kun du mtha' yang
132b1(dkon brtsegs): yas// bde bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs// chung ba'i lam rgyud gang du 'khyams gyur cing // byams pa'i stobs las rab tu nyams gyur pa// de dag ma lus khyod
132b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu gzigs// 'gro ba rnams ni ji srid dus gnas shing // ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyur dang // lus kyi rnam pa ci 'dra 'chang ba rnams// de dag 'dren pa khyod
132b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu gzigs// mi yi seng ges lta ba ci 'dra dang // gang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa 'thob 'gyur bar// gang la brten cing las rnams bgyid 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren
132b4(dkon brtsegs): bas rab tu gzigs/ de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung da ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni gang zhig gis// ci 'dra'i lam dal de dag brten bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob
132b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur khyod kyis mkhyen// byas pa gang rnams bden shegs bstan pa la// rab tu byung zhing 'jig rten mkha/ pa yi// bstan pa rab pra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams
132b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas bgyis pas// dmyal ba chen po ji srid gnas pa dang // ci 'dri sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren
132b7(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu gzigs// gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dad bskyed de// rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing // chos kun stong pa nyid du yongs brtags nas// mtshan ma thams cad
132b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gzhig bgyis shing // 'gro rgyud kun du smon pa rnams spangs te// lus 'di sgyu ma 'dra bar rab brtags nas// phung po brag cha 'dra bar rtogs gyur te// byang chub sems
133a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan de dag rab tu gzigs// mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa// de yis bla med sangs rgyas
133a2(dkon brtsegs): grub par shog/ 'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas 'dzum pa
133a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gsol pa// mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// mi yi zla ba rab byung gyur pa ni// rgyu ma mchis
133a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum pa de yi rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol// ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// babacom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal// mgon pos
133a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag the tshom bsal du gsol// 'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur// de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa bskye/  // gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs// gang gis
133a6(dkon brtsegs): sems ni bskul nas gnas par gyur// de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol// de ring 'khor rnams the tshom che 'tshal zhing // kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du blta zhing sdod// ci nas
133a7(dkon brtsegs): the tshom ma mchis kun 'gyur ba// de ltar dpa' bos the tshom bsal du gsol// de ring 'di ni gang gi rnam 'phrul lags// gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'di bstan lags// / 
133a8(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis 'gyur// de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa// the tshom 'tshal ba yid gnyis legs bsal
133b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol te de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de
133b2(dkon brtsegs): slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// de ring 'gro ba dag gi don chen byas// rang byung 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni dris pas na// ston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyod kyis
133b3(dkon brtsegs): legs par mthong // de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan par bya// gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur nas// 'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa// dang pa'i yid kyis rta
133b4(dkon brtsegs): thul mnyan par gyis// rgyal ba'i byang chub zhi pa shes gyur nas// gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de// 'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod
133b5(dkon brtsegs): byas nas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu yid kyang btang // chu sa rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang // mtshan ma tham sa cang rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// 'gro ba kun du smon pa
133b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams spangs shing // byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang // rnal 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnam bshig cing // kun rdzob tsam du rig nas mi chags te// srid pa kun du chu la
