133b7(dkon brtsegs): pad+mo bzhin// byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang // de dag srid pa gang du chags 'gyur ba// stong par bshig ste thams cad lags rtogs pa// de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med
133b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ste// byang chub phyir ni dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes// skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste// de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin// dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes
134a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// zhi ba bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid// byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid// gang spyod de yang / 
134a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin stong pa ste// ye shes ldan pas shes kyi byis pas min// ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te// shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas/ shes pa po dang 'dra bar rtogs
134a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya// stong pa'i rang bzhin stong par shes par bya// mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa ste/ de
134a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar spyod na gzhan min spyod pa yin// de thos lha dang bcas dpa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing de dag stobs dang / dran par gyur// rang byung chos la de dag yid ches te// zhi ba'i gnas
134a5(dkon brtsegs): shes byang chub yid ldan gyur// gnod sbyin tshogs rnams dang mos yid gyur te// 'di ltar nga la mchod pa rab byasapas// gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo chen rnams// 
134a6(dkon brtsegs): mtho ris dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis// zhing du dong zhing skad cig gcig la yang // blo can de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod// de dag bzod mkhyen
134a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba gdams ngag ston// de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis// mtshan ma med par spyod cing dong gyur te// 'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas// 'jig rten chags
134a8(dkon brtsegs): mang mkhas pa spyad pa spyod// de ltar bstan pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas// byang chub bla med de yang thob gyur te// de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yis 'gyur// sems can mtha' yas
134b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag rnam par 'grel// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas grags pa can// de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas shes bya// zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi/ tshe tshang bskal pa stong ni tshang bar
134b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'gyur ba ni// rgyal sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs snyed de// kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thos par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug
134b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal med// de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig rten dag/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol// ngoms par gyur nas brtson pa brtan brtsams te// kun kyang brtson
134b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus stobs kyis brtan par 'gyur// gnod sbyin lung ba stan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci bye ba phrag
134b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad kyis lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de dag dang gnod sbyin gyi/ mchod pa'i bar dag kyang mthong // lung bstan pa yang nA sa nas shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te// khyod 'di ltar sem
134b6(dkon brtsegs): can yang mi dmigs la/ srog dang / skye ba po dang / shad las skyos dang / shed bu dang / gang zag dang / bdag dang / bdag gi yang gang yang med la/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang la
134b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can zhes gdags pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs/ las gang yod pas rnam par smin pa gdags par bya'i las de yang mi dmigs/ byang chub kyang
134b8(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs la/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do// 
135a1(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig las dgongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyasu 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te byang chub sems dpa/ 
135a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin pa dang / zhing bkod pa de dang / zhing yong su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du/ 
135a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang / sems can rnam par dgod pa dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis sangs rgyas su 'gyu ro zhes bya ba dang / bskal pa 'di
135a4(dkon brtsegs): snyeng cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa ni 'di snyed cig tu 'gyura'o zhes
135a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / de dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyu ro zhes de ba zhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa mdzad pa/ ci zhig las dgong
135a6(dkon brtsegs): te sems can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyu ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam ste/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i the tshom skyes nas
135a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgya ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas// shes rab che mnga' bdag
135a8(dkon brtsegs): ngogs skyes// stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa// bde gshegs bdag gis ma 'tshal ba// gsung ba'i zla ba chos kyi dbyings// 'gyur ma mchis la stong pa dang // rang bzhin med gzung ji lta bu// 
135b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa 'di ni gang zag mchog/ skye ba 'ang ma mchis byang chub tu// sems skyed pa ni ji lta bu// skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'i// ldem po ngag de bdag ma 'tshal// mi dbang bdag po
135b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar nata 'gag pa ma mchis 'tsho 'pho gsung // de ni yang dag lung bstan pas// thub pa bdag gi the tshom khum// sgyu ma 'dra la lha skye zhes// gsungs pa de ni 'di lta bu// ldem por gsungs/ 
135b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag kyang // shAkya seng ge bdag ma 'tshal// gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la// dge ba shes brten gsum ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // skyes bu khyu mchog bdag
135b4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal/ g.yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// rkang ga nyis mchog gsungs ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // dgra bsal bcom ldan bdag ma 'tshal// 
135b5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs zhes mgon ga sung ji lta bu// the tshom rnam pa 'di 'dra skyes// shes rab dpe med bdag mi 'tshal// zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal
135b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ chos kun zhi gsungs ji lta bu// mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po ngag/ bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol// sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams// nam mkha' 'drar gsungs ji lta bu/ 
135b7(dkon brtsegs): chos ni rab tu spang bgyis na// mi mkhas dmyal ltung ji lta bu// brtan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang // 'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang // las de bgyis ma mchis la// rang las can gsung
135b8(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu ka/ bka' stsa la tshul 'di rnam pa yang // zil gyis mi gnon bdag ma 'tshal// mgon po de la bdag dogs na// bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom sol// dge ba'i tshogs 'gyur/ 
136a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa'ang gsungs// dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi tshul// de skad bka' stsal bdag ma 'tshal// chos rnams zad pa med gsungs
136a2(dkon brtsegs): spongs byed las ni zad bstan pa// tshad med blo mnga' 'di la yang // bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal// yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal la// ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang rab
136a3(dkon brtsegs): rib bral ba yi// spyan mnga' sdig spangs bstan du gsol// thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs pa// gzhan gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di// sel nus ma mchis de lta bas// bdag ni rgyal ba
136a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog la dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i/  rgyal po ljon pas the tshom dris pa 'di dag gsan nas/ de la lan gdab pa'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshig
136a5(dkon brtsegs): su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa// bdag gis ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ gal te 'ga' zhig mi ston na// rgyal bas de lung bstan ma
136a6(dkon brtsegs): gsung / ci'i phyir zhe na 'di lta bu// rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur nas// 'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste// de la 'phel med 'grib pa med// me long shin du yongs dag la// ji ltar rang
136a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin med pa yi// gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du// ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis// chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur med na// mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes// yan lag
136a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la brtags byos la// ljon pa mchod pa 'di la spyod// chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du// 'gyur med skye bo mkhas pas rtogs// byis pa rnams ni 'di la 'khrul// blo sbyangs pas ni med/ 
136b1(dkon brtsegs): par shes// skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed// de ni ma 'tshal ces smras pa// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po dag/ gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis// byas pa 'khor bar dga'
136b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ 'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen po// log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de dag sngon chad ma thos pa'i// sems med chos
136b3(dkon brtsegs): ni ngas bshad na// byis pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams// 'di la kun du rmongs par 'gyur// byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang // byang chub pan yon thos gyur nas// zil gyis mnon
136b4(dkon brtsegs): rang byung sems// rgya chen de ni thob par 'gyur// 'gag pa dam mchis 'chi 'pho ba// de yang ma 'tshal ces smra / nges pa// 'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyis// gzhan du ma
136b5(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyan par gyis// gang dag rtag 'dzin de dag la// 'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med// dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces// bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par ston// sgyum
136b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra la lhar skyes pa// ji lta bu zhes ngogs gyur pa// mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang // skye bo rnams la mtho ris bshad// gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la// dge ba shes bstan ces gang sgra
136b7(dkon brtsegs): btaganas dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir// gnas pa med pa'i dge ba shes bsten// g.yo ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// bstan pa ma mtshal zhes smras pa// shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang // shi
136b8(dkon brtsegs): rta'i bya ba bzhin du rtogs// mo gang bdag yid khas len cing // bya ba'ang bdag gis byas 'dzin pa// de dag la ni bya ba dang // g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad/ rang bzhin stong ste stong
137a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang // rtogs shes nga yis gang smras pa/ byis pa log pa'i blo can rnams// rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa/ de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir// rang bzhin stong zhes
137a2(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs bston// kun du rtogs pa'i rtog pas bskyed// yang dag ma yin rtog pas bcings// zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang // zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni// mi shes rmongs par
137a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur rnams kyi// kun du rtogs las sred pa skye// skom pas ji ltar smin rgyu la// kun du rtog pas skom pa skye// mi mkhas de ni rtog pa'i rgyu// yod pa min la log par brtags// chu yin/ 
137a4(dkon brtsegs): par ni mthong gyur kyang // smin rgyu la ni chu medado// de bzhin yo dngasu rtogs pas dkrugs// sdug pa min la sdug par rtogs// byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag/ sdug dang ldan pa
137a5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis// sdug med smig rgyu chu bzhin te/ smig rgyu la ni chu med do// de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med // gzugs de sdug pa ma yin na// byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can/ 
137a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug par rtog pas bcings par gyur// chos rnams na mkha' 'dra ba dang // spong ba dmyal ltung zhes smras pa// med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa// mi mkhas rnams ni skrag par 'gyur// rang
137a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na// bdag zhen dus ni mi shes pa// de dag stong zhes thos gyur na// bdag med 'gyur zhes skrag pa skye// de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te// nam mkha' la ni mdud
137a8(dkon brtsegs): bor nas ta stong pa gya nom spong byed de// mi mkhas sems dmyal chen por ltung // mtho ris 'jigs pa ngas bsten dang // skye ba'i 'gro rgyud gzhan dag dang // las kyang ngas ni bstan
137b1(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ byed pa po ni rab tu bkag/ yang dag tu na 'gro ba dag/ rmi 'drar bshad par shes par gyis// rmi lam gang la'ang dngos po med// log pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhen// ngas ni las kyi rnam pa
137b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ byed pa phyogs bcu rnams na med// shing rnams rlung gis bas pa las// me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin no// bdag cag me 'di bskyed bya zhes// rlung dang shing la sems pa med// 'on
137b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar// las kyi byed po de bzhin no// bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang // legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni// de tshul yang dag mnyan
137b4(dkon brtsegs): par byos// mi yi tshe tshad lo brgya ste// de srid 'tsho zhes pa/ rjod mod kyi// lo la phung por spungs pa med// sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs// zad pa med ces gang smras dang // las
137b5(dkon brtsegs): zad ces ni ngas smras pa// stong pa'i tshul du zad pa ni // tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan// yang dag mtha' ni ngas bshad pa// phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'// log pa
137b6(dkon brtsegs): blo can byis pa rnams// gang dag mtha' ni mi shi so// mtshan nyid med par shes pa yi// ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi// nges par ldon pa khyod nyon cig/ yi ge gcig gis 'jug pa yi// byang chub blo
137b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan rnams la ston// chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa// a yi sgo yi gzungasu bstan// de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la// mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te// 'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug
137b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ta a yi sgo yi gzungasu bstan// chos rnams thams cad 'gag med pa// a yis chos la 'jug par bstan// a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa// de yang ljon pas shes par gyis/ 
138a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams rnam par rtogs med pa// de yang chos la 'jug par gsungs// chos kun 'gyur ba med par yang // a ni chos kun sgo mor bstan// a yi sgo yi gzung
138a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag/ ljon pas de ltar shes par gyis// mi zad pa dang zad smras pa// chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste// stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyis// mi zang sgo yi gzungs su bstan// 
138a3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun la sgo med de// de dag med pas sgo mi 'byung // 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces// yang dag
138a4(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan// a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa// de yang ljon pas shes par gyis// chos ku da na lus med byang chub ces// blo ldan rnams langs bstan
138a5(dkon brtsegs): baH'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'a jug par bya// chos rnams 'ong ba med pa ste// med pas/ de dag 'ong ba'ang med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ 
138a6(dkon brtsegs): / a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams gdags pa med pa ste// med pas de dag gdags pa med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams rang
138a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin med pa ste// med pas de dag rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungasu bstan// gzungs kyi sgo mo nga la nyon// chos kun yod la bya ba med// 'di// 
138a8(dkon brtsegs): yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungasu bstan// med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas
138b1(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya// chos kun thogs pa med pa ste// thogs par bya ba de ni dmigs// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/ 
138b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya// chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa// de dag ming med shes par bya// chos rnams yang dag ma yin te// de dag ma lus rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzung
138b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas shes par bya// gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba// de dag mthong med bstan par bya// lta ba po ni med pa dang // de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro// chos kun mnyam med de bas/ 
138b4(dkon brtsegs): na/ mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan gzhi med// na mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste// chos kun yod pa ma yin no// de lta lhag me/ dang chad pa med// mnyam gzhag med cing gnyi su med/ 
138b5(dkon brtsegs): gdung med bsil med tsha ba'ang med// blta ba'i lam min med phyir ro// drang po ma yin yon po min// mun pa ma yi na snang ba min// mthong ba med cing thos med de// med pas/ 
138b6(dkon brtsegs): gzungasu shes par gyis// g.yo med drang po'ang med pa ste// chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba med// 'khrug pa med cing khro ba med// ci yang mi byed nyer zhi byed// skyel ba med cing gnas kyang med// / 
138b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro min ldog med 'gro sems med// nyal ba med cing mi nyal med// sad pa med par shes par gyis// mig can ma yin long bri min// blta ba ma yin mun pa sgribs min// sbas pa ma/ 
138b8(dkon brtsegs): yin bzhag pa min// dul ba ma yin ma dul min// rgod pa ma yin zhi ba min// 'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min// bdon min pordzun min de lta bur// rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis// 
139a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dul ba'i phyir yin gyi// 'di la the tshom gang yang med// gang bcang bya ba'i the tshom de// dam pa'i don du byung ba med// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po// 
139a2(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pa dang gzungs nges par bstan pas yongasu tshim par gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te// khang pa brtsegs
139a3(dkon brtsegs): pa shing la brten pa dang // pad+ma la brten pa dang / ri la brten pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa// gdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas
139a4(dkon brtsegs): paHrgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa/ bla re dang lnga da ldis brgyan pa bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te// mi 'am ci'i rol mo'i sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par
139a5(dkon brtsegs): sprul nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang las skyes pa dang / thang la sa skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas mi 'am ci'i tshogs
139a6(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog de dag gis
139a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor to// de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las babs te/ rkang pas dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
139a8(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rje su dran par byed cing phyogs gci
139b1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
139b2(dkon brtsegs): rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa// bde gshegs dri bral spyan mnga' ba// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu// 'dzum 'dzad rgyu
139b3(dkon brtsegs): de bka' stsal gsol// thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa// 'khor gyis mthong nas the tshom 'tshal// zla ba tshes la mi bzhin du// smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du blta// bde gshegs
139b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa deng su zhig/ gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes// bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// mi mchog da dam pa the tshom sol// bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la
139b5(dkon brtsegs): dad pa thob pa na bcom ldan 'das// ji ltar 'dzum pa madz+ra/ da par gyur// smra mchog bdag gi the tshom khum// thams/ cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yis// bcom ldan nyan thos yi
139b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing // the tshom ma mchis som nyi chad// ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par 'gyur// de ltas rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ 'gro la thugs rtse mdzad pa dang // the tshom bcad slad ljon pa dang // 
139b7(dkon brtsegs): mi ci rnams kyi lung bsrungs pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du// sangs rgyas yon
139b8(dkon brtsegs): tan bsten 'gyur ba// ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa// rta thul khyod kyis legs par dris// ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa// bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can de khyod dang / 
140a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yid kyis nyon// skye med yid kyis nga la nyon// 'jig rten phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir// ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa// de yi 'bras bu brjod par byas// the tshom
140a2(dkon brtsegs): bcad pas nga la nyon// ljon pa la sogs mi 'am ci// bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa// de dag nga la mchod byas nas// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris 'dong // bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur ded/ 
140a3(dkon brtsegs): mi yi nang na 'khor bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas// sems la dbang bsgyur dbang ldan 'gyur// mi yi seng ge de dag gis// sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu// sprul
140a4(dkon brtsegs): bkye rang ni lha gnas na// bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong // bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang // de dag lha mi dar 'khor 'khor nas// rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su
140a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// rtag tu snang ba'i ba skal pa la// mi yi seng ge 'jig rten mgon// chags ming ye shes mthong dpag yas// stobs bcu gzi brjid
140a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas 'gyur// de dag zhing du sems can gang // yongasu ma smin 'ga' mi skye// nyan thos theg pas gang 'byung ba// kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa// mi yi seng ge zhing der ni// byang chub
140a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang skye ba// de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste// mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur// gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams// bdag cag dpag med sangs rgyas zhing // yongasu sbyar
140a8(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o zhes// de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs// sems can rlabs chen de dag ni// smon lam rgya chen yun ring btang // de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// bsam pas rang bzhin rnam par/ 
140b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyong nyon mongs 'joms pa de dag gi/ zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni// dga' ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams// ngan song kun kyang yongasu dag/ de dag zhing rnams kun du yang // 
140b2(dkon brtsegs): mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur// zhing rnams yongs sbyangs de dag ni// sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren// de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis// mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan
140b3(dkon brtsegs): bshad/ lung bstan du thos 'khor rnams ni// kun kyang yid ni rangs par gyur// mi 'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas lha phreng ldan glang po can
140b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khris lha ma yin rnams nas mi 'am ci'i bar dag gis dmachod pa yang mthong / lung bsten pa yang tho/ das nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing
140b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir ba rtson par gyur te// de dag gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
140b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po thams cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man+dA ra bas pus mo nub tsam du gang bar byas so// de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
140b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal// srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba// bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje can// 'jig rten bdag po mi yi
140b8(dkon brtsegs): stag /  sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi// 'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par// zhabs mchog midzes shing dga' ldan par// thugs rje can la mgos phyag 'tshal// ji ltar dgung za
141a1(dkon brtsegs): pa tshe// maM rnams zla ba phyag 'tshal dang // de bzhin la tshogs 'di rnams kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bste// dpag tu med pa'angan srung pa
141a2(dkon brtsegs): dpag med ye shes phung po ldan// gzi brjid dpag yas phung po can// blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal sdug pa// de bzhin mi bsnyengs dri gsum
141a3(dkon brtsegs): sel/ rgyal ba bcwo bdud ches dang ldan// the tshom mi mapar smra ba'i mchog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing // dpe byang bzang po brgyad bcu ldan// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs
141a4(dkon brtsegs): meng thugs// bde gshegs khyod le phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khrims stobs kyis mthar phyin pa// ti ba na stobs gnas mi bskyod pa// ye shes stobs kyi mtshan
141a5(dkon brtsegs): maHnaHbdud stobs bcom thub rgyal ba lags/ ye sa stobs mchog rgyas gyur ba// sor sna ma mangs nyan thos btul// zhi ba'i thugs kyis spyad mdzad cing / 
141a6(dkon brtsegs): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul// skyes bu seng ge bde gshegs kyang // gti mug zhi bgyid chos brnyes pa// bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu yi// chos rnams 'dir ni thos pa
141a7(dkon brtsegs): shog/ ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi// bsam mkhyen dang mdzad de bzhin du// 'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang // lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dang bgyid// de ltar 'gro ba'i don sladu/ 
141a8(dkon brtsegs): snying brtse nye bar bzung nas ni// 'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba// srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral bar bgyi// bdag cag lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi// 'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur cig/ 'gro ba/ 
141b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal rgyas nyen pa// srid pa'i rgyud las dgrol bar bgyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi bsam pa thugasu chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 
141b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcol ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// bde gshegs rnam par 'dren pa po// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum
141b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa'i// rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba dang bgyid byung mthong nas// 'khor kun the tshom 'tshal gyur te// 'dzum pa'i don ni
141b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan par 'tshal// don chen 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don// bka' stsol bka' sgrol 'dren pa mchog/ dge sbyong rnams kyi dargyal po khyod// the tshom chang 'gyur bka' stsal gsol// 
141b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par gyis// gang gis deng mtsho/ de bla med gyiso// su zhig de ring gting thob gyur// bde/ go shegs bdag gi the tshom khum// de ring gang gis bdud
141b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas// dkrugs g.yengs kun du dkrugs par bgyis// deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' yid ldan par gyis// rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston// 'gro ba'i
141b7(dkon brtsegs): the tshom myur du khum// de thos bde gshegs 'khor 'di rnams// kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ 
141b8(dkon brtsegs): phreng ldan glang po can lha yi// lung bstan rta thul khyod dris pa// des na 'gro ba mang po yis// don chen shin du deng byas 'gyur// stobs bcu rgyal ba ma dris par// sras mchog byang chub lung mi
142a1(dkon brtsegs): / ston/ de ni 'gro ba mang don du// de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus// phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis// nga la sems dang nga mchod pas// bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu// 
142a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa ma byas rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// mthun par mi yi nang skyes te// rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la// me tog mchog gis mchod par 'gyur// kun du bde bar gshegs/ 
142a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi semasate bskyed par 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur// rang 'byung mi yi seng ge la// tshig su bcad pas bstod par 'gyur// ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis// rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang
142a4(dkon brtsegs): me tog gis mchod tshigs bcad kyis// mi mchog rnams la bstod byas te// de dag bde gshegs rnams mchod cing // mthu bo che yi sku bstod nas// rab tu dga' ba'i bskal pa la
142a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren par 'jig rten 'byung // grags pa ma smad/ nags rgyu ba// brgyad khri po rnams de dag kun// bskal pa/ cig la bde gshegs 'gyur// me tog rgyal mtshan ldang zhes
142a6(dkon brtsegs): bya de na dmyal dang dud 'gro dang // ngan song gshin rje'i 'jig rten med// zhing de na ni lha min med// mi khom thams cad rab tu bcom// phreng ldan glang po can lha yi// longs spyod sum cu rtsa
142a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi// ci 'dra ba ni de 'drar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i tshe tshad dpag tu med// de tshe mi dge sgra mi grag/ mi dge byed pa smos ci dgos// de na rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi// skye bo rnams kyang chos can
142a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te srog chags bye ba khrig khrig phrag/ gang+gA'i bye ma rab mang snyed// 'gro bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams// gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston// grags pa ma smad de dag gi/ ring
142b1(dkon brtsegs): sel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi ring bsel la'ang // rgyal ba'i sku mang 'byung bar 'gyur// grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi// ring bsel tshe 'phrul sku mthong nas/ 
142b2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang // byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 'gyur// phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi// lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// thos shing shes nas 'khor kun
142b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang / de tshe sems ni rab tu dga'// phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khris lha ma yin rnams
142b4(dkon brtsegs): nas phreng ldan glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang zos nas tshim de zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang
142b5(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa/ ra bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyed de// 'di lta ste per na kham pa'i glu la zhon pa'i mi zhig chu yi dbus su phyin
142b6(dkon brtsegs): nagru chag tu 'ong zhes chu tshu rol nas pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes pa de bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri po dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la dang pa
142b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes par gyur nas/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par 'gyuraro// 
142b8(dkon brtsegs): dongag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i bla re bkra ba blta na sdug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to// de dag kyang phal cher mu tig dmar po dang / skar mdog dang / bai DUr+ya dang / 
143a1(dkon brtsegs): gser dang / rdor snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// lha'i rol mo sil snyan dgu khri yang mngon par sprul te/ de dag nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re dgu khri ba de / 
143a2(dkon brtsegs): thogs nas rol mo sil snyan dgu khri po de dag byed cing steng gi bar snang las dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha kang
143a3(dkon brtsegs): many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor te de dag gis mchod pa byas
143a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te// tshig su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// rgyal ba'i yon tan mthong ba yi// lha ni dgu khri thams pa dag/ 'dren pa
143a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi spyan snga na// thal mo rab tu sbyar nas mchis// rgod pa ma mchis zhu ma mchis// 'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma mchis// mi blun ngo mtshar ma mchis par// rkang
143a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum// mi shes pa ni rnam par sbyangs// sred pa'i phung po rab tu phyung // nga rgyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bstan// khyod ni zug
143a7(dkon brtsegs): rngu phyung ba ste// rma la gdug pa khyod kyis spangs// khyod ni mkhyen bzhin spyod pa ste// 'dren pa khyod ni rma rnams sos// khyod kyi nyon mongs thams cad spangs// bcing ba dag ni tham
143a8(dkon brtsegs): cad bcad/ sbyor ba kun dang bral ba ste// thub pa chags pa kun las 'das// rgyal ba khyod kyi spyod yul ni// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med// bcom ldan khyod la smon pa yang // rnam pa
143b1(dkon brtsegs): kun du mi mnga'o// khyod kyis sred pa drungs nus byung // ma rig pasna ni thugs kyang byung // rnam pa bzhi po'i phyin ci log/ rnam pa kun du yongasu spangs// gang du 'jig rten mi chud de
143b2(dkon brtsegs): ri dgas rngon pa ji bzhin du// 'jigs shing sgeg par 'gyur ba yi// yang dag mtha' ni khyod kyis gzigs// sems can 'jig tshogs slar ltung ste// stong pa nyid ni ma
143b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bas// ma rigs pa yi mun pas gtibs// 'khor ba'i brtson rar dga' bar bgyid// khyod kyis yang dag ji bzhin du// 'gro de chang ba stong 'drar gzigs// gang gis
143b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag mig 'gyur ba'i// ye shes snang ba rab tu ba stan// phung po stong par rnam par bshig/ mig dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra zhing // khams rnams dang ni skye
143b5(dkon brtsegs): mched dag/ bdag med stong par rnam par bshig/ chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba// chos gang dang ni// ming gang gis// chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba// 
143b6(dkon brtsegs): chos de chos des stong pa ste// thub pa khyod kyis stong par bstan// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la// skye ba'i tshogs tshon mngon sprul na// de la sems can gdags ma mchis
143b7(dkon brtsegs): srog dang gang zag ma mchis ltar// de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang // dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang // yang dag ma yin sgyu ma zhes// skyes bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad

144a1(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam ci ma mchis// de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam lags na// byis pa rnams ni de la rmongs// gang shes khyod kyi bslab pa la// legs bsrabs
144a2(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par mi 'gyur ba// lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhin du// de ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstan// shes rab chen po khyod kyis ni// ye shes sgron ma rab bus te// chos kyi 'khor lo
144a3(dkon brtsegs): rab bskor nas// sems can rnams la chos bstan pa// da ltar bdag cag myur du ni// bla med byang chub zhi thob ste// de ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
144a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyi// 'khor ba'i lam log 'di dag tu// 'khyams gyur pa yi sems can la// ji ltar 'dren par snyan pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos 'gyur bstan// 
144a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhag/ pa'i bsam pa thug su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs

144b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed dang yi bstan la rab tu gnas// sngon yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ brgyad cu dag la 'di dag mchod// ma 'ongs dus na'ang sangs rgyas ni// bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur/

145a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu 'gyur// mtshan ni 'od zer 'chang ba ste// 'jig rten kun mkhyen thub par 'gyur// / 'jig rten sgron ma de dag gi/ nyan thos 'dus par//

145b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la/ 'jig rten sgron mas lung bstan mdzad// de thos nas ni skye bo kun// kun tu dga' zhing rab dga' ste// sems mgu yid kyang rangs gyur nas// ston pa la ni mngon par bstod/ 
145b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / bam po drug pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag
145b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyang cus lA ma yin dag dang / na mkha' lding dag dang / klu'i bu mo dag dang / klu dag dang / grul bum dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / mi 'am ci dag dang / phreng ldan glang po can dag

145b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / bdan dag gis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi seng ge 'i khris btsun pa/ khrer chen po dang / dril bu ga yeng ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ lha'i rim mo'i tshogs kyis mangs par byas pa/ lha'i ramam
146a1(dkon brtsegs): sil spyan sgra rab tu 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to// rtswacang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta lha rdzas kyi rnam pas legs par brgyan pa gdugs

146b6(dkon brtsegs): brag brgyad cu brgyad cu mngon par sprul te/ lha'i bu mo de dag kyang la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sbyar zhing / lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin
146b7(dkon brtsegs): du byaso// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bya ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa las na chos thams cad
146b8(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nge so snyam nas/ de dag 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin no// snyam du sems par gyur cing / 
147a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar shes nas/ chos la the tshom med pa thob par gyur to// de dag de ltar the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur nas/

147a3(dkon brtsegs): cag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong // mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de dag
147a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes te/ de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bya bar shes nas the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
147a5(dkon brtsegs): la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang / sprul pa'i mchod pa/ 'di dag gang bgyis dang / lha rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas
147a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod byas pa// 'di ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid// 'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang // de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang // 'di dag thams cad
147a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa 'dra'o zhes// de ltar lha tshogs de dag blo gros skyes// bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin du// ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste// rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur
147a8(dkon brtsegs): bas/ 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchiso// rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas// byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang btags pa// de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te// bde gshegs 'gro ba
147b1(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan de bzhin no// slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi slob dang // bcom ldan nyan thos dul ba'i sa thob pa// de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sbrul dang 'dra// bcom ldan bstan la the tshom myu
147b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// bcom ldan gang rnams mi smra lhur len cing // gse ru lta bur gnyis med nyon mongs spangs// de dag rnams kyang sprul 'dra bcom ldan 'das// bde gshegs bstan la the tsha
147b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchiso// gang rnams 'gro ba kun la bo dben phyir// rgyal ba'i byang chub spang spyod bag yod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' bde ga shegs sras ngag kyang // khyad par ma mchis sprul pa'ang/ 
147b4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'draHbde gshegs rang byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog/ stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can/ ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag/ spru
147b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs// 'dren pas 'di chos rnams gang gsungs pa// gnas med zhibs la nyon mongs med gyur cing // sdug bsngal zhe byed mtha
147b6(dkon brtsegs): drug grangs med pa// de yang sprul pa 'di dag je bzhin// bcom ldan 'di la chos rnam gang dag kyang // sprul pa'i rang bzhon ma lags de ma mchis// gang che go'u te ma'i bstan pa/ 
147b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dir bdag cag rtogs nas the tshom thams cad spangs// sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas// bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bde gshegs spyod yul
147b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di la spyod pa rnams// the tsom ma mchis rang byung 'dren par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bas
148a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thug su chung nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa// gnal yas grag mnga' mtha' yas
148a2(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid can// bde gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad// rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na// rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshig gsungs the tsom khum// rang byung bde gshegs
148a3(dkon brtsegs): zhal nas 'dzum pa 'di// byung bar rigs nas 'jig rten the tshom 'tshal// 'gro ba'i the tsom thub pas bsal du gsol// 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom ma mchis mdzod// lha tshogs 'di rnams
148a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu yid dga' bas// rgyal ba bstod de lha rdzas rnam das kyis mchod// bde gshegs de dag don du 'dzum dpa mdzad// rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' stsal gsol
148a5(dkon brtsegs): zla 'drar dri med 'ong mnga' mtha' yas gzi// ci nas brje gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas// mgon po 'gro dra thams cad dgar 'gyur bar// rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen
148a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsol gsol// bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun// sprul pa lta bur rnam par rtogs gyur na// stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'di bka' stsal te// rab rib bral ba lha yi bslab pa
148a7(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// skye bo 'di dag the tsom bral gyur nas// thub pa de ltar byang chub spyad brtsom 'gyur// rab tu dpa' ba 'khor 'dis thos gyur te// dgongs pa rig nas rgyal chen rtsom par 'gyur// de nas
148a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcang de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga' shes nas// rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig/ smras pa de ni dus la 'bas
148b1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to// lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris pa// des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de ngas bstan gyis// dga' zhing / 
148b2(dkon brtsegs): dang pa'i sems kyis nga la nyon// lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni// ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas// chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing // rab rib bral ba'i
148b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe// mi yi gtso bo gang+gA'i bye snyed mchod// srid rgyud de na 'di dag thub pa las// chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo / 
148b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag nga la mchod mchog 'dir byas pas// chos rnams sgyu dal pa 'dra bar mngon du mthong // bde gshegs bstan da pa 'di la byas pa ni// chud zos mi 'gyur bar chad yod mi 'gyur/ 
148b5(dkon brtsegs): lha tshogs 'di yis nga la mchod byas te// chos rnams tham sa cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas// bskal pa pad+ma zhe sa bya byung ba'i tshe// smra ba'i zla ba mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ 
148b6(dkon brtsegs): khyu mchog ldan pa'i ming mchog 'gyur ba ni// bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rgyal po// chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing // 'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'grel
148b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// bde gshegs de dag bstan la bag yod pa// chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems// zhi gnas de la su sten bag yod pa// myur du bla med byang chub mchog zhi thob
148b8(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gsum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnams nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bar
149a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang // yid dang bde ba skyes nas// bcom ldan
149a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga' bar shes shing // sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste// de dag thob na ma shes pa'am// ma mthong ba 'am// ma rtogs pa
149a3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ mngon du ma byas pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ las sam/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do// 'di ltar de bzhin
149a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas kun rdzob dang / don dam pa gnyis thugs chung de shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa 'dir zad do// de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ stong pa nyid du
149a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gzigs/ rab tu mkhyen legs par mngon du mdzad pas/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs
149a6(dkon brtsegs): pas gzig so// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa ste/ shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin pa// ma bstan pa rab
149a7(dkon brtsegs): tu ma bstan pa/ ma thob pa thob par ma byas pa/ ma shes pa rnam par ma shes pa/ ma bstan pa ma mthong ba ma btags pa/ 'dzin du ma bcug pa/ rtogs par ma byas pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ 
149a8(dkon brtsegs): mi thob pa/ nye bar ma bsnyen pa/ ma bor gam bzhag pa/ ma spangs pa/ bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rab tu zhi ba med pa/ ma smad pa ma bstod pa/ thob pa ma yin pa/ ma thob pa ma yin pa/ bde ba ma
149b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa sdug bsngal ma yin pa/ snyan pa ma yin pa/ mi snyan pa ma yin pa/ gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba med pa/ 'jig rten med pa/ 'jig rten dang
149b2(dkon brtsegs): bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/ ma bsams pa/ ma bskyod pa/ mngon par
149b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa dang bral ba ste/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig dang
149b4(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa
149b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par she/ sa pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa/ dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te
149b6(dkon brtsegs): reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg po las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs
149b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugasu sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid
149b8(dkon brtsegs): la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ sa dang chu dang me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi/ 
150a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan ma ma dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod
150a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos dang / de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga' ba yin na de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa mi shes pa rnams kyis
150a3(dkon brtsegs): thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par 'gyur te/ des 'jigs par gyur pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par 'gyur te/ de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya
150a4(dkon brtsegs): ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to/ zhes te/ de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dal 'dod pa bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du
150a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyad par du/ 'phags pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod de bcom ldan 'das
150a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'thab bral gyi lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la
150a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs// khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin te// dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag/ kun
150a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bden pa 'di gnyis te// khyod kyis gzhan las ma gsan rang gis gzigs// de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste// bden
150b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchi so// gang gis bde bar gshegs pa 'gro ba rnams// bde ba'i don du dad pa skyed 'gyur ba// rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du// 'jig rten phan phyir kun
150b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzob de bstan to// sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa// sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yi dgas dang // lha min ris dang mi dang lha yi rnams// mi yi seng ges kun rdzob btags pa/ 
150b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzadarigs dma' de bzhin mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang // phyug po'i khyim dang dbul ba'i khyim rnams dang // bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin g.yog gi tshogs// bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma
150b4(dkon brtsegs): ning dang / 'gro ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung // mtshung das med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa// kun rdzob bde bar mkhas pas thugs chud nas// 'jig rten phan
150b5(dkon brtsegs): bas mi la de bstan to// de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba na// 'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste// thob dang ma thob snyan dang mi snyan dang // bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal/ 
150b6(dkon brtsegs): thob pa rnyed na de la chags pa skyed// ma thob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur// gang gzhan ma bstan tshul 'dis shes par bya// nang rnams brgyad kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur// kun rdzob de la don dam
150b7(dkon brtsegs): su smra ba de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya// mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang // bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra ba dang // mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing // de ltar dga' ste mtshan
150b8(dkon brtsegs): mar gang gnas pa// de dag bder gshegs gsung ni thos gyur na// 'jigs shing ji bzhin mi rtogs spong bar bgyid// de dag bder gshegs gsung ni spangs gyur pas// sems can dmyal bar
151a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mi bzang myong // de dag tshul min bde ba tshol bgyid kyang / sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis// ma
151a2(dkon brtsegs): log blos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na// sbrul gyi lpags pa rnying ltar rab spangs te// srid pa kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur// chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste// stong pa mtshan ma med pa/ 
151a3(dkon brtsegs): don dam zhes// gang gis thos nas dga' ba skye 'gyur ba// de dag bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos// de la lha rnams the tsom ma mchis te/ 
151a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad yongasu dgrol ba'i phyir// de dag bla na me dad pa'i byang chub tshol// byang chub blo can rnam dag blo cam/ dmas// skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed tu gsol// de thos
151a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba kun la sman slad tu// bla na med pa'i byang chub thob/ par 'gyur// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tha ba bral ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsan
151a6(dkon brtsegs): ba thugasu chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol ba// 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des/ khyod kyi 'khor ni the
151a7(dkon brtsegs): com 'tshal bar gyur// mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsa la gsol// des ni 'khor 'dir rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos 'gyur na// 'khor 'di shin tu dga'
151a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la// bde ba nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'dir ni mchog ldan te// drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon
151b1(dkon brtsegs): tan snod/ 'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu ba mdzad slad du// snyan pa'i gsung ni legs par brjod du gsol// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu dag thos gyur na// skye dgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur// bde
151b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos na// mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin brtsom par 'gyur// mi yi dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dir// the tsomo 'tshal ba'i nem nur lags par sol/ 
151b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing stod// lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol// kun kyang rim gror gus par rna blags te/ khyod kyi lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la// sgrib/ 
151b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan// 'jig rten phan phyir skye sa bu mchog gis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi das tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ 
151b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pan phyir mkhas pas 'dzum mdzad pa// rta d+hu la khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan// sangs rgyas yon tan ma thu ni thos gyur na// skye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don du 'gyur// sangs
151b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing // 'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang // tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang // gti mug blo can dga' ba skyer mi 'gyur// gang rnams rgyal bas bstan la
151b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang // gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon dris dang // gang rnams snying rje che dang ldan pa dag/ de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang gis 'gro ba gnod zin mthong gyur te// mi yi
151b8(dkon brtsegs): seng ge snying rje skyed byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos na// ud pa la phreng bzhin mgo la khyer bar 'gyur// nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dga' gyur pa// sngon gyi rgyal la bsnyen bkur
152a1(dkon brtsegs): sngon byas te// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di// me tog 'phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta// 'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la// bsnyen bkur byas shing
152a2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa spangs pa ste// nyon mongs smad cing sangs rgyas blo ldan 'gyur// snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan// rgyal ba mi yi seng ge gang ga yi// bye snyed kun la sngon chad bsnyen bku
152a3(dkon brtsegs): byas/ byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing // dge ba mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis byas// sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas// sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying rje
152a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed/ de dag mi mchog sems can phan mdzad la// chos tshul mtha' yas yongasu dris par gyur// gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren gyur pa// rnam 'dren chos la 'jug pa 'chad par gyur// 
152a5(dkon brtsegs): mi yi nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas// de dag rnams la// rgya chen chos kyang 'chad// rnam 'dren skyes bu dam/ pa'i mchog de dag/ rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chad/ 
152a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs// cis stong zhe na mtshan ma'i rnam pas stong // rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med pa smra// rgyal ba'i chos
152a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams de ltar shes gyur nas// kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas// de dag nga la mchod pa rgya chen byas// bdag gi chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas// skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal
152a8(dkon brtsegs): bdam pa la// bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs mnyam pa med pa bye ba'i phrag/ nyi shu nyi shus yongasu gang bar 'gyur// blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangasu 'gro// sems can
152b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas yongs su sbyor bar 'gyur// 'thab bral 'khod pa'i lnga yi bsam pa rnams// rta thul gyis ni yongasu zhus byas pa// rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yis// lung bstan lha
152b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga'// 'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad nus lha ma yin rnams nas 'thab
152b3(dkon brtsegs): bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
152b4(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig/ ci gzugs sam/ 'on te tshe ra ba 'am/ 'on te 'du shes sam/ 'on te 'du byed dam/ 'on te rnam par shes pa shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
152b5(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba/ stan snyam nas// de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzugs ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag
152b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma
152b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan tonyade ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
152b8(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ de la ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/ 
153a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa
153a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyi su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyi su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gnyi su med
153a3(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub kyang gnyi su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang
153a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigasu med pa/ byang chub kyang dmig su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmig su med pa/ byang chub kyang dang mig su med pa nas/ ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang / spros pa med
153a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gnyi su med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / dmigasu med pas 'gag pa med pa dang / dmig su med pa'i bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya// de ltar chos zad
153a6(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs na/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni gang / byang chub ni gang / lung bstan pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
153a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo/ 
153a8(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid kyis stong / lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa la gzugs shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs
153b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni tha snyad tsam/ ming tsam/ brda tsam/ kun rdzob tsam brjod pa tsam/ gdags pa tsam ste/ de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen/ 
153b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i mi cha'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing rtse rtse ba las de la nyal ba las sang na 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/ de rjes su dran
153b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mi rnyed cing / de ltar ma rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ 
153b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ma rnyed cing ro ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyu ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu no ra pa ste/ chos de dag gi don ni rnam par zhan la so so'i skye bo de dag
153b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen to// chos de dag ni de ltar shes pa/ bya ba yin na/ de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yis/ gang zhig byang chub yin/ gang
153b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos thams cad dmigasu med do// so so skye bo yang dmigasu med de/ so so skye bo'i chos kyang dmigasu med/ nyan thos kyang dmigasu med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs
153b7(dkon brtsegs): med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmig su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigasu med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigasu med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigasu med/ sangs rgyas kyang dmig
153b8(dkon brtsegs): su med sangs rgyas kyis chos kyang dmigasu med// byang chub kyang dmigasu med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang dmig su med do// bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag cag the tsom ma mchis// yid
154a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ma mchis so zhes gsol nas/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag la the tsom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson
154a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur nas/ de dag gis 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan
154a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan
154a4(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas pa// de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// rnam thar sgo gsum de ni rnyed gyur pas// mtshungs dpa med pa'i spyod yul spyod par 'gyur// gzugs dang tshor ba
154a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes ma mchis te// sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma ma chis pa// chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul lag/ mi yi seng ge phung po dben la dgyes// skyes bu dam pa mkhas
154a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gi/ byang chub sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma mchis// phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong gyur nas// sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spangs blo ldan// de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing // byang
154a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems la'ang de dag mi smon de// dga' dang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis par// bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod byed pas// bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par
154a8(dkon brtsegs): gzigasate/ de la rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams// yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing // mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di na spyod// gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par gzhig bgyis
154b1(dkon brtsegs): shing / mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad rab spangs te// srid pa gsum la de dag yong mi smon// dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid// phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtogs gyur cing // lung bstan bde
154b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs nyid kyang ma skyes la// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes// de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis// skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams// de dag kun dang bde gshegs ma
154b3(dkon brtsegs): skyes te/ mi yi seng ge de ltar gang 'tshal ba// de ni khyod sras khyod ni de yi yab// gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing / khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos// byang chub rgyal ba de
154b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin lung bstan pa// bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal da ba dang // gang rnams byang chub 'tshal cing spyod bgyid pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gag ma mchis// 'gro ba thams
154b5(dkon brtsegs): cad 'gag med blor gyur na// de 'dra'i blo can byang chub rnyed mi dka'// phung po skye mched dag dang khams rnams dang // byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras mi g.yo bar// gang gis 'tshal ba de
154b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag rgyal sras te// de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags// phung po sems med de bzhin skye mched dang // khams dang byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras dang // lung bstan de bzhin sems pa ma mchis par
154b7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rang byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste/ khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang // byang chub dang ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa
154b8(dkon brtsegs): gang spyod dang // phung po spros 'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang // skye mched rkang gnyi mchog dang byang chub dang // lung bstan spros pa med par gang spyod cing // de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras
155a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma lags te// mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yong ma lags/ 'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags// de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i/ 
155a2(dkon brtsegs): sras rgyal dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing // stong pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la// de ltar bgyis na gang zag mchog mchod cing // 'dren pa 'khor dang bcas la bsnyen bkur lags// 
155a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa'i bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // ji snyed 'jig rten pan mdzad mkhyen pa yi// dge ba de yis 'gro ba rang byung ba// rgyal ba mtshan mchog ldan par grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
155a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa darta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ 
155a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa rgyu mi stobs ni gang zhig gis// stobs chen brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol// des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga'
155a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyurate shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'angs mthong the tsom 'tshal gyur te// nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par// kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta// 'di ltar/ 
155a7(dkon brtsegs): dper na nad pa nad skyob// sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa// de bzhin 'khor 'di lung bstan thos 'tshal zhing // rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du lta// 'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen
155a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ste// sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan// rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te// kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdod// de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // ci nas
155b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur dang // sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bas// ye shes stobs kyis the tsom gcad du gsol// mi yi khyu mchog lung bstan dus la ba ba// the
155b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba'i the tsom bsal du gsol// sangs rgyas slar sngo'i dgra ni mi mngal na// rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad
155b3(dkon brtsegs): de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad la// 'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan// de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na// de ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen byas// 'jig
155b4(dkon brtsegs): rten pan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// gang gis chos rab 'a dadi dag shes gyur te// nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa de'i// dga' ldan lha yis bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzad// 'gro ba
155b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong // rgyal ba'i dgongs pas cho sa nyid brnyes par gyur// gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmod sa gyur pa'i// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs/ 
155b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas// bsam pa gcig gis zhu ba legs par zhus// de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgoms// sngan chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan// de dag de bzhin gshegs
155b7(dkon brtsegs): dang dang phrad cing // skyes bu mchog dang 'grogs pa thob gyur nas// stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pas// de ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byos// 'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du// byang chub
155b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan dang // gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang // byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med// 'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid 'dra ba// de shes byang chub thob par 'gyuraro zhes// lha
156a1(dkon brtsegs): / rnams gang yang de la the tsom med// byang chub sems kyis rtag par de ltar spyod// de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji bzhin du// lha tshogs 'di dag rtogs pa'i blo ldan te// mkhas
156a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag nem nur med pas na// de phyir 'di dag rgyal ba rang byung 'gyur// gnas pa med pa la ni nges gyur nas// g.yo ba med pa de la nem nur med// 'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min
156a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ de la'ang lha rnams the tsom yong med do// chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang // thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// de la
156a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ang lha rnams the tsom rnam par dag/ blo mchog ldan pa'i da dga' ldan lha 'di rnams// kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te// de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dka'
156a5(dkon brtsegs): rang byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dren pa skar ma/ 'dra ba'i bskal pa la// 'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'grel par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur ba ni// rang
156a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung chos la rnam nges rgyal po'o// de ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnams kyi// bsam pa mkhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzad pa// de thos nas ni lhar bcas 'jig rten yang // yid rangs gyur cing
156a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyang thob par gyur// dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe rab 'phrul la sogs pa// 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus lAm
156a8(dkon brtsegs): yin rnams nas dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bdi bskyes nas/ yang dag pa'i
156b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' la gnas shing / de bzhin nyid la the tsom med par gyur na/ stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar
156b2(dkon brtsegs): ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sgrib pa mo
156b3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i mtha' dang / mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang / mi zad pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste// mtha' ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de la ma nor ba'i
156b4(dkon brtsegs): slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// tshad ma mchis dpa'i slad du mtha' yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// chags dpa ma mchis pa'i sla du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi
156b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i sladu mi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o / 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes pa/ gyi'o// ro gcig pa'i slad mi gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// 
156b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i slad mtha' ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni thams cad kyis rjesu song ba lags te/ chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i chos de gang
156b7(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ byang chub gang zhe na bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni byang chub lags par rig par
156b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// tha na mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chubo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas// 
157a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i sla du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams/ 
157a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhi no// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhi no// bcom
157a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gang su dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba de dag ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig mchis na ni/ mya ngan las 'das
157a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'khor bar zhugs pa gang yang ma mchis na/ de mya ngan la/ sa 'das pa ci zhig tshol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag
157a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtha' ni gnyi su ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' na gnyi su ma mchis pa ste/ bcom/ ldan 'das de la bdag cag som nyi ma mchis the tsom ma mchi sa
157a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig chos 'di la nem nur dang the tsom ma mchis na/ de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bla na med pa yang
157a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bdun cu po de dag
157a8(dkon brtsegs): rang gis rang lung bstan pa gsan nas/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcang gsol pa/ 
157b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod kyis ma bstan te// rang byung skyes bu dam pa gang dag kyang // sgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad pas/ khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum
157b2(dkon brtsegs): de mdzad pa// mthong nas ltar bcas 'jig rten the tsom 'tshal// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de gang lags rang byung gsungs// the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom bsal du gsol/ khyod kyi 'dzum mdzad rgyud
157b3(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur na// 'khor 'di thams cad ngo 'tshar thob par 'gyur/ byang chub mchog ni yongasu bsgrub slad// de dag lam mchog shin tu rnam dag 'gyur// the tsom 'tshal ba dag ni nam du/ 
157b4(dkon brtsegs): yang /  byang chub yid bzhin bde bar mi grub ste/ the tsom sa dam nyi bsal nas mkhas pa rnams// byang chub mchog dgi rgyu dang skal ldan 'gyur// rkang gnyis dbang po khyod kyi 'khor
157b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag tu sdig pa yongs spangs byang chub sems dang ldan// lha rnams lung bstan de dag thos gyur na// rgyal ba'i de 'phang rgya chen thob par 'gyur// de bas rgyal ba thugs rje che bskyed/ 
157b6(dkon brtsegs): cing ga the tsom 'tshal ba rnams la thugs rtse bas// lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing // 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad dga' bar mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan te
157b7(dkon brtsegs): rta thul la tshig su bcad slar bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni 'jig rten pan phyir 'dzum pa mdzad// rta thul khyod kyis zhu ba de zhus pa// lung bstan de ni khyod la ma lus par// bstan par ngas byas dad pas/ 
157b8(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang nyon// 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di rnams kyis// thams cad mkhyen par bdag cag lung bsten te// mu stegs tshogs kyi bsam pa zil mnan nas// 'khor 'dir seng ge'i nga ro chen/ 
158a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgrubs/ nam du zhu ngams la srung bsapa// dal com pa par mi 'gyur te// de lta chos med pa'i tshul bab sa// bdas cag cad ni skabs bcu 'gyur ba
158a2(dkon brtsegs): shes/ nyi ma nub gyur nam sros gyur pa'i tshe// mi rnams zla ba myur du 'char bar shes// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag/ bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// skar
158a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dbus na zla ba gnas pa ni// sems can mtshungs par 'di la the tsam med// de bzhin rtul ba'i sras po tshul thob dag/ bdag cag thams cad mkhyen tu 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar nyi ma nub pa
158a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i tshe// nyi ma mi mthong sems can de dag shes// de bzhi dan bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa// ye shes dam thob par 'gyur du shes// chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab
158a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing // rgya 'tshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes/ de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa/ byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar gnam du bong ba
158a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs pa ni// sa la ltung bar 'gyur du the tsom med// de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang // 'jig rten mkhas par myur 'gyur ye shes 'jug/ gang thos nas ni the tsom med 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas
158a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gnas par bdag shes la// rang gi sar nye lag stong ma yin par// mkhas pa rnams kyis chos nyid rab tu mthong // gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag/ sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur bar chad
158a8(dkon brtsegs): sA byas kyang // chos la mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthong ba// de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus// de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing // bdag gis bdag nyid lung bstan brjod byed pa// 
158b1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'dren pa chog tshul mkhyen pa/ mi dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzad// de ltar lha tshogs 'di dgra tshul 'di la// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog mngon shes shing // de bas bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang / 
158b2(dkon brtsegs): smra larnga 'jig rten mkhas pa rje su yi rang mdzad// rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gi rnams// bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa// de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur pa'i// 'phags pa'i skye'o// 
158b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas la bsten par bya// gang dag tshul la 'jug pa rab mthong zhing // mkhas pa gang dag bde gshegs bsnyen bkur ba// de dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal// tshul shes de dag rang gis
158b4(dkon brtsegs): rang 'byung 'gyur// gang gis bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyad/ 8 / sha khrag lpags la mi lta byas pa pas// gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na// de ni khyad 'phags dka' thub de
158b5(dkon brtsegs): lha minaH'das pa'i rang byung gang rnams byung ba dang // ma 'ongs sems can phan bzhed gang 'byung dang // da ltar dus na 'dren pa gang bzhugs pa// kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar
158b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa thob// rab 'phrul lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa// 'di dag nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing // 'dren pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas nas// tshul gyi su ni rang byung
158b7(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa// de yis rgyal ba rang 'byung gnas pa'i rnams// de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul po// tshul thob rnams kyis sngon
158b8(dkon brtsegs): bsten myur du thob// de la rta thul sangs rgyas sras rnams ni// sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med// sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnams rtse ba// tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam/ 
159a1(dkon brtsegs): la spyod// de ltar tshul la dang ba'i yid byas te// brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min// rtag tu dge ba shes mkhas pa bsten byas na// bla med byang chub myur du thob pa/ 
159a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsungs mchog zos nas ni// 'khor kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yid rangs te/ rje su yi rang the tshom med gyur nas// mthar phyin blo gros la ni zhugs par gyur/ 'brum
159a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// bam po bdun pa// de nas de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris kyi lha khrag khrig
159a4(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i da bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos denas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang
159a5(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga/ sol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gang smras pa de la bdag cag gis
159a6(dkon brtsegs): ni yang dag pa yang ma dmigs na de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa dmigs na ni mtha' yang des dmigs par 'gyur te/ 
159a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni gnyis kyis spyod pa'o// de lta bu de ni theg pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod yul ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gnyis su ma
159a8(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i chos rnams la chos rnams ni gnyi su medo zhes mi spyod ma mos na/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du semasu lags kyang de ni lam log par
159b1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par 'tshal bar brtsi'o// nga ci'i spyang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub tu ston pa de ni lam log par nugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyabar
159b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshargya bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das chos
159b3(dkon brtsegs): ni 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags/ 'dus byas ma lags/ 'dus ma byas ma lags/ dngos po ma lags/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags/ mngon
159b4(dkon brtsegs): par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yong su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon par bgyi ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das byang
159b5(dkon brtsegs): chub ces bgyi ba de yang chos gang gi gnyen po yang ma lag/ sa la/ chos gang yang chos de'i gnyen po ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ 
159b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byang ba ma lags te/ gang gis gzhan gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs la/ gang chos de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de gang yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs
159b7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongasu shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags
159b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ 
160a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa shes pam tha //  sa ma pa shes pa sa kyi gas pa sa su ma ma ma/ #
160a2(dkon brtsegs): ba nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags pa de yang 'gag pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang nga ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang
160a3(dkon brtsegs): skar byung ba dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas kyang 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// 'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das paltar dza tsam du phung pos bzung
160a4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ skye ba dang 'gag pas bzung ba'am/ 'das pas bzung ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pas bzung ba'am/ nga ltar byung bas bzung / da'am/ 'dus byas kyi bzung ba'am/ 'dus ma byas kyis 'azung
160a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs te/ de ltar ming mi// gas pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yong su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bskam/ 
160a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes
160a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar shes pa'i chos de ltar lung bstan nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// bcom ldan srid
160a8(dkon brtsegs): pa mthar phyin legs par gsungs// 'dren pas srid pa'i snying po ma brnyes na// skye bo mi mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis// 'khor ba'i pha rol bgrod phyir rab tu zhugs// phung po rnams ni kun du mi dmig
160b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ phung po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid// chos gang gang gi gnyen por 'gyur ba ni// mtshan mas stong ste gang yang ma mchis// nga ba nyid kyis stong phyir dngos po gang // yongs shes byang/ 
160b2(dkon brtsegs): spang bsgom mngon bya ba// gang yang ma mchis gang du'ang mi dmigs te// dngos po rnams ni dngos med rang byung gsung // byang chub gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnam
