160b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no// sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mas rtogs mi 'gyur// mi mkhas gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhen pa// de dag byang chub 'tshang
160b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyar sems bskyed kyang // mtshan mar spyod cing spyod yul lo/ dag pa ste// blo gros ngan pa byang chub lam mi spyod// mtshan/ dam sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la// spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas
160b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan la mkhas// mtshan ma de bzhin mtshan ma med spangs te// stong dang mi stong de bzhin dmigs med pa// mkhas pa de dag byang chub lam la spyod// de dag byang chub dam ba zhi pa 'thob// phas kyi rgol
160b6(dkon brtsegs): ba kun gyi spyod yul min// gnas de nyan thos rnams kyis 'grod bya min// rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste// rnam grol sems ldan zag med tha ba med// dgra bcom bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang // 
160b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rang rgyal skyobs par gyur pa dag/ mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la spyod yul med// go 'phang de ni mtshan ma spyod pa dang // nyi tshe'i stong pa nyid la bsgom pa dang // gang rnams stong pas stong zhes stong smra dang
160b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kun rang bzhin yod smras 'thob mi nus// sangs rgyas ma spang rnams kyi bslab pa la// slob dang rnam bral slob pa slob pa'i rnams// mkhas de rtogs pa med pas byang chub rtogs// ston pas
161a1(dkon brtsegs): don mangs la nas byu pa ga ngas ma ldas ngas kyu la N+Dal pa nga bsgru pasags pa/ gnas myed pa kyis thag khrig brgya cu pa mas pa'i
161a2(dkon brtsegs): thug su chung nas skye tho bal pa che de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// ri nas tshe dang ldan pa dathul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bca gsal pa/ gzhan 'phrul dpa
161a3(dkon brtsegs): byed lnga mi bsam mkhyen nas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis la dadum mdzad la/ thub pas 'dzum pa'i rgyuni ma gsungs na/ rgyal ba 'jam pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol/ 'dred pa d+ma med 'dzum
161a4(dkon brtsegs): tham sang cas// rgyal ba khrumachogangs pas de sa gsu/ 'jig rten don nga 'jas pa mdzad pa / 'asabaka' sum ma tsam pas sadrugs pa/ drang chung chen pa
161a5(dkon brtsegs): nas 'a pa/  sa rgyan 'phang mas la las/ ko la pa dzin pas pa/ sa ta nga 'dus rung bldananas/ dza 'tshar pa dru
161a6(dkon brtsegs): grags te/ mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis pas sbyar spong // 'ab 'dusangs pa'i sems ldan ma chom 'tshal// dang yang grags mang mam nyi bas ladurnam pa// deg shegs parnyan mamatsham
161a7(dkon brtsegs): mchos te/ byi nang nga bskyed rim gror cher babyeng / khatshams 'chal sems na gror 'gyur bar/ rgyal bas sme bar mchos legs pa bum// bde ga shegs pastan la 'di ga 'a sadas kyi
161b1(dkon brtsegs): gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa/ lam de nas ni the tshom ma mchi mchi// de bas skye bo'i the tshom bcad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka'
161b2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa// skye bo tshogs chen don dbang brten byas nas// tshig su bcad de dusu gang smras shing // 'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni yongs zhus pa// khyod kyi tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin// rta thul dri ba de yi don dris pas/ 
161b3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo tshogs chen 'di yi don byas gyur// khyod kyis de dris skye bo tshogs chen don// byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen te// rta thul 'dzum pa 'di ni
161b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas bstan to// 'jig rten mkhyen pas bstan pa'i lam de nas// dadon du gnyer ba 'di dag de bzhin 'dong // gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par// smig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong / 
161b5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te// de dag rjes byang chuba'adod pas bslab// mtshan ma'i 'du shes spang phyir mi na mas gang // rtag tu mtshan ma mngon dga' 'jig 'gyur zhing // 
161b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dong // mtshan ma med pas byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// med pa'i rtog ldan mtshan mar rnam brtags nas// ji ltar brtags pa de ltar 'acing ba yin// mtshan ma
161b7(dkon brtsegs): stong par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi// zhi ba dag ni grags ldan dam pa 'thob// 'du shes mtshan can mi mnyam sems rgyud kyis// sdig pa brgya dag mi mkhas de dag byed// 'gro ba kun du sdug bsngal mi
161b8(dkon brtsegs): chung myong // de ltar mi mkhas mtshan mar brtag pa byas// mtshan mar 'du shes pa ni phung po dang // sangs rgyas byang chub byang chub sems dpa' mthong // de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na// byang chub
162a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob// 'du shes mtshan ma can la nyon mongs 'phel// mtshan ma med pa kun du sbyor ba spong // mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de// kun tu sbyor ba de nyid mtshan med
162a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ gang rnams byang chub 'thob par bya rtog pa// rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas par chad yin// mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnam pa thob byed na// longs spyod de nyid mtshan ma med par 'gyur// chos rnams gang yang rang
162a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid kyis med// rnam par rtogs pas chos 'byung kun kyang stong // rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur// de nyid byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra// rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos gyur nas// / 
162a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tshom bsal// dper na tsam pa'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ltar// mkhas rnams thub pas gsungs la legs shes 'dzin// 'jigs pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis// 
162a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing // rgyal ba'i spyod yu/ la chos kyang rab shes nas// 'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa ku/ na mkhyen 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u
162a6(dkon brtsegs): ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba phrag drug cus lha ma yin rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim
162a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / bsam pa yongasu dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i
162a8(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyes shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la ni snang ba thob ste/ chos zab mo la bzod pa thob par gyur nas de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa yang ma yin ma byas
162b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de bzhin du skyes pa yang ma yin ma skyes pa yang ma yin/ byung ba yang ma yin ma byung ba yang ma yin/ grub pa yang ma yin ma grub pa yang ma
162b2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ 'gags pa yang ma yin ma 'gags pa yang ma yin/ gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin rnam par byang ba yang ma yin/ rjes su
162b3(dkon brtsegs): chags pa yang ma yin/ khong khro ba yang ma yin/ rmongs pa yang ma yin ma rmongs pa yang ma yin/ shes pa po yang ma yin shes pa po med pa yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin mthong
162b4(dkon brtsegs): ba po med pa yang ma yin/ tshor ba po yang ma yin/ tshor ba po// med pa yang ma yin/ ston pa po yang ma yin ston pa da po med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma
162b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin/ dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmig/ sa pa yang ma yin/ 'gro ba yang ma yin 'ong ba yang ma yin// 
162b6(dkon brtsegs): song ba yang ma yin ma song ba yang ma yin/ stong pa yang ma yin mi stong pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa yang ma yin mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin/ smon pa yod pa yang ma yin smon pa
162b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de dag de ltar chos thams cad la yang mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming la mi gnas/ tha snyad la yang mi gnas/ brjod pa la yang mi
162b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so
163a1(dkon brtsegs): sa'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bar skye ba'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin// 
163a2(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bo'i ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes/ 
163a3(dkon brtsegs): can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang
163a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du
163a5(dkon brtsegs): shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma/ yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub se// mas dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin
163a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin
163a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin// sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 
163a8(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin// 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/ de ltar thams
163b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can na mkha' bzhin du dag cing gos pa med par gyur nas/ de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe de dag zhi bas bcom ldan
163b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// zhi la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon// zhi ba bsten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjesu ston
163b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chubazhi la dri bral 'khrug ma mchis// khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyes// zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang
163b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag bsten// yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klong rnams zhi mdza dad 'gro ba thams cad bton// sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god// de ston sangs rgyas
163b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng zhes gsung // 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab/ pa bsten// gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub
163b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhal yas 'thob// bslabs nas zhi zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dong dbang po zhi ba dag/ 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro bzhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro bzhi bgyi
163b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis// 'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa// de dag 'dren pa tshul la mchod pa'i mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur// nyon mongs zhi zhing mtshan ma kun
163b8(dkon brtsegs): spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das// thub pa gang dag zhi las zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs gyur// rgyal ba khyod kyi byang
164a1(dkon brtsegs): chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la bdag cag ngogs ma mchis// gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshol de la zhi bar
164a2(dkon brtsegs): rtogasate/ phung pos 'jigs pa de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags// dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi tshol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste// chos kyi mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa/ 
164a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes ni ston pas gsungs// thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba 'di dag rab tu gsungs// thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam par kun du mtshan mi rnyed// de dag shAkya thub
164a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bstan pa mdzes phyed gang dag mtshan med dga'// de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob da par 'gyur// bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba
164a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa thob// rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa// chags med thug sa mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur
164a6(dkon brtsegs): pas des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa// zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pa mchod pa'i rang 'byung sdig med shog/ de nas mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs
164a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas/ bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// mi dbang khyod
164a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos rnams thams cad ni// log pa rmongs byed chang bstong 'dra zhing // ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'khrul 'dra bar mkhyen// rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen// ji ltar mi
164b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas// kha zas rob rgya zos kyang ma 'grangs pa// de la bkres med zas med sems can med// rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs/ ma man ma tsamasas
164b2(dkon brtsegs): da gan sum kya ba gas sa med pan sa ma bya / de ga sud kyi ma mas sa gags ni sun dang med na de/ ma de byed de/ tha gyu sa sa pa men na ba cad pa chom yongs mi mnga'// mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smran/ 
164b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med// tshig nyid med cing dga' 'gyur dngos med kyang // de mkhyen de la the tshom yong mi mnga'// pi wang sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te// sgra de rang bzhin gang yang
164b4(dkon brtsegs): yod pa min// de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na// phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'// nor bu rin che dan rang bzhin gsal dag pa// gos kyi drung gzhag sna tshogs
164b5(dkon brtsegs): tshon du 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang // log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar 'gyur// tsan dan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang // rkyen dang sbyar na dri
164b6(dkon brtsegs): zhim gzhan du 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang // so so rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin// ji ltar mi yi dung gi sgra thos te// sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtag
164b7(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang / rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos po de mi dmigs// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i kha zas la// yan lag srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags
164b8(dkon brtsegs): na/ dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te// drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig na mkha'i 'ja' mthong na// yan lag gzhigs brtags rang bzhin med cing
165a1(dkon brtsegs): stong // na mkha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod kyis yan lag stong // drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na// grong
165a2(dkon brtsegs): khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming ma dmigs// grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bu dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis na// 
165a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba skyed kyang sgra yi rang bzhin stong // ji ltar sgra bzhin te ltar yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rjed de brdus pa'i tshe// sgra ni phyogs
165a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gro 'byung ba med// phyogasu de bzhin 'gags par mi 'gyur te// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs // skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe// thogs pa med
165a5(dkon brtsegs): cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te// khyod kyi yan lag rnga sgra de dang 'dra// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigaso// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de
165a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dga' byar rtog pa med// ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe// g.yo ba med cing
165a7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i dngos kyang med// ji ltar rnga bzhin khyod kyis yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de yan lag ma byung rang
165a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang min// ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang mi mjed kyi bdag po
165b1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud cing zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bstod pa des de ltar bstod pas/ 'khor de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gzigs nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
165b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong nas// lhar bcas mi bcas klu dang gnod sbyin
165b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro ba the tshom 'tshal// bde gshegs zhal bzang de la blta zhing thos par dga' ste sdod// rgyal po 'dzum
165b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad legs par bka' stsol the tsom dgum du gsol/ rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dren phra rnams// rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad
165b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong na// bde gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum/ mdzad the tshom rgyu de gsungs// rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad// rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di tha
165b6(dkon brtsegs): tshom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems// bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog the tshom gcod pa nyan 'tshal na// rnam 'a dran thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de de dag rnams la gsungs/ 
165b7(dkon brtsegs): thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tshom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog med sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dra la
165b8(dkon brtsegs): blta/ 'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i gsung bsgrags gsol// de thos 'khor rnams the tshom chad cing chos la gnas par 'gyur// khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog
166a1(dkon brtsegs): don ldan 'jig rten 'das rig nas// skye bo dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pas tshim// de dag dogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen
166a2(dkon brtsegs): du bsgrub// brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dus pa stobs ldan rtsom par bgyid// de lta lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan mdzad gsung bsgrags gsol// rkang gnyis dam pa'i
166a3(dkon brtsegs): gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nas de yis ni// dge ba thob pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar// stobs bcu mnga' ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa legs par dgongs/ 
166a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul nga yis phan ched 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa// rtse gcig yid
166a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis snyan cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byos// de thos 'gro ba yon tan bsags pa myur du 'jig/ rten don byed pa// phan dang ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas
166a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus rtsom// tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di dag dga' zhing chos rnams la ni the tshom med// bskal pa khrag khrig gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du dge ba legs par spyod// kun du rnam
166a7(dkon brtsegs): par dag la ma chags yid gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste// de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sems ma bskyed// 'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag
166a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhal yas pa// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed na rdul bsal thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas// de dag phyi nas bde bar gshegs pa tshe ldan sangs rgyas 'dren che ba// srid pa sel cing 'gro ba stod/ 
166b1(dkon brtsegs): par ston pa'i bcom ldan 'dasu 'gyur// skyob pa de dag ji ltar spyod pa sku tshe'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur// bde gshegs mtha' yas grags ldan 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur/ 
166b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhing ni zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal yas te// 'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du mar ni// sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsungs kyang / 
166b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag bkod pa zad mi nus// de tshe de dag ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar mthun par 'gyur// g.yo ba med cing sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur// de dag
166b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing mchog rnamasu skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam ma sbya dngas pa'i// sems can cig kyang mi 'byung srid pa de dal phal cher mya ngan 'da'// de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag
166b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gcig shes te// mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsnga la rab tu 'jigs pa sems can yid 'byung ba'o// de na 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yod/ 
166b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad blo mthun 'gyur zhing bslob pa'i lam la myur bar 'gyur// de na mi rnams dag gi sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur// mi sdug mi rtag nyid dang sdug
166b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang // zhi ba stong nying mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub zhi// sgra skad de dag yang dang yang byung de dag rna la gnas par 'gyur// sgra gang thos nas de dag
166b8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang gang na'ang yod mi 'gyur// bla gab med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang rnams
167a1(dkon brtsegs): na med// de tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung // de tshe 'dren pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang
167a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyi rnar ni dge ba'i sgra grag 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror 'gyur// de tshe zhing mchog stong pa thams
167a3(dkon brtsegs): cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub brtson byas nas// drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di bsags te// zhing mchog de ni/ 
167a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur// tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya cher zhi ba 'gro bas mthong gyur na// ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs
167a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshogs kyis bsten gyur pa// de la bslabs nas 'gro thams cad thogs pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur// de dgargyal ba thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ste// de lta
167a6(dkon brtsegs): bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa bsten par gyis// tshangs pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis lha ma
167a7(dkon brtsegs): yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs
167a8(dkon brtsegs): te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
167b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslabs pas chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i tingange 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ nges
167b2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtog par gyid // de rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs
167b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa'i spobs pa dang / 
167b4(dkon brtsegs): zab pa'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi stob sra pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i
167b5(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi// tshul la 'jug pa'i slad rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa
167b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yid la mi bgyid de/ de 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med de/ rnam par rtog pa yongasasu chad pa'o// gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni thams cad du song ba ste chos gang yang rnam
167b7(dkon brtsegs): par rtog par nus pa ma mchiso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad la rnam
167b8(dkon brtsegs): par rtog par a la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob cing / de dag a'i sgo la zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par gyur te/ a zhes bgyi ba ni mtha' yas pa kun du mtha' yas pa
168a1(dkon brtsegs): ma bgyis pa/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa/ yongasu ma grub pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba/ 'dus pa ma mchis pa/ 'phro ba ma mchis pa/ 
168a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ yong su thub pa ma mchis pa/ ma brtags pa/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ bltar ma mchis pa/ 
168a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong ba/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma smos pa/ ma bstan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ 'ongs pa ma
168a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa/ nye ba ma lags pa/ ring ba ma lags pa/ ma ba da tags pa/ gdags pa ma mchis pa'i chos can/ ming dam mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ mnyen po ma mchis
168a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa/ 'pho ba ma mchis pa/ 'khrug pa ma mchis pa/ rtag tu ma mchis pa/ mi zad pa/ gnyi su ma mchis pa/ ma byung ba/ brdzun pa ma lags pa/ 
168a6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa ma lags pa/ sho ba ma lags pa/ ma skyes pa ma lags pa/ sbyangs pa ma lags pa/ sbyang bar 'os pa ma lags pa gdag su ma mchis pa/ mtshan mas ma bskyod pa
168a7(dkon brtsegs): ma bzung ba/ ma bor ba/ 'dzin pa ma mchis pa'i yongasu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ gtan du ma mchis pa/ yongasu gtan du ma mchis pa/ ma btang ba/ yongasu ma btang ba ste/ a zhes bgyi/ 
168a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ni sus kyang ma bgyis pa/ chos gang gi byed pa po yang ma lag so// a ni ma skyes pa ste chos gang yang skye bar bgyid pa ma lagaso// a ni ma skyes pa ste chos gang gi skye ba'i rgyur
168b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'ang ma lag so// a ni ma 'gags pa ste chos gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lagaso// a ni ma 'gags pa yang ma lags te/ chos gang gis mi 'gag pa'i
168b2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen du 'gyur ba ma lag so// a ni gnas pa yang ma lags/ mi gnas pa yang ma lags/ a ni btags pa yang ma lags/ mi btags pa yang ma lags/ a ni spang ba yang ma lags
168b3(dkon brtsegs): ma spangs pa yang ma lags/ a ni shes pa yang ma lags ma shes pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmigs pa yang ma lags mi dmigs pa yang ma lags/ a ni stong pa yang ma lags mi stong/ 
168b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmig su mchis pa yang ma lags da dmigasu ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni mtshan ma yang ma lags mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni smon
168b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma lags smon pa ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/ ma ldan 'das de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid/ ni a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni tshul gcig pa ste/ 
168b6(dkon brtsegs): a'i tshulo// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba gcig pa ste a'i 'gro ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jug pa gcig pa ste a la 'jug pa'o// chos thams cad ni gdags pa gcig pa ste as gdags
168b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// chos thams cad ni tha snyad gcig pa ste a'i tha snyad // chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig pa ste as brjod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rtogs par bgyi ba
168b8(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi/ chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtog/ 
169a1(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi'o// chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'du ma bgyis pa de
169a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyis te/ de ni chos thams cad kyi tshu lo// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag gi tha snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhe na/ 'di lta ste dpe
169a3(dkon brtsegs): na/ rmi lam na bya ba sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba ni ma skyes pa ma byung ba dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ 
169a4(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang de dag la gdags par gsung so// de bzhin du cho sa thams cad kyi byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na brag cha la tha snyad mchis pa
169a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o// / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes/ khu la gdags ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi
169a6(dkon brtsegs): gdags par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na smog rgyu la chab tu gdags pa'i tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
169a7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la bud med kyi gzugs sam skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa
169a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du rmi lam gyi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi yi/ rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du mig yor dang
169b1(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu dang brag cha'i bya ba dag kyang tha snyad du bgyi sde brag cha la bya ba ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
169b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin to// de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ 
169b3(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul cig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs// thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhi no// de la 'jig rten blo med
169b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khong mi chung // bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong // sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du shes
169b5(dkon brtsegs): can tabyis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid// de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mim mkha sa gnas min dngos la brtan kyang 'chal// de bzhin byis
169b6(dkon brtsegs): skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yod ma 'tshal// 'khor bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das// gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug bsngal myong ba de la dngos
169b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor pa la// nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjesu 'gro zhing 'brang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti
169b8(dkon brtsegs): mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjesu 'brang // blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sdug bsngal ba// de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa
170a1(dkon brtsegs): khur yang khyer// de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar par bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos na// skyes bu ngan pa blo zhan de dag bstan dag bde ba nyid kyis 'dzegs// bde gshes
170a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis a'i yi ge tshul chen sgo cig de ltar bstan// de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing // bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi pa mngon 'tshang
170a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya ta yan lag brgyad pa'i grur bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol// bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des// myur du nyon mongs dug bsal
170a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dpag yas zhi ba thob gyur cig/ grol nas du dag med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas// pha rol myur phyin dug med bde zhing gdug pa
170a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'joms par mdzad// bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtogs rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog/ 'gro ba kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul
170a6(dkon brtsegs): min bslabs pa dag/ grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos// de yi tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur// 'ching dang bcings pa med/ 
170a7(dkon brtsegs): cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med// de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi mi dga' nyon mi mongs// nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams
170a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang med/ gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur// grol zhing 'grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'// bcom ldan lhar/ 
170b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul pa ste// kun rtogs bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal den sna tshogs kyis
170b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed sems kyis sems kyang ni// las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong gang gyur de yang med// bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal// des ni de ltar
170b3(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing nges pa ste// dge ba'i blo mnga' dag gtsang dri med chos kyi rab tu mchod par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso bo bstod pas
170b4(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams gang byung ba// ji snyed dpal stug rkang gnyis ga tso bo rnam smin yongasu mkhyen gyur pa'i// bdag cag dge rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog/ bsod
170b5(dkon brtsegs): nams 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyilha/ de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa yong su dag pa ngang tshul gyi rjesu 'gro/ 
170b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugasu chud la/ 'khor ro dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom
170b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa// bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad
170b8(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mdzad na// rgyal ba dpal sngags rga gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol// 'jig rten 'das khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs// 
171a1(dkon brtsegs): gtso bo de thos 'gro ba 'di dag yid ni rab tu dang gyur zhing // rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzha yA bgyid par 'gyur// des ni lha mir bcas
171a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di las sgrol bar 'gyur// drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag
171a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos na// 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur// the tshom bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs
171a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed cing // bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyi / nga khyod dang mthun 'byung srasu 'gyur// 'khor rnams 'a di dag brten pa gzhan ma mchis par khyod kyi zhal du blta// / 
171a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung ba/ stan bka' stsal gsol// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di/ dag khyod kyi zham ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal// gsung
171a6(dkon brtsegs): rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char po ba gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ring du song ba'i ma la bu blta bzhin du khyod kyi
171a7(dkon brtsegs): zhal du blta// bde gshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsol bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol// skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur// thub pa de
171a8(dkon brtsegs): ring su zhig dge ba 'phel cing grags pa don du gnyer// su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de nyan 'tshal// rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos shing
171b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gyur nas// tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang bsgom par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcad de slar bka'
171b2(dkon brtsegs): su la pa/ rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin du legs// bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing // spobs pa che 'byung / 
171b3(dkon brtsegs): de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa// de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis// 'od gsal ba'i lha rnams blo dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste// 
171b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon med yid can dag mthong nas byang chub ya nga dag zhugs// byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad pa spyod// byang chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston/ 
171b5(dkon brtsegs): med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur// tshul gyi dam/ pa shin du gsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di thos nas// sa/ ngas rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi
171b6(dkon brtsegs): thob 'gyur// de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul min mkhas shing byang chub yid nges gyur// bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag smon lam btab// 'od gsal lha rnams
171b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te// bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas nas// sems can skar ma'i grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga'
171b8(dkon brtsegs): byas te// de yi 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang 'byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya bgrangs par// yangs shing shin tu
172a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste// kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung // bde bar gshegs rnams thug/ 
172a2(dkon brtsegs): brtses sems can thams cad rang byung mdzad par 'gyur// zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te// sems can thams cad rang 'byung nyid du mngon phyog
172a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrogs pa med par 'gyur// de na rang byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi// sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya grangs gang+gA'i bye snyed 'gyur// rta thul
172a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas dpa bas// gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na// bsod nams de la snga
172a5(dkon brtsegs): mas grangs sam dper kyang bya bar mi nuso// de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis// rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung
172a6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnyed sla min// de ni u dum pa ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mangs gsungs// de phyir bla na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis// shin tu blo phra bstan bzang
172a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la brten par bya// de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsungs dag de 'dra thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad yid rangs mchog tu dga' zhing
172a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag dga' bar 'gyur// khrag khrig lha rnams na mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g.yab mo 'dor bar byed// dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshalo zhes sgra yang phyung // zhib
172b1(dkon brtsegs): thugs ni skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzod// bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyug tu gsol// khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye dgu'i dug med 'gyu
172b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing dgra mod 'gyur// sdug bsngal rnams kyi 'dren las tshul thos mi zad srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol// 'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// bam pa
172b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa// de nas dge rgyas kyi ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas
172b4(dkon brtsegs): tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag tshul phun sum tsho// gas par gyur pa yang brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das la
172b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos tham sa cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin ma chis te/ ting 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
172b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi
172b7(dkon brtsegs): myong ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyid kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / 
172b8(dkon brtsegs): lag pa bcad dam/ rkang pa bcang ngam/ rkang lag bcang dam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ rna ba dang / sna gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / spa lcag gis bzhus sam/ 
173a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhug byed rtsal lam/ lcagags bzhus kyang ba ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / brtson ra bcug gas/ lpags smras dang / shing ga
173a2(dkon brtsegs): bcug gam/ gatshan tshangs pa la rgyas btaba'am/ byis pa'i gtsug pung ltar bcings sam/ drugs kyi snod ltar gdugs sam/ bu ram shing brdung bltar brdungs sam/ 'ang ma
173a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa ltar bcom 'am/ 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam/ mang gyi mar me dang / zho skol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i nang
173a4(dkon brtsegs): du bor ram/ seng ge'i khar bstabs sam/ sngags/ khar bstabs sam/ skam ril bya ba ltar dril tam/ byi bo nga'i chang pa lta bus bcad dam/ nyes pa byung ba bsgrags pa
173a5(dkon brtsegs): mAr bsgrags sam/ kar sha pa ni tsam du btubs pa/ ma/ 'bras phye bco ba ltar bcos sam/ glang po marnam sa kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par
173a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang / mig zung ngam// gsal shing gi rtse mo la gnag gam/ bsad pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bangade ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ 
173a7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba yang ma lags mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring
173a8(dkon brtsegs): po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang gis bdag la skom blung ba de dag dang / gang
173b1(dkon brtsegs): gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang yang bdag la
173b2(dkon brtsegs): gshe ba dang / mi bde bar byed pa dang / brdeg pa dang / mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du srog gcad pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing bla na
173b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ de yid la bya ba de dag dang ldan zhing de lta bu'i las dang de lta bu'i smon
173b4(dkon brtsegs): lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi rje su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la brten cing bsnyen la bsgom zhi dang mang du byed de/ de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos
173b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu/ thob po// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams/ cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa/ 
173b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa
173b7(dkon brtsegs): la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o// de 'tshal na tshe brjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de 'tshal na
173b8(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa grangs ma mchis par gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub
174a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongasu 'dzin pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu gsal ba dang / 'gro ba drug po kun du skyes
174a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bslabs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang / bdud
174a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi las las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la nges
174a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de nas dge rgyas ris kyi// lha rnams kyi ting 'dzin 'di brjod nas/ de'i tshe tshig su
174a5(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la ma thar thug gyur pa ste// ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba
174a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen la mgo bos skyabasu mchi// de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas don mkhyen 'khor ba brgal gyur pa// thub pa mi yi 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa
174a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren la bstod// 'di na rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen// yan lag
174a8(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs sgra brnyan ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa'i drang srong khyod kyis lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs// 'di ni sems can srog dang / 
174b1(dkon brtsegs): shed bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis te// mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshig cing stong par rnam gzhag la// rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhan
174b2(dkon brtsegs): yas bsgom pa'ang mdzad// rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'// byams pa dge bsgom sems can dmigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas
174b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal la/ sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen// de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tshom bral thugs ldan// des ni bde gshegs/ 
174b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod par 'tshal// bde bar gsheg/ rnas pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun du mi dmi dgas kyang // lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la
174b5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje bgyi bar gsungs// de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgya la ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun du 'tshal// des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'a
174b6(dkon brtsegs): thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsal bgyi sdug bsngal ma gzigs la// dgyes pa skyes nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bsal// de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bas
174b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal// des na mi mchog khyod la mchod nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi// skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun du sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das ma dmigs
174b8(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed// sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas
175a1(dkon brtsegs): thub pa mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal// 'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyi su med par bstan// gang zhig der rdul ma gzigs gang
175a2(dkon brtsegs): yang tshad med gnas pa re ma gzigs// thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs pag yod mi yang ma gzigs te// sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod par bgyis/ 
175a3(dkon brtsegs): thub pa sku ni rnam par spangs pas sku btsal mdzad na ma brnyes kyang // de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma gsungs ma lags bsnyel ba yong mi mnga'// bde bar gshegs pas lus la song ba'i bsgom pa bsgom
175a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa mchod pa bgyis// 'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma gyur la// tshor ba tsher
175a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongasu btsal na ma brnyes te// de lta/ ra gang zhig dran bsgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yod ma/ gzigs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas ston pa la ni bdag
175a6(dkon brtsegs): cag mchod pa bgyis// thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma rnyed pa// gang gi nye bar gzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab mkhyen kyang // thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems
175a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs// bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas ni ston la mchod par bgyis// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma
175a8(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// bsgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'din rang bzhin ma mchis la// thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul bani
175b1(dkon brtsegs): po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la mchod pa bgyis// gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum 'am bzhi lta ga la mchis// gang gi gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang
175b2(dkon brtsegs): na'ang ma mchis te// de bas gang gi bde ba 'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang de mchis// ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas nges na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// ston pa'i tshul
175b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang dag 'dzin bgyis na// 'di dag thar pa nyid kyi lam ste 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma grol byang chub 'dren/ 
175b4(dkon brtsegs): pa min/ bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshig des na khyod la mchod par 'tshal// thar mdzad slad du bcom da ldan 'das kyis lam zhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gsungs// 'di dag/ 
175b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ 8// yang dag tu na rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang dang bsgom pa mi dmigs te// chang par mi 'gyur bya ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang
175b6(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs la// thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gang na'ang ma mchis te// de dag de na nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis 'gyur// 'di na mchod pa bzang po mchog
175b7(dkon brtsegs): ces mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// de nas bde gshegs dpe med spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thar par mdzad slad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang
175b8(dkon brtsegs): po lnga yang gsungs// rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di bsgoms shes bstan// thub pa dbang po dang ni bsgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te// 'di la lha 'khor gyi
176a1(dkon brtsegs): chom ma mchis de slang khyod la mchod par 'tshal// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lngapo// de dag nyon mongs par bgyid bar par/ 
176a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid ces ston pa thub pas gsungs// de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te// thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang thetsom mchis de slang khyod la mchod// byang chub yan la/ 
176a3(dkon brtsegs): bdun po 'di dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsung // 'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings pa'ang ma
176a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis te// sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tsom ma mchis khyod la mchod// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis zhi phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bstan// brtson 'grus
176a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'phags lam sdug bsngal mtha' mar 'byin pa da sgoms shes gsungs// mi mchog lam dang de bzhin to/ na mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te// 'di la lha tshogs
176a6(dkon brtsegs): the tshom ma mchis gyur pas mchod 'os khyod la mchod// 'dod chags gnyen por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs// gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog
176a7(dkon brtsegs): gis sems can rnams la bstan// 'di dag thams cad g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag min nyon mongs min// 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson// sdug
176a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang bsgoms shes gsungs// bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas bri de dag zhi// thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma
176b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad stong pa ste// 'di la lnga tshogs gang du'ang the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod// stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu yi las lam bstan mdzad de// gsod dang 'phrin
176b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ma byin phra ma brdzun dang zhe gcod kyal tshig dang // gnod sems dang ni ma rig 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams// mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnam
176b3(dkon brtsegs): la bstan/ sems can mi dmigs gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra// gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste// bde gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams
176b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong // rnam 'dren the tshom som nyi ma mchis de slang khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig spyod pa 'di bston pa// mkhas
176b5(dkon brtsegs): pa kun du dge ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar yong mi 'gyur ra// bcom ldan bde gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis// 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma
176b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// de ltar dge rgyas kyis lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi
176b7(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams cad mi zer bar 'khod pa yang mkhyen// de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa yang thugasu chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das
176b8(dkon brtsegs): la tshig su bcad de gsol pa// skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil mnan nas// bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum pa mdzad 'di 'jig rten bstan
177a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ma mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu don gnyer mig med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal ga
177a2(dkon brtsegs): ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod// dpal sdug khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan pa 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas// sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug
177a3(dkon brtsegs): thos nas yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te// chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur// bde gshegs mi mchog dge ba'i thugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed
177a4(dkon brtsegs): de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi ba rtogs shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis// su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal rab 'dren pa dpag tu med 'gyur ba// de dag bka' stsol drang
177a5(dkon brtsegs): srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas tshim par// mdzod// rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa deng su btsun la dad pa skyes// bdud kyis mi 'phrogs blo ldan
177a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig chos la yang dag yongasu gnas// sangs rgyas sras po tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges pa thob par 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro 'di the tshom ma mchis mdzod
177a7(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dang bskyed skye dgu rnams la byams gyur cing // byang chub mthar phyin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas// gang la 'dzum pa deng bstan bde
177a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de gang lags// bsod nams rgyal ba'i mtshan mnga' de dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tshom khum// 'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan legs par
177b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsol thos gyur na// bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren// de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur
177b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// nga yi 'jig rten
177b3(dkon brtsegs): don byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing // skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don byas pa// khyod kyi bsod nams 'phel ba brjod du med de ni zad mi 'gyur/ 
177b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni khyod la bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' da bas nyon// dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag nga yi chos nyi dad la ni the tshom med// kun kyang yid rangs rab zhi yid kyis
177b5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs bcang dag gis nga la bsngags// sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong grangs mchod 'os mchod byas te// the tshom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun du som nyi
177b6(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur// de ltar sngon gyi rgyu des 'dir yang tshig su bcad pas nga la bstod// bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag bstod par 'gyur// 'di dag bskal pa
177b7(dkon brtsegs): ut+pal la rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu chen 'gyur// 'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongasu mya ngan 'da' bar byed// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gar 'gyur/ 
177b8(dkon brtsegs): de yang bstan gyis dang ba'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spangs te nyon// rgyal ba de kun chos kyi tog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa gzhal yas 'gyur// 'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam
178a1(dkon brtsegs): las mya ngan tho bar 'gyur// des chen bde gshegs kun gyi ring srel shin du rgyas 'gyur te// de tshe shid rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me rtag tu
178a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// thub pa grags chen de dag yongasu mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na// thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas pas don chen 'gyur// sems can khrag khrig bsam mas
178a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis de tshe ring bsrel mchod byas te// ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi pa 'chi med 'thob// thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te/ 
178a4(dkon brtsegs): slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'du// ji ltar bye ba brgya grangs nga la legs par spyad pa byas nas su// byams pa blta phyir rgya chen yid kyis byas
178a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor du 'dong gyur pa// de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob/ tshigs de dag rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du// rkang gnyis/ gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa bya phyir 'dong // bde
178a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa des thos shing // dge rgyas ris kyi lha yi bdag nyid chen po de tshe thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste bal
178a7(dkon brtsegs): cher byang chub sems kyang bskyed// bdag nyid chen po de tshe shes nas thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos rab tu btugs// dge rgyas ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// 
178a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag brgyang cus lha ma yin rnams nas dge rgyas kyi lha'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs
178b1(dkon brtsegs): te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshul gcig la bzhugs pa dang / chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing tshul la 'jug pa
178b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang / mi chod pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / nye ba'i spobs pa
178b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dag kyang 'byung ba shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
178b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba skyes te chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te de la
178b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 'a chen po spobs pa thob cing mi chod pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / dmigs pa dang snyoms par
178b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de la dmigs pa gang yang gzungs lags par ma 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang
178b7(dkon brtsegs): sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur// khams la 'jug pa dang / skye mched la 'jug pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par
178b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can la 'jug pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dngos po la 'jug pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa la
179a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / bdag la 'jug pa dang / stong pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis
179a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / gnas la 'jug pa dang / gnas ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma
179a3(dkon brtsegs): byas la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang
179a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ni yongasu ma grub pa'o zhes gzungs rab tu thob po// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs ni gang yang yongasu grub pa ma mchis te/ sa ni sar
179a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu ma grub/ de bzhin du chu dang me dang rlung ni rlung du yod/ su ma grub po// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sa ni rang bzhin ma/ mchis pa ste/ chos gang yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de na
179a6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu ma grub pa'o// chu dang me dang rlung ni ma mchis te/ chos gang la yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongasu ma grub pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa zhes gdags
179a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bgyi/ ma 'ongs pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugasu ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad
179a8(dkon brtsegs): du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags de ni gdags ma mchis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
179b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang da ltar byung ba'i gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig du bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal te/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dmigs su ma mchis na
179b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das par lta ga la 'gyur/ ma 'ongs par lta ga la 'gyur/ da ltar byung bar yang ga la 'gyur te/ de bas na gzugs kyi phung po ni dmigasu ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
179b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du phung po rnams ni dmig su ma mchi so// phung po dmigs su ma mchis pas/ gzugs dmigasu ma mchis te/ 
179b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug par 'gyuraro// / gzungs de yang ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda/  tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / bdags pa
179b5(dkon brtsegs): tsam ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug par mi dmigs te/ 'di la phung po yang mi dmigs gzungs kyang mi dmig sa/ 'jug par yang mi dmigs/ gzungs kyang rang bzhin gyis
179b6(dkon brtsegs): mi dmig so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis pa'i chos te/ chos gang yang ma bgyis pa de la/ spungs pa yang ga la mchis te/ phung po ni spangs pa'i slad du phung
179b7(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bgyi'o// dper na khyim dang / khang bzangs dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung khol ma dang / bgam dang / dra ba dang / stegs bu dang / kha khyer dang / skar khung
179b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / blta ba dang / ra ba dang / shing btags dang / 'obs dang / chos mang po bsogs pa la grong khyer zhes bgyi ba bzhin du phung po zhes bgyi ba'ang de bzhin te/ gzugs de yang ngo bo nyid
180a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi dmigs na/ de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis/ spungs pa ma mchis pa na/ gzugs kyang ma mchis gzugs kyi phung po yang ma mchiso// de bzhin du tshor ba
180a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis dmig su ma mchis na/ de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis te/ spungs pa ma mchis pa'i sla du rnam par shes pa yang ma
180a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang ma mchi so// de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// de la skye mched la 'jug
180a4(dkon brtsegs): pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni mig gi skye mched ces dbagyi ba ni ci'i skye mched ces bgyi na sdug bsngal gyi skye dmachedado// de la mig gang zhe na/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/ 
180a5(dkon brtsegs): sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang pa'o// de las sa'i khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gis rang bzhin mi dmigs
180a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang ba dang / me'i khams dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa
180a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongasu ma grub pa'i mig gi skye mched de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma las/ 
180a8(dkon brtsegs): so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi skye mched ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis
180b1(dkon brtsegs): bste gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni gang gsum mchis pa'o// de ltar na mig kyang ma skyes ma 'gags skye mched dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gags
180b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni ming tsam dang tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par gang gsu ma mchis pa ste/ ming de yang ming gis ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
180b3(dkon brtsegs): chos gang mig ce'am/ skye mched ce 'am/ sdug bsngal nas gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmigasu ma mchis te/ ming yang ming du brjod du ma mchis so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / 
180b4(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thog gzungs la 'jug pas
180b5(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa thob po// de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs thob pa ni mig ni mig gis ma mchis pa/ khams ni/ khams kyis ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ mig ni mig gi
180b6(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin dang bral ba/ khams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i sla du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongasu
180b7(dkon brtsegs): ma grub pa'o// gang yongasu ma grub pa de ni skye ba ma mchiso// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gags pa ma mchi so// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / 
180b8(dkon brtsegs): brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par 'das pa zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// ming de
181a1(dkon brtsegs): yang ming gis ma mchis brjod pa'i bar de yang brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos
181a2(dkon brtsegs): po ma mchis pa de ni yongasasu ma grub pa ste/ yong su ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchi so// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das
181a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// gang dus gsum du gdags par bgyi ba ma lags pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ 
181a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid ma mchis pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ brda ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ 'dris pa ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis
181a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa// mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongasu she/ sa par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma
181a6(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ gnas ma lags pa/ rten ma lags pa/ thob pa ma lags/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rtogs pa ma lags pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyis pa ma lags pa/ 
181a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i skye bo ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi sa ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa
181a8(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa ste/ sa yang ma lags/ sa ma lags pa yang ma lag so// de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin mi dang / zhi ba dang mtshan nyid
181b1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa ste tha snyad tsam du btags pa'o// des tha snyad du de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste don dam par ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la de bzhin gshegs
181b2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmig so// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par
181b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rgya cher kham pad kyi chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni phung por btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor/ khams/ 
181b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye mched dang / dbang po dang / bden pa dang / rten ci dang 'brel par 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi dbyings de nyid mi 'dor te/ chos kyi dbyings de ming gang dang gang gis
181b5(dkon brtsegs): btags kyang de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyis kyang de dang des sa'i
181b6(dkon brtsegs): khams nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dpe
181b7(dkon brtsegs): na chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro// 
181b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dag gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na khams la 'jug pas gzungs thob/ gzungs la
182a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'jug pas spobs pa thob po// bcom ldan 'das de la dbang po la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste mig gi dbang
182a2(dkon brtsegs): po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / pho'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang
182a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang
182a4(dkon brtsegs): po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po
182a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la mig ni mig gis ma mchis dbang po ni dbang pos ma ma chis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang
182a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o// gang yongasu ma grub pa de ni
182a7(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag pa/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// 
182a8(dkon brtsegs): gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mig ma lags/ dbang po ma lags so// gang mig ma lags shing dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'di lta ste dper na
182b1(dkon brtsegs): chang ba stong pa ni brdzun pa yang dag pa ma lags pa ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdag par bas kyi don dam par ni stong pa yang mi dmigs chad par yang mi dmigs so// de bzhin du mig
182b2(dkon brtsegs): dang dbang po yang chang ba stong pa ltar brdzun zhing ma mchis la yang dag pa ma lags pa ste/ gso ba gsog log pa/ slu ba'i chos can byis pa 'drid pa glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltar
182b3(dkon brtsegs): ming du gdags par bas kyi don dam par ni mig kyang mi dmigs dbang po yang mi dmigs na/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas ji tsam du phyin ci log la gnas
182b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can rnams gzud pa'i slad du dbang po zhes bta gas kyi don dam par ni ma lags so// dbang po ni rang bzhin dang bral zhing dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste chos
182b5(dkon brtsegs): gang chos gang gis stong pa de la/ des tha snyad du bgyi ba ni pra rdzun pa mas TIg/ ga so sa gsog log pa sdu ba'i chos can byis pa 'dris pa glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa rang bzhin dang bral ba ste
182b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni mi skye mi 'gag go/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du
182b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ brdzun pa mtshan nyid ma mchis pa gdag su ma mchis pa/ gdags pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa
182b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa'o// rnam par ma rig pa/ rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs
183a1(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags
183a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'onyide ci'i slad zhe na/ ma mchis shing mchis pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig rmi lam na rgod pa dang dga' ba dang rtses pa dang dga' mgur spyad pa dag nyal nyal ba las
183a3(dkon brtsegs): sad de rje su dran la/ de dran yang rnyed par mi 'gyur 'thob par mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rmi lam na yang mi des rgod pa dang dga' ba dang rtses pa dang dga' mgur spyad pa de dag ma thob ma rnyed na 12/ 
183a4(dkon brtsegs): ba las sad pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ thob pa dang dad par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar rmi lam na rgod
183a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang dga' ba dang rtses pa dang dga' mgur spyad pa de dag dmigasu ma 'tshal ba de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ngo rngo/ bo nyid kyis dmigasu ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni 'das pa zhes
183a6(dkon brtsegs): gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lagaso// gang dus gsum du dmigasu ma mchis pa de dag ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ dbang po
183a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi'o// de ltar na chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/ chos thams cad la 'jug pas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par
183a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// de la ji ltar na bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni bden pa ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang lam mo// 
183b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bka' stsal te/ de la bdag cag the tshom ma
183b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis som nyi ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du sdug bsngal ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ gang la sems can ma mchis pa de
183b3(dkon brtsegs): la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i slad kun 'byung 'ang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu ma mchis
183b4(dkon brtsegs): pa den rgyu ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kuna'abyung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'gog pa ma mchis par dag par bgyi'o// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis
183b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la spangs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom lda na 'das 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du lam ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ gang spong bar
183b6(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid pa de ni lam ma lags te/ lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa ma lags la/ gang spang ba'i 'gog pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni mi dmigs te/ 'gog pa dmigs su ma mchis
183b7(dkon brtsegs): na lam du 'thad pa ma lags te/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa'i lam yang ma mchis pas/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag ni brtags pa rnam par bsgrubs pa ste// gang brtags
183b8(dkon brtsegs): shing rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni ma mchis pa'o// gang ma mchis pa de la ni 'das pa zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so// ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma/ 
184a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa mtshan nyid ma mchis pa mtshan ma mchis pa/ ma brtags pa/ bdags
184a2(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyi ba ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa ma brjod pa brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 
184a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par ma brjod pa/ mngon par brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa ma mthong ba mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ khong du ma chud pa/ 
184a4(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 
184a5(dkon brtsegs): ma thos pa/ thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ bsgrubs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon du ma bgyis
184a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ snang ba ma lags pa/ mun pa ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma lags pa
184a7(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba ma lags pa/ zab pa ma lags pa/ 'khrugs pa ma lags pa/ dang ba ma lags pa/ 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ bde ba ma lags pa/ 'ching ba ma
184a8(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ grol ba ma lags pa/ rjes su chags pa ma lags pa/ khong khro ba ma lags pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa/ rnam par byang ba ma lags pa/ ye shes ma
184b1(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa/ lam ma lags pa/ lam gol ba ma lags pa 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ rnam par 'jig pa ma lags pa/ bzung ba ma
184b2(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ mi bzung ba ma lags pa/ dor ba ma lags pa/ rab tu dor ba ma lags pa/ dmigs pa ma lags pa/ dmigasu ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sems can ma lags pa/ 
184b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ srog ma lags pa/ srog ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gang zag ma lags pa/ gang zag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ bdag ma lags pa/ bdag
184b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ dngos po ma lags pa/ dngos dpo ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ stong pa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma lags pa/ mtshan ma
184b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma lags pa/ smon pa/ ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gnas pa ma lags pa/ gnas pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa'adus byas ma
184b6(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ 'dus ma byas ma lags pa/ chad pa ma lags pa/ rtag pa ma lags pa/ log pa ma lags pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa
184b7(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ rten ma lags pa/ rten ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gzhi ma lags pa/ gzhi ma mchis
184b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongasasu shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ spang ba ma lags pa/ bsgom pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnyed
185a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'khor ba ma lags pa/ myang las 'das pa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas ma lags pa/ 'tshang rgya
185a2(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ byang
185a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ma lags pa/ spyod yul yang ma lags pa/ spong yul ma lags pa yang ma lags pa/ bgyis pa ma lags pa/ ma bgyis pa ma
185a4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ dag pa ma lags pa/ dag par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/ de ltar bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jugs pas gzungs
185a5(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa thob par 'a/ gyu ro// de la ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la/ 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug ce na ma rig pa'i rkyen
185a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa nas/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyuro zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel
185a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de la ma rig pa ni ma rig pas ma mchi so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ 'di ltar ma rig pa ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa
185a8(dkon brtsegs): de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongasu ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba'o// gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag pa'o// gang ma skyes
185b1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang nga ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni ming
185b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ gdag su ma mchis pa ste/ gzhan du na ming tsam dang / brda tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / 
185b3(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam du sems can rnams bzung ba'i don du bgyi ba ma gtogs par ma rig pa de ni don dam par dmigs su ma mchis so// chos gang don dam par dmigs
185b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa de ni gangag su ma mchis pa/ tha snyad du bgyid ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom lda na 'das gang ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas gdags pa tsam gyi
