185b5(dkon brtsegs): bar de dag kyang yang dag pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa log pa brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ yongs su brtag/ sa pa/ rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par dpyad pa/ ma zhi ba
185b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu spros pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bgyi ba yang chos gang gi ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis pa de 'du byed bskyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ de bas na ma rig pa ni ma
185b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'o// de ltar na/ ma rig pa ma mchis pas/ 'du byed rnams kyang ma skyes pa'o// gang ma skyes pa de ni rga bar mi 'gyur/ na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi
185b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang ma skyes pa de la rga ba ga las mchis ste/ gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de ni na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ 
186a1(dkon brtsegs): shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ ming / 
186a2(dkon brtsegs): tsam du bas kyi don dam par ni ma lag so// ma rig pa gang lags pa de nyid byang chub bo// de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'bral bar
186a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa ste chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o// de bas na chos thams
186a4(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga/ shegs pa ni ma 'gags pa ste chos thams cad kyang ma 'gag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 
186a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ dmig sa ma mchis pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa/ rjesu chags pa ma mchis pa
186a6(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyong dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs
186a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dang de dag gis chos thams cad ma mchis te/ de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshes
186a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes
186b1(dkon brtsegs): mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ byang chub kyang gnyisu ma mchis pa
186b2(dkon brtsegs): lags pas gnyisu ma mchis pas ni gnyis su ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs
186b3(dkon brtsegs): bas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzlog pa
186b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am bskor bar mdzad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'dangs gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas/ sems can tshad med pa yongasu mya ngan las bzlas so zhes
186b5(dkon brtsegs): mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhe/ na pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yongs
186b6(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes mchi na// de dag thams
186b7(dkon brtsegs): cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i sla du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gang la yang phan pa'am gnod pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso// / 
186b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed po ro zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
187a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni ci'ang 'dor ba'am/ len pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung
187a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'angaso zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
187a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba 'am// yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par gyur na/ de dag thams cad bla na med
187a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa da ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la ni 'gyur ba dam mchis kyang gda'i// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
187a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur mi ganga'o// / bam po dgu pa// de nas 'bras bu che ba'i
187a6(dkon brtsegs): lha bye ba phrag brgyad bcus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyid la nges pa 'gro ba brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
187a7(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de mngon par bstod pa// bde
187a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba kun la thugs brtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa// 'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis/ 
187b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag bstan// mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/ khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i
187b2(dkon brtsegs): drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan// khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi bshis pa mi g.yo brnyes// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams thag
187b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grol mdzad pa// mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal// phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid stong shin du phung po rnams dang bral// byis pa
187b4(dkon brtsegs): rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongasu da brtags// shes pa mi ldan skye bo phan chen 'dirab dacings rnyong la spre'u thogs pa bzhin// grol ba mkhas pa
187b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dod / khams rnams khams kyi rnam pa kun du stong paraH/ mas cad mkhyen pas gsungs// dper na brag cha rnam pa
187b6(dkon brtsegs): kun du shin du sgra dang bral ba 'dra// des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings// grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtog pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma
187b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis// skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan// yang dag ma lags brdzun zhing byis pa bslu ba chang ba stong pa 'dra// mi mkhas skye bo chos la
187b8(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu ma nges mang po de la chags// dper na 'gron pa rgya mtsho chen por 'khyam pa bzhin du 'khor bar ltung // 'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin du stong pa ste// thub
188a1(dkon brtsegs): pa me long nang gi gzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin du stong // mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags// bya dang mcho
188a2(dkon brtsegs): nya dang srog chags dag ni rgyal thogs pa bzhin// sems can sems can nyid stong sems can bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong // thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du
188a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis na// mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags// mkhas pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol// rten 'byung chos rnams de
188a4(dkon brtsegs): dag skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis// rmi de lam dga' ba bzhin du bzung du ma mchis byis pa rmod sa bgyid pa// mi shes rtog pa'i sladadu des kyang mi mkhas
188a5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mang po bcings// mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtog sa rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin grol// thub pa sa chos nyid bas ma yas ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad
188a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam mi khyab// thub pa zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral// thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te// de la'ang tshul cig
188a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'tshal gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med// thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji
188a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags ma lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes
188b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyis// mi mkhas gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas brnyes zhes smras pa dang // gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang // gang dag
188b2(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan 'das smra ba// de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs pos yongasu dkris// gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe yi 'du
188b3(dkon brtsegs): byed btang bzung smra ba dang // gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongasu mya ngan 'das smra ba// de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyi lag tu mchis// 
188b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen de bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi// gang dag tshul dang tshul mi ngan 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal// de dag rkang
188b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gtso bos dpal stug 'jig rten thugs brgya rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags// de ltar 'di
188b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi yi mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa// ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bas
188b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang bstan byas nas// kha cig yid rangs dogs med yid rangs sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas// 'dren sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan par
188b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur tade nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges par rtogs pa thugasu chud nas/ sems can rnams
189a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ 
189a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal stug 'dren pa rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te// rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum de skad thos// 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod
189a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na// rgyal ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu 'di gsungs// de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mdzad gsal mthong nas// 
189a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi zha la du blta// mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs// de thos gyur nas rgyal mchog / 
189a5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur// 'dren pa dam pa lha tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa// de dag/ su zhig gang gis ci thob mtha' bcas rnam par 'phrul pa
189a6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// mi mchog tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs sgrog ste the tshom kun du bsal du gsol// de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob// bde gshegs rgyal/ 
189a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan 'thon po de dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems par// 'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam pa sems shing mchis// thub pa 'dren mchog the tshom 'tshal ba
189a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum// des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min khams kun rgyal bar 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab
189b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ste/ bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par 'gyur// de dag don gyi dbang la bsten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol/ 
189b2(dkon brtsegs): des ni yid rangs gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po lnga de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing // rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas brnag pa yongs rdzogs
189b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi zhing rab dga' ste// tshul la zhug shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// 'gro ba rab tu 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag smon pa mdzad par 'gyur/ 
189b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcang de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs rnams da kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/ 
189b5(dkon brtsegs): rta thul khyod kyis dus dang chod shes nga la dris pa shin tu le// sa// gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi rgyu tshul dang rgyu// de khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro brtsa
189b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig yid kyis nyon// thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing // rgyu la gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad/ 
189b7(dkon brtsegs): kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang // kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang // kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten
189b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te/ skye bo sdug bsngal ltung ba 'grol zhes zhugs pa'i bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas// 'dzum pa chung mdzad gang byung nyan thos don du mdzad/ 
190a1(dkon brtsegs): par shes par bya// 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya// 'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i
190a2(dkon brtsegs): don du shes par bya// rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te// kha cig thar pa don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas// des na
190a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad// rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhal du nub par 'gyur// rang rgyal don du 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku yi dbus su nub par
190a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ 'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa// gtsug tu nub par 'gyur// de ltar rta thul khyod kyi// sa 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par gyis// rgyal ba
190a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi gtsug tu nub// sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan she sa par gyis// 'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de
190a6(dkon brtsegs): d+hU rnam gsum yang bshad kyis// kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par mnyan par gyis// dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du thog mar nub/ 
190a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bring gi don ni dus tshod cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur// blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin du ring du gnas// rta thul nyan thos don du gang gnas
190a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad// gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam gsum bshad kyis rta rdul khyod kyis mnyan par gyis// gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la bskor ba
190b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni// de dag pa la rkyen par bskor nas myur du shin du mkhas par 'gyur/ 'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la ngal gyis bskor ba byed par 'gyur// ngal gyis g.yas phyogs
190b2(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur// gang dag gser rgyan la dkar steng bzhag 'dra ba'i bde gshegs mthong gyur na// de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun
190b3(dkon brtsegs): khyab par gnas par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya// gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gebs pa dang // 
190b4(dkon brtsegs): gang tshe me tog 'dra la 'dren pa'i steng gi mkha' la lding ba dang // gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum bskor byed pa/ de ni 'jig rten 'das pa tshe'i dbang du
190b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad shes par bya// bde gshegs rgyal ba rna/ mas kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum de tsam bstan / rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum po
190b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag shes par gyis// de na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad// de thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyi stan la the tshom med par gyis// 'bras
190b7(dkon brtsegs): bu che ba'i lha tshogs bye ba brgyad bcu tham pa 'di dag ni// zhing rnams ngag tu chos tshul shin du rgya chen smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por
190b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur// de phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan// de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum bcu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong // bskal
191a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sum cu drug du thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyad// nga dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal ba grangs med sum cu rtsa drug tu// gang zag
191a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas// thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtog rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed/ rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod de byang chub
191a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba yongasu btsal byas nas// de dag de yi 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog/ 'dren pa mthu chen yon tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan skal la 'byung / 
191a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing sbyangs te// sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya// de tshe yon tan ldan pa
191a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de// de tshe thub pa ra/ re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni// gal te/ bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de bgrangs
191a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang // legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin bgrangs mi 'gyur// 'dus pa de dag thams cad grangs mod 'dus pa des ni ci 'dra ba// de las nyis 'gyur ro/ 
191a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// de tshe rgyal bar zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin// de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur
191a8(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs de dag spyong po gang yin de dag rnams kyi 'ang de nyid 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos// de tshe sras kyis gzung zhing bskal pa byeb
191b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad bcur gnas par 'gyur// de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems bskyed pa// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma pas kyang shin du mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de dgaH'das/ 
191b2(dkon brtsegs): nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni// nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang 'byung de dag thams cad
191b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongasu legs par ldan gyur cig/ yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin// mi mchog de yi gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus
191b4(dkon brtsegs): dang gyur nas// rkang gnyis dam pa gzhal yas 'jig rten dadon byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te// thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'/ 
191b5(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas// de lta bas na dga' bar bya/ sa la 'bar bzhin spyad spyod de// rtag tu shes rab pha rol
191b6(dkon brtsegs): byin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byos la// yang dag mthong ba'i spyad pa dge ba 'di la kun tu bsten byos te// dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur ba
191b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ 'bras bu che ba'i ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe// sems can
191b8(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tshom med par gyur par rig nas tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing
192a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do// de nas lha
192a2(dkon brtsegs): bu sbyin pa la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang // btsun mo dang ni srog phangs btang // rgyal srid btang ba ci smos te// sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tsha
192a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi tshul khrims rnam sbyangs pa// rnam pa kun du bsnyengs mi mnga'// shin du bslabs pas mthar phyin pa/ khrims mthar
192a4(dkon brtsegs): byin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas ga sol pa// khyod kyis bzod pa bsten mdzad pas// yan lag garngubs pa'ang bzod par mdzad// zab mor
192a5(dkon brtsegs): sgying lug ma lags te// bzod mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa// brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te/ 
192a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa// brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa/ 
192a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bsam gtan bsten mdzad pa// de la 'jig rten gting mi snyeng // dus gsum mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa// bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gzi
192a8(dkon brtsegs): brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa/ dpa' bos shes rab pha rol phyin// yang dang yang du bsgoms pas na// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa// shes rab mthar byin phyag kyang 'tshal/ 
192b1(dkon brtsegs): lha bu khams kyis blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sbyin bdag dang ngag stan dang // don spyad 'thun pa 'don dgugis// 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyis btul// 'dren pa khyod la/ 
192b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// byams chen thugs rje chen po dag/ yun ring dus nas bsgom mdzad de// sems can dpag las yongs
192b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgral// gangos 'dzin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa// nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing // thub chen dul ba'i sems mnga' bas/ 
192b4(dkon brtsegs): mthul thams cad dul mdzad pa/ kha lo bsgyur la phyag kyidang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med pas gsol pa/ sems dag mnyen pa'i sems mnga' ba// sems duH/ 
192b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po ni mnga' ba// sems can kun gyi sems mkhyen pa sems mkhyen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ shes rab/ 
192b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i bra gros can// bla gros mchog la rab tu zhugs// thugs gsal phun sum tshogs pa'i blo/ mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i sems brgyan gyis
192b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba/ khyod kyis sems ni rnam par sbyangs// sangs rgyas zhing yang rnam dag mdzad// sems can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa// kun dag khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu pham
192b8(dkon brtsegs): pa med pas gsol pa/ dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba/ khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung yang bcom// khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur// lha'i
193a1(dkon brtsegs): bu myur du byed pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos rnams myang bar mkhyen// sems can sbyar bar rnam par sbyangs// zab cing bsdu dka' chos dgal/ 
193a2(dkon brtsegs): myur du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan pas gsol pa/ bral gyur yongasu bral gyur pa// chu bo rgal te thog pa spangs// pha rol phyin cing thang la bzhun/ 
193a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtan la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu spyod lam dang ldan pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs// gti mug spangs pa zag med pa// sbyin gnas
193a4(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams zhing gyur pa// 'jig rten mchod 'os phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gso la pa/ khyod kyis dam chos shin tu bstan// 'jig
193a5(dkon brtsegs): rten gsum du rab tu mchod// gcig pu bgrod pas ba de ba brnyes// de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa/ lhun stug gcig tu gyur
193a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ri/ rlung gis bskyod par mi nus te// de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis// bde gshegs bskyod par mi nuso// lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thob pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po
193a7(dkon brtsegs): zab cing mnyam// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa// rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ 
193a8(dkon brtsegs): sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'// de bzhin nyid la rab tu zhugs// yang dag mtha' yang rab tu ston/ khyod mtshungs gang zag yong ma mchis// lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gas/ 
193b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis su med pa yang dag ston// dpa' bo dpa' bas rnam par gnon// gang dag zab la zhum ma mchis// de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin// lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas
193b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag/ khyod kyi slob la bslabs pa rnams// sbrul rnams lpags pa rnying 'dor bzhin// srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor// lha'i bu zhi ba'i
193b3(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis gsol pa// ji ltar mar me mar zad cing // snying po zad pas zhi gyur bzhin/ khyod kyi bstan pa myur thos na// shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'// lha'i bu zhi gnas la gnas
193b4(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa// gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i // mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa yang // shes da rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dag/ 'dod chags zhags
193b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gcod par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas mang gis gso la pa/ zhi ba'i sems mnga' zhi la spyod// cho ga spyod/ yul rab tu zhi// nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur pa// dgra
193b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis zhi gnas bslabs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag/ zhi gnas nyid kyis
193b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung 'gyur zhing // sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi zhi ba ni// dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan// shes
193b8(dkon brtsegs): rab chen pos de 'tshal na// de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par blta bas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs// mkhas pa khyod ltar
194a1(dkon brtsegs): slob pa rnams// ye shes mchog gis mnyam bzhag cing // byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol
194a2(dkon brtsegs): phyin gyur pa// thub chen khyod las gang slob pa// de dag 'jig rten snang 'dzin cing // sgrib pa med par gzigs par 'gyur// lha'i bu 'ong byed kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi gsung
194a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rgya mtsho de thos na// de dag dri med bde ba 'thob// bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kyang 'byung // lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtogs// thabs
194a4(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pas de dag gsungs// de 'dra'i ye shes s+ho na bgyid pa// de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa/ gnas ma mchis
194a5(dkon brtsegs): shing bla ma mchis// chos rnams thams cad sems// ma mchis// bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba// de dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu gnas med blo gros
194a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste// sems can rnams la bstan pa
194a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzadalha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rten ma mchis// sems can ma mchis phan tshun min// lag mthil skya ru ra bzhag bzhin/ 
194a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu bar snang rgyu bas gsol pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyis chos kyi rnams// bar snang lta bur snang ba ste/ skye dang 'gog pa med par
194b1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// de slang 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu ngar 'dzin pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni// g.yo ba med cing ngar 'dzin
194b2(dkon brtsegs): medakhaspyod med rtsol ba med par gzigs// lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol pa/ sgyu ma sna tshogs legs bgyis pa// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na// 
194b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gda'// thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu rab tu sad pa'i ngang tshul gyis gsol pa/ gzugs brnyan ji ltar me long la// gda' yang de ltar
194b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa// de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs// / de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu yid pa bzhin rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas gzugs
194b5(dkon brtsegs): brnyan lta bu ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams / de bzhin khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// de ltar 'a gro ba kun kyang mkhyen// lha'i bu spobs pa thogs med kyis
194b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ chos nyid la ni khor yug tu// spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing // chos nyid de yang brnyes pas na// de slad khyod ni spobs pa ldan// lha'i bu chags med blo gros
194b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos 'di thams cad ni// rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par// yang dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen// de bas thub pas rab rib bsal// lha'i bu mya
194b8(dkon brtsegs): ngan bral gyis gsol pa/ mya ngan med cing nyer len med// spros pa med cing rnyog pa med// chos rnams kun du nyon ma mongs// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i
195a1(dkon brtsegs): bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams yang dag ma lags te// 'gro dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa// de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen/ 
195a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu blo gros mchog gis gsol pa/ lhun gyis grub cing blang med pa// rmongs pa med cing shes pa med// chos rnams ci yang mi bgyed pa/ 
195a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis rang bzhin thug su chung // lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa/ snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis// gzugs med ma lags gzugs can min// bzung ba ma mchis
195a4(dkon brtsegs): grol ma mchis// khyod kyis rang bzhin thugasu chud// dalha'i bu mig dpas kyis gsol pa/ yul dang phyogs da ni mi gnas pa// yod dang med pa ma lags par// rmi lam
195a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa ji bzhin du// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis giR+Sha gas// lha'i bu mig mi 'dzum kyis gsol pa/ byis pa rnams kyis blo rmongs pa// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags
195a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang zag sems can ma mchis pa/ ma mchis/ 
195a7(dkon brtsegs): tha snyad ma mchis pa// bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba// ngo dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gis tha snyad gdags
195a8(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ mtshan ma de dag ma mchis te// chos kun mtshan ma mchis par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon pas gsol pa/ ji ltar mtshan ma stong
195b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing // smon pa dmigasu ma mchis dang // su la smon lam mchis gyur pa// de yang de lta'i tshul du mkhyen// lha'i bu ting 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa/ rnam thar / 
195b2(dkon brtsegs): la brten bgyis shing // gang zhig 'grol 'gyur de yachis// de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol pa/ khyod ni
195b3(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa kun spangs shing // bsod nams thams cad bsags gyur te// bde gshegs khyod la smad mi mnga'// su smod de dag mkhas ma lags// lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis
195b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs// char gyis sa chen ngoms pa bgyid// de bzhin 'dren pas/ chos char gyis// 'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad// 
195b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu bsam pa don yod kyis gsol pa/ thub mcho// gsungs ni don mchis te// chos kyi 'khor lor tu bskor// shin du bstan nas mdzad pas na// de ni thams
195b6(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan// lha'i bu blo phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis// ma skyes 'gags pa ma lags te// de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis
195b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// gzhan yang de bzhin rdzogs par mdzad// lha'i bu seng ge nga ros gsol pa/ khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te// seng ge nga ros bsgrags mdzad pas// mu stegs can
195b8(dkon brtsegs): kun rab 'jigs pa// seng ge nga ri dgas phra mo bzhin// lha'i bu bag yod las kyis gsol pa/ bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de/ khyod kyis spyod pa spyad bgyis pas// sangs/ 
196a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod// bag yod pas ni nges par byung // wA 'brubag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la ba gnas te/ 9/ 
196a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel// stobs bcu gzhal yas sangs rgyas chos// bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu spel// lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la brtson pas
196a3(dkon brtsegs): ma/ byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes// thub chen rang yang grol gyur nas// de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'grel// lha'i khu bag yong nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ byang chub sem
196a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' nyan thos dag/ ji snyed thar la brten pa'i rnams/ da/ kun kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste// bag yod pas da ni nges par 'byung // lha'i bu bag yod gnas pas gsol
196a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bag yod yongasu ma btang bas// rnam par 'dren pa kho kyi sras// 'gro ba 'di la ma chags par/ thams cad mkhyen du nges par 'byung // lha'i bu bag
196a6(dkon brtsegs): yod bsrungs kyis gsol pa/ byang chub lam la brten mdzad cing // khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na// thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yi// byang chub dam pa brnyes
196a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// lha'i bu bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing // mtshan nyid cig po rtogs bgyis pas// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyi sras// yab
196a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi dkar kyang thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ bag yod dga' ba'i brtan pa rnams// de dag sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// dpa' bo nyon
196b1(dkon brtsegs): mongs ri 'jigs pas// nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin rnyil// lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad tshe// khyod ni bag gis bcu
196b2(dkon brtsegs): ba na/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ khyod kyi thugs ni skyor ma gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa// chos rnams de dag rang bzhin zhi// de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul
196b3(dkon brtsegs): lags// byang chubo yang dag gang zhugs dang // thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs// lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhugs
196b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ 'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'// sems can to/ na mongs zhi bar mdzad// rdul 'thul ba la char pa ba bzhin// lha'i bu zhi gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/ 
196b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu zhugs// sus kyang mi skyod ri bo/ bzhin// khyod la gnod bgyir mi nus te// sems zhi// khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis
196b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba/ khyod kyis sras rnams ma smad pa/ zhi gnas kyis ni yongasu dul// bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs te// 'dod chags kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas
196b7(dkon brtsegs): nges par byung gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhir gnas la// dpa' bo chen po sgrol mdzad pa// ci la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad// sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal// lha'i
196b8(dkon brtsegs): bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gros gsol pa/ ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi// sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsungs// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i// chos gzhan de yi rjesu 'brang // 
197a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu zhi gnas rjesu 'brang gis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma zhe gnas ni// sems kyi rnyog pa dang par bgyid// zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'ching / 
197a2(dkon brtsegs): de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad// lha'i bu zhi gnas spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs// de la chags med spyod pa ni/ 
197a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas brlan gyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan gyis ni mngon brlan te// shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas// de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub
197a4(dkon brtsegs): brnyes// de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren// lha'i bu zhi gan sa lhur len gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang // lam gzhan dag gis ma mthong ste// zhi gnas
197a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes che thob na// rang byung nyid du nges par byung // lha'i/ bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol ba/ dpa' bo chen/ po lhag mthong ni// chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste/ 
197a6(dkon brtsegs): de la khyod kyi sras spyod cing // rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing // rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
197a7(dkon brtsegs): sman pa'i rgyal po sten pa ste// de ni lhag mthong dge ba lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad btsal bgyis te// yang dag ji bzhin
197a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong gyur na// brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob// byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dong // lha'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung gis gsol pa/ gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis
197b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog tu nges par byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis// brnyes pa'i 'dren pa skye mi 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa/ yang dag ji bzhin ya
197b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag tu// chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na// byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te// de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas
197b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing // dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa// de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis// pham par bgyi bar yong mi nus// lha'i bu lhag mthong byung
197b4(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa/ chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du// rgyal sras gang dag bzhugs pa'i rnams// chosarnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal zhing // rang byung nyid ni thob par
197b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong la brten pas gsol pa/ rnams 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du// ye shes la ni brten mdzad pas// thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes nas
197b6(dkon brtsegs): niHsrog chags bye ba grol bar mdzad// lha'i bu khyad par ldan gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mkhyen par thams cad mkhyen// 'dren pa dam pa mngon par 'phags// srid pa'i
197b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtshos khyer ba yi// 'jig rten de yis sgrol bar mdzad// lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol pa/ lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing // chos kun rnam par gzigs
197b8(dkon brtsegs): pas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te// sa bzang n+ya grod skyes 'dra// lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol pa// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// ye shes
198a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni yongs bzung ste// byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing // skye bo mang po 'grol ba bgyid// lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ 
198a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mkhyen pas rnam par rol// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// zhum pa ma mchis dang nga mi mnga'// thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu lhag mthong la
198a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'jug gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen pos chos kun ni// lhag mthong nyid du yang dag 'du// rang bzhin med par rnam mthong na// de ni rang byung byang chub lags// lha'i
198a4(dkon brtsegs): bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol pa/ sangs rgyas lhag mthong dang po ste// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// 'jigarten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs shing // thugs rje chen po/ 
198a5(dkon brtsegs): shin du bskyed// lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gros kyis gsol pa// byang chub phyir ni shes 'grol ba'i// 'jig rten ma khas pa nges par 'byung // de dag byang chub mchog kyang
198a6(dkon brtsegs): thob tu grol nas skye dgu 'di dag 'grel// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la rton gyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos bsten pa'i// mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// sems can bcings las grol
198a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid cing // 'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid la mos gyur pas// 'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs// dmigs med do// 
198a8(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid med pa// de ltar srog chags rnams la ston// lha'i bu stong pa nyid spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni// chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste// srog chag
198b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la thugs brtse bas// dba' bos de la spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsam pas gsol pa/ skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la// 'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs// chos rnams
198b2(dkon brtsegs): kun la mi gnas shing // na mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ stong nyid chos la brten bgyis cing // sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mas
198b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ston pa mchod pa ste// mchod pa de ni bla na med// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyis gsol pa/ gang gis 'dren pa 'phags gyur pa'i// de ni yang dga' phags
198b4(dkon brtsegs): shes gsungs// stong nyid chos la brten bgyid pa// ma smad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis 'dren gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po chos rnams gang
198b5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das min ston ma mchis// kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren// drang srong chen po'i byang chub lags// lha'i/ khu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/ stong
198b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid zhing rten nas ni/  khyod kyi spobs ma yang dag shar// stong pa nyid la gang brten pa// de dag rim gro bgyid pa lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la brten gyis gsol pa/ gang rnam stong pa
198b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid brten pa// mkhas pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur// nyon mongs med cing lta med rnams// byang chub rdul med 'thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas
198b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ gang rnams stong nyid bsten bgyid pa// sangs rgyas chos kun phun sum tshogs// rang byung pham pa med par 'gyur// 'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa
199a1(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te// stong pa nyid la gang brten pa// de la bdud rnams bye ba phrag/ stong gis dkrug par/ 
199a2(dkon brtsegs): mi nus so// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga' bas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la mngon dges te// dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung // mtshan
199a3(dkon brtsegs): ma rnams la chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu mtshan ma med la gnas pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la spyod gyur cing // zhi bzhi la spyod pa rnams// mtshan ma rnam par bshig rnams kyis/ 
199a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus// lha'i bu mtshan ma med dpa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi daspyod yul la// 'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de// mtshan ma
199a5(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga' rtogs dka' zhing // zhi spyong khyod la phyag kyanga'atshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas skom gyis gsol pa/ thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni// mtshan ma
199a6(dkon brtsegs): med pas skom gyur te// yab kyi dkar ni 'tshal gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la bkur bsti bgyid// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la nyin
199a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan du// gang zag mchog ni spyod mdzad pa// lha dang dri za mi dag kyang / khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal to// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams
199a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam ba shig cing // dpal chen 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// mtshan ma med la gnas pa mdzad// de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med la rnam par rtse
199b1(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa// thu chen dpa' bo chen po khyod// mtshan ma med la rnam par rol// 'gro ba yongasu smin mdzad cing // sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la zhugs// lha'i bu mtshan ma
199b2(dkon brtsegs): med pas yongs grub kyis gsol pa/ gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa// de dag byang chub grub pa ste// yab kyi chos kyi brtul zhugs can// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
199b3(dkon brtsegs): mchod// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga' bas gsol pa/ gang gis mtshan ma rnam bshig pa// de dag sangs rgyas chos la dga'// bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste/ 
199b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun gyi mchod rten lags// lha'i bu mtshan 'ad pa la rten pas gsol pa/ zhi la spyod cing rnam grol ba// sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na med// 'byung po kun gyi spya
199b5(dkon brtsegs): dang rten// dpung gnyen de bzhin gnas kyang lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol pa// mtshan ma med la mos gyur cing // zhi bas dgra la rgyal
199b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// sangs rgyas brgal ba 'gro sgrol ba// de dag tshad ni ga la mchis// lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol pa/ mgon po gang dag smon lam ni// rnam pa
199b7(dkon brtsegs): kun du mi dmigs pa// de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste// sangs rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung // lha'i bu smon pa med pa la brten pas gsol pa/ zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod// srid pa
199b8(dkon brtsegs): rnamasu smon mi mdzad// srid pa yongasu chad pas na// sangs rgyas 'jig rten yongs mi gos// lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa/ gang gis srid pa yongs bcom pa// de dag/ 
200a1(dkon brtsegs): gzi mchog bskyed pa ste// de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras// rang gi yab la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sras
200a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams ma smad pa// sred pa yongasu bcad pas na// srid pa 'jigs bgying srid pa la// de dag smon pa mi bgyid do// lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongasu grol bas gsol pa/ gang dag smon pa mi bgyid/ 
200a3(dkon brtsegs): pata gzi ldan khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba// de dag yongasu grol bar 'gyur// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ gang gis sred pa rab bcom pa// de dag
200a4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dgon pa rgol// de dag mi skom zang zing med// dpal chen khyod la de phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med la nges pas grasol pa/ gang gis srid dang sdug bsngal dang / bde ba dngos po
200a5(dkon brtsegs): med bsgoms la// mgon khyod de dag rnams kyi yab// de dag/ khyod kyi sras kyang lags// lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis gsol pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal sus mthong ba// 
200a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag khyod kyi bstan la dul// kha lo bsgyur zhing srid srel ba// sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ srid pa'i dgon las byung ba'i rnams/ 
200a7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te// nyon mongs dgra rnams pham mdzad pa// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa/ g.yul las rgyal bar
200a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ste// khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi mnga'// bdud kyi dpung rnams pha ma mdzad cing // srid pa kun du smin mi mdzad// lha'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa/ thar pa'i
200b1(dkon brtsegs): chos la stobs ldan pas// bdud kyi zhags pa yongs bcad cing / khyod kyi sras rnams bdud dag la// bsgrub pa'i 'du shes mi bskyed do// lha'i bu lus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ 
200b2(dkon brtsegs): lus med 'chi ba med tshul du// lus 'di gang gis 'thong gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul dga'// 'dren pa khyod kyi rje su zhugs// lha'i bu lus nges par sems pas gsol pa/ mi gtsang
200b3(dkon brtsegs): rul ba'i rnag zag pa// lus 'di mi zad nges bsams te// yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas// rnam 'dren khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa/ lus la mi gtsang / 
200b4(dkon brtsegs): brtags bgyis te// lus la dran pa rnam dpyad cing // lusad kyi sdug bsngal rnam grol nas// nges pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus yongasu gtong gis gsol pa/ 
200b5(dkon brtsegs): sbrul gyi lpags pa rnying bzhin du// rnag can lus 'di spangs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bo che// sku mi/ mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus la smod pas
200b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ mi btsang dri nga rnag zag cing // rul pa'i lus la ma smad de// mi gtsang gang ba rnam spangs nas// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyis yongasu skyo bas gsol pa/ 
200b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rul pa'i lus skyo zhing // rgyal sras gtsang ba 'tshal ba rnams// chos kyis rab tu bskyed pa'i sras// de dag sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tshal 'gyur// lha'i bu lus kyis skrag pas
200b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ 'byung ba chen po sbrul gdug 'dra// gang gis shin du rtogs gyur pa// de dag lus las 'das pa ste// rkang gnyis gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong bas gsol
201a1(dkon brtsegs): galas kyi skyon la mngon sum ste// ye shes gzigs pa'i spyan ma ga// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mkhas papa// sring gsum thams cad yang su gzigs// na
201a2(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod chags dang bral bas gsol pa/ lus kyi 'du shes 'dod chags bral// chos kyi 'du shes mi gnas pas// kun sbyor kun las 'das pa ste// rnam 'grel sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tsha
201a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu srid pa'i dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ srid par srid pa 'joms mdzad pa/ khyod kyis dgra yi 'du shes mkhyen// khyod kyi sras rnams bsgom bgyid cing // mkhas pa byang chub mngon
201a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya// lha'i bu srid pa sel bas gsol pa/ srid pa ka dan gyi nyis dmigs mthong // mya ngan 'das la 'jigs med mthong // khyod kyi sras rnams 'gro phan phyir// byang chub
201a5(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod pa bgyid// lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gso la pa/ gang gis srid pa rnam spangs shing // 'jigal mngon par mi dga' ba// bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa/ 
201a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa bsal gyis gsol pa/ mi yi dam pa khyod kyi sras// srid par khrid pa rab bsal te/ khyod kyi bslabs la bslabs pa dag/ stong gsum 'di
201a7(dkon brtsegs): na rnam par mdzes// lha'i bu srid pa las brgal bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i mtsho las brgal ba yi// 'jig rten mgon mchog skyobs rnams la// grangs gi rgyung du 'grang ba yi// grangs ni
201a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'din med// lha'i bu srid pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/ srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste// gang dag rtag tu dran spyod pa// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// srog chags
201b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos kyang sod// lha'i bu srid pa las rab tu grol bas gsal pa/ sring pa'i dun las rab tu grob// rnam par 'dren pa srid pa nal// srid pa sel la phrag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu
201b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu ni byed kyis gsol pa/ sring par khrid par ba ni zhing // srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs// bden pa srid pa mthar 'byin pa/ khyod la ngo bla ma mchemo// lha'i bu srid pa'i maH
201b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i mthar phyin rab zhi ba// mgon po khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'// srid pa phyir log thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu srid pa tha ma'i lus
201b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ srid pa'i rgyun rnam spangs te// srid pa datha ma 'dzin mdzad pa// gang gis srid pa len gyur pa'i // khyod kyis kun du sbyor ba mthong // lha'i bu sred pa rab tu zhi
201b5(dkon brtsegs): thob kyis gsol pa// khyod kyis srid pa stong mkhyen te// srid du'i rgyu yang de bzhin no// zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga' mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa
201b6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu 'gro bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i pha rol brgal ba ste// srid par srid pa yang dag bsal// rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas// skye bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad// / bam pa
201b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu pa// lha'i bu tshor bas mnan gyis gsol pa/ tshor ba dag tu bgyi ma mchis// sems pa ma mchis rtsol ma mchis// bsam gtan mdzad pa che khyod kyis// tshor ba chu bur lta bur mkhyen// / 
201b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tshor ba ston pas gsol pa/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par// tshor ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// rmi lam sdug gu'i dga' 'dra ba// de la so so'i skye bo chags// lha'i bu tshor ba la
202a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtogs pas gsol pa/ shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags nas// tshor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing // 'ong ba med la dngos med par// de ni thub ce
202a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas gsol pa/ tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po// rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs// zab mo bstan dka'i tshig de yang // khyod kyis sems can rnams
202a3(dkon brtsegs): la bstan// lha'i bu tshor ba'i rgyud la nges pas gsol pa/ tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam// don dam nyid du mi dmigs te// khyod kyis sems can dar btul bas// 'gro ba the tshom ma mchis 'gyur// 
202a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tshor ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pa po// mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin // byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid na// de ni khyod kyis yang dag
202a5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba la mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung po mngon mkhyen pa/ rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa// mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog
202a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis// tshor ba bdag med rab tu gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba las brgal bas gsol pa/ rkang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod// brgal dka' tshor ba'i 'tsho las brgal// 'dam las brgal
202a7(dkon brtsegs): cing sdig med pa// byang chub mchog 'di sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu tshor ba las 'byung gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du// tshor ba rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas// 
202a8(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba'i phung po rab brgal te// sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu tshor ba rig pas gsol pa/ mi rnams ngag la gang 'ching ba'i// tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen
202b1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs zhags pas 'ching 'gyur ba// de yi rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems kyi nyon mongs pas// bdud rnams kyang
202b2(dkon brtsegs): ni spa bkong ste// sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par// thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems yongasu shes pas gsol pa/ ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis// sgyu ma sna tshos
202b3(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa bzhin// sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// de phyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod// lha'i bu sems la yang dag par rtogs pas gsol pa/ sgyu ma mkhan nam slob ma
202b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i// sems dang khyod kyis yang dag brtags// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul la spyod pas
202b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen// rnam pa ra 'dren pa rmi lam na// ji ltar tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du// byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid par gzigs// 
202b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ dul gyur la su rung ba yi// sems kyi rang bzhin rtogs byed pa// gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// mtshan nyid brtan pa khyod kyis
202b7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pa/ gang gis sems la sems med shes// mkhas pa sgyid lug mi 'gyur zhing // bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa// de dag
202b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi// lha'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/ gang dag sems la sems med shes// de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te// dpa'
203a1(dkon brtsegs): chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la// skyes zung dag yang dag 'phags/ lnga dran pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ gang gis sems sa dbang 'khyim pa/ 
203a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag zhi rab zhi// bdud kyi zhags las rab grol bas// de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi// lha'i bu sems mnyen pas gsol ba/ mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing
203a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen par dka' dang dpa' ba dang / khyod kyi bstan la gang mos pa// de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/ sems ngag las rnams gtsang gyur cing / 
203a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa// de dag rgyal ba'i ba stan thos na// zab mo rnams la zhum mi 'gyur/ lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gi yid ni
203a5(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid la// rab tu dga' zhing thogs med pa/ de dag mi dbang sras po ste// zhi ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags// lha'i bu chos la sems pas gsol pa/ chos
203a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad chos dbyings su// 'dren pa de la bslabs pa rnams// chos nyid la ni gang sems pa// de dag spyod yul ma yin med// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings las nges par byung
203a7(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// chos kyi dbyings las nges byung ste// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag/ mtshan nyid cig gis nges byung lags// lha'i bu chos kyi
203a8(dkon brtsegs): dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// chos kyi dbyings shes rgyal bas gsungs// dpa' bo khyod ni gang spyod pa'i// ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab// 
203b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol pa// chos kyi dbyings la gang zhugs pa// de dag ye shes bsam yas te// sangs rgyas chos la the tshom med// sems can bsam/ 
203b2(dkon brtsegs): la de dag mkhas// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab kyis gsol pa/ gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig/ chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams// de dag spongs pa'i stobs bskyed
203b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ gang la de dag gnas pa yi// 'jigs pa med pas thob/ 
203b4(dkon brtsegs): med pas// de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs// de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung // lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gsol pa/ khyod ni chos dbyings
203b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa ste// chos rnams kun la shin du mkhas// lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par ston// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas/ 
203b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ chos rnams rang bzhin med gzigs pas// khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la zhugs// mi gnas zhum pa ma mchis te// gzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings
203b7(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de// bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos
203b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings la bston pas gsol pa/ gang dang gang gi sgo dag nas// skyes bu dam pa ston mdzad pa// de yi sgo nas chos dbyings ston// de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis// lha'i bu
204a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la brtson pas gsol pa/ mngon par brtson pas chos kyi dbyings// skyes zangs pa khyod kyus mkhyen// 'dzin pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
204a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams// ye shes pha rol phyin par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyis tshim gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyis skye bo 'di // chos kyis rab tu tshim par mdzad// chos kyi dbyings ni rnam mkhyen pas// 
204a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa byang chub mchog la zhugs// lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas gsol pa/ gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun// 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du blta// chos dbyings rnam par mkhyen pa yi/ 
204a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas shes pa dal rab tu gnas pas gsol pa/ mi mchog 'dren rapa sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes gnas 'di chos dbyings te// rnam
204a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa stobs bcu po// gang la spyod pa de lag so// lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos kyi byings ni gnas chen te// thams cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i
204a6(dkon brtsegs): lam// de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang // mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa lags// lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas gsol ba/ khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen// mtshan
204a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid cig la mkhas pa ste// sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang // rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras
204a8(dkon brtsegs): gnasu bya ba chos dbyings shes// bsal bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams// rang byung nyid du nges par byung // lha'i bu gnas la bslabs pas gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings la gang
204b1(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pa'i// skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs// rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas// de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 
204b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa ni gang 'tshal ba// de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos// bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang // de dag rmongs par yong mi nus// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mngon par
204b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pas gsol pa/ gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa/ de dag bdag cag bdud kyi tshogs// bye bas byang chub mi bskyod ces// mkhas pa de dag shin du dga'// lha'i bu gnas med
204b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni// chos nyid la ni rab gnas te// sdig can bdud rnams bshal ba ni// ji ltar rta
204b5(dkon brtsegs): yis shing rta bzhin// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po// chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid pa'i// bdud
204b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi las ni gnas med de// gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs// lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa/ gnas dang de bzhin gnas min pa// byis pa'i blo can
204b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bstan// rang gis de ni thugs chud nas// sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ sngon chad rgyu ni gang dag dang // las 'dra
204b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba ma 'tshal ba'i// rgyu des khyod kyis thugasu chud// las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la mkhas pas gsol ba/ chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni// las kyi rgyu
205a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes khyod kyis mkhyen// gang gis rgyu yis bgying de yang // gang zag mchog gis thug su chud// lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ ma 'ongs
205a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yi dus dag na// mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba// de yi rgyu dang len pa dang // gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la lta bas gsol pa/ phyogs bcu'i/ 
205a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'di dag gi/ sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las// gnas dang las kyi legs pa rnams// kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ mi
205a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i// las dang rgyu dag ma mchi das te// gnas dang skye ba'ang ma mchi so// de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga'
205a5(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa/ las dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas// dus la rnam smin rnam gsum dang // ji ltar de yi len pa yang // khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod// lha'i bu stobs
205a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas// rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen// de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa med// lha'i bu stobs
205a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis byung gis gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud rnams dang // rnam smin so so yang dag rig/ thams cad stong pa rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs
205a8(dkon brtsegs): la dga' bas gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams// khyod nyid rang gis mngon mkhyen te// rang bzhin med par bstan pa mdzad/ 
205b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu skabs kyis rnam par brtse bas gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyang kyi rnams// 'pho med dbang phyug med pa ste// rten cing 'byung bar khyod kyis
205b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa/ rgyu dang rkyen dang las rnams dang // rnam par smin pa brten pa rnams// de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes/ 
205b3(dkon brtsegs): seng ge nga ror khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu stobs kyis rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa 'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis// khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pas/ 
205b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag rkang gnyis gtso bos mkhyen// de bas khyod ni do/ zla med// lha'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis gsol dpa/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing // gang
205b5(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par las bgyis dang // de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ba// de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/ khams
205b6(dkon brtsegs): gang la ni brten bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi// sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// phyag gi sor mo lnga dang 'dra// lha'i bu stobs la spyod pas
205b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten gyis shing // bshes gnyen ci 'dra rnyed gyur nas// 'du 'dzi ji 'dra bgyid gyur pa// de kun bla na med pas mkhyen// 
205b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa/ stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs mkhyen cing // 'dren pa de yi khams dang ni// 'du 'ji shes gnyen tshogs
206a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnams// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol pa/ khams deng nga ni de len dang // bshas
206a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen de dang de 'grogs pa// de la khyod kyi mkhyen pa nges// de phyir the tshom yong mi mnga'// lha'i bu khams la brten pas gsol pa/ sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i/ 
206a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de dang khams de dang // spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams// mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol pa/ ye shes gang gis khams de ni// 'dren
206a4(dkon brtsegs): pas mngon par mkhyen pa yi// mkhyen te mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes// blo mchog mnga' bas yang dag bsta dan// lha'i bu khams nas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ 
206a5(dkon brtsegs): khams gang la ni brten bgyis na// 'dus byas dag la/ ji srang gnas// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/ khyod la do zla ma mchis so// lha'i bu khams kyis rjes su
206a6(dkon brtsegs): song bas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis pa// yon tan ji snyed bskyed pa dang // rnam par smin dang 'bras bu dag/ de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu
206a7(dkon brtsegs): khams la yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyid cing // 'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyis pa// de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen// de phyir khyod ni
206a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas mchod// lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis pas// 'gro ba ci 'drar mchi ba yi// sems can rnams kyi lam dag kyang
206b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa/ sems can log pa nyid nges shing // mya ngan 'das 'gro skal med par// phung po gsum po
206b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la/ khyod kyis ye shes nges par 'jug/ lha'i bu lam gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sems can yang dag nyid nges te// ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal med
206b3(dkon brtsegs): paratade la 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// rtogs pa thogs pa med par 'jug/ lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol pa/ ma nges phung por gyur pa la// gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams
206b4(dkon brtsegs): de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyo/ dad kyis bstan// lha'i bu stobs kyis brdas ga/ sol pa/ sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid lags te// de bzhin
206b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang ye shes dang // mi 'jigs bzhi yang de ba zhin du// kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs/ lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas
206b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos rnams med// ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med// don dam nyid du bstan to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs la gnas kyis
206b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la stobs gnas pas// des na de la 'jigs med de// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras// ji ltar 'dod dgu rnam par 'phrul// lha'i bu chos
206b8(dkon brtsegs): la 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang // de dag rab tu bstan mchis kyang // kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang // brda yang dmigasu ma mchis so// lha'i bu ye
207a1(dkon brtsegs): shes lhur len gyis gsol pa/ brjod pa thams cad rnam pa gzhan// chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan// mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma mchis// khyod kyis chos kyi
207a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gzigs// lha'i bu lam la brtson pas gsol pa/ nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams// gzhan gyi rgyud mchi'i gnas ma mchis// log par nges rnams kun du 'gror/ 
207a3(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis te// gang rnams ci 'drar mos 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags kham
207a4(dkon brtsegs): la sdug bsngal ba// de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mi sdug pa la nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// 'dod chags kham
207a5(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba// de dag khyod kyis// ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung // gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongasu brtags pas na/ 
207a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu rkyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongasu brtags pas na/ gti
207a7(dkon brtsegs): mug khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ 'tsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag/ ser sna
207a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon du 'phel 'gyur te// de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sdig pa'i grogs dang
207b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs pa na// 'thun pa'i khams ni rab tu 'byung // de la mos pa thob 'gyur ba// de dag 'dren pas rnam par mkhyen// lha'i bu rnam par shes pa snying por 'dzin pas gsol pa/ 
207b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis// ci 'dra'i khams la brten pa dang // mos pa de mthar phyin pa dag/ khyod kyis ma lus rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas gsol pa/ 
207b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis// gang gis rgyu 'byung nan tan dang // mos pa de la 'byung ba yang // smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsol pa/ sems
207b4(dkon brtsegs): can gang gis mkhas gang la// brten na ji ltar 'gyur ba/ da yi// rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// des na khyod ni dag da' bar mdzad// lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa/ 
207b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang // gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang / dmigs pa dang ni zhing rnams dang // dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung
207b6(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang // sred par mngon pa 'jug pa dang // sred pa zhi bar bgyid pa'i don// de dag smra ba'i mchog gis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po'i spyod yul
207b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ dbang po nyam chung rnam dag ni// gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par 'tshal// sred pa rnam par gzhig pa yang // rkang gnyis dam pas bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu dbang po
207b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rgyal bas gsol ba/ dbang po rtul po dur khrod rten// rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas// sred dang bcas pas khyod la blta// lha'i bu
208a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags can dang 'dod chags dang // zhi dang shes dang mi shes dang // sred pazhi dang dbang po rnams// rnam par
208a2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs la mngon mi dmigs// lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol ba/ zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi// gnad sems med dang dben pa dag/ dbang brtul po bsten pa'i ma// 
208a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol pa/ zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs// sems can shes pa rje su skye// zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar
208a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dang dang po tshol bas gsol pa/ gnod sems med dang byam sa pa dang // zhi ba ngo bo nyid ma gzigs// dag dang nyon mong
208a5(dkon brtsegs): ma dmigs te// des na 'jig rten khyad par 'phags/ lha'i bu dbang po rjesu 'brang gis gsol pa/ log par/ rnam par rtog pa dang // log pa nye bar ston pa yang / 
208a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs dam phyir kun sbyor te// bzlog pas thar par 'gyur ba gzigs// lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dngos la
208a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa mun pa ste// bzlog pas snang ba chen por 'gyur// de ni grags chen khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
208a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / mun pa snang ba dngos po rnams// rang bzhin nyid kyis ma mchis te// de ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs// lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ sems can gang gis shes
208b1(dkon brtsegs): ba gang // ji tsam yongasu bsgrub bgyis dang // snod du gang rung ji skad pa// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po dang zhe 'dras pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs spang phyir shes
208b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis// shes pa de la rtog bgyid pa// de yang ston pa khyod kyis mkhyen// de bas khyod la mngon par dga'// lha'i bu dbang po la dga' bas gsol pa/ yul dang dus dang gnas dag
208b3(dkon brtsegs): dang tha spyod pa rnam par bsgom pa dang // nyon mongs nyon mongs rnam dag pa// thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs// lha'i bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ dbang po rno rtul 'bring
208b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang // gang zag dag gi bsam pa dang // bcings dang tha dar dang zad pa'ang shes// g.yo ba med par khyod kyis ma khyen// lha'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ 
208b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rab 'bring rtul ba dang // nyon mongs ye shes tsher ba dang // gdul dang 'dul bar bgyid pa dag/ khyod kyi sa mtshan nyid med par gsungs// lha'i bu dbang po rnam
208b6(dkon brtsegs): par brtags kyis gsol pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam gtan dang // rnam thar kun nas nyon mongs dang // snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin ldan pa dang // rnam byang thub pa khyod kyis
208b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi shugs kyis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsten te// chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni// rang bzhin med par khyod kyis mkhyen// des na thams cad mkhyen
208b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi// lha'i bu stobs kyi go chas gsol pa/ chos rnams gang dag rang bzhin gang // chos gang gis ni brjod bgyis pa// yang dag ji bzhin thugasu chung // des na dus gsum
209a1(dkon brtsegs): chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa/ log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs// rnam pa bzhi ni skye bar 'gyur// las las skyes par de dag
209a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ des na khyod ni do zla med// lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi// gnyen po rnam par byang ba dang // bstan pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// 
209a3(dkon brtsegs): des na khyod la do zla med// lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan rnam thar ldang ba dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzin dang // kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag/ 
209a4(dkon brtsegs): ming tsam mo zhes khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu stobs las dbyung gis gsol pa/ bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang / da dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin// bag yod
209a5(dkon brtsegs): pa las byung ba ste// de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug/ lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel bas gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyA/ da kyi mkhyen pa ni// bsam gtan la sogs de dag dang // ldan
209a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par byang la 'jug/ de ni rlung ltar chags pa med// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs tshe// srid pa'i skyon dang
209a7(dkon brtsegs): yod ma 'dres// des na khyod la do zla med// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// byang chub gzhal yas tshol mdzad cing // 'dren pas yongasu spyad
209a8(dkon brtsegs): pas na// des na khyod ni dpa' bo lags// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la rtogs pas gsol pa/ mngon mthar sbyin pa sna tshogs dag/ blo mchog gsung tshe gsol bas na// spobs pa sna tshogs/ 
209b1(dkon brtsegs): rab mnga' bar// rnam par 'dren pa de nges byung // lha'i bu sngon mtha' la byang bas gsol pa/ sngon chad 'khor bar spyod pa'i tshe// tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa/ 'jig rten sgron rnams
209b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gzigs// des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' tshar phyin pas gsol pa/ sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la// dpa' bos sngon chad spyod mdzad pas/ 
209b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung // sems can khams la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir// bskal/ 
209b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba grangs med du// sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul nga la nges pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba brtags mdzad pas// 
209b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kun sems can med pa zhes// chos rnams thams ca/ dnges par mkhyen// 'du 'phrod tsam du rgyal bas gsu/ ngas// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsol pa/ 
209b6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// gnas dang gnas min rab mkhyen par// rnam par 'dren pa spyod mdzad pas// des na 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la spyod pas
209b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// gnas dang gnas min bsten bgyis nas// las dang rgyu rnams dpyad pas na// khams dang dbang po mos pa dang // bsam gtan sngon gyi mtha' yang mkhyen// lha'i bu sngon gyi/ 
209b8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' la yongasu rtog pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sngon mtha' yongs brtags pas// stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po// dpa' bo chen pos rnam par spel// des ni 'jig rten
210a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la gzigs// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa// dpa' bos sems can thams cad kyi// sngon gyi mtha' yi spyod pa dang // dge dang mi dge'i rgyu ba
210a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ mkhyen pas 'jig rten gso ba mdzad// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' spyod pa la so sor rtogs pas gsol pa/ thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi// sngon mtha' spyod pa rab mkhyen cing // khams
210a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mos pa mkhyen pas na// de phyir sems can gso ba mdzad// lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gyis gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// sngon gyi mtha' la brtags bgyis kyang // khyod kyi
210a4(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa chags mi mnga'// des na mgon la bdag mos la rags// lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// sngon mtha'i srid pa bsam bgyis
210a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang / rkang gnyis gtso bos yon tan gyi// pha rol phyin nus/ 'ga' ma mchis// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi/ skye dgu
210a6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs las ldan pa// shi 'pho skye bar 'gyur ba dag/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas spun gyis gzigs// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ rgyu gang gis ni las gang
210a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig/ bgyis shing rgyud drug mchir gyur pa// de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen// des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi// lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khams
210a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gi ni sems can gang // bsgos par gyur cing las bgyis pa'i// bag chags las dang sems can dag/ khyod kyis g.yo ba med par mkhyen// lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba rig pas gsol pa/ 
210b1(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen ji 'dra bsnyen bgyis shing // las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa// 'gro ba gang du mchis 'gyur ba// thub pa khyod kyis de yang mkhyen// lha'i bu dgos pa la mkhas pas
210b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ las de yi ni bgyis pa gang // dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// gang gi slad du las bgyis pa'i// de yang ma lus rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas gsol
210b3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ dngos po gang dag dmigs pa dang // las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pa// thams cad mkhyen pas de mkhyen te// de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags// lha'i bu dngos po rigangs
210b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam mkhas pa// dngos de ji ltar chags pa dang // de ni ji ltar grub pa yi// las de khyod kyis mngon par mkhyen// lha'i bu shes pa
210b5(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pas gsol pa/ shes pa gang gis dngos po de// brtags par gyur pa rab tu mkhyen// de la ji ltar chags gyur pa'ang // thub pa khyed kyis shin du mkhyen// 
210b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mngon par 'du byed pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ chags pa gang gis las rnams// nyon mongs gang gis 'du bgyis pa'i// nyon mongs de dag yang dag mkhyen// de bas
210b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni bdag gi mgon// lha'i bu 'gro ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba gang du las gang gis// mchi zhing sgrib pa gang rnyed nas// 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ba// de kun spyan ldan
210b8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dmigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba dag tu skyes rnams kyi// gang gi las rnams smin gyur pa'i// dmigs pa khyod kyis rab mkhyen te// de la
211a1(dkon brtsegs): / khyod kyi blo gros 'jug/ lha'i bu bag chags la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro dang 'gro bar mi rnams kyis// sngan chad bgyis pa'i sdig las dang // de bzhin dge ba'i las
211a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi// bag chags khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ 'gro bar 'byung po thams cad kyi// rlung dang gsar dang slad ma dang // las rnams gsum po khyod kyis/ 
211a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// de la so so'i skye bo 'khrul// lha'i bu rnam par smin pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ chung zhing rnam smin che ba dang / che zhing rnam smin chung ba dang // chung ngam che 'am mnyam pa'ang rung / 
211a4(dkon brtsegs): de la mu stegs can rnams rmongs// lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ tshe 'di las rnams gang lags dang // skyes pa'i las rnams gang lags dang // lan grangs
211a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi gang lags pa// de dag spyan ldan khyod kyis ma/ na// lha'i bu tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ tshe 'di la ni gang bgyis pa'i// las kyi rnam
211a6(dkon brtsegs): smin mi gang dag/ myong bar 'gyur ba gang dag la// so so'i skye bo rmongs pa mkhyen// lha'i bu skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ gang gis las gang bsags gyur te// skyes
211a7(dkon brtsegs): nas rnam par smin gyur pa// gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// shes rab chen pos de yang mkhyen// lha'i bu lan grangs gzhan na myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ las gang
211a8(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba yi// phyi dus rnam par smin 'gyur zhing // dus gzhan dag na yang 'byung ba// de dag yang dag nyid du mkhyen// lha'i bu yongasu ma smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa
211b1(dkon brtsegs): las rnams gang zhig bgyis gyur pa// yongasu smin par ma gyur na// de srid 'bras bu mi 'byin pa// rkang gnyis mchog gis de yang mkhyen// lha'i bu yongasu ma smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la
211b2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas gsol pa/ las gang dang ni ldan pa na// sems can 'di ni skyer 'gyur ba// pham pa med pas de mkhyen te// yongasu brtags nas rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu yongasu smin pa myong bar
211b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ las ni ji ltar yongs smin na// 'bras bu dkar bar 'gyur ba mkhyen// de la stong par rnam par mkhyen// lha'i bu yongasu smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la nges
211b4(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pas las kyi rnams// lci dang yang ba rab tu mkhyen// sems can bsam paH/ dgasu chud // de slang bcom ldan bdag gi bla// lha'i buSh+Ti
211b5(dkon brtsegs): yang la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ las gang gis ni sems can rnams// ngan song mchi bar 'gyur ba dang // lci ba dang / nga ni yang ba gzigs// de shes mkhyen pas rab tu mkhyen/ 
211b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ sems can spyod pa nyer bzung zhing // las kyi lci dang yang ba dag/ dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// mu stegs can rnam
