211b7(dkon brtsegs): de la rmongs// lha'i bu sems can gyi spod pa la sprod pas gsol pa/ sems can spyod pa spyad mdzad cing // las kyi rnam par smin pa bsten// phor phu'i chu dang gang+gA'i chu// lan tshas rnam par
211b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa bzhin// lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ slob dang mi slob rnam par smin// rkang gnyis dam pa ston mdzad cing // kun nas nyon mongs las myong nas// las ni zas par 'gyur
212a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan// lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la reg par byed pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas spyan gyis khams gsum na// las kyi 'bras bu bsten pa yi/ byis pa dag dang
212a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa gzigs// phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// lha'i bu las zad par byed pas gsol pa/ 'jig rten dag na rnam 'dren khyod// sems can rnams kyi shi 'pho dang // skye ba kun la
212a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes 'jug/ mkhyen pas 'jigs med phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dmigs pa med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dang skye dang las// 'gro dang de bzhin sems can dang // rnam smin
212a4(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam 'drar bstan pa// 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog gis mkhyen// lha'i bu nyon mongs pa la rtog pas gsol pa// ji ltar rmi lam skom pa zhi// shin du bsil ba'i chu 'thungs
212a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// rkang gnyis mchog khyod 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang / gti mug rnams kyang zad// lha'i bu yongasu rtog pa dang / bral bas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams
212a6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rtog las skyes pa ste// rmi lam dga' bar rtse ba bzhin// smra mchog khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu yongasu rtog pa zhi bar byed pas gsol pa/ yongasu rtog pa rab zhi bas// nyon
212a7(dkon brtsegs): mongs zad pa rab bstan te// rmi lam na ni sprin med ltar// mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu bstan// lha'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar// de bzhin zag pa rnams
212a8(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar// zag pa 'byung ba mkhas pa po// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu rmi lam rtog gis gsol pa/ rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar// de bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung ste/ nor
212b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la zag 'byung bar// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas gsol pa/ ji ltar bu mo'i rmi lam na// bu zhig byung la shi 'phos na// dga' dang sdug
212b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal tshor 'gyur ba// de bzhin 'gro ba khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu rmi lam rtogs pas gsol pa/ rmi lam dag na mgo bcang bzhin// khyod kyis zag pa zad pa gzigs// de ni mkhas pa
212b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la bstan// thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros nges par rtogs kyis gsol pa/ chos kun mkhyen pa khyod kyis ni// ji ltar rmi lam mdza' phrad
212b4(dkon brtsegs): dang // bral ba yang dag ma mchis gzigs// 'gro ba ji ba bzhin tshim par mdzad// lha'i bu ye shes yid kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi dam pa'i chos ston pa// thos nas yid
212b5(dkon brtsegs): ni dga' 'gyur te// rmi lam dag na rmi bstan bzhin// de ltar rgyal bas bstan par mdzad// lha'i bu yongasu dga' ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/ me long gzugs brnyan snang ba
212b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// 'gro ba mtha' dag gzigs pas na// bsam gtan mnga' ba khyod la ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten yid kyang dga'// lha'i bu blo gros nges pas gsol pa// thub pa pi wang sgra 'dra ba'i
212b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi dam chos thos gyur na// lha'i bu rnams kyang the tshom bor// rgyal ba mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sgyu mas tshim gis gsol pa/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma dag/ byis pa rmod
212b8(dkon brtsegs): byed yongs bstan na// mi mkhas de la rmongs par 'gyur// sgyu ma bzhin du khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sprul pa la sems kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar rmi lam sgyu mthong ba// de ltar khyod kyis 'gro/ 
213a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gzigs// mgon po'i bstan pa de thos nas// bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so// lha'i bu sgyu ma las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu sprul
213a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang rtsa sgyu ma lags par 'tshal bas na// de la rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis// de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs// lha'i bu rtogs pa'i rjesu rtogs kyis gsol pa// ji ltar brtson
213a3(dkon brtsegs): pas rmi lam na// sangs rgyas sku gzigs brtags pa bzhin// de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu kun du rtog pa 'jom gyis gsol/ 
213a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ kun rtog 'dod chags rgyu las te// 'dod chags dadangos pos bskyed ma lags// rtog pa ngan las 'a dod chags byung // de ni rnam 'dren khyod kyis gzigs// 
213a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu yongasu shes pa dang bas gsol pa/ ri su la ngag na sgra byung ba// brag cha sems can sgra ma lag sa// de bzhin 'jig rten khyod kyis gzigs// de slang 'jig rten
213a6(dkon brtsegs): chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu ston pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ sgra ni yang ma mchis te// sgra ni brag cha 'dra ba legs// 'on kyang mi dbang khyod kyis bstan// byis pa mang po rab tu btsud // lha'i bu/ 
213a7(dkon brtsegs): nan tan la mkhas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang // byis pa rnams kyis gzhan du brtags// nan tan chos las shes par gyis// de la bdag ni the tshom chad// 
213a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu don gyi rjesu 'brang bas gsol pa/ chos don yang dag gang lags pa// de ni sus kyang ma rtogs shing // sus kyang ma bstan 'tshal ma gyur// de skad thub pa'i mchog gis gsungs
213b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos kyi brda rtog pas gsol pa/ zag dang dri ma nyon mongs dang // bag chags dang ni rtogs dang rtog/ kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa// thub pa brda yi tshig kyang lags/ 
213b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu kun du rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag dang // zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang // ngag dang gshad dang nyid dang // ston pa'ing kun ming tsam lags/ 
213b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ khams gsum rnams la ma chags te// na mkha' 'dra ba'i thugs mnga' ba// bral bar gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas// zhi ba'i sems la
213b4(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu ma gos pas gsol pa// thub pa khyod kyis thugs yid ni// gzugs dang gdazugs med mi gnas shing // 'dod dang mya ngan 'das pa la// 
213b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma mchis par snang 'dra// lha'i bu re ba med pas gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i khams la re ba spangs/ gzugs dang gzugs min gnyi gar min// 'du 'ji
213b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang bral gyur pa// sred zad khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pa byung bas gsol pa/ 'byung ba dag dang 'jig pa la// khyod kyi sred pa yang dag chang // khams
213b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum kun la chags mi mnga'// rnam par 'dren la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pa zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten 'di dag zil mnan nas// khyu mchog dam
213b8(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod mdzad cing // sems can 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa// thugs brtse khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pa dang bral gyis gsol pa/ kun du sbyor dang bral ba ste// 
214a1(dkon brtsegs): yang srid bas pas zhir gyur pa// dag pa'i bdag nyid dag pa'i sems// dus dang bral la phyag 'tshalo// lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rig pas gsol pa/ chos rnams
214a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dngos med pa// ji bzhin dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen// bcings pa ma mchis grol ma mchis// yang dag gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu 'dam las brgal bas
214a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i 'dam las brgal ba ste// srid pa'i 'dam las de bzhin brgal// gzigs pa mi mnga' len mi mnga'// yang srid rgal la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zad
214a4(dkon brtsegs): zing spangs kyis gsol pa/ zang zing spangs shing dri ma spa dngas// re ba spangs shing sdig pa'ang spangs// sangs rgyas sgrib pa rnam spangs pa// don rtogs khyod la phyag kyang
214a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// lha'i bu re ba spangs kyis gsol pa/ don dang don ma lags pa spangs// chags pa mi mnga' nges rtogs pa// bdud kyi zhags las rnam 'das pa// len med
214a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu phan par 'dod pas gsol pa/ bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi// lam gang nyon mongs rim med pa// sgrib pa med par gzigs pa po// dpa' chen khyod
214a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis de yang gzigs// lha'i bu grags pa thob kyis gsol pa/ 'dren pa 'jig rten rnam grags pa// khyod kyis mkhyen la brtson pa rnams// ji skad bstan bzhin rab rdog na// nyon mongs/ 
214a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni nub par 'gyur// lha'i bu 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ chos rnams kun la nges pas na// bsngo ba gang yang yong ma gzigs// ye shes rgya mtsho mo spangs par// sang
214b1(dkon brtsegs): ge'i sgra ni sgrog par mdzad// lha'i bu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ 'jigs pa kun las yang dag brgal// zug rngu thams cad kun du bton// bsnyengs pa mi mang
214b2(dkon brtsegs): zhum mi mnga'// thams cad zil gnon phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas med kyis gsol pa/ lha rnams dang ni dri za dang / bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa yis// khyod kyi chos la rgal
214b3(dkon brtsegs): mi nus// de bas khyod la bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu seng ge'i rtsal gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad yongs mkhyen pas// sangs rgyas gyur la 'jigs mi mnga'// bdag
214b4(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyis sus rgol zhes// bde gshegs khyod la da dogs mi mnga'// lha'i bu skrag med kyis gsol pa / seng ge ri sul gnas pa ni// 'jigs pa ma mchis
214b5(dkon brtsegs): skrag ma mchis// ri dgas phra mo yongs btul te// spa skong gnas na nga ro sgrogs// de bzhin thams cad ma khyen pa yang // mu stegs can rnams yongs skrag ste// lha
214b6(dkon brtsegs): klu dri za'i 'jig rten na// mtshungs med gzigs nas gsung yang sgrog/ lha'i bu thams cad zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'jig rten na// sangs rgyas nyid la sngo
214b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa// 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te// des na rgyal ba bdag gi skyabs// lha'i bu seng ge'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs// chos rnams kun
214b8(dkon brtsegs): la 'jigs mi mnga'/ khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis te// cis mi bsnyengs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu rje su 'thun par skyes kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas nyid du dam bcas na// 'di na
215a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod la rgol ma mchis// 'jig rten 'dren pa chos kyis ni// khyod la gang rgol de ma mchis// lha'i bu mdzod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ seng ge'i nga ro gsung bsgrag/ 
215a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ khyod kyis chos kyi mdzod bzung bas// srog chags bye ba stong dag gis// byang chub mchog tu sems kyang skyes// lha'i bu brtul zhugs rje su 'thun gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rjes
215a3(dkon brtsegs): 'thun brtul shugs can// dpal chen de dag thob chen thob// byang chub mchog tu sems btud cing // gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur// lha'i bu rjesu 'thun pa'i chos la dga' bas
215a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ khyod kyi bstan pa sus thos te// byang chub mtsho dag tu sems btud pa// de dag 'jig rten sems can che// gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag
215a5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ 'jig rten dag na rgol med pa'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung thos nas// srog chags bye ba/ stong dag gis// byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/ 
215a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems rgyun yongasu dag pas gsol pa// yun ring dus na mi dbang gis// sangs rgyas bslabs la legs bslabs pas// de slang khyod ni thugs rgyud dag/ mtshan rab sum cu
215a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pa med pa'i yid kyis gsol pa/ zag pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad de// dam bcas pa la mngon bzhugs na/ 
215a8(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba 'di na yong ma mchis// lha'i bu de kho na'i rjesu song bas gsol pa/ khyod kyi gsung la smra 'gyur ba'i// lha dang lha bu mi dag ni// 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te// des na thub
215b1(dkon brtsegs): pa stobs dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pa zad pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dge sbyong dam pa'i zag pa ni// ma lus yongasu bas pa ste// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// des na sangs rgyas bdag gi
215b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ lha'i bu rtag tu brtson gyis gsol pa/ khyod la nyon mongs lus so zhes// mi dbang khyod la gang rgol ba// rnam pa kun du mi dmigs te// de na sangs rgyas bsnyengs mi mnga'/ 
215b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems zhi bas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi ba ste// gti mug bag chags bcas par zhi// nyes spyod las kyang zhi bas na// sems zhi khyod la phyag 'tshalo// lha'i bu rnal
215b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byor spyod pas gsol pa/ rnal 'byor gang gis nyon mongs gang // bas par 'gyur ba lta ba'i tshe// de la khyod kyis mkhyen kun 'jug/ des na khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// 
215b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'dren pas/ gang la bslabs pa yi// rnal 'byor tshogs ni mthar yas te// thams cad mkhyen pa de slad du// nyon mongs
215b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma lus pas// lha'i bu rnal 'byor blo gros kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi blo// rnal 'byor las ni nyams ma mchis// des na khyod kyis nyon mongs kun// 
215b7(dkon brtsegs): bag chags bcas par yongasu btsal// lha'i bu zhi ba rig pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs thams cad zad gyur nas// bag chags ma lus yongasu bsal// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' rgyal
215b8(dkon brtsegs): sras dang // cis kyang mi bsnyengs spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu zag pa la rtogs pas gsol pa/ thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod// nyon mongs bag chags bcas par bas/ 
216a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni// mtshungs pa gang yang mi dmigs so// lha'i bu bag la nyal phyung gis gsol pa/ khyod kyis bag chags ma lus bsal// khyod la skyon dri/ 
216a2(dkon brtsegs): yong ma mchis// de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen// lha rnams kun gyi thub pa'i thub// lha'i bu mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa/ zag pa rnams ni spangs pas na// skye ba yang skye
216a3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags te// thub pa khyod skye tha ma pa// des na mgon po bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu tshad bsrung gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyis sa bon spangs// sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par
216a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te mya ngan mkhri shing rnam par bskams// gdung ba med la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shing btags bto dan gyis gsol pa/ thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod// 
216a5(dkon brtsegs): ma rig shing btags rnams kyang bsal// sangs rgyas spu nga pa rnam par spangs// de bas ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol du song bas gsam
216a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ srid pa'i mtsho las yang dag brgal// rnam par 'dren pa bya ba byas// khyod kyis snang ba yang dag phyung // 'jigs med khyod ni don kyang grub// lha'i bu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro
216a7(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhir gyur pa// nyon mongs thams cad rab tu bshig/ bag chags rdul tsam yong mi mnga'// mgon po khyod la phyug kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi
216a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng // nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal// chos kyi lam srang mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu/ 
216b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnaso// thub pa chos rnams kun mkhyen pa// sems can kun gyi dge bshes gnyen// ye shes maco la phyag kyang
216b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi gos can gyis gsol pa// khyod kyi sras po 'jigs med pa// sang ge'i nga ro rnam sgrog kyang // rgyal sras de dag chog med cing // sangs rgyas chos kyi don
216b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis bsgom// lha'i bu chos don du gnyer bas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams don gnyer bar// khyod kyis sras rnams sems bskyed cing // khyod kyis mi 'jigs
216b4(dkon brtsegs): zos gyur nas// mkhas pa de dag byang chub tshol/ da lha'i bu chos kyis skom gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis mi 'jigs thob gyur nas// sangs rgyas chos rnams
216b5(dkon brtsegs): btsal ba'i phyir// srog chags bye ba skom gyur te// brtson 'gru/ sa brtan pa rab tu brtson// / bam po bcu gcig pa// lha'i bu chos kyi 'phags kyis gsol pa/ sangs
216b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos kyis mngon 'phags shing // 'jigs pa med par 'dul mdzad pa'i// gsung ba'i mchog gyur khyod mthong nas// brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol// lha'i bu chos 'dzin
216b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ thub pa zab cing lta dka' ba'i// chos ni khyod kyis rab bstan pa// khyod kyi sras kyis thos gyur nas// de dag bla med byang chub tshol// lha'i bu lta ba med pas gsol pa// khyod kyis
216b8(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i gsung thos nas// khyod kyi sras po dpa' nges pa// lus dang srog la mi lta bar// byang chub don du gnyer bar bgyis// lha'i bu gzhan du mi sems pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ thub pa bsnyed
217a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mnga' ba// khyod kyi dam chos 'di thos nas// gzhan du sems pa ma mchis par// brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol// lha'i bu gzhan du mi 'gro bas gsol pa/ 
217a2(dkon brtsegs): mi dbang khyod kyi gsung thos nas// theg pa gnyis po spang bgyis cing // lam gzhan du ni mi mchi bar// bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol// lha'i bu nye bar gnas kyis gsol pa/ seng ge'i nga ro 'di
217a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos gyur nas// byang chub mchog la nyer gyur cing // de dag rkang gnyis dam pa 'gyur// lha'i bu spobs pa nye bar gyur pas gsol pa/ grags chen khyod kyis
217a4(dkon brtsegs): gsung brjod pa'i// spobs pa de ni thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas chos la khyod kyis sras// kun kyang dga' ba rab tu skyes// / lha'i bu spobs pa thob pas gsol pa/ 'jigs med khyod kyis
217a5(dkon brtsegs): gasrung bsgrags pa// ma smad sras kyis thos gyur na// de dag spob sa pa nam du yang // sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog/ lha'i bu rtag tu rab dgas gsol pa/ 'jigs med khyed kyis
217a6(dkon brtsegs): gsung bsgrags pas// stobs chen khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// rtag tu rab tu dga' gyur cing // ma smad de dag byang chub tshol// lha'i bu yid zhum pa med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos gyur/ 
217a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyi sras// dga' zhing zhum pa ma mchis par// byang chub mchog ni tshol bar bgyid// lha'i bu thogs med yid kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos pas na// 
217a8(dkon brtsegs): sems rang gyur cing yid dga' ste// de dag yid ni nam du yang // byang chub nyid du thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos la bar chad med la mkhas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams gang la brten bgyis kyang
217b1(dkon brtsegs): dkar po'i phyogs dag mi 'grib cing // de yi bar chad mi 'gyur ba'i// gnas ni thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu chos nges par bstan pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dkar po'i phyogs la
217b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa la// bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen// des na ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dge la kun
217b3(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa// nag po'i phyogs kyi rang bzhin te// khyod kyi thugs ni des mi gos// gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen// lha'i bu rigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ nag po'i
217b4(dkon brtsegs): chos ni nam du yang // dkar po'i chos dang mi 'grogs pa/ dar// rigs par bcom ldan khyod kyis gsungs// des na bcom ldan bdag gi bla// lha'i bu dge ba dang mi dge ba
217b5(dkon brtsegs): rig pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad ma 'dres pa// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis mkhyen// kun nas nyon mongs brtags pas na// dkar po'i phyogs las 'grib par
217b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// lha'i bu lam la mkhas pas gsol pa/ kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa la// dkar po'i phyogs ni mi 'byung ste// de ltar 'tshal bar ma gyur la// bar chad du ni 'gyur bar gsungs// lha'i
217b7(dkon brtsegs): bu thar pa 'dod kyis gsol pa/ nag po'i phyogs la brten bgyid na// thar par 'dod pa mang po yi// bar du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs// des na rgyal khyod thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu dag pa'i
217b8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis gsol pa/ sems grol bgyi bar gang 'tshal bas// kun nas nyon mongs shes bya zhes// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis gsungs// de khyod 'jig rten mchod rten lags// lha'i bu nyon mong/ 
218a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong gis gsol pa/ kun nas nyon mongs sbyod bgyid pa// kun nas nyon mongs ma 'tshal na// dam pa'i chos ni shes mi nus// de skad bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// 
218a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sdig mthong gis gsol pa/ sdig pa rnams la brten byas kyang // dge ba mi 'grib gang smra ba// de ni thar chos skal med ces// rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu gdul bar bya/ 
218a3(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa/ chags pa gdul bar gang 'dod dang // zhe sdang gti mug gdul 'dod pas// thub pa'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba// de lta bu ni nan tan bgyi// lnga'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa dag
218a4(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ ngag dang kun nas nyon mongs pa// mi ma khas gang rnams mi shes pa// de dag ston pa sangs rgyas min// de skad drang srong mchog gis gsungs// lha'i bu thar pa/ 
218a5(dkon brtsegs): la brtson pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs 'grib par 'gyur/ ba'i chos// rgyal ba yis ni gang bstan pa// de brten nyon mongs mi zad ces// khyod la rgol ba yod ma mchis// lha'i bu
218a6(dkon brtsegs): thar pa la mngon par phyogs pas gsol pa/ chos gang nyon mongs gang gis rnams// zag 'gyur thugs pas bstan pa la// yang dag brtson byas mi zad ces// rgol ba 'di ni yong mi dmigs// 
218a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rnal 'byor la brtson pas gsol pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis nyan thos la// gang gi don du chos bstan pa// de brtson bgyis pas mi thob ces// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mi 'jigs
218a8(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags spang phyir mi sdug pa// bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis na// 'dod chags zad par mi 'gyur zhes/ khyod la rgal ba yod ma mchis// lha'i bu 'gro ba med pa rab
218b1(dkon brtsegs): tu shes kyis gsol pa/ shin du bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba// zhe sdang spang phyir byams gsungs pa// de bsgrubs sel bar mi 'gyur zhes// dgra 'joms khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mig
218b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag gis gsol pa/ shes rab gti mug spang ba'i phyir// gsungs pa de la brten bgyis kyang // gti mug sel bar mi 'gyur zhes// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu
218b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ni// dbugs 'byung rngub pa dran gsungs pa// de la brtson bgyis mi zhi zhes// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// / 
218b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa lhur len pas gsol pa// nga'o snyam pa spang slad du// stong nyid khyod kyis bka' stsal te// des ni des zhi mi 'gyur zhes// 'di na khyod la
218b5(dkon brtsegs): rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs// gyis gsol pa/ nga snyam nga rgyal spang slad du// mtsha/ na ma med pa khyod kyis gsungs// brten kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur
218b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes/ 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu sems rgyud rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pas dag pa yi// nyon mongs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// de nas nyon mongs
218b7(dkon brtsegs): mi zad ces// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu 'du shes rnam par bshig gis gsol pa/ phyogs dang gnyen po'i rnam pa dang / nyon mongs lam dang lam 'jug la// 'jigs
218b8(dkon brtsegs): pa med par rgol ba na// thub pa chen po ma mthong ngo // lha'i bu tha snyad shin du shes pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan phyogs dang phyogs min dang // zad dang ma zad tha snyad tsam// 'jigs
219a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis rgol bgyid pa// thub pa de ni ming tsam mo// lha'i bu lus kyi las dul bas gsol ba/ mkhyen pas yongasu mkhyen gyur nas// khyod kyi sku yi phrin lnga
219a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug/ thams cad ma lus mkhyen pas na// des na 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu lus kyi las yongasu shes pas gsol pa/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas// dpa' khyod sku ma
219a3(dkon brtsegs): phran las ni// mtha' dag shin du nges pa lags// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi las shin du nges pas gsol pa/ sku yi phrin las rab nges par// lus can
219a4(dkon brtsegs): kun la sman slad du// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod mdzad de// des na khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lha'i bu lus kyi mtha' shi na du mthong bas gsol pa/ sems can kun la sman
219a5(dkon brtsegs): slad du'adren pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni// sku yi phrin las dag pa dang // legs par yongasu brtags dang / ldan// lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mnyam
219a6(dkon brtsegs): par bzhag pas gsol pa/ shin du mnyam par bzhag sku dang // sku yi phrin las dag pa dang // ldan par sems can bde don du// gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu tshig
219a7(dkon brtsegs): grub kyis gsol pa/ snyan cing yon tan ldan pa dang // rtsub pa yongs su spangs pa'i gsungs// mkhyen pas shin du yongs brtags shing // mgon pa khyod ni gsung ba mdzad
219a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dus su smra bas gsol pa/ dus su don dang ldan pa dang // don med yongasu spangs pa'i gsung // gzung bar 'os dang blang 'os dang // 'dren pa khyod ni gsung ba mdzad// lha'i
219b1(dkon brtsegs): bu sdums byed blo gros kyis gsol pa/ dbyen du 'gyur ba yongs spangs te// 'dum par 'gyur dang yid 'ong ba// dbyen med 'bras bu rnam par smin// sngon chad khyod kyis gsung du brjod/ 
219b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mi slu bas gsol pa/ srog gi don du'ang khyod kyis ni// srid pa rnamasu brdzun ma gsungs// de bas khyod kyi grags pa kun// 'jig rten dag na thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu yang
219b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par smra bas gsol pa/ 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal slad du// thub pa'i gsung la sdod pa ni// yang dag gsungs pa'i rgyu 'thun
219b4(dkon brtsegs): lags// lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' las nges par/ 'byung gis gsol pa// mi mchog khyod kyi bden pa yis// rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsgrubs te// / 
219b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi yang dag rang bzhin yang // rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu yang dag pa la brtul ba sa gsol pa/ 'dus byas dag ni chos kyi rnams// 
219b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ji bzhin lta ba dang // chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid kyang // mi yi dbang pos rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu lnga la rtog pas gsol pa/ ye shos yongasu dag pa yis// bdag
219b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang ni gzhan dag gi/ tshig gi las kyang rab tu mkhyen// des na rgyal ba mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu yid la rtog pas gsol pa/ mi yi dbang po'i thugs kyi las// ji snyed gang dag
219b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ni// de dag 'gro ba thugs rjes 'jug/ 'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gang
220a1(dkon brtsegs): la khyod ni spyod mdzad pa// de la thugs ni dul bar byung // 'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu thabs la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnam dpyad
220a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rnam 'dren thugs kyi phrin las 'jug/ thub pa ye shes sna tshogs ni// mkhyen bzhin kun du rab tu 'jug/ lha'i bu yid rnam par bshig gis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas sa dang yid kyi/ 
220a3(dkon brtsegs): las ha sems can thugs rjes gzigs pas 'byung // sangs rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs// rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu 'das pa la mkhas pas gsol ba/ sbyin dang tshul
220a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan dag la da yang // gang gis gang la mngon spyad pa// sngon gyi dus kyang rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu 'das pa la rtog pas gsol pa
220a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog no tshol mdzad cing // gang drung khyod kyis sngon spyad pa// sngon gyi spyod pa yongs brtags nas// sangs rgyas bya ba rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum
220a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// gang du khyod kyis sngon spyad pa// sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdzad kyang / khyod kyi thugs yid thogs mi mnga'// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la yongasu
220a7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mang las byung ba yi// ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub bya ba// sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med la// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis zhus// lha'i bu sngon gyi sbyor ba las
220a8(dkon brtsegs): nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas drung dag tu// grangs med dpag tu med pa yi// ting 'dzin sgo dag 'dren pa yis// zhus shing bsgom pa mdzad par 'gyur// lha'i bu sngon gyi gnas la
220b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas gsol pa/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa rab mang dang // bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ gzigs pas sems can rnams la ston// sems can long ba rnams kyang 'grel// lha'i bu sngon
220b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi dus na 'phrul pas gsol pa/ gzhan dang gzhan dag zos shing 'tshal// rtse zhing rab tu dga' ba bgyis// gnod pa mi zad bgyis pa dag/ gzhan dang gzhan yang khyod kyis gzigs
220b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sngon gyi spyod pas yang dag par byung gis gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa 'gro rtogs pa// khyod kyi ye shes 'das dus kyi// las dang bsam gtan snyoms 'jug dang // 'gro ba rnams la
220b4(dkon brtsegs): thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas ga/ sol pa/ 'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni// ma 'ongs du das kyi 'chi 'pho dang // skye dang las kyi rnam smin la// thogs
220b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ma mchis so// lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ brtan pa 'gro ba mkhas khyod kyi/ mkhyen pa phyi dus sems can gyi// bsam dang las kyi
220b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu dang // 'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu srid pa las bskyod kyis gsol pa/ khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang // dus gsum kun la mkhas khyod kyi// ye shes
220b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni mi chags te// srid pa'i spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu tha snyad la spyod pas gsol pa/ las dang sems can 'gro ba dang // rnam par smin pa myong ba dag/ de dag thams cad
220b8(dkon brtsegs): ming tsam du// rkang gnyis dam pa bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la yang dag par rtog pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// da ltar byung ba thogs ma mchis/ 
221a1(dkon brtsegs): grangs med sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni// 'jig rten mgon po rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu nga ltar byung ba la dpyod pas gsol pa/ mi mi dbang pos rnam dpyad nas/ 
221a2(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i blo gros rmongs bgyis pa// dus gsum dngos po ma mchis par// nges par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs// lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ dus gsum
221a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma mchis shing // ngo bo nyid la mi gnas te// dngos po thams cad dngos med par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dus gsum mngon par bskul bas gso
221a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang // da ltar byung ba'i bu dang po rnams// ma mchis dngos po ma mchis par// skyes bu dam pa bstan pa mdzad// lnga'i bu chags med/ 
221a5(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis gsol pa/ dus gsum sems can thams nga la// stong po mchis par ma bstan te// sgyu ma smig rgyu mig yor dang // brag cha lta bur khyod kyis bstan
221a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dus gsum dpog gis gsol pa/ 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// dus gsum po dag kun du yang // sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pa ni// khyod kyi dbang po chags mi mnga'
221a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mos pa yongasu rig par byed kyis gsol pa/ gang gi nub mo dpa' khyod kyis// byang chub mngon du bgyis gyur pa// de dus tshun chad mos pa la// bri bar gyur par yong
221a8(dkon brtsegs): mi gda'// lha'i bu mos pa yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma'i mos pa ni// rab tu rgyun chang mi 'gyur te// rtag par khyod kyis mos pa des// khyod kyi sras rnams
221b1(dkon brtsegs): mos pa chen// lha'i bu mos pas mngon 'phags kyis gsol pa/ chab las pad+ma ji bzhin du// khyod ni mos pas mngon du 'phags// 'jig rten dag gis mi gos te// pad+mar chab kyis
221b2(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin no// lha'i bu mos pas yongasu grol bas gsol pa/ 'jig rten mgon dang mos pa ni// chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod pa ste// gnyis med gnyis su bgyir ma mchis// 
221b3(dkon brtsegs): smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/ gzi brjid chen po brtson 'grus kyis// byang chub yang dag brnyes par 'gyur// mdzad pa mdzad
221b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang mgon po khyod// brtson 'grus btang ba yod ma ma dzang// lha'i bu dran pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po'i dgongs pa ni// thams cad kun tu
221b5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'jug/ mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod// da/ gongs pa bri ba yong ma mchis// lha'i bu sems mnyam pa ra bzhags pas gsol pa/ mgon po rtag tu mnyam bzhag/ 
221b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ sems can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen// 'dren pa spyod pa'i dbang gis ni// sems can rnams la chos kyang ston// lha'i bu shes rab lhur len gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron mar gyur
221b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis// ye shes rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma ni// bskal pa bye bar brjod bgyis kyang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad mi spyod// lha'i bu rnam par grol ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 
221b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol dang ma grol ba// gang slang khyod kyis ma brnyes pas// mtshungs pa med pa khyod la ni// rnam grol yongs su nyams mi mnga'// lha'i bu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la
222a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson pas gsol pa/ thub pa khyod ni rnam grol nas// ngo bo nyid med mkhyen pas na// rnam grol ye shes gzigs pas ni// yang dag mkhyen pa nyams mi
222a2(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ lha'i bu sngon gyi srid pa rnam par spyod kyis gsol pa/ mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du// dpa' bo yang dag gzigs khyod kyis// spyod la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ste// de na sangs rgyas
222a3(dkon brtsegs): lags shes bstod// lha'i bu zab ma la spyod pas gsol pa/ srog chags gzhan dag ji bzhin du// bde gshegs khyod la mchog mi mnga'// chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen pas na// rang bzhin de la
222a4(dkon brtsegs): rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu blo gros yangs pas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la ni// rnam pa kun du bsnyel mi mnga'// mgon po dgongs pa nyer bzhag pas// thub pa
222a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bru mar snod dang 'dra// lha'i bu sems g.yeng ba med/ kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni// mnya ma par ma bzhag sems mi mnga'// ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos
222a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnams// srog chags kun gyis shes par dka'// lha'i bu ye shes la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/ bde bar gshegs pa khyod la ni// ma brtags btang snyoms mi mnga' ste// ma
222a7(dkon brtsegs): yi dbang po'i sangs rgyas chos// ma 'dres pa ni bsam mi khyab// lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis gsol pa/ skyes bu khyu mchog khyod la ni// 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/ 
222a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa ma pham pa// khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu snying po blangs pas gsol ba/ sems can snying po bla na med// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi
222b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam brnyes pa// sangs rgyas byang chub phyag 'tshal lo// gnas gtsang ma'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can spyod/ 
222b2(dkon brtsegs): pa can dang / kun du rgyu drug khris lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu dang / grul bum dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang / phreng ldan glang po che can
222b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / 'od gsal dang / 
222b4(dkon brtsegs): dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos/ gnas gtsang dma'i ris kyi lha dag gis bstod pa brjod pa yang thos nas ngo
222b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshar thob par gyur te/ chos kyis tshul la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di ltar sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi/ tshul thos pas yid gnyi su gyur/ nem nur dang the tsom za bar
222b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye go'u ta ma sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas bdag cag ni kun du rgyu'i gnas kyang mi 'tshal/ khyim gyi gnas kyang
222b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'tshal bar gyur cing / 'di ltar sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas chos 'di la nem nur dang the tshom du gyur te/ sems dang bar yang ma gyur mod kyi 'on kyang dge sbyong gi/ 
222b8(dkon brtsegs): ta ma khyod la bdag cag yid ches pa mchiso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar dge sbyong go'u ta ma khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul mngon/ 
223a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par mdzad pas bdag cag gis lha'i 'khor rgya chen po 'di dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phal cher/ go'u ta ma khyod kyi
223a2(dkon brtsegs): legs par gsungs pa 'tshal cing yid rangs par gyur pa mthong ste/ des na bdag cag dge sbyong go'u ta ma khyod la dad pa mchis par gyur to// kye go'u ta ma gang 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnam
223a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes smras pa de la/ ji ltar chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa snyam du bdag cag the tshom cher 'tshalo// dge sbyong go'u ta ma khyod ni/ 
223a4(dkon brtsegs): ci nas bdag cag legs par bshad pa'i don de rtogs na/ sa mun pa med par gyur te/ stan 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag cag la chos ston spyod do snyam ste/ bdag cag
223a5(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong go'u ta ma khyod la de ltar mngon par dad par gyur to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang / kun du rgyu rnams la 'di
223a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to// kun du rgyu dag de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma legaso zhes gsol te/ kun du rgyu de dag bcom ldan
223a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun du rgyu dag khyed kyis ji ltar mngal du 'jug pa shes sam/ de dag gis gsol pa/ kye goruta
223a8(dkon brtsegs): ma bdag gis bstan bcos las thos na gsum 'dus nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te/ gang 'di pa dang ma gnyis kyang tshogs pa dang / chags par yang gyur pa dang / chags
223b1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags pas/ 'dod chags kyang 'byung ba de'i tshe mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhe'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
223b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ pa dang ma gnyis rnam par rtog pa'i tshe 'dod chags de ma'i sems las byung ngam/ gsol pa/ kye go'u ta ma ma lag so// ma'i rnam par
223b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa las byung ngam/ kye go'u tra ma ma lag so// pa'i sems las byung ngam/ kye go'u ta ma ma lag so// pa'i rnam par rtogs pa las byung ngam/ kye go'u ta ma ma lags so// 
223b4(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ nga'i 'dod cha/ dgas gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma de ni mi lagaso// kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du
223b5(dkon brtsegs): sems/ pa'i sems gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma de ni ma lag so// kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ nga'i kun tu rtog pa de ma'i
223b6(dkon brtsegs): mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma de ni ma lag so// kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de lha las 'chi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta
223b7(dkon brtsegs): ma ma 'tshal to// kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa mi dang lha ma yin dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
223b8(dkon brtsegs): rten nas shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma ma 'tshal to// kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de gzugs yod pa 'am/ gzugs
224a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhig ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u tam ma 'tshal to// kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'dushes
224a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau'u ta ma ma 'tshal to// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag la 'di skad ces
224a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// kun du rgyu dag chos 'di ni zab cing phra ste/ mkhas pa shes pa blo dang ldan pas rig par bya ba yin te/ brtag tu med cing brtag pa'i yul ma yin la blta dka'
224a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing shes par dka' bas de ni khyod yun ring por gzhan du bltas pa/ gzhan du mos pa/ gzhan du dod pa/ gzhan du brtson pa/ gzhan gyi lta ba'i gnas la gnas pa
224a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis shes par mi nus kyi/ kun du rgyu dag 'on/ kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag tshul dang / 'dra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas chos zab mo
224a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mig skye bar 'gyur te/ kun du rgyu dog 'di lta ste dper na/ mi mig gi dbang po nyams pa ni/ de'i tshul dang 'dra ba'i gso ba byed pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na tshe 'di
224a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid la mig yong su dag par 'gyur te/ mig des kyang tshe 'di nyid la gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu dag de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi mig nyam
224a8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pas kyang tshul dang 'dra ba'i bu shes gnyen la brten na shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ des kyang chos zab mo rnams mthong bar 'gyur// kun du rgyu dag khyed kyang
224b1(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas gzhan du bltas pa/ sngon log pa'i gdam ngag gis bslus pa/ chos ma yin pa la chosu 'du shes pa/ thar pa ma yin pa la thar par 'du shes pa/ 'byung ba ma yin pa 'byung bar
224b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa/ chus zos pa rnams kyis chud bsan pa yin te/ kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na long ba'i dmigs pu long bar byas nas/ gang 'di 'gro ba dang khrid pa de gnyi ga yang tshul ma yin/ 
224b3(dkon brtsegs): par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// kun du rgyu dag de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang la la ston pa ma yin par bdag cag ni ston pa yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang / 
224b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par bdag ca dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no// da zhes khas 'che ba dang / 'byung ba la mkhas pa ma yin par
224b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni 'byung ba la mkhas pa'o zhes khas 'che ba'am/ 'thung ba mthong ba ma yin par bdag cag ni 'byung / ba yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang / mu stegs byed pa ma yin
224b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bdag cag ni mu stegs can byed pa yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/ de dag ston pa ma yin par ston pa'o zhes khas 'che zhing gang rjesu ston pa de ni logs par rje su ston par 'gyur
224b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par gang khong du chud par byed pa de ni log par khong du chud par byed par 'gyur/ 'byung ba la mkhas pa ma yin par gang 'byin pa de ni log par
224b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byin par 'gyur/ 'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par gang 'byung ba ston pa de ni log par ston par 'gyur/ mu stegs byed pa ma yin par gang bsgral pa de ni log par sgrol bar 'gyur te/ de
225a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na ba lang rdzi rab ka la mkhas pa ma yin pas rab ka ma yin par
225a2(dkon brtsegs): glang bsgral na de'i ba glang de dag gis pha rol dang tshu rol gyi 'gram ma rnyed par 'khyil te// de nyid du tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ba lang rdzi de
225a3(dkon brtsegs): rab ka la mi mkhas pa'i phyiraro// kun du rgyu dag de bzhin du gang la la mu stegs byed pa ma yin par mu stegs byed par khas 'che zhing gang sgrol ba de ni tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob
225a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu dag nga ni ston pa nyid yin la sto ngan par khas 'che bas nga gang rjesu ston pa de yang dag dpar rjesu ston pa yin/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
225a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu khas 'che bas/ nga gang khong du chud par byed pa de/ yang dag pa/ khong du chud par byed pa yin/ 'byung ba la mkhas pa nyid yi/ 
225a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'byung ba la mkhas par khas 'che bas/ nga gang 'byin pa de dag yang dag par 'byin pa yin/ 'byung ba mthong ba nyid yin la 'byung ba ston pa mkhas 'che bas nga gang 'byung ba ston pa de yang
225a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par ston pa yin/ mu stegs byed pa nyid yin la mu stegs byed par khas 'che bas nga gang sgrol ba de yang yang dag par sgrol ba yin te/ ston pa'i chos rab tu shes nas ni rjesu ston/ 
225a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes nas ni khong du chud par byed/ 'byung ba rab tu shes nas ni 'byin/ yang dag par mthong nas ni ston/ mu stegs rab tu shes nas sgrol te/ gang sgrol ba de yang mu steg
225b1(dkon brtsegs): bde bas rab tu sgrol ba yin no// 'di lta ste kun du rgyu dag khyod kyang thar pa 'dod pa yin la nga yang ston pa mngon du bzhugs pa yin te/ yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa/ 
225b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa/ 'byung ba mthong ba yang dag pa'i mu stegs byed pa yin gyis/ de'i phyir rna ba lhogs te mos pa bskyed la/ dran pa nye bar zhog ste yid 'dun par gyis la/ ma thob
225b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnams thob par bya ba dang / sngon ma phyin pa'i lam du 'gro bar bya ba dang / sngon ma song ba'i phyog su 'gro bar bya ba dang / sngon ma 'grogs pa'i lam 'grogs par bya ba dang / sngon ma btsa
225b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam btsal bar bya ba dang / sngon ma thob pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus yang dag par dertsoms shig/ kun du rgyu dag chos gsum mngon du gyur pa/ 
225b5(dkon brtsegs): mngal du 'jug ces gang smra ba de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyad la ngas pa sha do// kun du rgyu dag
225b6(dkon brtsegs): de la ma zhes gang smras pa de ni sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rkyen du gsung so// pa zhes bya ba de ni sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rgyur gsung so// dri za zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa las kyis
225b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs pa'i tshigs bla dag so// mer mer po zhes bya ba de ni las kyis 'phangs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang gzhi'o// ma'i mngal zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa'i las kyis 'phangs
225b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzhi ste/ 'di ltar ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni skye ba dang 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyuraro// kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po la gnas na rtsa dang shing gel ba
226a1(dkon brtsegs): dang sman dang nags tshal dag skye zhing 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba dang / 'phel ba dang rgyas par
226a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ 'phel nas skye bar 'gyuraro// btsas nas rnam par 'phelo// 'phel nas spyod pa snang bar 'gyur te/ 'gro ba gang dang gang nas shi 'phos nas de dang der skyes pa de dang de 'dra ba'i spyod
226a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag de spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang mkhas pas shes par bya ba yin gyi glen pas ma yino// yun ring po nas 'grogs 'grogs pas shes par bya ba yin gyi yun thung ngus ma yin no// yang
226a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par sems pas shes par bya ba yin gyi mi brtson pas da ma yino// kun du rgyu dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas dashi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags mkhas pas shes par bya/ 
226a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni 'di dag yin te// 'di lta ste skad sha sha po yin// skad/ gyo dum gyi sgra lta bu yin/ skad brtag dgos pa yin// skad che ba yin/ skad lhang ljang po yin// rtag tu dngang pa yin
226a6(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'dar ba yin/ rtag tu spu zing zhes byed pa yin/ rmi lam na me'i phung po 'bar ba mthong ba yin/ rig rgyug par mthong ba yin/ me mdag 'bar ba mthong ba yin/ lcags zang
226a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang du btso ba yin/ lag na dbyigs pa thogs pa'i mi ngag mthong ba yin/ srin po dag gis bdag 'phang bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid gson por gsal shing gis gzugs par mthong
226a8(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ khyingag gis bdag dbad par mthong ba yin/ khyi ngag gis bdag bskor bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid glang po che dang sbrul gyis gtses par mthong ba yin/ phyogs bzhir bros na phyogs
226b1(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa yin/ sems can kun la yid mi rtog pa yin te/ kun du rgyu dag rnam pa nyi shu po de dag gis sems dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu rig par bya'o// kun du rgyu dag de
226b2(dkon brtsegs): la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste rmugs shing gnyis che ba yin/ le lo che ba yin/ mang du zab yin/ sa la 'dud pa yin/ mi 'jig
226b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa yin/ mi gsal bar smra ba yin/ glen pa la dga' ba yin/ mun pa la dga' ba yin/ 'dam rdzab la dga' ba yin/ yang dang yang sos na gcod pa yin/ rgyun du rkang pa'i 'the bos sa
226b4(dkon brtsegs): rko ba yin/ yang dang yang mgo la spang ma 'du ba yin/ yang nga yang na mkha' la sos 'debs pa yin/ kun du bskums te nyal ba yin/ sa la nyal ba yin/ mi gtsang bas
226b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dogs pa yin/ yang dang yang na mkha' la snum pa mi na/ yang dang yang min pa zab yin/ gzhan du smra/ zhing gzhan du byed de/ g.yo byed pa yin/ bab bab tu spyod/ 
226b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ rmi lam na bdag rdzab kyis gos par rmi ba yin/ rmi lam na bdag nagasu song ste/ rtswa za bar rmi ba yin/ sbrul gdug pas bdag bskor bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid ri khrod du
226b7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par mthong ba yin te/ kun du rgyu dag de dag la sogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas 'chi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma rnam pa du mar shes par bya ste/ de dag ni bskal pa 'am bskal/ 
226b8(dkon brtsegs): pa las lhag par brjod kyang zad par mi nus so// kun du rgyu dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste skra ser ba yin/ mig wa'i
227a1(dkon brtsegs): mig 'dra ba yin/ rtag par bkres pa yin/ rtag tu sgom pa yin/ ser sna che ba yin/ 'dod chen che ba yin/ thob pa mi rnyed pa yin/ gzhan gyi la re ba yin/ khro bal
227a2(dkon brtsegs): mig dmar ba yin/ bza' ba thams cad la sred pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad la chags pa yin/ sbyin pa'i gnas dag mthong bar mi 'dod pa yin/ dngos po kun la yang de rku ba'i sems yod pa yin// 
227a3(dkon brtsegs): dngos po ngan pa rnams la yang dga' ba yin/ thob pa la mos pa yin/ zas skom mi gtsang ba la dga' ba yin/ gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la phrag dog byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi longs spyod la sred
227a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bskyed pa yin/ gzhan gyi longs spyod gang yin pa de dag la bdag gi snyam du sems pa yin/ zas gtong na sems mi dga' ba yin/ tshong dus kyi srang dag nas kyang shing tog la
227a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ kun du rgyu dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags kyi bye brag ni de dag la sog/ sa pa mtha' yas par shes par bya'o// kun du rgyu dag de la
227a6(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste khengs pa yin/ 'tha' bkrol che ba yin/ khon du 'dzin pa yin/ nga rgyal che ba yin/ lus che ba yin// 
227a7(dkon brtsegs): mig che ba yin/ mig dkar ba yin/ mche ba snang ba yin/ mthu dang ldan pa yin/ thab mo'i blo can yin/ dbyen la dga' ba dang / bya ba thams cad la nga rgyal che ba yin/ so snang ba yin/ 
227a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad la brnyas pa'i 'du shes can yin/ mtshon cha rno ba yin/ tshig na ba yin/ bdag gzeng bstod pa can yin/ mi shes pa'i stobs can yin/ nyon mongs pa'i snga
227b1(dkon brtsegs): can yin te/ kun du rgyu dag de dag la sogs pa ni lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan mar shes par bya'o// kun du rgyu dag de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni/ 
227b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa can yin/ 'phags pa dang bsten pa yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa la smod pa yin/ dge ba byed pa yin/ mngon rtags 'dod pa yin/ grags pa
227b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa yin/ snyan pa 'dod pa yin/ bzol dga' ba yin/ shes pa la dga' ba yin/ nyon mongs pa chung ba yin/ khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa yin/ rigs kyi bu'i tshul phun sum tshogs
227b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ byas pa bzo ba yin/ mdza' bo la gdung ba yin// yongasu gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ bye brag shes pa yi/ na/ byas pa dang ma byas pa la rtog pa yin/ tshig gi mthu
227b5(dkon brtsegs): yod pa yin/ gros bzung bar bya ba'i mthu yod pa yin/ 'dum par bya ba dang / 'thab mo bya ba la mngon par mkha sa pa yin/ pho nya nus pa yin/ skad thams cad 'dzin
227b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthu yod pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mngon par shes pa yin te/ kun du rgyu dag la sogs pa ni mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags yin no// kun du rgyu dag de la lha
227b7(dkon brtsegs): las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste mdzes pa yin/ gtsang sbra che ba yin/ phreng ba la dga' ba yin/ spos la dga' ba yin/ bdug pa la dga' ba yin/ 
227b8(dkon brtsegs): glu len pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ byug pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan ngan ngon gyis mi mgu zhing rgya chen pos dga' ba yin// rol mo'i sgra thams cad la dga' ba yin/ 
228a1(dkon brtsegs): glu thams cad la dag pa yin/ skye bo rgya chen po dang 'grogs par dga' ba yin/ khang pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang khyim dang longs spyod rgya chen po la dga' ba yin/ 
228a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i sems byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yin/ rgod pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ 'jam par smra ba yin/ dga' ba la mkhas pa yin/ rgyan la dga' ba yin/ che ba'i ngang tshul can yin/ 'gro ba'i
228a3(dkon brtsegs): ngang tshul can yin/ lus kyi shugs 'byin pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ chags pa'i mtshan ma dang / mi chags pa'i mtshan ma shes pa yin/ phan par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kun
228a4(dkon brtsegs): du rgyu dag mtshan ma de dag la sogs pas mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu shes par bya'o// kun du rgyu/ de dag de la mtshan ma de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i
228a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis dge 'i bshes gnyen gang dag mtshan ma de dag las 'od 'a bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos ston par byed pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i
228a6(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen rnams la brten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe/ zhe sdang la yongasu
228a7(dkon brtsegs): brten pas des zhe sdang las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas de las des sems can dmyal bar skye ste/ de'i phyir de sems can dmyal bar gnas pa rnyed nas sems can dmyal ba'i
228a8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa can du gyur pas de mi'i nang du skyes te spyod pa'i rtags 'di dag thos nas/ bdag ni sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des sems can dmyal
228b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las kyi rgyu spang ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa ston to// byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs
228b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// des kyang de'i zhe sdang gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur te/ de byams pa chen po bsgoms pas/ pha rol
228b3(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe gti mug la yongasu brten pas/ des
228b4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas/ de las nges dud 'gro'i skye gnasu skyes te/ de'i phyir dud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas pa rnyed nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyis
228b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de dung 'gro'i skye gnas nas 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas skye/ spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag
228b6(dkon brtsegs): gis bdag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skye so zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing de dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi las de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge
228b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bshes gnyen 'atsal bar bya ste/ de dag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gti mug spang ba'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ston to// des kyang de'i gti mug gi bag la nyal spong
228b8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// yang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ston te/ des de'i gti mug de ni rang bzhin med pa'o zhes bya bar shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la
229a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ston te/ des de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro// kun du rgyu dag
229a2(dkon brtsegs): de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe ser sna la kun du brten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas/ des ser sna dang ldan pa bag chags las byung
229a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mngon par 'du byas pas de las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zil par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ de dag gshin rje'i
229a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na gnas pa nges gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i spyod da pa can du gyur pas/ de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas da shi 'phos te/ mi'i nang du skyes kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten
229a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gi sa bdag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'o/ zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des spyod pa de/ 
229a6(dkon brtsegs): ngag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dog pa'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag ser sna spang ba'i phyir gtong ba ston te/ des kyang de'i ser sna'i bag
229a7(dkon brtsegs): la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro// yang de la gtong ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs
229a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu dag de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dag kyang mngon par 'du byas la/ nga rgyal
229b1(dkon brtsegs): la yang yongasu brten pas/ de nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa des lha ma yin du skyes te
229b2(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyis gnas na gnas pa des lha ma yin gyi spyod pa can du gyur pas// de lha ma yin nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha ma yin gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des
229b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa de dag gis ni lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen ba
229b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag nga rgyal spang ba dang / nga'i snyam pa'i nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir skye mched rnams ston to// des kyang de'i nga rgyal spong bar
229b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// yang na de la stong pa nyid ston te/ des de'ing/ rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong ba dang / bdag rnam para'ajig par 'gyur ro// yang na ji ltar bya ba sgyu ma rnams
229b6(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa las 'byung ba'i tshul ston te/ des de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gcig pa ston te/ des de'i shes rab
229b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu dag de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis
229b8(dkon brtsegs): ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe'ang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la kun du brten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas des las de byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par
230a1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang / blangs pa des mir skyes te/ mi'i nang na gnas pa nges ma'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ nga mi'i nang nas shi 'bros/ mi'i nang du skyes
230a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang / mi'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyong por 'gyur te/ de spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni mi'i nang nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / nges mi'i spyod pa de dag la
230a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'do' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mi rtag pa'i 'du shes ston te/ nges kyang de'i spyod pa bgol nyal dang
230a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la 'khor ba'i mi sngags pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa ste/ na te/ des de 'khor ba la mi dga' zhing mya ngan las 'das
230a5(dkon brtsegs): ba don du gnyer bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston te/ de thos pas bla na med pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// 
230a6(dkon brtsegs): la thabs mkhas pa yang ston te/ des de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag bzung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu dag de la mtho ris nas shi
230a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe tshangs par spyod pa mchog tu bzung ste spyad pa dang / sbyin pa mchog tu bzung ste byin pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu bzung ste bsrungs pas las
230a8(dkon brtsegs): de byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pas lha'i nang du skyes te/ de lha'i nang na gnas pa des lha'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de lta
230b1(dkon brtsegs): las shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni lha'i nang nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing des spyod pa
230b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag tshangs par spyod pa mchog tu 'dzin pa'i nyes pa ston cing / 
230b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i yon tan brjod do// mchog tu 'dzin pa'i sbyin pa la smod cing mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i sbyin pa bsdogs par 'gyur ro// mchog tu 'dzin pa zhes
230b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims la smon cing mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul khrims bsngags par 'gyur ro// des de'i tshul khrim/ des dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa bag la nyal dang / 
230b5(dkon brtsegs): bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de la
230b6(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa yang ston te/ de dang ldan pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang
230b7(dkon brtsegs): zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mnyan par bya'o// thos nas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ste grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / 
230b8(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / 'khor bzhi po yod de dag tu gnas par bya zhing de dag dang
231a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'grogs par bya'o// nges 'gro ba byas te goms pa'i rjes su 'gro bas chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'ing ba nyid de zhes dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
231a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon du 'gyur ro// kun du rmya dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/ gti mug gi gnyen por bstan bcos la mkhas/ 
231a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye bo dang lhan cig dga' bar gnas par bya'o// des de'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur te/ des bstan bcos de dang bstan ces shes pa de dag rang bzhin gyis yang dag par brtag par
231a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de'i phyir de la bstan bcos dang bstan bcos shes dpa rnams kyang rang bzhin med do// rang bzhin med do// zhes bya bar snang bar 'gyur te/ des de la dus gsum
231a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid mngon du 'gyur zhing / myur du thamasang mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos
231a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gang zag gis ni gang la brten na sbyin pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis de la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig mngon du 'gyur
231a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de bsgoms pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten par bya/ yon tan la brten par bya'o// // bam
231a8(dkon brtsegs): po bcu gnyis pa// kun du rgyu dag de la lha yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang 'thab par bya'o// 'di lta ste
231b1(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal zhes bya ba'i chos de ni gang zhig de ni ci zhig gis yongasu bzung / de ni su las kun nas langs/ su zhig de spang bar byed ces yang dag par btsal na/ nga rgyal de mi dmigs so// 
231b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis de yongasu bzung ba dang / gang la de kun nas langs pa dang / gang de spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba de yang mi dmigs pa/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongasu bzung bas bdag dang 'jig rten
231b3(dkon brtsegs): bslus par yang dag par rje su mthong ngo // des chos thams cad rang bzhin med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing chos gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bya bar rab/ 
231b4(dkon brtsegs): tu shes so// dngos po med pas yongs su ma grub po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yongs su ma grub pas mi skye/ ba ste/ gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag go// gang mi skye mi 'gag
231b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni gangag su med pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gang gdags su med pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin ma'o/  sa pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// gang
231b6(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni thob pa yang ma yin chud zos pa yang ma yino zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// kun du rgyu dag de ltar na de ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid de/ chos nyid gang gis
231b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin
231b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin nyid pas/ de'i phyir chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'o// kun du rgyu dag ngas ni sngan chad dang / da ltar yang 'jig rten brtags pa ni nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin no zhes
232a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad de/ nga rgyal gyis ni mi las shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro// nga rgyal gyis ni mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro// nga rgyal
232a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni sems can dmyal ba'i bar du shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro// nga rgyal med na gdags pa medo// kun du rgyu dag de ni nga rgyal med pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// de yang thabs
232a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dang ldan zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang dge ba'i bshas gnyen gyis yongasu zin pas shes par nus so// de nas kun du rgyu drug khri po de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ 
232a4(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dag mi skye dpa'i chos la bzod pa thob nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
232a5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nasakyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa'i de dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ mgon po ye shes
232a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis yang dag 'phags// 'gro ba kun la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ 'gro ba kun na spyod pa rnams gzigs// lag pa'i 'thil du skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// 'jig rten lta
232a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam pas kun du dkrugs// sprin stug dag gis na mkha' yog pa bzhin// de dag gis ni byis pa rmongs nas spyod// long ba'i tshogs rnams rab tu lam stor bzhin/ 
232a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rtag dang 'dzi rten mi rtag dang / rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kha cig mchi// rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min zhes te// glang po'i dbang po khyim du btag ltar brlag/ 'jig rten
232b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yong 'jig rten mtha' med dang // mtha' yang yod la mtha' med kha cig mchi/ mtha' yod ma yin mtha' med min ces te// dper na bya ni gzeb tu bcug pa bzhin// la
232b2(dkon brtsegs): la dag ni lus la bdag ces mchi// la la dag ni lus 'di gzhan zhes mchi// rtog pas yongs su bkris nas nyal bgyid de// bya ni bya rgyar chud nas thogs pa bzhin// la la
232b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni dbang phyug sprul zhes mchi// la la rgyu med byung zhes 'dogs pa bgyid// lta ba'i rnam pa dag gis kun nas dkris// mkha' la gnas pa'i zla ltar rgyal bas gzigs/ 
232b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar gzeb tu bcug pa'i bya rmongs pa// bug bu gar thar du re ba ltar// mi mkhas lta ba'i rnam pas 'das pa ngar 'gyur// thar pa mi thob rkang gnyis btags pa bzhin
232b5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs dang skye dgu bdag dang skem byed dang / gzhon dang 'khor/ lo 'dzin dang rnam thos bu// phyogs dang rgya mtsho kun la phyag 'tshal te// rgyal pos mtshan mo rkun po bzung ba
232b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// dbul po bu lon chags pa bu lon pas// bzung na gnyen sgron gsol ba 'debs pa bzhin// lta ba'i rnam par gnas pa'i byis pa dag/ dbang phyug las ni bde ba 'tshol
232b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid pa// rkun po'i tshogs rnams brtson rar stsal pa bzhin// 'gro ba rnamasu sdug bsngal brgya myong ba// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis gzigs// phyag gi mthil
232b8(dkon brtsegs): na sor mo lnga dang mtshungs// de la mi dbang thugs rje bskyed nas ni// 'gro ba mkhyen pa 'gro ba spyod mdzad de// blo mchog tshe rabs 'gro ba bkrol ba ni// dper na rgyal pos brtson
233a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams bkye ba bzhin// 'jig rten sman slad bskal pa bsam yas su// dka' ba mdzad nas byang chub mchog brnyes te// lta ba'i rnam par sems can 'khyams mkhyen
233a2(dkon brtsegs): nas te de dag bcings las khyod kyis grol ba mdzad// bde gshegs mi yi seng ge rkang gnyis gtso// chos tshogs gang la mnga' dbang khyod mdzad pa// lta ba'i rnam pa sgyu 'drar rmongs
233a3(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'// bde gshegs khyod ni de 'drar bdag cag 'tshal// stobs rnams gang gis rgyal ba stobs brnyes shing // mi 'jig gang gis sngo ba'i dgra bsal te// 'khor gyi nang du
233a4(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa// blo mchog de ni bdag cag thob pa dar shog/ gang gis rgyal ba 'jig rten gsum bskyod dang // gang gis mtha' yas 'od ni 'gyed pa dang // gang gis mi
233a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog sems can lung bston pa// de ring yud kyis/ bdag cag de thob shog/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du rgyu de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thug su chud
233a6(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten phan bzhed 'dzum pa gang mdzad pa// mu stegs
233a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs 'di shin du 'phags gyur tam// mi mchog rang byung ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dzum rgyu de ni khyod kyis bka' stsal gsol// bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong
233a8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'jig rten phan bzhed 'gro 'di the tshom 'tshal// zla ba nyal 'gro ba blta ba bzhin// blta zhing mchis na rgyal ba 'dzum rgyu gsungs// su zhig rgyal la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/ 
233b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis de ring yab ni mnyes par bgyis// rgyal ba'i yon tan de ring gang gis mthong // mkhas pa myur du legs par bka' stsal gsol// mu stegs can rnams lung bstan de thos
233b2(dkon brtsegs): na// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'di ltar 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas btul// des ni 'gro ba kun gyi rnam 'dren lags// rgyal bas the tshom legs par
233b3(dkon brtsegs): bsal du gsol// som nyi 'tshal ba'i som nyi dgum du gsol// des na 'khor rnams 'di yid rangs shing gnas// sangs rgyas khyod kyi dgongs pa dad par mchi// de nas bcom
233b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su brtsa dad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dus 'di shes gyur na// rgyal ba dgra las rgyal las
233b5(dkon brtsegs): dris pa legs// 'dren pa rang byung nyid la de dris pas / 'jig rten phan pa'i tshig kyang brjod par 'gyur/ 'jim pa 'di ni ji ltar ngas mdzad pa// 'dzum
233b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyungs de khyod la bstan par byas// yang dag ji bzhin nga yi bstan pa la// dga' ba'i yid du byos te deng nyon cig/ mu stegs tshogs 'di rab tu dul 'gyur te// 
233b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i rnam spangs lta ba bzang por gyur// lta ba'i rnam par 'jig rten 'khyams mthong nas// snying rje can gyur byang chub rab tu zhugs// lta ba'i rnam pa dag ni rab spangs te/ 
233b8(dkon brtsegs): lta ba drang po rnyog med rtogs gyur cing // nga yis lung bstan thogs med zos gyur nas// de dag kun gyis thams cad mkhyen sems bskyed// sngon gyi rgya bdag la dang bskyed de/ 
234a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje ldan pa rkang gnyis dam pa po// rgyal ba bye ba nyi shur tshang ba la// bla med byang chub tshol zhing bsnyen bkur byas// rgyal ba rnams la sbyin pa mi ltung ngu
234a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnam par sbyangs// shes rab brtson 'grus stobs kyang 'bar bar byas// thugs rje ldan rnams drung du bzod pa ste// byang chub dam pa btsal nas yun ring du/ 
234a3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol phyin pa drug la blo yang zhugs// rgyal ba dgra las rgyal la zhu ba zhus// sangs rgyas brgya bgrangs dag la yid dga' byas// de dag sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang gis ni// lta ba'i/ 
234a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa stug la gnas gyur pa// de dag bde gshegs rang byung mthong gyur nas// chags pa med pas lta ba'i rna dam pa spangs// ston pa'i dgongs pa yang dag rnam
234a5(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs// ston pa'i dgongs pa rnams la dad pa ga/ nas// ma 'ongs dus na byang chub tshol byed cing // rgyal ba bye ba bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur// ma 'ongs
234a6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa skar ma 'dra ba la// rgyal ba nga rgyal bcom pa mtshan 'thun pa// grags pa chen por phyogs su rnam par grags// 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba 'grel par 'gyur// de
234a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sangs rgyas zhing yang dag 'gyur te// de dag bkod pa sna tshogs mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas zhing der sdig pa'i blo can med// blo gros dag par 'thun pa sha sdug gnas// de na
234a8(dkon brtsegs): ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyangs// mi khom bsal te dus de'i tha ma la// rgyal ba de dag sku tshe'i stobs ldan te// lo ni stong phrag brgyad cu thub par 'gyur// mi de dag gis byang
234b1(dkon brtsegs): chub 'di thos na// de tshe mi mnyes par ni byed mi 'gyur// chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi mtshan thos na// bud med rnams kyang skyes pa'i lus thob 'gyur// de ltar nga rgyal bcom
234b2(dkon brtsegs): pa drang srong che// ston pas mu stegs lung bstan bka' stsal pa// de thos gyur nas lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams// yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skyes par 'gyur// mu stegs can
234b3(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'khor dang bcas pas/ lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams nas kun du rgyu rnams kyi bar gyi
234b4(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa thos nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te// / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs dpas/ 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byas pa ni ngo mtshar to/ 
234b5(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ de yang bu la chags pas kun du dkris par gyur to// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sems thugasu chud nas/ rgyal po bas gtsang ma la bkan
234b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod la tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ 
234b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu byang ba'i chos 'di 'di lta ste/ khams drug rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// bcom ldan
234b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das legaso zhes gsol nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khams drug
235a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu gang zag 'di ni khams drug pa/ reg pa'i skye mched drug pa/ yid kyi nye bar spyod pa
235a2(dkon brtsegs): bco brgyad pa ste/ skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa zhes gang smras pa ci las brten te smras she na/ rgyal po chen po khams drug ni 'di dag go// drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams
235a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams so// rgyal po chen po de dag ni khams drug ste/ skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa'o zhes gang ngas
235a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de ni de la brten te smras// skyes bu 'di ni reg pa'i skye mched drug pa'o zhes gang smras pa de ci las ba rten te smras she na/ rgyal po chen po reg pa'i skye mched drug ni
235a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ gzugs rnams la blta ba'i phyir mig gi reg pa'i skye mched dang / sgra rnams la nyan pa'i phyir rna ba'i reg pa'i skye mched dang / dri rnams
235a6(dkon brtsegs): la snom pa'i phyir sna'i reg pa'i skye mched dang / ro rnams la myang ba'i phyir lce'i reg pa'i skye mched dang / reg bya rnams la reg pa'i phyir lus kyi reg pa'i skye mched dang / chos rnams
235a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i phyir yid kyi reg pa'i skye mched do// rgyal po chen po de dag ni reg pa'i skye mched drug ste skyes bu 'di ni reg pa'i skye mched drug pa'o zhes gang ngas smras pa de ni de la brten te smraso// 
235a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po skyes bu de ni yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad pa'o zhes gang smras pa de ci las brten te smras she na/ rgyal po chen po yod kyi nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad ni 'di dag ste/ bco brgyad gang
235b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di la mi mig gis gzugs mthong na yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dang gtang snyoms su 'gyur bar gzugs la nye bar spyod do// rna bas sgra thos na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba
235b2(dkon brtsegs): dang btang snyom su 'gyur bar sgra la nye bar spyod do// snas dri tshor na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / btang snyom su 'gyur bar dri la nye bar spyod do// lces ro myong na yid bde ba dang / 
235b3(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang btang snyoms su 'gyur bar ro la nye bar spyod do// lus kyis reg bya la reg na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang btang snyom su 'gyur bar reg bye la nye bar spyod do// 
235b4(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis chos rig na yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dang bta dang snyomasu 'gyur bar chos la nye bar spyod do// rgyal da po chen po de la gang dag yid bde bar nye bar spyod pa drug dang / gang
235b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag yid mi bde bar nye bar spyod pa drug dang / gang dag bta nga snyoms su 'gyur bar nye bar spyod pa drug po ded/ gcig tu bsdus na yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad du 'gyur ro// 
235b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bco brgyad po de dag ni yid kyi nye bar spyod pa ste/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu 'di ni yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad pa'o zhes gang ngas smras pa de ni de la brten te smraso// rgyal po
235b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po de la sa'i khams ni rnam pa gnyis te/ nang gi yang yod phyi rol gyi yang yod do// rgyal po chen po nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ lus 'di la nang gi khong na
235b8(dkon brtsegs): sra ba dang / 'khrang ba'i rnam pa dang / nye bar gyur pa dang zin pa'o// de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste skra dang spu dang sen mo dang / so dang rdul dang / dri ma dang / lpags pa dang / 
236a1(dkon brtsegs): sha dang rba dang / chu d+hus dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mchin pa dang / glob dang / mkhal ma dang / sul mangs dang / mchin dri dang / zlum dang / 
236a2(dkon brtsegs): gnye ma dang / lgang pa dang / mtsher pa dang / phyi sa dang / gzhang dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / gzhan yang gang lus 'di nang gi khong na sra ba dang / 'khrang ba'i rnam pa dang / lus
236a3(dkon brtsegs): su gtogs par gyur pa dang / zin pa 'di ni nang gi sa'i khams shes bya'o// rgyal po chen po phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ phyi rol gyi sra ba dang / 'khrang ba'i rnam
236a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lus su ma gtogs pa dang / ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams shes bya'o// rgyal po chen po de dal nang gi khams 'byung ba'i tshe/ gang nang nas kyang mi 'ong
236a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du'ang sogs par mi 'gro'o// rgyal po chen po bud med nang du bdag ni bud med do zhes rtog cing de nang du bud med ces brtags nas/ phyi rol tu skyes
236a6(dkon brtsegs): nga'o zhes rtog go/ phyi rol du skyes pa la skyes pa zhes brtags nas chags par 'gyur te/ phyi rol gyi skyes pa dang phrad par 'dod do// skyes pa de yang nang du bdag skyes pa zhes rtog ste/ de
236a7(dkon brtsegs): nang du bdag ni skyes pa zhes brtags nas phyi rol tu bud med ces rtog go// phyi rol du bud med la bud med ces brtags nas chags par gyur te/ phyi rol du bud med dang phrad par 'dod do// 
236a8(dkon brtsegs): phrad par 'dod pas phrad par 'gyur ro// phrad pa'i rkyen gyis mer mer po skye bar 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do// rgyal po chen po gang la kun du rtag pa dang / gang kun du rtog pa de gnyis ka yang
236b1(dkon brtsegs): med de/ bud med la ni bud med med do// skyes pa la ni skyes pa med do// de ltar med cing yang dag pa ma yin par kun du rtog pa skye ste/ kun tu rtog pa de yang ngo bo nyid kyis med do// kun
236b2(dkon brtsegs): du rtog pa ji lta ba bzhin du phrad pa dang mer mer po yang ngo bo nyid kyis med do// gang ngo bo nyid kyis med pa de ji ltar sra ba bskyed par 'gyur// rgyal po chen po de ltar kun du rtog pa shas
236b3(dkon brtsegs): par byas nas sra ba nyid rtogs par byas te ci nas sra ba ni skye ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong bar shes par bya'o// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar gang lus 'di dur khrod kyi mthar 'gyur ba'i dus
236b4(dkon brtsegs): de yod de/ de'i sra ba de 'jig cing 'gag par 'gyur ba'i tshe shar phyogasu mi 'gro/ lho phyogs dang / nub byo/ dgas dang / byang phyogs dang / steng dang / 'og dang / 
236b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs 'tshams rnamasu yang mi 'gro ste// rgyal po chen po nang gi sa'i khams ni de ltar blta'o// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gnas pa 'di na mkhar gyur pa la tshangs pa'i
236b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa gnas pa'i dus yod de/ rgyal po chen po de'i sra ba de 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
236b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa byung yang / rgyal po chen po de'i sra ba de 'byung ba'i tshe/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo // 'khor yug dang khor yug chen
236b8(dkon brtsegs): po'i ri rdo rje'i rgyu las grub pa sra zhing brtan la lhun sdug pa rnams gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi sra bde 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo // ri'i rgyal po ri rab dag dang / gnya' shing 'dzin/ 
237a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang / mu khyud 'dzin dag dang / gshol mda' 'dzin dag dang / rdo rje 'dzin dag dang / seng ldeng can dag dang / rnam par 'du dag dang / ri rta rna dag dang / @
237a2(dkon brtsegs): na sdug dag dang / blta na sdug chen po dag dang / ther sgre dag dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dag dang / gangs ri dag dang / de ma yin pa'i ri nag po dag na gnas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan
