286b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ mngon par ma shes pa ma yin/ yongs su shes pa ma yin/ yongasu ma shes pa ma yin/ spangs pa ma yin/ ma spangs pa ma yin/ bsgoms pa ma yin// 
286b6(dkon brtsegs): ma bsgoms pa ma yin/ mngon du byas pa ma yin/ mngon du ma byas ma yin/ bstan pa ma yin/ ma bstan pa ma yin/ rab tu bstan pa ma yin/ rab tu ma bstan pa ma yin/ bsgrags
286b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin/ ma bsgrags pa ma yin/ thos par bya ba ma yin/ thos par ma byas pa ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ ma thos pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po gang bsnan
286b8(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba 'am/ dbri bar bya ba'i chos de ni mi dmigs te/ rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni rang bzhin med pa yin gyis/ rgyal po chen po 'di la yid yongasu dga' bar bya zhing gzhan gyi
287a1(dkon brtsegs): dring mi 'jog par bya'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la ni gang rtog pas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i chos de gang yang mi dmigs
287a2(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ 'on kyang dmigasu med pa'i chos rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdags pa bstan to snyam nas/ de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri mi skye ba'i chos
287a3(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa skyeso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang
287a4(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe 'od zer kha dog sna chog das can kha dog du ma dang ldan pa dag/ bcom lda na 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khamra
287a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas rgyas par bkang na sa/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ phyir log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
287a6(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs/ 
287a7(dkon brtsegs): su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad te zhus pa/ 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa po// dpa' chen khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pa/ 'jig rten snang ba mdzad pa po/ 
287a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa'i 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol// thams cad mkhyen pa 'dren pa po// rgyu gang gis ni 'dzum bstan pa// khyod kyis 'gro ba rnams la ston// bdag gi the tshom myur du khum/ 
287b1(dkon brtsegs): shAkya'i tshogs kyi don slad du/ gau ta mas 'dzum pa mdzad// dpa' bo 'gro ba dga' mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol// bsam gtan chen po khyod kyis gsungs// thos
287b2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'gro ba'i the tshom 'chang// mchog tu dga' ba'i yid gyur te// kun kyang khyod kyi ston pa thob// rgyal ba'i 'dzum gyi phrin las 'di// khyod kyi sras rnams 'tshal gyur na// nan tan gyis
287b3(dkon brtsegs): ni rab nges shing // shes pas rjes su mchi bar 'gyur// rgyal ba khyu mchog khyod kyis ni// 'gro ba'i the tshom 'di bsal gsal gsol// 'jig rten the tshom chad gyur na// bde ba rgya chen
287b4(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol ba dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// ngas ni 'dzum zhig gang mdzad pa// 
287b5(dkon brtsegs): rta thul de ni nga la nyon// shAkya rnams kyis blo nges pa// yang dag ji bzhin lung bstan to// chos rnams da/ migasu med par ni// shAkya rnams kyis yang dag shes// de
287b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir sangs rgyas chos rnams la// 'di dag yid ni nges par bzhag/ dmigasu med pa sten nas ni// shAkya grags pa chen po pa// chos rnams kun la nges gyur nas// bla med byang chub
287b7(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// shAkya nges pa 'di dag ni// mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du// 'od dpag med pa'i drung du 'gro/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med
287b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bde ba can na gnas pa'i tshe// sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med la// phyogs bcu dag tu mchod byed 'gyur// mkhas pa rnams ni khams gcig na// sangs rgyas bzhugs rnams
288a1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byed// sems can kun la phan tshol zhing // byang chub mchog tu sngon lam 'debs// de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod byed cing // ning nas zhing du
288a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rgyu// gang du sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'dong bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
288a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod nas// de yi 'og tu 'dren par 'gyur// de tshe sangs rgyas re re zhing // sems can khrag khrig mang po dag/ byang chub phyir ni sangs rgyas kyis// sangs rgyas dgongs la 'gro ba 'dul// sangs
288a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kun gyi zhing rnams na// byang chub sems dpa' rnam das la ston// de na sangs rgyas gang yang ni// nyan thos la dngul bar yong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas de dag re re zhing // de na
288a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe tshang 'gyur ba ni// bye ba grangs med lo rnams// chos ston pa dag gnas par 'gyur// de dag mya ngan yongs 'das nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pas// 
288a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i sras dag lo grangs ni// bye ba stong du dam chos 'dzin// mi dbang sras po de dag kyang // ston pa nyid kyi chos ston pas// sems can bye ba bsam yas dag/ byang chub la ni 'dul
288a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// bag yod pa yi mi rnams ni// bag yod pa la gnas bcas te// stong pa nyid kyi chos sten nas// thams cad mkhyen du nges pa 'byung // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis shAkya yi// bu yi/ 
288a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bstan 'di thos nas// lhar bcas 'jig rten dga' gyur te// byang chub phyir ni yod kyang btang // shAkya lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
288b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' mthar phyin pa rnams la bsgrag par bya'o// 
288b2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gang zag med pa ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang yang ma dmigs so// gang ma dmigs pa de ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs
288b3(dkon brtsegs): ma rgyas so// gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa de ni ma bstan to// gang ma bstan pa de ni ma shes pa'o// gang ma shes pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs/ 
288b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa ste// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi rnga chen po yin gyis / ci nas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges
288b5(dkon brtsegs): par bstan pa 'di bzung ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya b.ra'adi shA ri'i bu khyod la yongasu gtad do// shA ri'i bu byang chub
288b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bskal pa bcu'i bar du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar spyad
288b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bas/ shA ri'i bu gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di tha na thos par gyur kyang de nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phelo// shA ri'i bu gang
288b8(dkon brtsegs): gis bskal pa bcu'i bar du mnyan pa bas/ gang gis sems can gcig cig la 'di bstan na de nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phe lo// gang gis bskal pa bcu'i bar du
289a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyan te gzhan la bstan pa bas/ gang gis se gol togs pa tsam du 'di bsgom na de nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du 'phelo// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na
289a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' rnams nan tan thams cad kyis gdams par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu
289a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di bsgoms pas ni myur du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
289a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu ngas lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dad pa'i tshogs 'di dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ti nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di la rab tu
289a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / brgya byin
289a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lce dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom
289a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon cho ga rtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yab dang sras 'jal ba'i de kho na
289a8(dkon brtsegs): nges par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ 'dus pa bcu drug pa rdzog so// rgyag gyi mkhan po shi len dra ba d+hi dang / dzin mi tra dang / ngan shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo chubazhang
289b1(dkon brtsegs): shes sdes bskur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// sho lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po bcwo lnga'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pAH
289b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ri prits+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa gang pos zhus pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
289b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems
289b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med tshad med pa rnam/ sa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshe dang lnga// na pa byams ma'i bu gang po stan las langs nas/ bla
289b5(dkon brtsegs): gos phrag pa cig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
289b6(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis zhu ba cung zad cig mchis na/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te rje su gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
289b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ byams ma'i bu gang po khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas yang dag par bstan nas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa/ bcom
289b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das deng bdag ni yon tan mchog mngon par bsgrubs pa/ grags pa shin du mtho zhing rgyang ring ba/ rtag par sems can gyi bde ba yongasu gnyer bar bgying ba'i byang chub
290a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi srang du zhu ba mchis lags// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ yan
290a2(dkon brtsegs): tan mchog ni rab bsgrubs nas// glags pa mtho zhing rgyang ring dang // tshul khrims gtsang zhing chos mos pa'o// spyod pa gang lags bdag zhu lags// ji ltar
290a3(dkon brtsegs): sems ni sbyong bar bgyi// ji ltar sbyin pa rgya cher gtang // ji ltar sems can rab sgrol cing // dga' sems rtag tu lam bsgom lags// yang bcom ldan 'das la byams/ 
290a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i bu gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng / bdag ni skyes bu dam pa de dag gis slad du dngos po de lta bu dag zhu ba lags na/ byang chub sems dpas
290a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta zur bsags/ pas yong su btugs par mi 'gyur lags// dzi mang du thos pa'i gter rin po tshabasags nas/ 
290a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la nges pa'i don thos pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba lags/ de nas tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// mang thos
290a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho lta bu tshol// chos la nges pa'i don thos nas// byang chub lam ni logs rtogs 'gyur// ji lta bur na tshig gcig gis// tshad med don ni rab rtogs te// 'di ltar shes rab
290a8(dkon brtsegs): stobs dag gis// chos rnams thams cad rtogs 'gyur lags// mang thos mthar thug ma mchis pas// rgol ba mchis kyang sems mi g.yo// snying rje slad du chos bstan nas
290b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can the tshom gcod bgyid lags// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni sa'i rjes su 'brang
290b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba gsol pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
290b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las yongasu ldog par mi 'gyur lags// de nas yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa// ji ltar mi khom yongs spangs nas// sangs rgyas mang po phrad gyur lags// 
290b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mang po mthong nas kyang // shin du dang ba myur thob lags// bla med dang 'thob gyur nas// shin dadu gtong dka' gtong bar 'gyur// thams cad yongs su
290b5(dkon brtsegs): btang nas kyang // stobs kyis thogs med lam sna da lags// ji ltar rab 'byung mos gyur nas/ dben gnas stong pa'i ye shes bsgom// ji ltar chos
290b6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gal med bgyid// dngos po 'di ni bkas po shang gsol// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
290b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mkhyen pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa dang / khams gsum na mchog tu gyur pas dpe zla ma
290b8(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i ye shes chen po gya nom pa brnyes nas/ chos thams cad la spyod pa thogs pa mi mnga' bar khong du chud pas na/ de'i slad du deng bdag dngos po 'di dag zhu ba lag so// 
291a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas yang tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ bcom ldan yon tan mchog bzhugs pas// rdzu 'phrul pha rol rab tu byon// thogs pa mi mnga' mkhyen pa rnyed pas/ 
291a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo khyod la bdag zhu lags// chos rnams thams cad legs bslabs pa// yon tan mtho zhing mngon par 'phags// mun bcom shes rab snang bskyed pas// 'khor mang
291a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dga' bar mdzad// dgra zin byams sdang mi mnga' zhing // mya ngan mi mnga' sku mi mnga'// 'chi bdag las ni rab rgyal zhing // bdud dpung dag ni pham par mdzad// mtshon
291a4(dkon brtsegs): cha thogs pa mi mnga' bar// dgra rnams thams cad pam par mdzad// rtag par byams pa'i thugs ldan zhing // tshul khrims rnam dag bstan par gnas// bcom ldan
291a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo sgyu mi mnga' zhing // nga rgyal mi mang dregs mi mnga'// rnam grol rig pa brnyes pas na// yon tan kun gyi ma chog tu gyur// ji ltar sngon ni lam spyod pas// mkhyen pa
291a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni brnyes pa dang // ji ltar sprad nas sangs rgyas pa// bdag la dang na bkas bshad gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la bka' stsal pa/ 
291a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la dngos po de lta bu zhus pa leg so leg so// shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
291a8(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad de
291b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ ngas deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams// dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas// rab tu brtson pa'i stobs dag gis// byang chub lam spyad bshad par bya// byang chub
291b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa yi// lhag pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas lung ni bstan gyur pa// dngos po de dag mdor bstan to// lhag pa'i bsam pas chos mos sems// tshad med mtha'/ 
291b3(dkon brtsegs): yas yod ma yin// spyod pa sna tshogs ston byed pa// dngos po cig gis grub mi 'gyur// dga' sems nang ni rab rgyas pas// sbyin pa dag ni gtong bar byed// sbyin pa gtong yang 'gyod med pas
291b4(dkon brtsegs): de yi sems ni dga' bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' 'a dri snyam du// sems can rtag tu rgud pas na// mang du thos pa'i nor mi ldan// bdag gis btsal bya snyam du sems// sems// 
291b5(dkon brtsegs): can rtag tu rgud pa yang // le lo dbang las gyur pas/ na// bdag gis brtson 'grus rab bskyed de// byang chub thob bya snyam du sems// bdag gis sems can
291b6(dkon brtsegs): ched du ni// yid bzhin bzod pa rab bskyed de// tshig ngan sme 'bebs brdegs gyur kyang // lan yang mi smra snyam du sems// bdag la sma 'beb su zhig yin// sma 'bebs dmigs par mi
291b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas// sma 'bebs khong khro byed pa yin// dngos po thams cad stong snyam sems// de ltar yid la sems pas na// sems la khong khro kho na 'dzin med// rtag tu bzod pa bsgoms pas/ 
291b8(dkon brtsegs): na// des na mngon par 'tshang yang rgya// sems can dge sems med pa la// 'jig rten sgron ma byas nas na// mgon dang skyabs ni byed pas na// nor med nor dang ldan par byed// sems can
292a1(dkon brtsegs): lam log spyod pa ni// de dag snying brtse'i gnas yin pas// bdag gis yongasu bzlas nas ni// mya ngan 'das la bzhag snyam sems// sems can thams cad
292a2(dkon brtsegs): rgad pas na// shes rab nor dang yong mi ldan// bdag gis thams cad mkhyen thob nas// de dag tshim par bya snyam sems// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can yongasu bzla ba'i
292a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir// sems bskyed byang chub tshol bas na// de 'dra'i smon lam 'debs par byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa
292a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rgyu rkyen rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can la chos ston par byed kyang chos 'ga' tsam la yang gnas par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
292a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams ni chos thams cad yang dag par bslabs na/ nyes de'i 'og tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'a// gyur pa so// byang chub sems dpa' ni ngo mtshar rmad du
292a6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pas chos gzhan gang yang dngos po 'di las lhag par yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can le lo
292a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po dang po zhes bya'o// khong khro ba'i sems can nan po che dag gi nang na bzod pa sgom
292a8(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po gnyis pa zhes bya'o// sems can lam log pa la spyod pa dag mthong nas bdag nyid yang dag pa'i lam la brtson pa
292b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po gsum pa zhes bya'o// sems can 'khor ba las yongasu bzla ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
292b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bzhi pa zhes bya ste/ gang po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
292b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po mchog ces bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa// sems can le lo can mthong na// brtson 'grus
292b4(dkon brtsegs): sems ni skyed byed pas// bdag gis de la chos min pa'i// / dngos po bstan snyam yong mi sems// khong khrod ston par mi byed do// khong khrod sangs rgyas lam min zhes
292b5(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu byams sem bsgom pas na// byang chub de la sa skye bar 'gyur// sems can lam log mos pas na// log pa'i lam la gnas par byed// byang chub sems
292b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yang dag lam// btsal na sems can 'god par byed// 'khor pa'i nyes dmigs mthong bas na// rtse gcig sangs rgyas ye shes tshol// bla med gter ni thob gyur nas// sems can
292b7(dkon brtsegs): bzla bya snyam du sems// rmad byung dngos po 'di dag las// lhag pa gzhan ni su yang med// de lta bas na thogs med chos// 'thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya// lus kyi gos ni tshigs pa dang // 
292b8(dkon brtsegs): mgo thong me ni 'bar ba bzhin// le lo sems ni bskyed gyur na// myur ba nyid du sel bar byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 
293a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyuraro// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can rnams ni 'khor ba na gnas shing brtson 'grus mi rtsom par mthong la// bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas
293a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam la gnas nas brtson 'grus rtsom par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams ni rtag par le lo can du gyur par mthong la// bdag nyid ni sangs
293a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnas nas brtson 'grus rtsom par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams ni khong khro ba dang // 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog
293a4(dkon brtsegs): can du gyur par mthong la/ bdag nyid ni khong khro ba dang / 2khon du 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog med cing rtag par byam/ sa pa'i sems dang ldan par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems
293a5(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon parabasgrub par brtson par gzhan su yang bdag dang ma tshungs pa med par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar
293a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can le lo can mthong na// bdag nyid brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas// de phyir byang
293a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de// bdag nyid dga' sems 'thob par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong bas na// skyo ba'i sems ni rab tu skye// khams gsum btson ra 'jigs pas na// / 
293a8(dkon brtsegs): btson pa'i sems kyis spong bar byed// sems can khong khro 'khon 'dzin dga'// bdag nyid byams sems gnas pas na// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// dga' ba'i sems ni skye bar
293b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ sems can rnams kyis gang byas pa// de dag thams cad mi bya bar// de phyir bdag gis bla med pa'i// sangs rgyas lam ni btsal snyam sems// sangs rgyas rnams
293b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsngags pa yi// yang dag ye shes gang yin pa// bdag gis ye shes de bslabs nas// sems can kun gyi skyabs bya sems// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// rtag tu
293b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' sems skye ba na// 'dus byas mi bden dag las ni// yang dag chos ni skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
293b4(dkon brtsegs): na mi khom pa rnams dang bral te/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par bsgrubapa chud za bar mi 'gyur// bzhi gang zhe na byang chub sems
293b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni sems dman zhing shin du mnyen pa na sems ca/ na dag mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe/ rtag par bde bar na/ ngas sam zhes mdangs dang ldan par gsong por smra zhing
293b6(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun tshig sbyin par byed pas rtag par 'dzum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sems rtse gcig tu chos gnyer zhing rtag par dri rtog la rab tu mos pas na/ dge ba'i don tshol zhing brtson pa la
293b7(dkon brtsegs): chog shes pa med pa yin/ dben pa'i gnas la mos shing gcig pu 'dug pa la dga' ba yin// bdag nyid byang chub kyi lam la gnas shing sems can gzhan yang byang chub kyi lam la
293b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'dzud pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ mi khom pa rnams dang bral te/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi
294a1(dkon brtsegs): chos mngon par bsgrub pa chud za bar mi 'gyuraro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mnyen pa'i sems dang rab ldan zhing // 
294a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag par byams sems bsgoms pas na// sems can dag dang smra ba'i tshe// sems can gsong por smra bar byed// rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags pa yi// zab mo gya nom chos kyang tshol// 
294a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag par tshul khrims gtsang bsrung zhing // sbyangs pa'i spyod la mos pa yin// sbyangs pa'i chos la rab gnas kyang // shes rab zab mos spyod pas na// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de
294a4(dkon brtsegs): mi khom rab spangs dal dang ldan// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams la ni// chos zab rnams ni zhu byed pas// de phyir shes rab 'phel gyur nas// mi khom gnas su
294a5(dkon brtsegs): skye mi 'gyur// rtag par dgon par gnas mos shing // rnam dag sbyangs pa spyod pas na// de phyir byang chub/ sems dpa' de// mi khom rab spangs khom dang ldan// 
294a6(dkon brtsegs): blo ldan mkhas pa gang dag gis// chos 'di bzhi la brten byed na// mi khom thams cad rab spangs nas// sangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mang po mthong nas
294a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / mi 'jigs dad dang ldan pas na// brtson 'grus mchog ni rab bskyed nas// sangs rgyas ye shes tshol bar 'gyur// de phyir ye shes gnyer ba dag/ yang dag chos ni
294a8(dkon brtsegs): bslab par bya// yang dag chos ni bslabs gyur na// byang chub lam ni thob mi dka'// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
294b1(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bsags pa yin pas yongasu gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing // rtag par mang/ 
294b2(dkon brtsegs): du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems
294b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni chos yongasu tshol bar byed pas gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su
294b4(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang // gleng gzhi'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa/ de'i rabs kyi sde dang / shin du rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du
294b5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde rnams yo/ ngasu tshol bar byed de/ yongasu btsal nas kyang
294b6(dkon brtsegs): klog cing kha don du 'don par byed/ klog cing kha don du bton nas kyang yang dag par rje su dran par byed/ yang dag par N+De su dran par byas nas kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du
294b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sgrub par byed de/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur na mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bsags pa yin pas yongasu gtugs
294b8(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas chos la nges pa'i don thob pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro// gzhan
295a1(dkon brtsegs): yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la gnas pa med pas bsam gtan dang // tingange 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag kyang gnas par bya ba med// 
295a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med pa'i phyir chos rnams las gnas pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyuraro// gnas pa med pa'i ye shes thob pas chos rnams las thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang mthong
295a3(dkon brtsegs): ba thob par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang po 'dod chags shing thogs par bya ba'i chos gang yang med pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na// 
295a4(dkon brtsegs): mang du zos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bsags pa yin pa sa yongasu gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po bsags nas chos rnams la nges
295a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don thob pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du/ chud par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni chos yongasu gnyer ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis sangs
295a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rjesu dran zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos rjesu dran par byed do// des chos kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis sangs rgyas rje su dran zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos rjesu dran par gyur pa na/ 'dod chags par bya ba'i
295a7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // des 'dod chags pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad la sems kyis mngon par zhen pa med do// des chos thams cad la mngon par zhen
295a8(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'i phyir dris pa rnams kyi rje su lan 'debs pa la thogs pa med par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po
295b1(dkon brtsegs): lta bu bsags pa yin pas yongasu gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pas tshig gi don rnams
295b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pas spyod pa dag la thogs pa med de/ 
295b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni dngos po rnams mi len pa gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang po gang mtshan ma 'di la gnas par gyur na yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
295b4(dkon brtsegs): mug skyed par byed la/ gang mtshan ma de la gnas par gyur na yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mugaskyed par byed pas so// dngos po'i mtshan ma 'am rdzas
295b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshan ma 'am/ phung po'i mtshan ma 'am/ skye mched kyi mtshan ma'am/ khams kyi mtshan ma 'am/ chos kyi mtshan ma 'am/ chos ma yin pa'i mtshan ma la gnas
295b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skyed par byed pas/ de'i phyir gang po ji tsam du len pa'i mtshan ma dang bcas pa de dag thams cad ni log pa'i lta ba zhes bya ste/ 
295b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni mtshan ma de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i ched du byams pa'i sems sgom par byed pas/ sems can 'jig pa'i phyir dang / mtshan ma 'jig pa'i phyir/ 
295b8(dkon brtsegs): dngos po yang 'jig pa nyid do// dngos po 'jig pa'i phyir lta ba yang 'jig pa nyi do zhes byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe chos thams cad rnam par bshig nas byams pa sgom par byed de/ 
296a1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i byams pa gang yin pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o// de lta bu'i dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi byams pa zhes/ 
296a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de lta bu'i chos kyi byams pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi byams pa zhes bya'o// gang po sangs rgyas kyi byams pa gang zhe na/ mngon par 'du byed pa med cing 'jig pa med pa
296a3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi byams pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi byams pa
296a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bgyis na yang da dag pa ji lta ba bzhin chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa zhes bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
296a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ gang po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni chos so zhe'am/ 'di ni chos ma yin zhes sems par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang po gal te chos yod do zhes/ 
296a6(dkon brtsegs): zer na/ de ni chos ma yin pa yin pas/ gal te chos med par gyur na chos ma yin pa yang med par 'gyur bas de la spros pa ci yang med pas so// spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mya ngan
296a7(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa zhes bya ste/ khyod kyis de ltar rab tu brtags na/ de shin du thag ring ba zhig yin nam/ 'on te shin du thag nye ba zhig yin/ gang pos gsol pa/ de ni thag ring ba yang ma
296a8(dkon brtsegs): lags/ thag nye ba yang ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i don de la ni phyogs kyang ma mchis/ gnas kyang ma mchis/ nang zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis// 
296b1(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis pas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du gang po khyod kyis chos rnam grangasu bgrang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das chos ji lta bu zhig/ 
296b2(dkon brtsegs): la grangasu bgrang bar bgyi ba lags/ gang po ji tsam du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs par dmigs par mi 'dzad// 
296b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par mi mdzad mngon du mi mdzad do zhes de lta bu'i chos mi rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni grangasu bgrang ba zhes bya'o// gang po chos rnams kyi grangs de dag ni chos rab tu rnam
296b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir// gang po deng khyod la 'a di ltar rab tu dben pa'i chos mchog dam pa sangs rgyas kyi lam yongasu sdud par gyur pa bshad par bya'o// gang
296b5(dkon brtsegs): po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten pa'i rnyed pa la gdung dag gal te mdo sde 'di thos par gyur na mnyan pa dang / len par mos par mi 'gyuro// gang po ngas byang chub
296b6(dkon brtsegs): ces brjod pa'i tshig 'di khyod kyis sgra dang tshig tsam du phyogs cung zad cig rtogs par gyur par zad kyi/ de'i don gyi tshul ni khyed kyis shes par mi nus so// don 'di ni shin tu
296b7(dkon brtsegs): zab pas tshig gis brjod par bya ba ma yin gyi/ mkhas pa dag gis rang gis rig par bya ba yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang
296b8(dkon brtsegs): gis don na mi rtogs pa// sangs rgyas chos la mya ngan skye// gal te don ni rig gyur na// sangs rgyas de la ston par mdzad// sangs rgyas ston par gang sems pa// de ni mya ngan
297a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das gnyer bas// 'bad rtsol sems ni med par yang // yang dag chos ni sems par byed// 'di la chos skye yod pa min// 'gag pa'i chos kyang yod min te/ skye
297a2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gag pa med gyur pa// de ni chos rnams yang dag mtshan// chos gang skye ba med pa la// byed dang 'byung ba'ang yod mi 'gyur// yin dang ma yin tha dad gcig/ chos 'di la ni de dag
297a3(dkon brtsegs): med// de ni mya ngan 'das yin te// de na 'gag par bya ba med// thag ni nye ring gang zer ba// de dag gnyi ka stong pa yin// gang zhig stong par rtogs gyur pa// de ni mya ngan 'das shes
297a4(dkon brtsegs): yin// mya ngan 'das pa gang shes pa// de yi slob ma zhes/ bya'o// gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na// mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po
297a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bur bsags pa yin pas yongasu gtugs par mi 'gyurar zhing / rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas chos rnams las nges pa'i don thos pas/ 
297a6(dkon brtsegs): tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyuraro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtag tu mang thos gnyer 'dod pa// sangs rgyas rnam
297a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsngags 'gyur zhing // yang dag nges don thob 'gyur bas// de phyir rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur// yi ge 'bru ni gcig pu dang // tshig gi don ni gcig tsam yang // bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du/ 
297a8(dkon brtsegs): brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyuraro// de phyir yang dag chos gnyer bya// gnyer nas tshul bzhin bsam bya yi// chos kyi mtshan nyid mi blang zhing // sangs rgyas bsngags la zhen mi bya// de bzhin
297b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rjes dran zhing // yang dag chos ni dran par bya// 'dod chags rtsod med sems kyis ni// 'dren pa yongasu btsal bar bya// rtag par sems can rnams la ni// byams
297b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems ni bsgom par bya// sems can la ni zhen med par// chos rnams thams cad zhi bar bya// byang chub sems dpa' grogs chen gyis// 'di 'dra'i chos ni sgrub byed na// 
297b3(dkon brtsegs): myur du gzungs ni 'thob 'gyur bas// mang du thos pa de las skye// ji ltar na mkha'i ngo bo nyid// 'phel zhing 'grib pa med pa ltar// chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin te// 'phel ba
297b4(dkon brtsegs): med cing 'grib med pa// ngas ni shes rab stobs dag gis// bskal pa tshad med grangs med du// chos rnams yongasu bshad gyur kyang // 'on kyang bshad pa
297b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes mi brjod// sems can nyid ni ji snyed pa// thams cang mi lus thob gyur te// kun kyang rab tu byung nas ni// mang zos kun dga' bzhin gyur kyang // gzungs
297b6(dkon brtsegs): thob byang chub sems dpa' yis// sems can de dag thams cad la// bskal pa bye bar chos bshad kyang // de ye shes rab gtugs mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtshungs
297b7(dkon brtsegs): med pas// nam mkha' 'dra bar tshad kyang med// na mkha' skye 'byung med pa ltar// mkhyen pa yang ni de bzhin no// klu yis chu ni ma blangs par// char chen dag ni 'bebs byed pa// chu
297b8(dkon brtsegs): de la ni gnas med kyang // char 'bebs pa la mthar thug med// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang de bzhin du// gzungs 'di thob par gyur pa na// chos rnams la ni gnas med kyang // rkyen de
298a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad na zad mi 'gyur// de phyir mang thos btsal bar bya// btsal nas chu bzhin gnas bya ste// chos dbyings sangs rgyas rjes dran na// mang du thos pa de las/ 
298a2(dkon brtsegs): skye// byams pas sems can kun khyab ste// sems can mtshan ma zhi byed cing // chos kyi mtshan ma'ang zhi byed na// mang du zos pa'ang de las ste// mang du thos pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / 
298a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyuraro// bzhi gang
298a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par gyur na don gyi tshul rab tu sems par byed kyi 'di ma yin zhes smra bar mi byed de// byang chub sems dpa'
298a5(dkon brtsegs): gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur na bla na med pa yang da/ ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyu/ ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad de/ 
298a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal ba'i// ma thos chos ni zos gyur na// don gyi tshul ni sems byed cing // chos min zhe ni spu mi byed// gal te stong pa'i chos thos nas// rtag tu
298a7(dkon brtsegs): don tshul tshol byed pas// de phyir shes rab 'phel 'gyur zhing // byang chub lam ni de nas skye// ma thos chos ni thos gyur na// don gyi tshul ni tshol byed pas// byang chub las ni mi ldog cing
298a8(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// mthos chos ni thos gyur na// nga rgyal ngan pa'i sems mi 'drang // g.yo sgyu dag kyang bskyed mi byed// g.yo bskyed pas ni byang chub min// ma thos chos na
298b1(dkon brtsegs): zas gyur na/ de yi don ni tshol byed pas// sngon chad thos par mgyur kyang // rtse gcig tu ni sems par byed// gang zag des ni chos thos tshe// yang dag chos ni thos 'gyur zhing / 
298b2(dkon brtsegs): rtag par sangs rgyas mang mthong bas// byang chub las ni ldag mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas mang po mthong nas kyang // tshul bzhin nu bzhu byed pas// nyan thos dag gis thos na yang // khams
298b3(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad ldan pas// 'di 'dra'i zhu ba zhu bar byed// bdag cag bsam pa'ang yod min na// dngos po 'di thos ci smos zer// nyan thos ngo mtshan
298b4(dkon brtsegs): brjod pas na// lha klu thams cad dga' 'gyur zhing // sa// ngas rgyas bsngags pa brjod 'gyur na// 'di ni mang / thos 'bras bu yin// zhu ba gang yod zhus pa'i tshe// sangs
298b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas de bzhin lan 'debs pa// 'khor 'dus mang po tshad me da pa// thams cad phan pa che thob 'gyur// byang chub se mas dpa' lan 'debs pa// mang thos 'di ni thos gyur
298b6(dkon brtsegs): na/ 'khor mang tshad med thams cad kyis// bla med chos mig thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po rgyu dang rkyen des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon ma thos pa'i
298b7(dkon brtsegs): chos thos par gyur pa na/ mngon par yid ches pas dang du len cing 'gal ba med pa'i sems kyis tshul bzhin du bsams nas 'di ni ma yino zhes smra bar mi byed na/ des sems can tshad med
298b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gang po sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshad med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa na/ de
299a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes
299a2(dkon brtsegs): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/ gang po bcom ldan 'das yon tan
299a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu thub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de'i 'khor 'dus pa re re la yang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gang+gA'i klung brjod kyis
299a4(dkon brtsegs): mi lang ba'i bye ma snyed chos rnams la len pa med cing zag dbazang nas sems rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom pa gnyi dga'i cha las rnam par grol ba sha stag byung ste/ byang chub
299a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshogs kyi grangs kyang de bzhin no// gang dro bcom ldan 'das de mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu ma pa'i chos ni lo drug khrir gnas par gyur to// de yongs
299a6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das su nye ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag mang po thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba brgya phrag mang po kun
299a7(dkon brtsegs): du khyab par gyur pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling re re na yang byang chub sems dpa' re re gnas par gyur to// gang po bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po de yongasu ngan las
299a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i nyan thos rnams khad kyis le lo dang snyom las can du gyur pas 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo dag kha don du 'don cing yongasu 'dzin pa med par gyur pas/ chos rnams
299b1(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag cing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyang mthar gyis nub par gyur te/ de dag gis klog pa dang / 
299b2(dkon brtsegs): kha don du 'don pa dang / rnam par bshad par ma byas pa'i phyir de'i bstan pa la chos kyi sde snod shin du yangs shing rgya che ba brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la/ chos kyi sde sdong re re la yang mang
299b3(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khrig brgya phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod de mdo'i sde re ra la yang ched du brjod pa'i sde sum khri drug brgya yod do// ched du brjod pa'i sde re re la yang tshig su bcad pa bye ba phrag drug khri bdun
299b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya yod do// gang po de'i tshe de'i dus tha ma la dam pa'i tshe/ sa nub du nye ba na sangs rgyas rgyas kyi chos kyi sde snod mang po de dag las mdo'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde 'ba'/ 
299b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig lus par gyur to// de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu po che zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir de ba/ zhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dam pa'i chos
299b6(dkon brtsegs): bsrung ba'i phyir chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa/ mang du thos shing rgya che ba/ chos la legs par rton pa/ tshig rgyan dang ldan pa/ don gyi tshul gsal bar rtogs pa des rtag par sngon ma thos
299b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos bsgrags pa la mos par gyur to// des chos bsgrags par gyur pa na skye bo phal cher skur pa 'debs shing 'gal bar byas par 'gyur bas chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen
299b8(dkon brtsegs): thob pa 'di ltar skye bo mang po 'di dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos zos par gyur kyang / mngon par yid mi chis pas mnyan pa dang / len par mos pa yang med la gal te thos par gyur na
300a1(dkon brtsegs): yang khong du mi chud pas rjes su 'brang bar mi byed cing 'gal bar byas nas skyon 'byin par byed pas/ 'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang me yin la
300a2(dkon brtsegs): ston pa chen po'i bstan pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag cag gis sngon cad nam yang slob dpon dang mkhan po las 'di lta bu'i mdo sde ma thos la/ gzhan yang dge slong gnas
300a3(dkon brtsegs): brtan rgan rabs gang yang slob dpon dang / mkhan po las 'di lta bu brgyud de thos par mi smra bas so// zhes dge slong mang po de skad kyang zer la mdo'i sde dang ched du brjod pa'i sde tsam las ma
300a4(dkon brtsegs): lus pas deng bdag ci'i phyir bdag gcig pu gnas dben par mi 'gro'o snyamo// gang po chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen thob pa de de snyam du bsams nas/ gcig pu ri
300a5(dkon brtsegs): phug dben par gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe 'dzam bu gli na bskal pa chags tshun chad grong khyer chen po chur dang / ga tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ zheng du dpag tshad bdun yod
300a6(dkon brtsegs): cing rab tu mdzes par byas pa lam srang rnams thad kar 'bab pa/ skye bo mang pos gang ba lo legs shing bde bar gyur pa drug khri brgya stong par gyur to// de'i 'og tu phyis yang grong khyer
300a7(dkon brtsegs): chung ngu kha cig ni dpag tshad bdun yod pa/ kha cig ni dpag tshad drug dang / lnga dang bzhi dang / gsum dang / gnyis yod pa nang gi chung ba'i tshad kyang dpag tshad gcig yod pa bye ba phrag
300a8(dkon brtsegs): brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byas par gyur te/ gang po de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na grong khyer chen po rab tu dben pa zhes bya ba na khyim bdag sha ni zhes bya ba byung ba de'i bu ni ma ha shu ma ta zhes bya ste/ 
300b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gi bu de dben pa la gnas pa las/ lha zhig 'ongs nas tshig su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyi nan tan chos dag la// bsal nas tshul bzhin soms shig dang // de bzhin gshegs
300b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yon tan rgyal// khyod 'tshang rgya bar lung bston to// gang po lha des tshig su bcad pa de smras nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag gi bu de pha'i drung du song nas/ rkang pa la mgo
300b3(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag byas te/ 'di skad du bdag ni rab tu byung nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan tham cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i bstan pa las tshangs par spyod par 'dod do zhes smras pa dang / de nas
300b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag sha nis tshig su bcad de smras pa/ nga yi khyi ma na rin chen mang // gser dngul dag ni tshad kyang me dad// 'dzam bu'i gling na med pa kun// nga yi khyim na ldan
300b5(dkon brtsegs): par yod// ngas ni rin chen btsal ba yang // bu 'dod ste// dpyir btsal btsal na// ci phyir rab tu 'byung byed ci nga // 'jig rten smod la dga' bar byed// de nas khyim
300b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi bu des tshig su bcad de pa la smras pa/ bdag ni rtag tu chos tshol mos// btsal nas yang dag tshul bzhin sems// longs spyod myong bar mi dga' bas// 'jig rten 'dren pa
300b7(dkon brtsegs): byed par dga'/ khyim gyi rin chen mi dgos pas// bdag ni 'dod pa nyung la mos// chos kyi gter ni dbyung ba'i phyir// rab tu 'byung bar mos pa yin// sangs rgyas 'byung bar rab tu
300b8(dkon brtsegs): dkon/ chos bstan pa yang rab tu dkon// deng bdag sangs rgyas bstan phrad na// ci'i phyir na btang bar bya// gang po de nas khyim bdag gi bu des pa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 
301a1(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas phyir byung ste 'gro ba'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// pa ni bye ba 'bum yod cing // ma ni bye ba brgya yod kyang // deng bdag rab tu 'byung
301a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems// gang gis kyang ni bzlog mi nus// deng bdag lus srog pha ma dang // gnyen 'dab kun ni rab spangs nas// sangs rgyas chos ni mi spongs par// rab byung spyod pa gnyer bar
301a3(dkon brtsegs): byed/  gang po de'i tshe khyim bdag gi bu des tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras nas rab tu byung bar gyur to// chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen thob ga la ba der song nas/ chos mnyan pa gnyer
301a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa dang / de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba mthu chen thob pas kyang de la sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rgya cher yang da/ dag par rab tu ston to// de nas dge slong ma ha shu ma tras
301a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde thos par gyur nas/ chos smra sa pa mthu chen thob pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bang ga gis 'di lta bu'i mdo sde sngon chad ma thos na/ mdo sde
301a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu 'di sus ni klog par byed/ sus ni 'don par byed/ sus ni yang dag par blangs nas 'dzin par byed gnas gang du ni thos par gyur/ mthu chen thob pas smras pa/ bdag gis
301a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od gzer gyi rgyal po'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu'i dbang gi phyir/ 
301a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo rang gi ngang gis sems la gnas par gyur to// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ma ha shu ma tas 'di skad smras pa thos nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed de/ rjes su
301b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas/ shes rab kyi mthu skyes pas shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa chen po'i stobs kyis chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la dri ba dris pa dang / mthu chen thob pas kyang don gyi
301b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su lan yang dag par btab nas/ 'di skad du sngon de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od gzer gyi rgyal po la dge slong gzhig gis dngos po 'di deng khyod kyis ji skad dris
301b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de bzhin du yang dag par lan btab pa dge slong des thos par gyur nas/ shin tu dga' bar
301b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur ro zhes smras so// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ma ha shu/ dam tas chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la yang de skad du dris pa dang / mthu chen thob pas kyang 'di skad du/ sngon de bzhin
301b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od gzer gyi rgyul/ po la dge slong zhig gis dngos po 'di deng khyed kyisaji skad dris pa de bzhin du zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
301b6(dkon brtsegs): ba des kyang de bzhin du lan yang dag par btab pa dge slong des thos nas shin tu dga' bar gyur to zhes smras so// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ma ha shu ma tas chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la
301b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu dam pa sngon de bzhin gshegs pa las zhus pa dang / lan 'debs pa'i dngos po 'di lta bu lan du zhig thos par gyur/ mthu chen thob pas smras pa/ 
301b8(dkon brtsegs): dngos po 'di ni shin tu yid ches par dka' bas/ dngos po 'di ma 'dri bar zhog shig/ gzhan yang gang lus kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa mngon sum du ma byas pa dag gis kyang shin
302a1(dkon brtsegs): tu yid ches par dka'o// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du ma ha shu ma tas/ kye skyes bu dam pa sngon de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus pa dang / lan 'debs
302a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dngos po 'di lta bu lan du zhig thos par gyur/ mthu chen thob pas smras pa/ dngos po 'di ma 'dri bar zhog shig/ gal te khong du ma chud par gyur na/ deng khyod la dpes nye bar mtshon
302a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ste/ blo dang ldan pa dag ni dpes nye bar mtshon na rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// dge slong bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po las sems can
302a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi rang bzhin thos pa ni sa chen po'i rnam pa bas ches ma ngo // dge slong gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i dajig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i sems can gyi
302a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gzugs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin pa'i ma/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min/ ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
302a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi'i lus thob nas shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan par gyur la/ sems can de dag re re yang yun se gol gtogs pa gcig la gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi dri ba so so nas mi mthun pa
302a7(dkon brtsegs): dag dris par 'gyur/ dge slong de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang bskal pa gcig gam/ 
302a8(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa gcig las lhag pa'i bar du dri ba mang po de lta bu dris par 'gyur/ gzhan yang gang zag gcig gis se gol gtogs pa gcig la gang zag de snyed kyi dri ba tha dad cing mi
302b1(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa thams cad dris par 'gyur/ de bzhin du gzhan yang gang zag gcig gis sems can ma lus pa mthar thug pa snyed kyi dri ba sna tshogs pa bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa
302b2(dkon brtsegs): gcig las lhag pa'i bar dris par gyur na/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ dri ba de dag ci mang ba yin snyam 'am/ smras pa/ de bzhin du mang bas dper sla ba yang ma yin no// mthu chen thob pas
302b3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ma hA shu ma ta la smras pa bdag gis deng khyed la yang dag par smras pa yin gyis the tshom ma za cig/ ji ltar sems can ma lus pa de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa gcig gam
302b4(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa gcig las lhag pa'i bar du the tshom dris pa bas / bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi rnam grangs gcig thos pa'i sgo nas lan btab pa de bas kyang
302b5(dkon brtsegs): ches mang ngo // de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo gnyis dang nga/ gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dad/ nga / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu nas/ 
302b6(dkon brtsegs): brgya dang / stong dang / khri dang / 'bum la sogs pa'i bar du yang de bzhin te/ dge slong bdag gis mdo tsam du bstan na bgrang ba'i ming dang yi ge ji snyed pa thams cad ni tshad med mthar thug
302b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas grangs de dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur kyang bdag gis ma lus par kha don du bton nas yongasu bzung ngo // dge slong dris pa de dag zams
302b8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang chos kyi rnam grangs gcig tu 'dus par bdag gis rab tu shes te/ 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal pos yang dag par gsungs pa'i
303a1(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi tshig dang / 'tshig dang / phyag rgya'i tshig dang / dngas gna' tshig dang / rdorjes du tshig dang / rab tu kya tshig dang / mamamo pa'i tshig d+ha / 
303a2(dkon brtsegs): gting dpag dka' ba'i tshig gang yin pa'o// dge slong sgo gcig tu chos thams cad sdud pa ni 'di lta ste mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dag yin pas chos thams cad dang / tshig
303a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang sgo nges gzhi byed pas thams cad sgo der 'jug par 'gyur// mdo sde dang ched du brjod pa'i sde thams cad kyang sgo der zhugs nas yi ge gcig rnam par phye nas yi ge mang
303a4(dkon brtsegs): po la 'jug par 'gyuraro// dge slong de bzhin du gzungs dkyi sgo bdun khri brgyad stong po thams cad la yang 'jug par 'gyur te/ de la yang dbang po rnams kyi bye brag
303a5(dkon brtsegs): dgu khri nyis stong yod do// sems can gyi spyod pa/ sgo nas kyang gzugs kyi kha dog brgyad khri yod de/ lam gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa'i gzugs ji snyed pa
303a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyi ming gang yin pa yang bdag gis rab tu shes so// gzugs de dag re re la yang meng ba rgyu yod pa dang / de bzhin du ming nyis brgya dang / ming sum brgya yod pa nas
303a7(dkon brtsegs): ming brgya stong du ma yod pa'i bar dag kyang bdag gis rab tu shes so// 'dzam bu'i gling na yod pa nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams las 'das pa'i bar dag na yod pa'i dmigs
303a8(dkon brtsegs): pa tha dad pa dang / ming tha dad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis rab tu sheso// mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus chos rnams so so tha dad pa'i bye brag dang / dris pa
303b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lam gyi bye brag ji snyed yod pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus bdag gis rab tu shes so// gang po de'i tshe
303b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ma ha shu ma tas chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa slar grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal du gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams
303b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal pos yang dag par gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par rjes su bskor cing bdag gis gsol ba btab pa bzhin du gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bdag gis yang
303b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par bsrung zhing chos mnyan par 'tshal lo// mthu chen thob pas smras pa/ da ltar gyi dus kyi dge slong rnams da ni thams cad kyang le lo dang snyom las can du 'gyur te/ dge
303b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la sogs pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa med pas khyod de skad ma zer cig/ ma ha tas smras pa/ bdag ni/ deng phyin chad dge ba'i chos la lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed
303b6(dkon brtsegs): nas chos de gnyer bar bgyid pas le lo mi bgyid do// gang po dge slong ma sa shu ma tas mthu chen thob pa grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal du 'jug cing yang dag pa'i chos bshad par
303b7(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba btab nas rjes su bsrung bar byas te/ sngon ma thos pa'i chos yang dag par mnyan to// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ma ha shu ma ta skye bo rnams kyis rim 'gro dang / bsnyen
303b8(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas te mang po kun gyis tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / mang du thos pa'i yon tan mchog tshad med pa dang ldan pa'o zhes brjod par gyur to// 
304a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ma ha shu ma tas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dag tu song nas sems can mang po yang dag pa'i chos la gzung pa dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas
304a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bstan pa kun du spel ba'i ched du chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod par gyur to// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ma ha shu ma tas/ skye bo mang po rnams yang
304a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par bskul nas chos la mchod pa bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la bsnyen bkur rim gro dang yang dag par bsrung ba byed du
304a4(dkon brtsegs): bcug go/ gang po chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa yangade dge slong ma ha shu ma tas yang dag par bsrung ba bya/ das pas/ phyir grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dag
304a5(dkon brtsegs): tu song nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal pos bskal pa grangs med pa rna masu byang chub mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de dag
304a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rgya cher yang dag par bshad de/ kun du rgya cher rab tu spel to// gang po 'di ltar dge slong ma ha sha ma tas kyang lo brgya'i bar du rtag par chos smra ba mthu chen
304a7(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i rje su 'brangs nas chos rnams yang dag par dris kyang rtag par gsar du tha dad pa'i chos yang dag par bstan gyis nom yang zlos bu smras par ma gyur to// gang po chos smra ba mthu
304a8(dkon brtsegs): chen thob pa yang dge slong ma ha shu ma tas yang dag par rab tu bsrung ba'i phyir/ sems can tshad med pa snyed 'phags pa'i bstan pa la yang dag par btsud nas sems can tshad med// 
304b1(dkon brtsegs): pa snyed sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la yang dag par bkod do// gang po khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na// chos smra ba mthu chen thob pas dam pa'i chos yang dag par bsrungs shing chos
304b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par bshad pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na/ de ltar mi lta ste de ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di nyid yin no// gang po dge slong ma ha shu ma tas yang chos smra ba
304b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsrungs shing gsol ba btab pa dang / grogs bya ba'i bsod nams kyi mthus/ shi ba'i 'og tu 'og gi phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams bcu pa de bzhin gshegs
304b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'khor mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i zhing du skyes de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la sems can thams cadad kyi the tshom yongasu gcod pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde 'di
304b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhus pa dang / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang leg so zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa lan brgya stong du ma brjod nas/ de la chos thams cad sdud cing
304b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par bston to// mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan pa na sems can tshad med pa snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
304b7(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed nas yang dag pa nyid du sems pa la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// gang po dge slong ma ha shu ma ta 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
304b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ri rab ces bya ba dang phrad nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos thams cad sdud cing 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par zhus pa dang / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs
305a1(dkon brtsegs): bdes kyang legs zhes pa'i bsngags pa lan brgya stong dum brjod nas de la chos thams cad sdud cing 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ma sde yang dag pas
305a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan to// mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan pa na sems can tshad med pa snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus byas te de bzhin
305a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ri'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang phrad nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos thams cad kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par zhus pa dang / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang
305a4(dkon brtsegs): leg so zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa lan brgya stong du ma brjodadenas de la chos thams cad kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo sdecher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// mdo sde 'di yang dag
305a5(dkon brtsegs): par bstan pa na sems can tshad med pa snyed bla na med pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus byas te de bzhin gshegs pa
305a6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba dang phrad nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par zhus pa dang / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa
305a7(dkon brtsegs): des kyang leg so zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod nas de la chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan pa na
305a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshad med pa snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te// gang po dge slong ma nya shu matas de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu sangs rgyas
305b1(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang phrad nas mdo sde mang po zhus pa dang / sems can yongasu bzlas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa gang yin pa de dag ngas gal te bskal/ 
305b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par brjod par gyur na yang sangs rgyas mang po de dag gi mtshan dang sems can ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag
305b3(dkon brtsegs): par bkod pa de dag mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// gang po dge slong ma ha shu ma tas ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na mngon du bzhugs pa 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das
305b4(dkon brtsegs): ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsta na pa rnams yang dag par bsrungs pa'i grangs ni ba darjod kyis mi lang ngo // gang po de lta bas na byang chub
305b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sngon ma sa pa'i chos thos nas don gyi tshul yid la sems par byed na yon tan rgya chen po de lta bu dag thob par gyur/ 
305b6(dkon brtsegs): par rig par bya'o// gang po khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong ma ha shu ma tas chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa las sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos nas/ don gyi tshul rjesu 'brengs par gyur/ 
305b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de gzhan yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi lta ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ke'u war du zhes bya ba 'di nyid yin te de'i tshe dge slong ma ha shu ma tas yang dag par chos gsungs pa
305b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / sngon ma thos pa'i chos mnyam nas don gyi rjesu 'brang zhing tshig la mngon pa med pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis sangs rgyas mang po dang phrad nas mdo sde zab mo shin du gya nom pa mang po
306a1(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis deng 'dir nga la yang chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs shes bya ba'i
306a2(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde zhus pa las ngas kyang yang dag par bstan pa ni sems can tshad pa snyed phan pa chen po thob par gyur pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid yang
306a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par bstan pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpas ma thos chos// thos nas don tshul sems bya yi// bdag gis sngon chad ma thos shes// de skad du ni smra mi/ 
306a4(dkon brtsegs): bya/ ma thos chos ni thos gyur na// yang dag dran pas do// na sems na// rgya mtshor 'bab chu shong ba bzhin// / de phyir shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// mang du thos pa
306a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel 'gyur zhing // shes rab dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyu ra// sangs rgyas mdzad pa thos 'gyur zhing // rgya sems can phan yang 'dogs// mang thos rgya mtsho sogs
306a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing // shes rab dag kyang gtugs mi 'gyur// tshig gi don ni rab shes pas// khyad par nang na mchog tu 'gyur// de phyir sngon chad ma thos chos// yang dag par ni mnyan par bya/ 
306a7(dkon brtsegs): ma thos chos ni mnyan byed na// de 'dra'i rnam smin thob par 'gyur// // bam po gnyis pa// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du thos pa yongs
306a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyer ba bzhin du 'dun pa'i bsam pa skyed cing gnas dben par gnas pa la mos pa'i bsam pa rab tu bskyed nas/ sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis bla na med pa yang dag
306b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu gnyer bar bya'o// yongasu gnyer nas kyang zhe sdang yongasu spang ba'i phyir byams pa bsgom par bya'o// 'dod chags yongasu spang ba'i phyir mi sdug pa
306b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgom par bya'o// gti mug yongasu spang ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgom par bya'o// gang po byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus ni gang yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
306b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ni brtson 'grus rtsom par byed ce na/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa gcig las nyung ba cig tu 'gro 'am 'dug pa dag tu
306b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par brtson 'grus bskyed par bya'o snyam du sems na/ gang po de lta bu gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus shes mi bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang la
306b5(dkon brtsegs): la zhig bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa gcig las nyu/ nga ba zhig tu tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsrung ba/ dang / dka' thub spyad pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang
306b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur kyang dmigs pa'i dngos po'i rjes su 'dod pa'i semasu bskyed nas chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral bar gyur na 'di lta bu 'di yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus
306b7(dkon brtsegs): shes mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus de bzhin gshegs// 
306b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par 'gyur cing / 'jig rten pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par mi 'gyur ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po byang chub
307a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas sngon ma thos pa'i chos zab mo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa/ mtshan ma cung zad tsam yang med cing don dam pa'i rjesu mthun pa de lta bu'i mdo sde zab
307a2(dkon brtsegs): mo thos par gyur na/ mi mthun zhing 'gal ba med par de'i don gsal bar rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed nas sems la nar pa med par nyan pa dang / len pa
307a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / klog pa dang / kha don du 'don pa dang / gzhan la yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus shes bya'o// man
307a4(dkon brtsegs): sde zab mo thos nas de'i don rab tu rtogs te mi mthun pa/ med cing 'gal ba med pa'i brtson 'grus de lta bu de la ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur
307a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing / 'jig rten pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang smod par mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir gang po byang chub sa mas dpa' ji ltar 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams
307a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gting mi rnyed pa gang yin pa de bdag gis 'dir gting gi mthar thug par bya'o// 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams bying bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de/ 
307a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bying bar mi bya'o// 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyis 'jigs pa gang yin pa de dag la bdag gis 'jigs par mi bya'o snyam pa'i go cha bgo bar bya'o// 
307a8(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis go cha bgos pa ni 'jig rten pa dang rje su mthun pa ma yin pas/ 'jig rten pa'i chos spang ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa yin 'jig rten pa'i chos spyad pa'i phyir/ 
307b1(dkon brtsegs): go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ 'jig rten pa'i chos mi spyad par bya ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rje su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ 'jig
307b2(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'i chos bzlog pa'i phyir go cha bgos pa yin no snyam du sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus
307b3(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis po 'di dang ldan par gyur na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom
307b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir// / tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sem/ das dpa' chos gnyer ba// rtag par brtson 'grus rab
307b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de// don gyi tshul ni sems byed pas// sgra yi rjes su yongs mi 'brang // byang chub sems dpa' tshig mi 'brang // chos rnams stong par shes pa'i phyir// dge ba'i
307b6(dkon brtsegs): chos ni tshol bar byed// bskal pa dag ni grangs med par// bye ba stong phrag mang por ni// nyin mtshan rtag par 'dug gyur te// sems bskyed dka' ba rab spyad kyang // sngon chad
307b7(dkon brtsegs): ma thos mdo sde dag/ yid mi ches na brtson 'grus min// don zab gting ni gang rnyed pa// le lo can zhes mi bya'o// de 'dra'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
307b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bsngags// 'jig rten gting ni mi rnyed pa// de gting byang chub sems dpa' 'thob// 'jig rten 'jigs shing bying gyur kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs bying med// brtson
308a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis rtag tu ni// stong dben byang chub tshol bar byed// stong pa'i chos la 'jigs med pas// ldog cing bying gyur pa yang med// bdag chos mtshan
308a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid gnas pa las// de phyir 'jigs bying rab tu ste// chos rnams thams cad 'jigs mthor ba// de ni byang chub lam zhes bya// nan tan brtson 'grus gang bskyed pa// mang
308a3(dkon brtsegs): zos rgya mtsho myur du 'grub// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpas phung po lnga la mkhas par bya/ skye mched bcu gnyis la mkhas par bya// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
308a4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag bcu gnyis la mkhas par bya'o// phung po lnga da ngu / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams btso brgyad dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis la
308a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhas par gyur na gnas pa med pa'i ye shes yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnas pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad la mi sems
308a6(dkon brtsegs): shing rnam par rtog par yang mi byed do// mi sems shing rnam par mi rtog par/ sems can la chos bstan nas lta ba thams cad 'jig cing 'jig tshogs la lta ba rab tu 'dul
308a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe
308a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' phung po lnga// skye mched bcu gnyis stong pa shes/ khams ni bco brgyad rab 'byed cing // rten
308b1(dkon brtsegs): 'brel bcu gnyis rab tu rtogs// lnga phung rjes su mi 'brang zhing // lus ni mi bden nyid du rig/ phyi nang skye mched thams cad kun// rang bzhin dag ni stong par shes// de ltar
308b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams shes nas kyang // gzhan dag la ni ston byed pas// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// shes rab rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa'
308b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni ji ltar tshul khrims bcas pa dang / ji ltar 'dul ba yang dag par bstan pa bzhin du legs par rje su slob par byed pas yongasu nyams par mi byed do// byang
308b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas ji ltar tshul khrims slob par byed ce na// chos thams cad slob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims slob pa zhes bya'o// 
308b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad slob par byed pa gang yin pa des ni thams cad mkhyen pa thob par 'gyur la/ chos shes pa des ni
308b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab thob par gyur te/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab des dngos po thams cad shes par gyur pas so// ji ltar dngos po thams cad shes rab gyur ce na/ byang
308b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni nang gi dngos po thams cad dang phyi rol gyi dngos po thams cad rab tu shes pa gang yin pa'o// gang po ci'i phyir nang zhes bya zhe na/ nang zhes bya ba ni ji tsam du myong ba
308b8(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa 'dod chags par bya ba'i gnas 'di lta ste/ nang gi lus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa las skyes shing / de la kun rdzob du btags pa'i ming
309a1(dkon brtsegs): tsam du yod pa 'di ni mig go// 'di ni rna ba'o// 'di ni sna'o// 'di ni lce'o// 'di ni lus so// 'di ni yid do zhes brjod pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni nang zhes
309a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// chos de dag la so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par zhen par byed pa'i phyi nang zhes bya ste/ 'di skad du bdag gis mig 'di lta bu thob par bya'o zhes brjod kyang de lta bu'i
309a3(dkon brtsegs): mig mngon par 'du byed pa med la de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang yid thob par bya'o zhes brjod kyang 'di ltar rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid mngon par 'du byed
309a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med par yang / de na las kyis rkyen gyis slong zhing rna dam par smin pa rab tu bskyed pas de'i phyir nang zhes bya/ nga'o// de'i phyir bye brag la so so'i skye bos mngon par zhen
309a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'di ni mig go// 'di ni rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid do zhes zer ba thams cad ni nang zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang po nang zhes bya ba ni dngos po
309a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnyis mngon par 'du byed pa yang mi bden zhing slu bar byed pa yin na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo'i mngon par zhen pas yang dag par blangs nas rtsod pa skyed par byed kyi gang po de bzhin
309a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas ni 'di dag bzod ma nyid nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin thugasu chud pas mngon par zhen par mi mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du thugs
309a8(dkon brtsegs): su chud nas mngon par zhen pa mi mdzad ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos 'di dag la phyogs par mi mdzad do// gang zhig la phyogs par mi mdzad ce na/ 'di lta ste/ mig 'di ni sred
309b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'ching ba yin no zhes phyogs par mi mdzad la mig dang bral ba la phyogs par mi mdzad do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la yang phyogs par mi mdzad la yid dang bral ba la yang
309b2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs par mi mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang po de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos 'di dag la nang zhes bya ba yang mi dmigs la/ phyi rol zhes bya ba yang mi dmigs pas/ de'i phyir de/ 
309b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di dag la phyogs par mi mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par bsrung ba yin pas/ 'di skad du dge slong dag mig ni bdag kyang ma yin la/ 
309b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi ngo bo nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// chos gang ni mig yin/ mig ni su'i yin/ chos gang ni rna ba dang / sna dang / 
309b5(dkon brtsegs): lce dang / lus dang / yid yin/ yid ni su'i yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi ngo bo nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir/ zhes gsungs paso// gang po mig kyang deng so sor rab
309b6(dkon brtsegs): tu brtags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang deng so sor brtags na/ chos gang la yang mngon par zhen cing len pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis ji tsam du
309b7(dkon brtsegs): chos la len pa dang bcas pa des ni sdug bsngal skyed par byed la/ sdug bsngal skyes pa'i phyir ni bde ba med par gyur pas/ de'i phyir gang po ji tsam du chos la len pa dang bcas pa thams/ 
309b8(dkon brtsegs): cad ni sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur la/ sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa des ni sdug bsngal spong bar mi byed pas/ gang po 'di ni mig so sor brtags pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / 
310a1(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / yid 'jug pa'i gnas med par so sor brtags pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang po gal te 'jug pa'i gnas yod par gyur na 'byung ba'i
310a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang yod par gyur pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang mig ni stong zhing bdag dang bdag gi ba med do// rang bzhin gyis de 'dra zhing / rna ba dang / sna dang / 
310a3(dkon brtsegs): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang stong zhing bdag dang bdag gi ba med de/ rang bzhin gyis de 'dra bas ngo bo nyid med/ 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de la ni mngon par 'du bya ba
310a4(dkon brtsegs): yang med la 'jig pa yang mdo zhes gsung so// gang po che sa nyid 'di lta bu gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung yang rung ste/ 
310a5(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid 'di ni rtag tu gnas pa nyid do// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa ni chos rnams skye yang mi skye ba nyid du thu/ gsu chud pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang
310a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par bsrungs pa yin pas/ 'di skad du de de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung yang rung ste/ ngo bo nyid 'di ni rtag tu gnas pa nyi do zhes gsung/ 
310a7(dkon brtsegs): gang po ci'i phyir mi skye ba zhes bya/ ci'i phyir ni mi skye ba'i ye shes zhes bya zhe na/ gang po chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o// lam gang
310a8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i ye shes zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal zad pa gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o// lam gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i ye shes zhes bya ste 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ 
310b1(dkon brtsegs): bden pa gnyis po 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa yod par gsungs pa zhes bya'o// gang po de bzhin gshegs pas sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid
310b2(dkon brtsegs): ces gang gsungs pa de nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa zhes gsungaso// sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'o// 
310b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni mtshan nyid med pa yin pas mkhas pa rnams kyis 'dus ma byas de nyid mtshan nyid med pa yin par rab tu shes// gang po mkhas pa
310b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis ji ltar 'dus ma byas de nyid mtshan ma med pa yin par rab tu shes par gyur zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dusadam byas kyi chos ni stong par yang shes/ rab tu dben pa yin
310b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes/ skyabasu 'gro ba'i gnas yin par yang shes/ phan pa mchog yin par yang shes/ yongasu gdung ba med par yang shes te/ mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar 'dus
310b6(dkon brtsegs): ma byas rab tu shes kyang ye shes de la skye ba'i mtshan ma medo// gang po mkhas pa rnams ni mtshan ma rnams yongasu spangs pas de na mchog dam pa mngon par 'du byed pa med pa 'jig pa
310b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa thob par 'gyur ro// gang po mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa de la 'jig pa yod kyi mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de la 'jig pa yang med do// 'jig pa med pa'i mtshan
310b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid yin no// 'jig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma med pa yin no// 'jig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni smon pa med pa
311a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gang gis kyang mngon par 'dum byas la/ gang gis kyang 'jig pa med par dbyer med pa gang yin pa de ni gang po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
311a2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang gang zhe na/ 
311a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dmigasu med pa gang yin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ 
311a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigasu ma mchis pa de nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'ad/ das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dmigasu med pa yin no// 
311a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na ni chos thams cad kyang sa ngas rgyas rnams kyi byang chub lags par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po de bzhin te/ 
311a6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yin yang byang chub de ni chos thams cad ces mi bya'o// chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub yino zhes bya ba yang kun rdzob btags
311a7(dkon brtsegs): pa tsam du brjod par zad de/ de ni le lo can rnams kyis rtogs par dka' zhing rig par dka' ba yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ le lo can gang yin pa de dag ni chos rnams mnyam pa nyid mngon
311a8(dkon brtsegs): par sgrub pa mi byed la/ mnyam par ma gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas dang rtsod par byed pas so// gang po gang dag mnyam pa nyid mngon par sgrub par mi byed ce na/ gang po 'jig
311b1(dkon brtsegs): rten pa thams cad ni mnyam pa nyid mngon par sgrub par mi byed do// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub la ni mnyam pa yang med mi mnyam pa yang med// gang po ngas lam 'dis tha
311b2(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis de'i phyir mdo sde 'di dag las chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i gnas
311b3(dkon brtsegs): skabasu thams cad kyang nges pa nyid du zhugs pa yin pas/ de ni nges par byang chub kyi sgor zhugs pa zhes bstan pa yin te/ de'i phyir gang po chos thams cad byang chub ces bya'o// / 
311b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegarngas pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
311b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub gang lags pa de ni nges pa yang lags/ ma nges pa yang lags/ tshig 'bru dang yi ger zhugs pa/ yang lags/ tshig 'bru dang yi ger ma zhugs pa yang
311b6(dkon brtsegs): lags/ tshig 'bru la zhugs pa yang lags/ tshig 'bru la ma zhugs pa yang lags pa de ni shin du ngo mtshar che lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dang bdag gis
311b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das las mdo sde 'di lta bu thos pas chos thams cad la rnam par nges pa'i snang ba thob lags so// bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis chos rnams la rnam par nges
311b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snang ba thob pas/ dngos po gcig las kyang dngos po thams cad rtogs par gyur la/ dngos po thams cad las kyang dngos po gcig rtogs par gyur pas so// de nas
312a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po la bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis 'di ltar myur ba kho nar sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi don la rab tu
312a2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par gyur pa legaso leg so// 'di yang khyod kyis sngon 'das pa'i dus su sangs rgyas mang po rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed nas nye bar
312a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan te zhu ba dag zhus pa las gyur pa yin par rig par bya'o// gang po ngas mngon par dran te 'das pa'i dus kyi zhing 'di nyid kyi nam mkha'i phyogs cig na/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas
312a4(dkon brtsegs): drug khri brgyad stong las mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i yon tan gyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis khyodad chos rnam par nges pa'i snang ba thob pa yin no// bcom
