312a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal te bdag gis sangs rgyas mang po las mdo sde 'di sngon thos par gyur pa zhig la/ gas na/ ci'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
312a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub rjes su dran pa'i bsam pa gcig tsam yang ma mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po ngas sngon mngon par dran te 'das pa'i dus kyis
312a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe khyod kyis skal pa gcig gi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las slar ldog cing nyams par gyur kyang / de'i bsod nams kyi rgyu
312a8(dkon brtsegs): dang rkyen gyis ngas deng 'dir chos smra ba rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa zhes brjod pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
312b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sngon mi dge ba'i las ci zhig bgyis na/ bskal pa gcig gis bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las slar ldog cing nyams
312b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis mi dge ba'i grogs po la brten pa'i phyir dang / gzhan yang khyod kyis dam pa'i chos rgya cher
312b3(dkon brtsegs): ma spel ba'i phyir khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar ldog cing nyams par gyur pa yin no// glang po chos bzhi dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
312b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub las ldog cing nyams pa nas nyan thos kyi theg par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa mi dge ba'i grogs la brten pa'i phyir/ 
312b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu spangs nas 'di skad du 'di ltar bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed ci dang/ sa/ 'khor ba'i mtha' ni shin tu thag ring ste/ 'gro ba
312b6(dkon brtsegs): lnga po rnams su kha brgyud cing sdug bsngal tshad med pa myong bas khom pa dang 'phrad pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'phrad pa yang shin tu dkon/ shin du dang
312b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dad pa thob pa yang shin du dkon// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par gyur na yang khyim nas khyim med par 'byung ba ches shin tu dka' bas/ deng khyod khom pa dang ldan pa chung
312b8(dkon brtsegs): ma gsan cig/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung bstan pa thob pa yang
313a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nges par gyur pa yang ma yin pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba yang mi 'thob cing 'gro ba lnga po rnamasu 'khor bar 'gyur zhes smras pas/ 
313a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zag des de skad smras pa thos pa'i dbang gis sems bying nas byang chub kyi lam las ldog cing le los mos par mi 'gyur te/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang
313a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las slar log nas nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa'i rje su mthun
313a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mdo sde 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo dang / byang chub tu sems skyed pa'i mdo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo dang / pa
313a5(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa drug dang rje su mthun pa'i mdo thos par ma gyu/ pAr na/ 'di ltar thos par mo gyur pa'i phyir ji skad/ bstan pa bzhin du spyod par mi 'gyur/ ji skad bstan pa
313a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du yang dag par slob par mi 'gyur bas/ des byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang ni bsten par bya/ chos gang na yongasu spang bar bya/ chos gang ni yang dag par blang bar bya
313a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rigs/ chos gang ni yang dag par blang bar bya ba'i mi rigs/ chos gang ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin chos gang ni nyan thos kyi chos yin pa dag rab tu mi shes so// 'di ltar
313a8(dkon brtsegs): mi shes shing rab tu 'byed pa mi nus pa'i phyir bstan par bya bar rigs pa'i chos ni bsten par mi byed la/ bsten par bya ba'i mi rigs pa'i chos la ni rab tu brton par 'gyur ro// 
313b1(dkon brtsegs): des bsten par bya ba'i rigs pa'i chos ni bsten par mi byed la/ bsten par bya ba'i mi rigs pa'i chos la ni rab tu bsten par byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyi
313b2(dkon brtsegs): sems las rab tu nyams shing log par gyur pas sems kyang zhum ste/ la lo can du gyur nas sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyang yongasu gtong bar 'gyur te/ gang po byang chub sems
313b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na bla na med pa'i byang chub las slar log nas nyan thos kyi theg par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos
313b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams yod pa nyid du 'dzin cing bdag tu mngon par zhen/ pa dang / log par lta ba rnams spyod cing mthara'adzin pa'i lta bar ltung ba dang / log pa'i sdig pa
313b5(dkon brtsegs): rnamasu bying ste drang dka' bar gyur nas mdo sde zab mo da na dam pa'i rjesu mthun pa dag thos par gyur na yang mngon par yid ches pa'i rtags cung zad tsam yang
313b6(dkon brtsegs): med cing 'gal bar byed pa dang / mngon par ma rtogs nas yang dag pa'i chos 'jigs pa'i kha ni ma tho ba dge slong bar byed na/ rgyu dang rkyen des mi khom pa'i gan su skyes nas
313b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang thos par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjesu bstan pa dag dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur/ dge
313b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bshes gnyen yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas rnams mi mthong ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i chos kyang thos par mi 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i chos ma thos pa'i phyir
314a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjesu bstan pa dag dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rje su bstan pa'i chos dang phrad par mgyur/ 
314a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma rnyed pa'i phyir khom pa'i gnas dang bral nas mi khom pa'i gan su skye bar 'gyuraro// mi khom pa'i
314a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas su skyes pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral nas mi dge ba'i grogs po dang phrad par 'gyur ro// mi dge ba'i grogs po'i rjesu 'brangs pa'i phyir sngon gyi yi dam brjed
314a4(dkon brtsegs): cing stor bar 'gyur ro// des sngon gyi yi dam brjed cing da stor bar gyur pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyang spong dar byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yang spong bar byed pas/ 
314a5(dkon brtsegs): slar ldog par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi bsam pa yang gtan du stor nas 'khor ba'i chos 'ba' zhig spyod ci nga theg pa chen po'i spyod pa'i chos mngon par bsgrub par
314a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na bla na med pa'i byang chub las slar log nas nyan thos kyi thog par 'gyur/ gzhan yang gang po
314a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde thos par gyur kyang / lhag pa'i bsam pas gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed cing sems zhum par gyur nas gcig tu 'gro ba la
314a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing chos kyi ser sna byas nas gzhan dag la bstan pa'i 'dun pa med pa dang / chos kyis gzhan dag rgya cher yongasu sdud par mi byed na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis shes
314b1(dkon brtsegs): rab dang dran pa rab tu nyams par 'gyur ro// shes rab dang dran pa nyams par gyur pa'i dbang gis zhen pa dag dang lhan cig mdo sde'i chos klog cing 'don par mi byed la/ chos kyis
314b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag dang mthun par mi byed pas gang zag de lus rjes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems kyang stong par gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yang brjed par gyur to/ gang po byang chub
314b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan par gyur na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems las slar log nas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
314b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis don 'di nyid yang dag par rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mi dge gro/ dgas po bsten byed cing / byang chub la ni mi brtson na/ 
314b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen ni de'i phyir// bla med byang chub sems stor/ 'gyur// sdig pa'i bdag lta rab bskyed nas// mtha'/ dang log ltar gang lhung ba// chos 'jig sdig ni bslang
314b6(dkon brtsegs): bas na// mi khom gnas su skye bar 'gyur// mi khom gnasu skyes nas kyang // byang chub sems ni gcod byed cing // sngon gyi yi dam stor gyur pas// de phyir byang chub sems kyang
314b7(dkon brtsegs): nyams/ de yis byang chub sems skye ba'i// chos ni thos par yong mi 'gyur// de yi sems ni 'phel 'gyur na// byang chub sems ni bsgrub par 'gyur// dam chos rgya cher thos gyur
314b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang // ser snas gzhan la ston mi mos// rgyu dang rkyen ni de'i phyir// byang chub las ni ldog par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' theg chen gnyer// chos 'di bzhi ni shes par bya// 
315a1(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di bzhi ni shes gyur na// byang chub sems ni skye bar 'gyur// de phyir sdig pa'i chos 'di bzhi// nan tan gyis ni rab spangs nas// stong nyid chos
315a2(dkon brtsegs): ni sgom byed na// dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par 'gyur// 'di lta'i mdo sde thos gyur nas// ser sna dag ni mi bskyed par// nan tan gzhan la bstan par bya// de las byung / 
315a3(dkon brtsegs): chub rab tu skye// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ji ltar yongasu bsngos pa bzhin du byang chub kyi sems las ldog
315a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur zhing / ji ltar yongasu bsngos pa bzhin du ge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu nyams par mi 'gyuraro// / bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul
315a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims rnam par dag pa yongasu bsrungs nas bsam pa rnams mngon par grub par byed pa dang / dran pa dang ldan zhing shes rab la yang dag par gnas pa dang / rab tu
315a6(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa'i sems kyis brtson zhing le lo med pa dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs shing shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag yin te/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos
315a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na ji ltar yong su bsngo ba bzhin du byang chub kyi sems las yongasu ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / ji ltar yongasu bsngos pa bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
315a8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu nyams par mi 'gyuraro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
315b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ldan/ dran pa zab cing thag kyang ring // brtson pa'i sems kyis rab brtson zhing // mang thos shes rab brgyan dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ni// chos
315b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di bzhi la brten byed na/ yid la bsam pa'i dngos po kun// thams cad rab tu grub par 'gyur// de phyir rtag tu khrims bsrung zhing // nan tan brtson 'grus ldan par bya// chos dran rgyun ni/ 
315b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gcod cing // rtag par mang thos gnyer bar bya// khrims bsrungs gnas gtsang rab tu ste// dran pas shes rab sbyor bar 'gyur// brtson 'grus sangs rgyas chos kyang sbyong // mang
315b4(dkon brtsegs): thos shes rab chen po ste// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams// de 'dra'i chos ni bslab par bya// de 'dra'i cho sa ni rab bslabs nas// bla med 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ 
315b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang / ldan par gyur na byang chub la phan 'dogs par 'gyur/ ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims bsrung ba ni byang chub
315b6(dkon brtsegs): la phan 'dogs pa'i chos// bzod pa bsgom pa ni byang chub lo phan 'dogs pa'i chos so// brtson 'grus brtsom pa ni byang chub la phan 'dogs pa'i tshe so// mang du thos pa ni byang chub
315b7(dkon brtsegs): la phan 'dogs pa'i chos te/ gang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub la phan 'dogs pa zhes bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid gsal bar rab tu bstan pa'i
315b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khrims bsrung ba// byang chub la ni phan 'dogs te// brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa dang // mang du zos pa de bzhi no// tshul khri
316a1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa gang bsrung ba// smon lam thams cad grub par 'gyur/ khrims gtsang phan 'dogs mang bas na// byang chub thob par yong mi dka'// byang chub sems
316a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bzod bsgom pa// lus kyi mtshan dang shes rab 'grub// de phyir bzod pa rab bsgom na// sangs rgyas mtshan dang shes rab gtar// brtson 'grus kyang ni de bzhin du// byang chub
316a3(dkon brtsegs): mang du phan 'dogs pas// rtag tu brtson 'grus gang brtson pa// byang chub thob par yong mi dka'// mang thos kyis kyang phan 'dogs pas// thos nas chos la rab bsten cing // chos min/ 
316a4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni spong byed pas// byang chub thob par yong mi dka'// / chos bzhi sa bon yin pas na// de las byang chub rab tu skye// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams// chos kyi
316a5(dkon brtsegs): phan la brten par bya// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na/ lus kyi kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang
316a6(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur/ nams kyang rtag par sdig pa mi dge ba'i gnas mi khom pa rnamasu skye bar mi 'gyur/ rtag par
316a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni byams pa bsgoms pas sems can
316a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la khong khro ba med cing gnod pa mi byed pa yin te/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgoms pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing gnod pa mi byed
316b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta bu zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgom pa ni sems can rnams la bdag gis yongasu bskyab par bya'o snyam pa'i byams pa bskyed pas// sems can lus dang sems
316b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag mthong na/ 'di snyam du bdag gis nan tan gyi brtson 'grus kyis sems can de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongasu bzlas nas/ sems can
316b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag la bdag gis bde ba sbyin par bya'o// bdag gis drangs nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de lta bu'i sems bskyed par byed do// de lta
316b4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i sems bskyed nas kyang nan tan brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa dang tshul khrims da dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan
316b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag yongasu goms par byed do// gang po byang chub sems dpa' shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyus/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug
316b6(dkon brtsegs): po dag phun sum tshogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyus nan tan brtson 'grus skyed
316b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed ce na/ glang po byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di snyam du chos gang ni bdag ces bya ba yin/ chos gang ni bdag gi zhes bya ba yin snyam du sems shing 'jal bar byed do// 
316b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sems shing 'jal ba na bdag ces bya ba'i chos kyang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong la bdag gi zhes bya ba'i chos kyang yang dag par rje su mi mthong snyam du sems
317a1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ chos 'di la ni bdag ces bya ba'i chos kyang med la bdag gi zhes bya ba'i chos kyang med do snyam du semaso// byang chub sems dpa' bdag dang bdag
317a2(dkon brtsegs): gIr 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir lus stong pa nyid du rab tu shes so// lus stong pa'i phyir sems can yang stong ngo snyam so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams la bdag dang bdag gir
317a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa yang stong pa yin na sems can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems pa so// byang chub sems dpas bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir sems can stong pa
317a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// sems can stong pa'i phyir gzu dgas kyi phung po yang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyuraro// gzugs kyi phung po stong pa'i phyir/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
317a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir lus
317a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyuraro// lus stong pa'i phyir sems can yang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// sems can stong pa'i phyir phung po rnams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur// 
317a7(dkon brtsegs): phung po rnams stong pa'i phyir 'di lta ste sa dang chu dang / me dang rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur te/ sa'i khams kyang sa'i khams kyi mtshan
317a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis stong / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / na mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas/ khams 'di dag la ni byed pa
317b1(dkon brtsegs): yang med la byang chub kyang med do// gang byed pa med pa'i chos de la ni stong pa yin snyam mo// gang po byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa spangs pa'i phyir lus
317b2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// sems can stong pa'i phyir phung po rnams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur
317b3(dkon brtsegs): ro/ phung po rnams stong pa'i phyir khams rnams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// khams rnams stong pa'i phyir// skye mched rnams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// skye mched
317b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams stong pa'i phyir skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang stong de zhing skye mched rnams la byed pa med pa dang bya ba med pa nyid du rig par 'gyur te// chos gang byed pa dang / bya ba med// 
317b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa yin snyam mo// gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid/ du lta bar byed do// chos thams cad stong par lta ba'i tshe// 
317b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la ngo bo nyid kyis zhe sdang skye ba'i gnas yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ gang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen pos lus stong pa nyid
317b7(dkon brtsegs): du rig pa'i byams pa dang sems can stong pa nyid du rig pa'i byams pa dang / phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams rnams stong pa nyid du rig pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'
317b8(dkon brtsegs): gang ji lta bu'i byams pa bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi byams pa bsgom pa zhes bya ste/ gang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po bsgom pa zhes
318a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin/ 
318a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'dun pa skyes nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par byed pas/ sems can gang 'di ltar chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid khong du ma chud pa dag khong du chud par
318a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir/ go cha chen po bgos pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po spyod pa zhes bya ste/ bdag gis bskyab par bya'o snyam du sems pa'i phyir byams pa zhes
318a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// bdag gis drang bar bya'o snyam du sems pa'i phyi/ dar snying rje zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di lta bu'i byams pa chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa des ni
318a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi mgon dang / skyabs dang / gnas dang / gling dang / mthar phyin pa'i gnas byed par gyur pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i byams pa
318a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po bsgom par bya'o// sems can rnams la rjesu chags pa yang med la khong khro ba yang mi rnyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems can stong pa'i byams pa zhe
318a7(dkon brtsegs): sdang med pa zhes bya'o// gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang byams pa'i rgyu dang bral ba'i rgyu dang stong pa'i rgyus chos rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba
318a8(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po bsgom pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis de ltar chos rnams rab tu rtogs par gyur pa de la bdud dang bdud kyi/ 
318b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur pa des ni yon tan thams cad la sgrib pa'i 'ching ba rnams yongasu gcod
318b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed do// yon tan gyi 'ching ba yongasasu gcod pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dron 'di nyid rab/ 
318b3(dkon brtsegs): tu gsol bar bstan pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpas phung po dang / khams dang skye mched de dag la// bdag med par ni rtag shes pa// byams
318b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgom spong bar lta bar byed/ bdag dang bdag gi chos da gnyis dag/ nges par yang dag dmigasu med// chos rnams dmigasu med pas na// byams pa'i sems kyis
318b5(dkon brtsegs): sgom par byed// chos rnams la ni mi gnas te// mi gan sa pa yang ma yin pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi lam// chos rnams mi gnas pa zhes bya// bla med bzod pa
318b6(dkon brtsegs): gang thob pa// chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid bzod// chos rnams skye 'gag med do zhes// don gyi tshul ni rab tu rtog so// blo gros chen po ldan pa dag/ chos 'di la ni brten byed na// / 
318b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu gya nom gzungs thob cing // spobs pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur// rtag par sangs rgyas phrad par 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyis don rig 'gyur// de phyir byang chub sems
318b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' nga // bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni nan tan brtson 'grus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
319a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchod rten dag la mchod par byed pas gus pa'i sems kyis me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dang / rol
319a2(dkon brtsegs): mo dang / sil snyan dang / mchod pa'i yo byad gya nom pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byed de byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na yon tan phun sum tshogs
319a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog spos// ba dan
319a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ni gdugs mchog gis// blo mchog mchod rten rab mchod nas// shes rab mchog ni tshol bar byed// bsod nams 'di yi rkyen gyis ni// byad bzhin dag ni
319a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par 'gyur// nor phyug rin chen rab tu mang // 'khro ra ni phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ byang chub nyid du/ nges 'gyur zhing // rtag tu chos la rab tu gnas/ 
319a6(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dag ni thams cad du// yon tan 'phel zhing mthon por 'gyur// rgyal po rnams ni kur byed cing // lha klu rab tu dran por 'gyur// sems can thams cad kun gyis kyang // bkur sti/ 
319a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byed par 'gyur// 'das dang da ltar bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas dag la mchod byed na// skye ba kun tu mchod pa 'thob// rtag par mi khom med par ste// gzhan yang gang po byang/ 
319a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rtag par brtson pa'i sems kyis chos la mchod par byed do// chos shes bya ba ni gang ji ltar na chos la mchod par byed ce na/ de
319b1(dkon brtsegs): la chos shes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan/ 
319b2(dkon brtsegs): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / rigs pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par
319b3(dkon brtsegs): thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / zad pa'i ye shes dang / mi skye ba'i ye shes gang yin pa 'di ni chos shes bya'o// ji ltar mchod par byed ce na/ chos de dag ji skad bstan pa bzhin
319b4(dkon brtsegs): du mngon par bsgrub cing rje su 'brang nas 'gal ba medadapar 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus bskyed de phun su dam tshogs par mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa
319b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni chos la mchod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang po chos la mchod pa zhes bya ba la chos ni mdo sde 'di lta bu dag yin la/ de la mngon par yid ches
319b6(dkon brtsegs): shing yid la sems pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / rjesu 'brang zhing sems kyis 'gal bar mi byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni chos la mchod pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
319b7(dkon brtsegs): gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar
319b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtag tu chos mchod brtson byed pas// ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ga nas// zab mos stong pa'i chos thos nas// sems
320a1(dkon brtsegs): / kyis 'gal bar yong mi byed// de phyir lus ni rtag mdzes shing // spobs ba dag kyang thob par 'gyur// ngas ni ji skad bsngags pa'i chos// de yis rab
320a2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'phel bar byed// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams la
320a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod par byed pas me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang
320a4(dkon brtsegs): na ba'i gsos sman dang // 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag dang / gtsug lag khang dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / 'chags dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang / las byed pa'i mi
320a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa gzhan yang mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'di ltar 'phags pa'i tshogs rnam sa la mchod pa byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi
320a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de
320a7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas// 'phags pa'i tshogs ni mchod byas pas// bsod nams 'di yi rkyen gyis ni// skye ba kun du longs spyod ldan// lus kyi kha dog
320a8(dkon brtsegs): rab mdzes shing // spobs pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur// yon tan rnams ni phun tshogs shing // shes rab dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// drag po'i sems kyis mchod byas shing // 
320b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang bdag gir med pas na// shes pa 'di ni rgyu rkyen gyis// skye ba kun du mchod pa thob// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yin// chos bzhi dag la rtag brten na/ skye bkun/ 
320b2(dkon brtsegs): du cho rigs btsun// yon tan dag ni mngon rdzob 'phags// byir mo ldog pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// bam po gsum pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
320b3(dkon brtsegs): gang po la bka' stsal pa/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zag pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pas rtag par chos bzhi po 'di dag la brten cing goms
320b4(dkon brtsegs): par byas nas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang pun sum tshogs par yongasu sdud par gyur la dge ba'i rtsa rab thams cad dang yang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang
320b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gang po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag theg pa chen por sems bskyed pas bzod pa bsgrubapa'i chos la bsnyen cing bsgom par bya'o// de ltar bzod pa'i
320b6(dkon brtsegs): chos bsgom pas na gal te sems mnyam par gyur na shin du mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
320b7(dkon brtsegs): yang thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de sems mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur pa na gal te 'gro 'am/ 
320b8(dkon brtsegs): 'greng ba 'am/ 'dug gam/ nyal lam/ gnyid log gam/ sad pa'i tshe yang rung ste/ gcin gyi bum pa'am/ dug gi bum pa 'am/ khu tshan gyi bum pa 'am/ phyag dar ba rnams sam/ 
321a1(dkon brtsegs): / me dang thal ba'am/ bshang gci'am/ thal ba cha bathogs pa 'ongs nas/ mgo'i steng du blugs sam/ lus kyi lan dag kun du brdungs par gyur na/ byang chub sems
321a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de la zhe sdang dang khon gyi bsam pa bskyed nas sems rnam par g.yeng zhing khong khro skyeng par yang mi bya'o// 'di skad du bdag la nyes pa ci yod ces kyang smra bar mi bya'o// gzhan yang ngas
321a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis de la lta bar mi bya'o// sems rtse gcig tu rang gi chos don du gnyer zhing gang bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po sems rtse gcig tu mi spang ba de ltar sems yongasu gdul bar bya'o// gang
321a4(dkon brtsegs): zag des rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir gcin gyi bum pa dang / duH/ gi bum pa dang / thal ba dang me dag thogs te 'ongs nas/ bdag gi lus la gnod par byed pa bdag gi lus ni dngos
321a5(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag gi rgyu rkyen gyis na ba dang gnod par mi 'gyur / sa byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/ 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen mang po'i chos la so sor brtags nas su zhig ni dngos pa
321a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di sbyin par byed/ dngos po 'di ni su la sbyin par byed/ dngos po 'di ni sbyin par byed ces de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yi la byed pa na/ sbyin par byed pa ni su yin/ len par
321a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni su yin/ chos ni gang yin zhes chos 'ga' tsam yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // de ltar yang dag pa'i dran pas yid la byed cing so sor rtog pa'i tshe 'di dang de zhes bya/ 
321a8(dkon brtsegs): ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad dmigs par mi 'gyur la mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' des chos thams cad mi dmigs shing mi mthong ba'i phyir zhe sdang dang
321b1(dkon brtsegs): khon du 'dzin pa yang bskyed par mi byed do// gang po byang chub sems dpa' gal te de ltar bsams kyang zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa'i bsam pa bskyed par gyur na/ gzhan yang
321b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar yang dag pa'i dran pas 'di snyam du reg bya gang gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis bdag gi lus la na bar byed/ reg bya de dag gis gang du reg par 'gyur/ lus la gnod par gyur
321b3(dkon brtsegs): tam/ 'on te sems la gnod par gyur/ gal te lus la gnod par gyur pa yin na ni lus ni rtswa dang / shing dang / gyo mo dang / rdo dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu yin pas rtog pa med
321b4(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa med pa yin pas bdag kyang ma yin gzhan yang ma yin no// gal te sems la gnod par gyur pa yin na ni sems ni kha dog dang / gzugs med pa/ 
321b5(dkon brtsegs): ska cig mar skye zhing 'gag pa/ thang cig tsam yang mig/ nas pas bdag kyang ma yin gzhan yang ma yin pa/ sa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par
321b6(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas 'di ni sdug bsngal lo// 'di ni bde ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'o zhes zer bar zad pas/ deng bdag gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam
321b7(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pas rnam par brtags pa 'di bskyed par mi bya'o// dang bdag gis mnyam pa nyid kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid du bltas nas 'phags pa'i bya ba rnams bsgrub par bya ba'i
321b8(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i bya ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi bya'o// 'phags pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos rnams las thag ring du gyur cing rnam par grol ba gang yin pa'o// bdag ni thag bsring ba'i
322a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir slob pa yin/ mi 'phrod par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin na ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di dag ni thams cad kyang 'phrod par byed pa yin te/ su dang 'phrong/ 
322a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa yin zhe na/ 'dod chags dang 'phrod par byed pa yin/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang 'phrod par byed pa yino// ji ltar na 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang 'phrod par
322a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin zhe na/ lus la rmongs pa'i phyir dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba rmongs pa'i phyir dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir/ lus kyi sdug bsngal myong ba'i tshe
322a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la mnar sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni zhe sdang dang 'phrod pa zhes bya'o// 'jig tshogs la lta da ba la rmongs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / 'jig tshogs la
322a5(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir dang / yid dang mi many+dzu na pa'i phyir gzhan dag la mnar sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni gti mug dang 'phrod pa zhes bya'o// gang dag
322a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i dug gsum gyis bcings nas/ 'di lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyi rgyu dang rkyen slong bar byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang yongasu skyob par mi spyod na// gzhan
322a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ deng bdag gis rgyu dang rkyen gyis chos rnams shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas chos rnams stong pa nyid du lta bar bya'o snyam du bsams par bya'o// 
322a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rje su mthun par yang dag par lta bas/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis chos rnams so sor rtog par byed pa na/ chos 'ga' tsam yang sus byin pa 'am/ sus len pa'i/ 
322b1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po gang yin pa yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // de'i tshe byang chub rnams dpa' gzhan yang 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen mang po las skyes pa yin pas rang bzhin
322b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis bzod ma nyid nas stong pa yin te/ nges par dmig su med par stong pa yin na/ bdag ci'i phyir yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos dmig su med pa dag la las mngon par 'dus
322b3(dkon brtsegs): byas nas pa zhe sdang bskyed de/ 'du byed kyi rgyu rkyen slong bar byed/ dang bdag gis zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa med pa'i bsam pa bskyed nas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 
322b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba med pa dang / skye bo med pa'i chos mngon par bsgrub/ ngas nas stong pa nyid du blta bar bya'i/ bdag nyid kyi sem das kyi rjesu 'brang bar mi bya'o// deng bdag gis mngon par
322b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / skye bamed pa'i chos la lta bar bya'o// mngon par 'du bya ba/ dang 'byung ba'i chos la gnas par mi bya'o// bdag
322b6(dkon brtsegs): gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams bsam par bya'i deng bdag gis yang dag pa ma yin pa yod pa ma yin pa la 'di la nan tan gyis chos su 'du shes bskyed par mi bya
322b7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa la nan gyis mngon par 'du byed pa ni zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa dag yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi ngo bo la gnas pa la ni zhe sdang dang kho na
322b8(dkon brtsegs): du 'dzin pa yod kyi/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid mther stong pa nyid la ni gnas par bya'o// chos kyi ngo bo gzod ma nyid nas med pas so snyam du bsam
323a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// byang chub sems dpas de ltar chos rnams med la byas par gyu / ba sems ra tu ben par gyur pas tres dang ljod du 'dzin pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 
323a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal lam/ gnyid log gam/ sad pa'i cha yang rung ste/ 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas spos dri zhim pa'am/ 
323a3(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi phye ma 'am/ zug spos dang / me tog mchod pa drug lus gtor ram/ yang na spos dang / me tog mchog dam pa dang / se modo dang / me tog tsam pa ka de'i phreng ba dang / me tog
323a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ri shi ko'i phreng ba dang / me tog mang po'i phreng ba dag gidas lus la g.yogs par gyur tam/ yang na gos mcho ga dam pa shin du phra zhing 'jam pa 'di lta ste ka shi ka
323a5(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ ku sha ka 'am/ ku sha pa 'am/ ku sha ma'i ba 'am/ ko sha ya sha 'am/ chu ma 'am/ ka pa'am/ de dag la sogs pa gos phra zhing 'jam pa dag gis lus la
323a6(dkon brtsegs): g.yogs par gyur tam/ yang na dar gyi lda ldi mchog dam pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag bdag nyid kyi steng du bres par gyur tam/ yang na lha'i me tog dang / spos dang
323a7(dkon brtsegs): gos mchog dam pa dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dag gis lus la g.yogs par gyur tam/ yang na lha'i kha zas mchog dam pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa dag khyer te 'ongs nas byin par gyur na/ 
323a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag la sred pa'i sems bskyed nas mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// rkyen des gang zag de dag la brten nas/ yid dang mthun par
323b1(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ phan tshun 'dul zhing gtam smra bar mi bya'o// phyogs gcig pa'i sems kyis rjesu chags par yang mi bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sems snyom par bya zhing / chos thams
323b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rab tu rtogs par byas nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can rnams la khong khro bor yang mi bya/ rje su chags par yang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams
323b3(dkon brtsegs): sdang gi dngos po gnyi ga yang nyon mongs pa yin pas so// deng bdag gis de dag la sred pa mi skyed par chos rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid legs par rtogs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir
323b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyi nang na sred pa'i rkyen gyis phrad par gyur pa 'di lci ba so// 'di ltar nyon mong/ das pa de ni rus pa dang / rkang las kyang thal te/ 'gro bas
323b5(dkon brtsegs): kun du sbyor ba bskyed pa'i chos ni nang na sred pa'i sems kyis ni shin tu mngon par zhen par byedado// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags par bya ba'i dngos po gal te yid
323b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin thob par ma gyur na zhe sdang skye bar gyur paso// skye bo rnams ni rang gi lus la 'dod chags kyi srid pa skyod par byed pas de dag gal te 'ga' zhig gis gnod par byas par gyur na zhe
323b7(dkon brtsegs): sdang skye bar gyur pas de'i phyir zhe sdang ni sred pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin la/ mngon par zhen pa ni gti mug gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin par rigs par bya'o// 
323b8(dkon brtsegs): deng bdag ni sred pas gos pa'i sems spangs nas chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o// bdag ni 'dod chags kyi phyir slob pa ma yin// zhe sdang gi phyir slob pa ma yin// 
324a1(dkon brtsegs): gti mugag phy-ir slob pa ma yin gyi/ bdag ni chos rnams kyi kho na nyid kyi cher slob pa yin pas/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa 'i lnga ba bzhin du/ 
324a2(dkon brtsegs): bltas nas/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag pa nyid du smrad nas/ las dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu rkyen la brten nas mchod pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi dngos po rnams kyang sngon gyi las kyi spyod
324a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rkyen las gyur pa yin par rig par byas nas/ de'i phyir rje su 'thun par gyur pa'i chos rnams la dga' zhig srid pa mi skyed dge ba'i chos dang 'gal ba la yang zhe sdang mi bskyed
324a4(dkon brtsegs): par yin pas/ sangs rgyas yon tan thob par 'gyur// zhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po rnams ni 'dod pa lnga po dag spangs nas rtag par
324a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung bar mos pas/ sems kyis rab tu byung ba'i rje su 'brangs nas rab tu byung ba la gzhol bar byed pas 'dod pa lnga po dag la mngon par zhen par mi byed do// rab tu
324a6(dkon brtsegs): byung nas kyang 'du 'dzi rnams spangs nas shin du thag ring ba'i ri dang / nags tshal dben pa dag tu gnas shing dge ba'i chos chud mi za bar byedado// byang chub sems dpa' gang chos
324a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 
324a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung la rtag mos pas// rtag tu rab tu byung bar 'gyur// ri dang nag tshal gnas mos pas// yon tan 'byung gnas 'phel bar byed// dben par gnas la brten byed pa/ 
324b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod lnga'i chags pa yongasu spong // de na 'du 'dzi med pas na// dge chos rkyen ni nyams mi 'gyur// phan tshun 'dul zhing gtam 'dri dang // tshig gis smra bar byed pas na// stong dben nyer
324b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi dben pa la// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rtag par yongasu bsten bya zhing // grong khyer la ni chags mi byed// bsnyen na rnyed sems
324b3(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur// rnyed pa thob na rab tu dga'// stor bar gyur na mya ngan ste// de yis sangs rgyas mchod byas kyang // mchod pa byas shes mi brjod do// de 'dra'i nyes dmigs spong 'dod na// 
324b4(dkon brtsegs): rnyernying pa rnams ni spang bar bya// spangs nas gnas dben rab gnas nas// stong pa'i chos ni bsgom par bya// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par chos
324b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyer ba yongasu slob par byed pas// yongasu gnyer nas kyang klog cing kha ton du bton nas/ 'di ltar tshul khrims yongasu dag pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan shin
324b6(dkon brtsegs): du phra ba'i chos yongasu tshol bar byed kyi/ 'dod pa mang ba dang chog mi shes pa'i chos yongasu tshol bar mi byed do// 'dod chags nye bar zhi ba yongasu tshol bar byed kyi 'dod chags
324b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par mi byed do// zhe sdang gzhom pa yongasu tshol bar byed kyi zhe sdang 'phel bar mi byed do// gti mug gcod pa yongasu tshol bar byed kyi gti mug skye bar mi byed do// khengs pa btsa
324b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yongasu tshol bar byed kyi khengs pa slong ba yongasu tshol bar mi byed do// nga rgyal gzhom po yongasu tshol bar byed kyi/ nga rgyal 'phel ba yongasu tshol bar mi byed do// bdag dang bdag gir
325a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i chos spong ba yongasu tshol bar byed kyi bangag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos 'phel bar byed pa yongasu tshol bar mi byed do// bdag med pa'i chos
325a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu tshul bar byed kyi bdag dang gang zag dang sems can dang srog le gnas pa'i chos yongasu tshol bar mi byed do// rtag par shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongasu tshol bar
325a3(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi shes rab chen po nyams par gyur pa'i chos yongasu tshol bar mi byed do// rtag par mtshungs pa med pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongasu tshol sems yong su sbyangs te/ 
325a4(dkon brtsegs): mnar sems med par byas nas 'dod chags kyi rjesu 'brang dbar yang mi bya/ zhe sdang gi rjes 'brang bar yang mi bya/ gti mug gi sdig pa'i chos kyi rjesu 'brang bar yang
325a5(dkon brtsegs): mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par rgyu/ ra na yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang thob
325a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni rtag tu shes rab sngags/ 
325a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bsrung ba'ang bsngags pa yin// bzod pa bsgom la bsngags byed cing // mang du thos pa'ang bsngags pa yin// ngas ni dge ba'i chos spyod cing // byams sems tshig
325a8(dkon brtsegs): snyan sgra la bsngags// sems can la ni phan gdags phyir// yon tan mang po ci rigs bsngags// nga ni rtag tu 'dod lnga dang // khong khro khon 'dzin gti mug can// phrag dog nga rgyal
325b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yo sgyu dang // 'khrug long sems can gnod byed smon// le lo dang ni skom las dang // bka' lo mi bde smra dga' dang // byas pa mi bzo lam log can// nyes pa chung la cher khro dang // 
325b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa la ni gdu ba dang // bdag ni rnyed par rab dga' zhing // gzhan gyi rnyed la mi dga' ba// 'di dag la ni nga mi bsngags// blo chung rnyed pa dag 'dod cing // gzhan gyi rnyed la phrag
325b3(dkon brtsegs): dog che// gzhan gyi khyim la ser sna byed// 'di dag la ning mi bsngags// rnyed pa dag ni tshol ba'i phyir// spyod lam dag ni 'chos byed pa// 'di ni 'tshe ba dag min pas// nga yi chos las shin du/ 
325b4(dkon brtsegs): ring // lam mi bsgom pa dag la ni// nye ba 'di dag tham sa cad yod// 'di ni ngan 'gro rkyen yin pas// dngos dpo 'ga' yang bsngagasu med// sdig pa dag lta ma spangs
325b5(dkon brtsegs): na/ \u0f7f'dod sred sems ni rab tu mang // 'dod sreg sems ni mang po'i phyir// rnyed pa dag la gdu bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du// bzod bsgom
325b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can pan gdags shing / khengs pa'i sems ni rab btul nas// myur du sangs rgyas bya bar sems// bdag gis byams sems rab bsgoms te// bzod pas
325b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can brtse bar bya// chos rnams stong zhing rkyen las byung // 'brel pa med cing shes par bya// rkyen gang gis ni chos rnams yod// chos de sems las byung ba yin// mi
325b8(dkon brtsegs): bden 'du shes khong khro ba skyed// mkhas pa thams cad stong pa yin// mi bden 'du shes khams gsum bskyed// lus kyi rgyud ni 'chang mi 'gyur// mi bden 'du shes mi
326a1(dkon brtsegs): rtog na/ nyes dmigs 'di dag yod mi 'gyur// rtag tu chos rnams sems pas na// rkyen las byung ba rab tu shes/ rtag tu chos rnams stong ltabs
326a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongasu bzlog par nus// khrims spang sems can sdug bsngal ba// nga rgyal dag gis smras pa la// sdug bsngal nyer zhi'i chos ston pas// phan pa mang po rab tu
326a3(dkon brtsegs): byed// gang zhig shar lho nub byang dang // phyogs 'tshams bzhi po dag nas ni// mi gtsang dug gi bum thogs nas// mgo yi steng du blugs gyur na// sus byin sus ni len byed ces
326a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni khong khro yong mi bskyed// chos gang zhig ni bdag yin zhes// brtags nas brtson 'grus rtsom par byed// / nyes pa ci yod gnod byas zhes// ngan sems gzhan la
326a5(dkon brtsegs): lta mi byed// shin tu brtan pa'i bzod bskyed nas// byams sems de la phan 'dogs byed// sngon gyi las las gyur shes pas// rnam smin 'di myong snyam
326a6(dkon brtsegs): du sems// dang du blangs te mi byed pas// byang chub lam la gnas par byed// smod dang sdug bsngal dngos po 'di// gzhan gyis byas pa ma yin gyis// 'di ni nges
326a7(dkon brtsegs): par las kyi rkyen// yun ring lon kyang chud mi za// sems can 'jig rten gnas po dag/ rtag tu dge sdig las slong bas// deng bdag sdug bsngal 'di mong yang // las rkyen yin
326a8(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu shes// gal te ngan pas len byas na// phyis kyang sdug bsngal myong 'gyur na// de phyir dngos po ngan pa yis// de dag la ni gnod byas snyam// bla na med pa'i chos gnyer nas/ 
326b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la ni ston byed pas// sems can sdug bsngal ji snyed pa// thams cad las ni thar bar byed// gal te 'ga' zhig me tog spos// phreng ba dag gis bdag mchod kyang // rje su chags
326b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mi bskyed par// mnyam par bsgom pa bsgrub par bya// byams sdang dag ni las min pas// rtag tu btang snyoms spyod par byed// sus byin sus ni len byed ces// chos rnams yang
326b3(dkon brtsegs): dag rtogs par byed// stong pas byin zhing stong len na// phyi nang gnyi ka stong pa na// stong la byin dang len med pas// thams cad kun la bdag med do// stong la 'dod chags bral ba
326b4(dkon brtsegs): med/ stong la kun nas nyon mongs med// rnam par byang ba'i/ dang med pas na// dri bral rnam dag stong pa yin stong 'arnam par rtog pa da med// stong lang ba nyid rnams med/ stod ni rtag stong mtshan ma med/ 
326b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni rnam dag lam yin no// gal te 'ga' zhig 'ongs gyur nas// lus ni dum bur bcad gyur kyang // las kyi rkye na las byung rig pas// de la zhe sdang yong mi bskyed/ 
326b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can dge sdig slong bas na// las bzhin rang nyid 'bras bu len// bdag kyang nges par snga ma'i sdig/ sdug bsngal rnam smin 'di myong snyam// sdig pa'i rnam smin 'di myong yang // 
326b7(dkon brtsegs): lus btags gzugs brnyan chu bur dang // sgyu ma sprul pa smig rgyu 'dra// stong zhing med pas mtha' yang stong / kha cig lus kyi yan lag gcod/ kha cig drin ni dran gyur nas/ 
326b8(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa dag ni byas gyur kyang // dga' dang mi dga' yong mi byed// rnyed pa thob kyang dga' ba med// kha ngan byas kyang khong mi khro// 'di gnyis sgrib pa yin pas na// sangs rgyas
327a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag lam mi sems// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems// de dag thams cad spong bar byed// rtag tu dben stong bsgoms pas na// sgrib pa rnams ni spong bar byed// 
327a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa stobs bcu'i gzhi yin te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gnas// thogs med ye shes snying rje yi// brtse ba dag ni bzod pa yin// bden bzhi dran dang yang dag spong // dbang
327a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs byang chub lam yan lag/ thams cad bzod pas gzhi byed pas// mkhas pa gang zhig bzod mi bsgom// ngas kyang wa ra na sir ni// bla med 'khor lo bskor ba yang // bzod pa
327a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis gzhi byas pas// sangs rgyas rtag tu bzod pa ba sngags// khyod kyang bzod stong bla med gzhi// yongasu bsgom par byed na ni// chos kyi chos nyid de bar byed kyi
327a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab rgya chung ngu thob par byed pa'i chos yongasu tshol ba/ ra mi byed do// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa/ ra 'gyur ba'i chos rnams yongasu tshol bar byed kyi yon
327a6(dkon brtsegs): tan rnams phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur ba'i chos yongasu tshol bar mi byed do// de ltar chos yongasu btsal nas kyang klog par byed/ kha don du 'don par byed/ tshul bzhin du yang dag
327a7(dkon brtsegs): par yid la byed/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par yid la byed sgrub par byed gzhan dag la/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed kyang 'jig rten pa'i khe dang grags pa yongasu
327a8(dkon brtsegs): tshol bar mi byed la/ tha na leg so zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa'i brjod pa tsam yongasu tshol bar mi byed pas sems can mang po chos de la dgod par byed de/ gang po byang chub sems dpa/ 
327b1(dkon brtsegs): gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang / 
327b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab 'byung ni// tshul khrims sbyangs pa dag la mos// des na shes rab yongs 'phel nas// ye shes char ni 'bebs par byed// rnam dag chos zab de thos nas// 
327b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag dran pas don sems byed// ji skad bston pa bzhin du ni// de bzhin yang dag sgrub par byed// rtag tu rnam dag sems kyis ni// gzhan la rgya cher rab bstan nas// sems
327b4(dkon brtsegs): can mang po pan 'dogs kyang // sems la re ba chung za dad med// yon tan rnams kyi ro rnyed na// bdag nyid cho sa de rab gnas shing // gzhan yang de la 'god pas na// 
327b5(dkon brtsegs): de phyir sangs rgyas chos 'phel 'gyur// bskal pa tshad med rnamasu ni// yon tan mang po ci bsags pa// thams cad mngon du gyur nas ni// byang chub lam du sdud
327b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas bsngags pa yin// chos zab dag ni yongs btsal nas// rtag par sems can bstan par bya// yon tan rnams ni de las skye// gang po byang chub
327b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims yongasu bsrung zhing basbyangs pa'i chos la rab tu gnas par gyur na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bsod nams dang
327b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'gyuraro// gang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa tshad med cing mtha' yas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
328a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur
328a2(dkon brtsegs): ba lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me ro ga na 'da' bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni tshe lo drug cu thub par gyur to// 'dus pa/ 
328a3(dkon brtsegs): rel chos bstan pa'i tshe nyan thos bye ba brgya phrag brgyad bcu dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa me rog na 'da' yongasu mya ngan las 'das
328a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos ni lo lnga brgya'i bar du gnas par gyur te/ de bzhi ngan gshegs pa de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'o/ dag tu zhag bdun tshun chad nyan thos chen po ji snyed pa
328a5(dkon brtsegs): phal cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu yongasu mya ngan la sa 'das par gyur to// gang po de bzhin gshegs/ pa de yang nga ji lta ba bzhin du snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe
328a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du byung bar 'gyur te/ nyan thos chen po rnams yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i tshe skye bo rnams phal tshor 'di snyam du dge sbyong gi chos ni rab tu bde zhing skyed pa yin/ 
328a7(dkon brtsegs): na bdag cag ci'i phyir so so nas rab tu mi 'byung snyam du bsams nas/ so so nas skra dang kha spu brags te/ chos gos ngur smig bgos nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung // rab tu
328a8(dkon brtsegs): byung nas kyang dngos po gsum po rtag par khyim pa'i khyim du 'gro zhing 'dul bar byed pa dang / rnyed pa la mngon par zhen nas/ bdag nyid 'tshol bar byed pa dang / bdag nyid nyam 'tshag che/ 
328b1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'ba' zhig tu sbyor zhing bsod nams dang ye shes dang mi ldan pa dag 'ba' zhig spyod par gyur pas dngos po gsum po 'di 'ba' zhig spyod par byed kyi las gzhan ni mngon par
328b2(dkon brtsegs): mi bsgrub par gyur to// lo brgya 'das pa'i 'og du nyan thos chen po thams cad yongasu mya ngan las 'das te ma lus par gyur pas/ dge slong mang po/ dag khyim rnams dang 'thun
328b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed cing sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde zab mo rnams dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod lam zhib mo gya nom pa'i chos rnams ni phal cher spangs nas su
328b4(dkon brtsegs): yang nga klog cing 'don pa med par gyur to// gang po de'i tshed dge slong rnams 'dod pa mang po dag la spyod par mos da shing bza' ba dang / btung ba'i ro la chags par gyur pas
328b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu dam shi ri zhes bya ba rgyal po shin du byams shing gces par byed pa zhig yod de// des gnas dben pa zhig tu gnas nas/ 'di snyam du de bzhin
328b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me ro gan das chos ji lta bu zhig brnyes na/ deng de'i nyan thos rnams bag med par spyod cing khyim pa rnams dang bye brag med par gyur ces de snyam du sems shing the tshom
328b7(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa dang / de'i tshe lha zhig de'i thad du 'ongs nas lus mi snang bar byas te/ 'di skad du kye rgyal bu de bzhin gshegs pa mo ro gan das brnyes pa'i chos ni shin du zab cing yongasu
328b8(dkon brtsegs): dag la rnam par nges par gyur pa'i chos dngos po ji lta bu zhig yin/ lhas smras pa/ rgyal bu chos de ni gzugs kyang med/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
329a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yang med phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyang med/ 'dod pa lnga yang med// 'dod pa'i sems kyang med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa me rogan
329a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de lta bu'i chos shin tu zab cing yongasu dag la rnam par nges pa brnyes pa sems can rnams la yang dag par rab tu bstan to// de nas rgyal bus lha de la smras pa/ bdag gis de lta
329a3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i chos thos shing khong du chud par gyur nas/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub tu rung ngam/ lha sa smras pa/ kye rgyal bu khyed sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus byos shig/ 
329a4(dkon brtsegs): dang thob par bka' ba med do// gang po de'i tshe rgyal bu dnge 'di snyam du nges par lhas kyang bskul te/ bdagadagi khong du chud par byas nas bdag rab tu byung nas chos
329a5(dkon brtsegs): zab mo de yongasu gnyer bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas pha ma ga la ba der song ste mgos gtugs te phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smraso// yab yum deng bdag ni
329a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gaun 'da'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam yongasu gnyer bar 'tshalo// pha mas smras pa/ khyod deng nged spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ci dgos/ 
329a7(dkon brtsegs): da ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba rnams ni khyim pa rnams dang bye brag du gyur pa ci yang med do// de nas de'i tshe tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ da ltar dge slong mang
329a8(dkon brtsegs): po rnams// bag med 'dod pa lnga yang spyod// zhing rmed nyo tshong byed pas na/ khyim pa rnams dang bye brag med// dbul po sdug bsngal rab mang zhing // bdag nyid gso bar mi
329b1(dkon brtsegs): nus pa de 'dri'i skye bo mang po rnams// lus gso'i phyir ni rab tu byung // khyod ni rgyal rigs khyim du skyes// phyug cing 'dod lnga bde ba myong // nor dang rin chen
329b2(dkon brtsegs): rab mang na// rab tu byung bas ci zhig bya// de nas rgyal bu dam shi ris pa ma la tshig su bcad du smras pa/ bdag ni dbang phyug mi tshol te// gal te thob kyang spong bar bgyid// deng
329b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag sangs rgyas chos zab dang // rnam dag tshul khrims 'ba' zhig tshol// lha zhig bdag ni go bgyis te// rab tu 'byung bar bskul bas na// sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i zab mo/ 
329b4(dkon brtsegs): chosatebadag ni rab tu rtogs par 'tshal// lha smras pa dag gis thos pas na// sems ni rab tu dga' bar gyur// sangs rgyas bstan pa nub tu nye// bdag ni grogs/ 
329b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyis bsrung bar sems// de nas pha mas tshig su bcad de da ma shi ri la smras pa/ mdo sde zab mo za/ da nub pas// kha ton 'don pa'ang yong med na// de ring
329b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi su las ni// sangs rgyas chos zab thos par 'gyur// gal te 'khor ni bzhi po las// don zab 'don pa yod gyur na// de las khyod kyis sngar mnyan nas// de 'og rab
329b7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung ba'i rigs// da ma shi ris tshigasu bcad de pha ma la smras pa/ deng bdag nan tan brtson 'grus gyis// tshul khrims bsrung zhing sbyangs pa spyod// thag ring ri dang nags tshal
329b8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sangs rgyas chos zab rnam dag tshol// gang po da ma shi ris tshigasu bcad pa 'di smras nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba byas te rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab pa dang / pha ma
330a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyang cang mi smra bar gnang ngo // de nas dge slong rnams kyi thad du song nas skra dang kha spu bregs te chos grongur smrig bgos nas rab tu byung ste// bslab pa'i dngos
330a2(dkon brtsegs): po rnams yang dag par blangs nas gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das rje su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis slob ma rnams la rje su bstan par
330a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzadabadag gis thos par gyur na ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ba bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang / gang po dge slong mang po rnams kyis dge slong dam shi ri la 'di skad ces
330a4(dkon brtsegs): smras so// bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las chos thos pa ni med kyi/ mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams kyi rjesu spyod par zad pas/ deng khyod kyang 'di
330a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i chos la spyod cig/ de nas dge slong dam shi ris da ge slong rnams la smras pa/ khyed ni gdon mi za bar dbul po sbrang rigs las rab tu byung ba yin pas/ 
330a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir deng khyed gos zas 'ba' zhig lhur len pas/ spyod pa rnams khyim pa dag dang bye brag du gyur pa ci yang med do// deng khyod bdag dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos zab
330a7(dkon brtsegs): mo yongasu dag pa btsal bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshig su bcad de dge slong da ma shi ri la smras pa/ bdag cag gis ni gang bsgrubs pa'i// dngos po de
330a8(dkon brtsegs): ni thob gyur pas/ gos zab dag ni 'byor cing ldan// rgyal pos bkol ba las kyang thar// shin du bde zhing rab tu skyid// brnyas shing nga rgyal byed pa med/ khyim pa'i sdug bsngal gang
330b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa// de dag da ltar gang yin pa// de dag da ltar gang yang med// 'di gnyis mya ngan 'das yin pas// mchog tu bde bar gyur pa yin// dngos po 'di las lhag par ni// bdag cag la ni dgra// 
330b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med// khyim pas rtag tu sbyor 'bul bas// bdag cag chos gos lhung bzed mang // sman dang nor zas shin du mang // sbyin bdag khyim yang rab tu mang // gang po de'i tshe dge slong dam
330b3(dkon brtsegs): shi ris dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigasu bcad de de skad smras pa thos pa dang / sems la rab tu gdung ba skyes nas mchi ma blags te ngus nas gtsug lag khang gzhan dag tu
330b4(dkon brtsegs): song ste/ yang dngos po des dge slong mang po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das rjesu bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis slob ma rnams la rjesu bstan par
330b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ bdag gis thos par gyur na ji skad bstan pa bzhi na du bsgrub par 'tshalo zhes smras pa dang / dge slong / mang po rnams kyis kyang snga ma bzhin du lan btab par
330b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de nas dge slong da ma shi ris dge slong mang po de dag spangs nas gcig pu ri dang nags 'tshal dben pa'i gnasu song nas sems rtse gcig tu chos zab mo gnyer ba la 'dun
330b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa dang // de'i tshe sngon de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i nyan thos rnams kyi nang na nyan thos chen po shin du bstan pa zhes bya ba rab tu dben pa'i spyod pa mngon par
330b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pa gcig pu ri phug dben par gnas pa/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa yongasu spong ba la sems mngon par spro ba/ bya ba byas pa/ mngon par shes pa drug dang / 
331a1(dkon brtsegs): rig pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa chen po zhig byung bar gyur te/ ji ltar da ltar nga'i bstan pa las 'od srung chen po ji lta ba bzhin no// de'i tshe dge slong ni
331a2(dkon brtsegs): du brtan pa des bdag nyid gnas pa'i ri phug gi brag ngos la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag yi ger bris par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i ro ni myangs pa'i phyir// 'khor ba dag ni rgyun mi
331a3(dkon brtsegs): gcod ta dgra ni gsos nas dur khrod 'jug/ don med sdug bsngal mang po myong // lus ni mi gtsang ro dang 'dra// bu ga dgu nas mi gtsang 'dzag/ srin bu mi gtsang myos pa bzhin// 
331a4(dkon brtsegs): blun pos lus sred de dang 'dra// yang dag ma yin kun rtog pas// de ni 'dod lnga'i rtsa ba yin// mkhas pa dag da ni mi rtog pas// 'dod lnga dag ni 'gag par 'gyur// log
331a5(dkon brtsegs): rtog las ni 'dod chen skye// 'dod chen las ni nyon mong sa skye// yang dag dran la zhen med pas// nyon mongs lhag ma zad par 'gyur// // bam po bzhi pa/ gang
331a6(dkon brtsegs): po dge slong shin du brtan pas ri phug gi brag ngos la tshig su bcad pa bzhi po 'di dag yi ger bris pa dge slong da ma shi ri ri phug dben par song bas// yun ring zhig lon nas ri phug gi
331a7(dkon brtsegs): brag la tshig su bcad pa bzhi po 'di dag yi ger bris pa mthong nas/ kha don du bslabs te/ de'i don gang yin pa yid la byas pas ring po ma lon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur to// 
331a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' sngon zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnasu phyin nas phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dkyil mo krungs bcas te 'dug nas 'di skad ces
331b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi gnas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa yang ma mthong // chos gzhan yang ma thob kyi bar du 'di las mi ldang ngo zhes yid dam bcas so// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gnangs/ 
331b2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa zhes bya ba brgya byin lha'i dbang pos mdo sde de kha ton tu shes pas/ brgya byin lha'i dbang pos dge slong dam shi ri'i lhag pa'i bsam pa
331b3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis rtogs nas sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas babs te/ de'i drung du phyin nas/ de la mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa de yang dag par bshad do// gzhan yang mang du thos pa'i
331b4(dkon brtsegs): dngos gzhi'i tshig bzhi dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshig ba dun dang / sgo'i tshig bcu bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang byin no// dge slong ngam shi ris thos nas kyang kha don
331b5(dkon brtsegs): du bton te yongasu bzung bas chos rnams la shes rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegasapa me rog na ngas gsungs pa'i mdo sde yongasu dag cing
331b6(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyi rje su mthun pa bral ba'i rjesu mthun pa/ zab mo shin du gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang rang gi ngang gis sems la snang bar gyur to// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
331b7(dkon brtsegs): pa me ro gan 'da'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor dang bcas pa dang / bzhugs pa'i gnas dri gtsang khang dang / gdan khri dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
331b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// dge
332a1(dkon brtsegs): slong ngam shi yang chos rnams las shes rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur pas 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas mthar gyis rang gi yul du song ste/ pha ma'i drung
332a2(dkon brtsegs): du phyin nas pha ma la yongasu dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjesu mthun pa bral ba'i rjesu 'thun pa/ zab mo shin du gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bshad nas/ sangs rgyas dang chos
332a3(dkon brtsegs): dang dge 'dun gyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rab tu brjod pas/ gang po de'i tshe dge slong dam shi ri pa ma dang / nang gi btsun mo dang / blon po chen po dang / 'khor rnams kyis chos de thos nas
332a4(dkon brtsegs): shin du mngon par yid ches par gyur pas gus pa'i se mas kyis dge slong dam shi ri la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa bdag cag yongasu bskyab cing de bzhin
332a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa la rab tu dbyung du gsol zhes gang po de'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyal po dang / btsun mo rab tu byung ba'i rjesu
332a6(dkon brtsegs): dus gcig tu byung bar gyur to// rab tu byung nas thams cad kyi ming ngam shi ri'i tshogs kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to// gang po dge slong dam shi ris de ltar de bzhin
332a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa slar rgyas par byas nas sems can mang po de dag bde ba la yang dag par bkod do// sngon gyi tshe rabs kyi byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i
332a8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis dam pa'i chos bsrung bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ri ljongs gcig nas gcig tu/ grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu/ yul gcig nas gcig
332b1(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyu zhing song nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me rogan 'da' dang / de'i nyan thos kyi sngags pa yang brjod/ gzhan yang yongasu dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rje su mthun pa bral ba'i rjes
332b2(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa zab mo shin du gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pas/ de'i tshe dge slong dam shi ri yang skye bo mang po kun
332b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mchod cing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod pas snyan pa'i grags pa yang kun du grags par gyur to// gong po dge slong das/ 
332b4(dkon brtsegs): shi ris de ltar sems can mang po'i don rgya cher byas/ da nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / de'i slob ma dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang
332b5(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen ma rnams lhan cig du 'dus te/ spos kyi shing thams cad spungs nas mchod pa byas te/ bsregs nas ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyang grags
332b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis yod pa brtsigs te/ me tog dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis gus par mchod cing / rim gro dang / 
332b7(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas nas bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge slong da ma shi ri 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas/ smon lam/ 
332b8(dkon brtsegs): btab pa bzhin du rgyal rigasu skyes nas dran pa thob pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' yongasu mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu lo sum brgya lon pa'i bstan
333a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la rab tu byung ste/ sngon gyi smon lam dang tshe rabs dran pa'i shes pa'i dbang gis sgo rnams kyi tshig ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig kyang rang gi ngang gis
333a2(dkon brtsegs): slar thob par gyur to// gzungs thob pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan gyi/ tshe rabs snga ma la sngar bshad par gyur pa
333a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni ma bstan to// gang po de'i tshed ma shi ri dge slong mang po rnams las gang shes rab zab cing gsal la rno ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ldan stug pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa thob pas/ 
333a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i mdo rnams thos par gyur na/ sems kyi rjes su yid rang nas mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed/ gus pas mchod par byas nas dge slong dran pa
333a5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa la yang yongasu bsrung bar byed// dge slong de dag/ las gang gzi byin dang yon tan med pa dang dbang po/ rtul zhing mi gsal dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba de dag ni
333a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dran pa thob pas gsar du bshad pa'i chos thos par gyur nas/ mngon par yid ches pa yang med/ dang du len pa yang med/ 'gal ba dag byas nas skyon 'byin cing 'di skad
333a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di dag ni bdag cag gis mkhan po dang slob dpon las kyang ma thos/ sngon slob dpon chen po da ma shi ri las kyang ma tho so zhes zer ro// gang po de dag las
333a8(dkon brtsegs): gang shes rab zab cing yang dag pa'i don la rton pa de dag ni tshig gi rje su mi 'breng bar don la rton pa'i phyir sems kyis kyang 'gal bar mi byedado// 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir de
333b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa yang yang dag par bsrung bar byed la/ gus pas dge slong dran pa thob pa la yang bsrung bar byed// gang po de'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong
333b2(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcu dge slong dran pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde'i chos kyi rje su zhugs par gyur to// gang po de'i tshe dge slong
333b3(dkon brtsegs): da ma shI ri'i slob ma 'khor rnams logs shig tu sde gnyisu gyes par gyur te/ gcig gi ming ni da ma shi ri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to// gcig gi ming ni dran pa thob
333b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur kyang // de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pas bdag ni da mA shi ri yi no zhes ma smraso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe dge slong dam
333b5(dkon brtsegs): shi ri ni mang po kun gyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu tho/ ba par gyur gyi byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yino/ zhes zer bas gal te bdag nyid kyis smras par gyur na
333b6(dkon brtsegs): mang po kun the tshom za bar 'gyur ba dang / dge slong dran pa thob pa ni de'i tshe mang po kun gyis 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yin gyi dgra bcom pa ma yino zhes zer bso// gang po dge
333b7(dkon brtsegs): slong dran pa thob pas de ltar rgya cher sems can rnams la phan btags nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa dang / de'i slob ma mang po rnams kyis spos kyi shing thams cad spungs
333b8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ mchod pa byas te bsreg so// 'khor bzhi po rnams 'dus nas ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyang grag gcig
334a1(dkon brtsegs): yod pa brtsigs nas/ spos dang / me tog dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis mchod/ 
334a2(dkon brtsegs): cing bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge slong dran pa thob pa 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe bdag slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig ces
334a3(dkon brtsegs): smon lam btab pas smon lam btab pa bzhin du khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skyes par gyur te/ de'i ming ni ya sha zhes bya bar gyur to// sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang
334a4(dkon brtsegs): gis sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa thob par gyur pas/ de ba bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' yongasu mya ngan la das 'das pa'i 'og tu lo brgya pa'i bstan pa las lo bdun
334a5(dkon brtsegs): lon te rab tu byung nas gzungs rnams thob par gyur to// gzungs thob pa'i mthus skye bo mang po la sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bstan to// de'i tshe dge
334a6(dkon brtsegs): slong dran pa thob pa'i dge slong rnams dang / da ma shi ri'i dge slong rnams las gang dge ba'i rtsa ba lhan stug pa de dag ni ya shas bstan pa'i chos rnams thos nas/ sems rab tu dga'
334a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing thams cad kyis chos kyi bde ba thob par gyur to// gang po dge slong mang po de dag yang dag pa'i don la brten cing tshig gi rjesu 'brang bar cang mi byed pas/ de'i phyir dge slong ya
334a8(dkon brtsegs): shas sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde stong pa nyid kyi rje su mthun zhing shin du zab pa don dam pa'i rjesu mthun pa yang dag par bstan pa thos par gyur na/ mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par
334b1(dkon brtsegs): byed 'gal ba med par yang dag par len cing kha ton du 'don par byed/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rje su bsgrubs par gyur to// gang po dge slong de dag las gang dbang po rtul zhing mi
334b2(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun ma sdug pa de dag ni dge slong ya sha las sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde stong pa nyid kyi don dam pa'i rjesu mthun pa stong pa nyid kyi rje su mthun zhing shin du zab
334b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dag thos par gyur na mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par yang mi byed 'gal bar byas nas 'jig cing smod par byed do// 'di skad du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di ni bdag cag gis mkhan
334b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang slob dpon las kyang ma thos/ sngon ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dran pa thob pa las kyang ma thos so zhes zer ro// gang po dge slong ya shas las chos
334b5(dkon brtsegs): thos nas rab tu dga' ba dang sems kyis mngon par yid/ ches shing dang du blangs pa de dag thams cad ni dam shi ri'i dge slong rnams dang / dran pa thob pa'i dge slong
334b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis sdang zhing phrag dog gis smad nas lhan cig gan su yang mi ster/ lhan cig glog pa dang / kha don du 'don pa dang / chos bshad du yang mi ster te/ skur pa btab nas/ 'di skad
334b7(dkon brtsegs): du de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma yin/ ston pa chen po'i bstan pa yang ma yin zhes zer ro// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ya shas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa
334b8(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher yang dag par spel nas/ grong khyer gcig nas grong khyer gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan cing phan pa mang po byas pas/ srog chags khrag khrig
335a1(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// dge slong ye shas de ltar phan pa mang po byas nas/ de'i 'og tu
335a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / dge slong ya sha'i rje su phyogs pa'i skye bo bdun khri yod pa de dag gis dge slong ya sha'i phyir ring bsrel gyi mchod rten bdun khri brtsigs nas/ spos dang / 
335a3(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur bstir byas/ bla mar byas shing bsdug
335a4(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge slong ya sha 'chi ka/ de'i dus kyi tshe slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye ba dar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas/ 'chi ba'i
335a5(dkon brtsegs): dus byas pa'i 'og tu smon lam btab pa bzhin du yang rgyal rigasu skyes par gyur te/ de'i tshe lha mang po rnams kyis sgra chen po phyung ste/ 'di skad du kye deng
335a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i bu btsas pa 'di ni sems can la phan pa mang po byed pa yino zhes bsgrags pas/ sgra de'i rje su ming yang rab tu 'dren pa zhes btag so// de lo bcu bzhi lon pa dang / 
335a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo brgya pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gyur to// dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de yang mdo sde dang bstan
335a8(dkon brtsegs): bcos mang po rgya cher kha don du 'don pa dang / mang du thos shing zab mo la 'jug pa dang / tshig 'bru dang / spobs pa yongasu dag pa dang / chos bstan pa'i thabs la rab tu
335b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas ma par gyur to// gang po dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de grong rdal gcig nas gcig tu/ glong khyer gcig nas gcig tu yul gciganas gcig tu d+hA ning seM nas
335b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'di'i bstan pa rgya cher spel nas phan pa mang po byaso// de'i tshe da ma shi ri dang / dran pa thob dang / ya sha'i dge slong gi tshogs rnams gcig
335b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'dus nas rab tu 'dren pa'i thad du 'ongs te/ des bstan pa dag gzhig cing skur pa gdob par bsham so// de nas de'i tshe dge slong rab tu 'dren pas dge slong mang po 'ongs par
335b4(dkon brtsegs): rig nas 'di skad du kye dge slong mang po khyed dngos po ci de zhig gis ni rgol bar sems/ dngos po gang zhig ni 'dri bar sems shes smras pa dang / dge slong mang po
335b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams de skad smras pa thos nas mya ngan gyis non cing mi de bar gyur pas cang mi zer bar gyur te/ dge slong rab tu 'dren pa la bgegs bya bar yang ma nuso// gang po
335b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de ji srid du 'jig rten na gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang rgyas shing rab tu 'phel bar gyur to// de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rje su sangs rgyas
335b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bstan pa yang nub par gyur to// dge slong ba tu 'dren pa de ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub tu nye ba'i tshe grong rdal gcig nas gcig tu/ grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu/ yul
335b8(dkon brtsegs): gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas sems can mang po'i ched du yongasu dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rje su mthun pa'i mdo sde zab mo yang dag par bstan pas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad bcu
336a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu thams cad kyang mtho ris kyi lha'i 'jig rten du skyes
336a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// gang po dge slong rab tu 'dren pas de ltar phan pa byas nas/ de gang gi nub mo 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i phyi de nyin par sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub par gyur to// gang po de bzhin/ 
336a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa nub par gyur pa'i phyir mdo sde zab mo yongasu dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjesu mthun pa'i chos rnams kyang nub par gyur to// gang po de ltar na byang chub
336a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni mdo sde zab mo de lta dbus sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyang phun sum tshogs par
336a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin no// gang po byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'dren pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu zhing de nyid kyi steng gi rgya gas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bcu par skyes par gyur te/ 
336a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe zhing de'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs pa'i spyan zhes bya ste/ de'i stan pa las rab tu byung nas tshe rab snga
336a7(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis shes rab zab cing gsal la rno ba dang / spobs pa gtugs pa med cing myur la thogs pa med par gyur to// dge slong rab tu 'drin pa de
336a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i spyan gyi bstan pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa na/ slar yang de nyid du de bzhin
336b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rab tu 'phel ba'i dpung pa zhes bya ba dang phrad par gyur nas sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas bla na med pa yang dag par
336b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu gnyer bar gyur to// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu slar yang zhing de nyid du skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
336b3(dkon brtsegs): gdon mi za bar spyod pa dang phrad par gyur te/ sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lo bdun khri'i bar du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs nas bla na med
336b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu gnyer bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i ming ni shu la zhes bya ste/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa gdon mi za bar spyod pa nges 'di skad du yong
336b5(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong shu la 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa ra rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
336b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan zhes bya bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan to// gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang
336b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigasu bca
336b8(dkon brtsegs): de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i zab mo yi// rnam dag nges pa'i chos thos nas// bdag nyid de la gnas byed cing // gzhan dag la yang ston par byed// 'jig rten gting
337a1(dkon brtsegs): ni mi dpogs kyang // byang chub sems dpa' bying mi 'gyur// tshul khrims rnam dag rab gnas nas// rgyu cher sems cad pan yang 'dogs// gling bzhi dang
337a2(dkon brtsegs): ni rtogs pa brjod// sangs rgyas lam zhes 'khor la ston// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pas na// 'di ni nges pa'i chos yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ban spyod pa// sem
337a3(dkon brtsegs): can la ni pan yang 'dogs// sangs rgyas chos rnams bsrung byed cing // 'khor la byang chub 'dems par byed// sems can dag gi chos bzhin don// byang chub sems dpa
337a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad byed// 'khor la sangs rgyas lam ston pas/ byang chub sems ni nye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas la dam ni bsrung byed cing / sems can rgyu char pan 'dogs
337a5(dkon brtsegs): pas/ lha dang klu dang 'dre srin dang // gang zag chen pos bkur bar 'gyur// de phyir rnam par dag pa yi/ stong zab gya nom chos thos nas// rtse gcig sems shing
337a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyer byed na// shes rab dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni spyod pa rnams phun sum tshogs par byed de/ spyod pa
337a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro// de la spyod pa gang zhe na/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshas
337a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyen la brten nas sbyin pa yongasu gtong bar byed// tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzod pa sgom par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gnog par byed/ 
337b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa sgom par byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang las mdo sde de lta bu dang rjesu ston pa'i thabs
337b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa ston par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dang lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub gnyer bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i
337b3(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// de nas de'i tshe bcom
337b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams// spyad par bya ba'i tshe/ das dag ni// sbyin pa btang nas rab dga' zhing // 'gyod pa
