361b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bstan pa yin no// glang po che'i lag 'di ni chos kyi sgo mthong ba zhes bya ste gang gis chos mthong ba'i sgor zhugs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o// glang po che'i lag 'di
361b4(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems/ chos gang gis sangs rgyas mthong par 'gyur ba'i chos de ci 'gags pa dang 'gag pa da dang / 'gag par 'gyur ba'i 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid
361b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig yin snyam 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag sa so// 'di ji snyam du sems/ chos gang gis sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de ci skyes pa dang / 
361b6(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang skye bar 'gyur ba'i skye ba'i mtshan nyid gcig yin snyam 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// glang po che'i lag gal te de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa ni
361b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa zhes mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lagaso// glang po che'i lag des gal te 'di skad tu sku'i mtshan dang ldan pas/ bdag de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
361b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par zhugs nas slar ldog par mi 'gyuro zhes smras pa sku'i mtshan nyid phyir mi ldog par mthong ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gag pa zhes bya'o// 
362a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du dris shig/ ci khyod sku'i mtshan yongs su grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dod dam/ des gal te 'di
362a2(dkon brtsegs): skad du bdag ni sku'i mtshan yongasu grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dong do zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i
362a3(dkon brtsegs): gsung rab las ni sku'i mtshan la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o zhes ma gsungs te gal te sku'i mtshan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin no zhes brjod na ni gyo mo dang / 
362a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ri dang / klung dang / rtswa shing thams cad kyang de ro bzhin gshegs pa yin pa 'gyur ro// de gal te/ 'di skad du gyo mo dang / rdo dang / ri dang / klung dang
362a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa shing thams cad la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu/ rtsa gnyis med pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes mi/ bya'o zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig
362a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis smras pa ltar mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya na ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang / de bzhin gshegs pa yin par rig so// 
362a7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan paso// des gal te 'di skad du mtshan ni mtshan gyi chos la 'jug par gyur pas mtshan
362a8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i bram zes kyang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'i dngos po de bden pa so zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig/ gal te mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
362b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin na ni khyod bdag nyid kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par mthong bas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur zhes lung bstan pa yin no zhes smras
362b2(dkon brtsegs): pas deng khyod kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan shod cig/ de gal te 'di skad du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres
362b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos bco brgyad dang / zag pa med pa'i dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la
362b4(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid du ston to// sa zer na/ de la 'di skad du spros shig/ khyod kyi sa stobs bcu la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
362b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid yin no zhes smras pas/ deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa shod cig/ de gal te 'di skad du ci sangs rgyas dang mtshan
362b6(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa zhig yin nam zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du khyod nyid mtshan sangs rgyas yin zhes zer bar zad kyi mtshan ni sangs rgyas ma yin no zhes smros shig/ des gal te yang 'di skad
362b7(dkon brtsegs): du dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos gzhan zhig sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid byed par gyur ram zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig/ dbyibs med
362b8(dkon brtsegs): cing kha dog med pa'i chos ji ltar dbyibs dang bcas shing kha dog dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid byed par 'gyur/ gzhan yang khyod kyis gal te dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos
363a1(dkon brtsegs): la sangs rgyas shes bya'o zhes zer na/ 'on ni gzhan dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos thams cad sangs rgyas yin par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// ga
363a2(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag sangs rgyas yin par gyur na ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
363a3(dkon brtsegs): lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yang de'i mtshan nyid byed par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// zhes brjod par bya'o// 
363a4(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i lag nga'i nyan thos rnams ni de ltar skyes bu blun po rnams rab tu gdul bar byed do// gzhan yang glang po che'i lag ngas sngon bla na med pa yang dag par
363a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na/ sa sems can thams cad yongasu bzla bar bya'o zhes smra na lam btab mod kyi/ nga byang chub kyi snying po la
363a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ sems can yang ma dmigs sems can gyi ming yang ma dmigs pas/ nga
363a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos dngos po yod pa'i phyir dngos po 'di yod// dngos po med pa'i phyir
363a8(dkon brtsegs): dngos po 'di med par rtogs pa kho nar zad do// dngos po gang yod pa'i phyir dngos po gang yod/ dngos po gang med pa'i phyir dngos po gang med par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste ma
363b1(dkon brtsegs): rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yod par 'gyur/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen
363b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis skye mchod drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis
363b3(dkon brtsegs): srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi/ rma shi'i rkyen gyis mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa
363b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams yod par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi bu dang po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur/  ro// ma rig pa 'gags pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams
363b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gag/ 'du byed rnams 'gags pa'i phyir rnam pa shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pa 'i phyir ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs
363b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa'i phyir skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pa'i phyir reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pa'i phyir tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pa'i phyir sred pa
363b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pa'i phyir len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pa'i phyir srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pa'i phyir skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pa'i phyir rga shi 'gag
363b8(dkon brtsegs): rga shi 'gags pa'i phyir mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'gag por 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po
364a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'anga' zhig po 'di dag 'gags par 'gyur ro// gang de la mig dang / ye shes dang / rig pa dang / blo skyes pas 'di ltar dbus dang / 
364a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba rab tu rtogs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba de rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ chos gzhan gang
364a3(dkon brtsegs): yang thob par gyur pa med kyi rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i chos dmigs pa kho nar zad do// glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji ltar chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa de
364a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sems can rnams la yang dag par rab tu ston to// / glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma
364a5(dkon brtsegs): byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'argyu rab med par rtag tu gnas pas 'di lta ste ming dang ga zugs kyang stong par mi 'gyur la/ phan tshun
364a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gal ba yang meng skye ba yang med/ 'byung ba yang med do// glang po che'i lag nga ni rtag par de ltar chos ston pas khyed kyis kyang nga'i dgongs pa bzhin du rig par bya'o// 
364a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas khyed la de lta bu'i chos bstan na khyed kyis kyang de bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// glang po che'i lag ston pa chen po slob ma rnams la gang bya ba'i rigs pa de dag ngas
364a8(dkon brtsegs): ma lus par byas zin pas/ khyed kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs nas chos rnams las ye shes kyi sna ba thob par bya'o// de nas bcom
364b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i lag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i
364b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba zhig yin na/ su zhig lam ston par 'gyur/ lam ston pa med pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos nub par zhes bya'o// 
364b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang nub pa zhes bya bas 'di yang sems can thams cad yongs su ma bzlas pa'o zhes mchi na/ de la
364b4(dkon brtsegs): ji skad du lan gdab par bgyi ba lags bcom da ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag gal te de skad du 'dri ba yod na/ de la 'di
364b5(dkon brtsegs): skad du lan gdab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin par skye bo mang po kun gyis kyang shes shing mthong la rtag par sems
364b6(dkon brtsegs): can bzla ba'i dus la bzhes pas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang da dung phan pa mdzad pa yin no// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas ma 'ongs pa'i
364b7(dkon brtsegs): dus su sangs rgyas rnams la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung ston par mdzad nas/ de nyid sangs rgyas kyi gdung bsab cing rgyun mi gcad
364b8(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ni sangs rgyas gcig gi chos yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos shes bya'o zhes bstan to// de bzhin
365a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yin pas de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'
365a2(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du gsungs pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa glang
365a3(dkon brtsegs): po che'i log gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad yongs su tshol po legs par thugs su chud pa lags te/ chos
365a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad legs par thugs su chud pa'i slad du skung gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las mkhyen pa sngon du gtong ni mkhyen pa'i rjes su 'brangabs
365a5(dkon brtsegs): na bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dang / 'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe rje skad bstan pa bzhin du mdzad cing ji skad mdzad pa bzhin du
365a6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs par 'gyur ba ni shin tu ngo mtsha cha lags sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bku' stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag de de bzhinan// de de bzhin te/ blang
365a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe'i lag khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du nga ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing / ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras par
365a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin no// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smras pa gang la la zhig 'di sa du su ni gnor ba med par 'jig rten du byung nas sems can la phani 'dags
365b1(dkon brtsegs): bsu lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'a ba lang god pa dang thams cad kun gyi ston pa chen por gyur nas/ yang dag pa'i lam ston pa dang / yang dag par/ 
365b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis rnam par grol bas spros pa mi mnga' bar pha rol du dran nus dadung ma 'argal bdag yongs su zlos shes zer bal/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as
365b3(dkon brtsegs): nga yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhig slu ba med cing byang
365b4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i drin gzo ba yin zhes zer ba la de ni ngadayinano zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te/ sems can gang la
365b5(dkon brtsegs): lo zhig ngal bya ba cung zad cig byas pa'i dngos po de dag chung za bar mi 'gyur ro// glang po che'i lag ngani dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang / 
365b6(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed pa tshun chad par der nam yang sems la ldog cing gyur pa yang med la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par zhen cing
365b7(dkon brtsegs): mos par gyur pa yang dag par rjes su mi dran yang ngas chos de bstan pas nga'i 'khor rnams las sems rtse gcig tu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
365b8(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu yongs su gnyer ba dag bzung ba'i phyir 'dun par gyur pa kho nar zang ngo // glang po che'i lag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ nga mu stegs can gyi drang srong du gyur/ 
366a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe shes rab gsal zhing rnol mang du thos shing spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pas chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de'i
366a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe bram ze gzhon nu lnga brgya zhig khyim na gnas pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i nyes dmigs mthong zhing rab tu byung ba'i bani yon mthong nas khyim nas khyim med par
366a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ste lam bsgoms par gyur to// de dag thams cad nga'i thang du 'ongs pa dang / ngas chos bstan pas rang sangs rgyas kyi lam thob par gyur nas mngon par shes pa drug
366a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhing sems la rang dbang thob pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan par gyur pas rta/ du rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nam mkha' la mngon par
366a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags nas grong dang grong khyer dang / grong la dag tu zhugs te bsod snyoms pa/ ngas nas ngal rim gro byas so// nga de'i tshe 'di snyam du
366a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar 'di dag ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes chen po dang ldan pa yin pas bdag gis 'di dag gi mchod pa blang ba'i phyir ni mi rigs so snyam du sems par gyur
366a7(dkon brtsegs): // drang srong de dag ngas rjes su bstan pa'i phyir de lta bu'i chos thob par gyur kyang ngas thob par ma gyur pas chos de thob par bya zhing mngon sum du ma byas pa
366a8(dkon brtsegs): mngan sum du bya ba'i phying nan chen btsun 'grus bsrung bar gyu // glang ba che'i lagang sanan tan can 'grus babyed nas chos demangon sum du byas
366b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha zhig 'ongs te mngon du lung bstan nas ngal 'di skad du kye ye shes 'di la mngon par zhen par ma byed cig/ khyod
366b2(dkon brtsegs): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams yongs su zlas par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o// glang po
366b3(dkon brtsegs): che'i lag ngas de'i tshe de skad bsgo ba thos nas lam bsgom pa btang bas sems mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur nas zla ba phyed kyi bar tu dben par 'dug pa'i tshe/ 
366b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas lus kun du khyab par gyur to// glang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na lha rnams kyis go bar byed cing rab tu
366b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i sems kyang thob par 'gyur la/ ba/ dag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 
366b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems rab tu bskyed nas gzhan dag kyang sems bskyed par bskul ba yin/ theb pa chen por sems bskyed pa dag
366b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong na phrag dog kyang mi byed la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag gcig pus thob par bya ba yin gyi gzhan gyis thob par bya ba ma yin no snyam du
366b8(dkon brtsegs): mi sems pa yin/ sems can nyes pa spyod pa de dag la dus dus su rjes su 'dems shing sems bzang pos gtam dag smras nas de dag gi dge ba yongs su bsrungs/ 
367a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa yin bdag nyid rtag par rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis chos rnams rgya cher gnyer zhing gzhan dag la bstan
367a2(dkon brtsegs): nus ser sna med par gyur pa yin te/ glang ba che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na lha rnams
367a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang go bar byed la bdag nyid kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal
367a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal dpa// byang chub sems dpa' brtan sems/  kyis// bla med theg la rab gnas shing / 
367a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag kyang bskul byas nas// theg pa de la 'god par byed// byang chub sems da pa'i spyad spyod na/ rtag par phrag dog khong
367a6(dkon brtsegs): khro med // nan tan brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas// dga' ba'i sems ni 'phel bar 'gyur// sems can sdig spyod mthong 'gyur na// 'du shes
367a7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'doms par byed// rtag par byams dang snying rjer ldan/ khong khro dag ni med pa yin// rtag par nan tan chos gnyer nas// sems can rnams
367a8(dkon brtsegs): la spel bar byed// ji ltar char ni rlan byed ltar// chos kyis thams cad tshim par byed// chos bzhi 'di dag gang spyod pa/ khyod ni sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur
367b1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ the tshom sems ni ma skyed ces// lha rnams kyis ni go bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas// nan tan brtson 'grus sred par byed// dngos pa 'dzin
367b2(dkon brtsegs): nges bden pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas nges grub sems// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// brtson 'grus dang ni smon lam dang // dran pa dang ni shes rab dag/ 
367b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// 'jig rten du ni byung gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// 'di 'dra'i yon
367b4(dkon brtsegs): tan ldan par 'gyur// gang zag chen pos bkur 'gyur zhing // rgyal po blon po dmangs rna dmas kyang // thams cad sems ni rab dga' zhing / 
367b5(dkon brtsegs): lam ldan yin par rig par 'gyur// bstan bcos gtsug lag tshig dang don// tshig 'bru tshig sa bcad rtsis dang grangs// de dag thams cad legs
367b6(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas// sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// dbang po rno zhing shes rab ldan// bya ba stobs la mi ltos pas// thabs dang ldan pa 'ba' zhig gis// thams
367b7(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su grub par nus// dgra rnams rab tu 'dul ba yang // lus kyi zho shas mi ltos par/ shes rab stobs ni 'ba' zhig gis// rang gi sems ni 'dul
367b8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed// sems can rab tu brtse ba'i phyir// 'jig rten du ni skyes pas na// rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams kyang // ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par 'gyur/ 
368a1(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kun dang smra bas na// de yi ya mtshan kun gyis rig/ ci'i phyir de ltar rig ce na// bdag sems shes zhes
368a2(dkon brtsegs): sems phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' de rtag tu// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthang bas na// der song chos ni rab zhugs nas// sems can rgya cher pan yang
368a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dog/ sangs rgyas zhus lan gsungs pas na// the tshom dag ni chad par 'gyur// sems can rnams ni phan 'dogs pas// thams cad dga' ba thob par 'gyur
368a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu bstan nas// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar lung ston pas// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// sems ni dga' ba thob par
368a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ shin tu 'phags pa'i nor rnams dang // phyi nang kun la chags med pas// de phyiradaga' ba chen po yis// bdag nyid sangs rgyas
368a6(dkon brtsegs): grub par shes// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi// bzod pa gya no ma thob pas na// de phyir dga' ba chen po yis// bdag nyid sangs rgyas grub par
368a7(dkon brtsegs): shes/ chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing // chos bstan mi rung rig pas na// de 'dra'i shes rab thob 'gyur nas// lus ni mkha' la 'phags par
368a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de yi sems ni nang mi gnas// phyi rol na yang mi gnas te// 'du shes thams cad 'das pas na// de phyir bzod pa bla med thob// yun rings byams
368b1(dkon brtsegs): rang snying rje yis// sems can kun la sems pas na// dpyir bsod nams de yi dbang // sangs rgyas tshad med mthong bar 'gyur// de mi lus ni thams cad kun/ 
368b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sku dang khyad par med// de 'dra'i bzod pa thob pas na// chos kyis bdag nyid 'phel bar byed// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed la// su zhig rjes su slob mi
368b3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ rab brtan dam chos gang gnas pa// de 'dra'i yon tan thob par 'gyur// de phyir lam ni gnyer ba dag/ rtag par nan tan chos gnyer bya// chos kyis
368b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi khe btsal nas// byang chub la ni phan gdag sa bya// rgal ba'i lan gdab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas bcom ldan
368b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom lda/ na 'das kyis 'das pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i
368b6(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dge ba'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs la shin tu brtan par gnas par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po de de bzhin// 
368b7(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin te/ nga ni yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dge ba'i chos la shin tu brtan par gnas par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di
368b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos gcer chos ni gang thob pa// de ni sangs rgyas lam gzhi ni// rtag tu chos la gang brtson pa/ 
369a1(dkon brtsegs): chos ma yin pa spong bar 'gyur// rtag tu yang dag lam spyod pa// log pa'i lam ni spong bar byed// sangs rgyas chos la rtag brten pa/ 
369a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni lam la brten par 'gyur// des ni mi khom rnam spangs nas/ khom ldan dag ni thob par 'gyur// khom ldan gnas ni thob 'gyur na// brtson 'grus brtsams pa chung
369a3(dkon brtsegs): mi za// gnas gnyi su ni mchog tu btsun// kha dog gzugs ni mchog tu 'gyur// g.yog 'khor dag ni phun tshogs shing // thams cad kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ 
369a4(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa'i sems kyis rtag tu ni// tshul khrims bzod pa'i phyogs la gnas// brtson 'grus phyogs la rab gnas shing // bsam gtan shes rab
369a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byed// rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi gtso mchog dag ni byed par 'gyur// yon tan kun gyi mchog gyur pas// don rig 'jigs
369a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ci yang med/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i chos gya nom pa dag la su zhig slob par mi bgyid de/ 
369a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni sngon dang po nas le lo can du gyur pas sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa la re ba ma mchis shing / bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa 'di lta bu thob par gyur pa mngon par
369a8(dkon brtsegs): yid ches pa ma mchis pas na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas bdag nyid nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba lagaso snyam du sems lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng
369b1(dkon brtsegs): slan chad byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzengs bstod cing spro ba bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod par bgyid lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom
369b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dka' ba mdzad pa lagaso// bcom la 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can gyi ched du rtag par de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i
369b3(dkon brtsegs): dngos po sha stag mdzad de// de lta bu'i dngos po de ni dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas tham cad la yang ma mchis na sems can gzhan la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bas so// 
369b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos da po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe/ na por gyur pa 'ba' zhig gis sems can thams cad la
369b5(dkon brtsegs): snying brtse ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shin tu dka' ba'i bus na gnas kyang rnam mdzes pa// lhun po lha yi tshogs kyi gnas
369b6(dkon brtsegs): / lta bur// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su de bzhugs te// 'od zer stong phrag brgya dag 'gyed pa mdzad// tshangs pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de// tshangs pa'i
369b7(dkon brtsegs): mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes ltar// bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin bzhugs// sems can dam pa 'gro ba kun la gsal// brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum
369b8(dkon brtsegs): lha nang du// gnas nas gzi brjid yangs pas mdzes pa ltar// mtshan gyis spras pa ye shes yon tan phyug/ thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba kun la gsal// gling
370a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi mi yi bdag po snang ldan pa// 'jig rten 'di la ston pa mdzes pasgyur// 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug par bas dzad cing // zugs
370a2(dkon brtsegs): rje'i dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes// mkha' la nyi ma lham mthal le ba// nor bu me 'od mog mog byed 'di ltar// kyem stong bas khyad par 'phags pa
370a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od/ sangs rgyas seM 'gro ba 'di na gsal// dri med zla ba nas spyi zung gas pa ltar// shin tu nam dag 'gro ba kun lagasas// rdul ba'i nal ras na sa
370a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra// kun 'od zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes/ ji ltar ri bo'i zom la me 'bar ba/ mchen mo mi hA la tsam na kun sdang ltar// gti naH
370a5(dkon brtsegs): mun pa ma lus bcom nas ni// drang srong chen po'iye shes 'od kyang gsal// seng ge ri sum/ bsten pa'i sgra sgrog cing // sa la ri dgas
370a6(dkon brtsegs): tshegs rnams skrag bgyid ltar// mi dbang bstod pa bdag med gsung sgrog cing // pha rol mu stegs can rnams skrag par mdzad// nor bu'i rgyal po bzang po gzi
370a7(dkon brtsegs): brjid 'byar// nor bu thams cad zil mnan lham me ltar// rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// 'gro kun zil gyis mnan nas lham mer bzhugs// 'jig rten gang na
370a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ang khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// lhag pa'i sems can mchis par ga le 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thabs rnams dang // yon tan kun gyis khyod dang
370b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs ma mchis// mi yi dpa' bo 'gro la lham me ba// mgon po yon tan rgya mtsho bdag gis mthong // gus pa skyes shing dga' ba rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi mthil
370b2(dkon brtsegs): la bdag gis gtugs// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten sgron// grags pa dam pa rgya chen thugs mnga' ba// bdag gis bstod de bsod nams 'dis thob des/ 
370b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis
370b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod nas/ thal mo sbyar te mig gnyis mi'o dzums par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni blta/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod// zab pa
370b5(dkon brtsegs): dang gting dpag dka' ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / khong du chud par dka' ba dang / brtag mi nus pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang phra ba
370b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni 'jig/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni rje su rnam par dpyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dngos po de lta bu tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis
370b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po spyad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
370b8(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor te/ sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams yongasu bzla bar bgyis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
371a1(dkon brtsegs): gang po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
371a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
371a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe de lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang / dka' ba'i dngos po chen po shin tu zab pa
371a4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dka' ba tshad med dpag tu med grangs med pa dang ldan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 'astsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / 'khor
371a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang mi dang / klu dang / gnod// sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa tha/ mas cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu
371a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing yid ches pas mngon par bstod do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
371a7(dkon brtsegs): grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las gang pos 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa bcu bdun pa rdzog so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rASh+Ta pa la na/ pa ri prits+tsha na ma ma hA yan sUt+ma
371a8(dkon brtsegs): bod skad du/ 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cid/ 
371b1(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge
371b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong thams cad kyang spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ bzod pa thob pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
371b3(dkon brtsegs): cad la shin tu nye bar gyur pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ gzungs thob pa ting 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob pa mi 'jigs pa thog pa med pa thob pa/ 
371b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa nas yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad zad mi shes pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems
371b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun tu mig dang / kun du lta ba dang / kun du 'od zer dang / kun du'o// dang / blo gros mchog dang / blo gros 'phel dang / zlogs
371b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas dang / blo gros rgya chen dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / sa 'dzin dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa'
371b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu
371b8(dkon brtsegs): drug dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lha'i bu 'tshams bzang dang / lha'i bu blo gros legs
372a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / lha'i dbang po thams cad dang / klung dbang po dang/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin
372a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / na mkha' lding gi dbang po'i 'khor brgya stong du ma yod pa thams cad dang / 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams dang thabs
372a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ lhun po ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las ni mngon par 'phags
372a4(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni snang / zla ba/ ltar 'gro ba thams cad la ni snang bar mdzad/ tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar ni bzhugs/ brgya
372a5(dkon brtsegs): byin ltar sku ni bsnyen par dka' 'khor los bsgyur bltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che bdun dang ni ldan seng ge ltar chos thams cad bdag med
372a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang stong par ni sgrogs/ me'i phung po chen po lhur 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i sku dang ni dang / lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu rin po che kun nas bsdus pa'i nor bu rin
372a7(dkon brtsegs): po che'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis shin tu 'bar zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad na/ don shin tu rnam par nges
372a8(dkon brtsegs): pas chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa/ sems can thams cad go bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i
372b1(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyis chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ 
372b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byung ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes
372b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma stong las lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor
372b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad zil du rlag par mdzad nas shin tu lha dngar bzhugs pa mthong ste/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / dad pas 'dun pa'i sems
372b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis stan las langs nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 
372b6(dkon brtsegs): lha tshogs lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci// klu dang nyan thos dag dang sangs rgyas sras// 'gro ba 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yangs kyis// zil mnan khyod ni gser gyi
372b7(dkon brtsegs): ri ltar gsal// rgya mtsho'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni rjes su rnam par sems sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la ni yang dag
372b8(dkon brtsegs): par blta de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig gi
373a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni rtog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas med pa/ na mkha'i spyod yul du ni yang
373a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par lta/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni mos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la ni mngon par 'dod
373a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag pa dang zhi ba dang ther zug pa la ni 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / sems
373a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la mngon du phyin pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan gyi phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur yang thug pa med pa ni
373a5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran par byed/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam par dpyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po
373a6(dkon brtsegs): yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod du dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/ de zla ba gsum 'das nas
373a7(dkon brtsegs): chos gos byas te/ chos gos zin nas de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gsar bu las dang po rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa dag dang
373a8(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu mthar gyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga' ba dang bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der song ngo // de nas che dang
373b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das gal bder sang ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mag pas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum banar
373b2(dkon brtsegs): babyes nas byugs gcig tu 'jug go/ dugs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang che dang ldan yul la bar rgyang gos thal ma sbyar te/ tshag subaca dpa'ang dag gos bcam
373b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das lo mngon par brjod de/ mematshag 'ang mdzad la phyag 'tshal la/ rnam mapa' mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal la// rgyal ba da
373b4(dkon brtsegs): genyis gtsang phyag 'tshal / dang gsum mothar byan thub la phyag 'tshal lo// zhid rnams bye ba rong 'byam kun tu yang // dzan
373b5(dkon brtsegs): bdug na khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung / rgyal ba'i sras kyis zas nas rab dga' dang / yan tan rgya mcha thub pa mchod du mche// 
373b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs tshul dang mthun pas mchod 'gyis te// thub pa che les rdul bral chas thos nas// de dag khyad kyi yan tan phreng brjod cing // yid pa
373b7(dkon brtsegs): drag 'das ga na tsho// byang chub dam pa mchag na tshal ban/ khyad ni thugs na rgyab ma mnga' bar// bskal pa bye la drug khrag pas mams su/ 
373b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi tshing du cu dang rlung // dren pa gyid btsun dang rgyal khrim pa spyong // bzod dang bcan 'grus dang na papam gan rlobs// ses pa yang ma nga bangan
374a1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol gshegs// des na rnam 'dren che la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul rkang dang mngon shes mchog la mkhas// dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa brdas
374a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs// mnyam med ye shes gtse la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen// spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang // tshul
374a3(dkon brtsegs): sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur ba// de ni bcom ldan mi yi mchog gis mkhyen// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong // gang gis sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang / 
374a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bde 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las// 'gro bas legs bgyis pa dang nongs bgyis mkhyen// 'gro ba ta dan mdzad gang dag 'das rnams dang // de ltar lha dang mi yi
374a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod rnams dang // gang gis ma byon yon tan mcho ga mthar phyin// bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen// dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor
374a6(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos dang // drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad// rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par mkhyen// mya ngan 'das ni chos gnas tsa 'dra dang / 
374a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa ci 'dra dang // der ni chos mdzod 'dzin pa ci 'dra ba// de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas mkhyen// dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu'i// ye shes
374a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi mnga' 'jug/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'// phyag 'tshal rgyal ba ye shes mtsho khyod la// khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis rab tu lhag
374b1(dkon brtsegs): skur ma rnams kyis na mkha' smras pa ltar// mtshan rnams kyis kyang snyun rab smras pa// mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis
374b2(dkon brtsegs): yid du mchi// lhar bcas 'gro ba zil du rlag par bgyid// tshang ba brgya byin 'og min lha yi rnams// khyod kyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags// khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri ma
374b3(dkon brtsegs): mnga'// dbu snam 'jam zhing g.yas su 'khyil bar gnas// lhun po'i rgyal po lta bur spyi gtsug 'phags// bsod nams rgya cher byung bltam mer bzhugs// 'od zer bye ba
374b4(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig rab 'gyod cing // khyod kyi smon ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes// 'gro bathugs rje dgongs pas pa/ dra gzigs pa// spyan no ut+pal 'dra zhing yid du mchi// 
374b5(dkon brtsegs): nyidri meng mkha' la ji lta bar// rnam 'dren khyod kyi na lani lha ma me ste/ blta ba'i skye bo ngoms par ma 'gyur ba// zhal bzang me yi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// 
374b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ba byar dgas rgyal gyi stabs// glang po dregs pa dal gyis mchi stabs kyis// sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa// stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal
374b7(dkon brtsegs): lo phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum la mdzes// sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas spras// bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lhang reg cing slebs// sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshalo// 
374b8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo 'dra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bar// sa steng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs// zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yong smon pa'i// mi rnams gum nas lha yi 'jig rten mchi/ 
375a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po// chos kyi skyon bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba// chos kyi spyod pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa// 'dren pa chos kyi
375a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa'i go cha dran pa'i ral gri mchog/ tshul khrims gzhu dang shes rab thabs kyi mda'// de yis skyo 'chi sred pa 'phel bgyid pa// nyon mongs dgra
375a3(dkon brtsegs): dag rnam par bcom par gyur// brgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol// grol nas 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'grel// bde gshegs gang gis zhi ba gnas mchi ba/ 
375a4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba rims nang ma mchis lam yang ston// gang na skye dang 'tsha ba ma mchis shing // 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bur mi 'gyur ba// gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis
375a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de/ thugs rje brnyes nas khyed kyis bstan pa mdzad// chos kun dbang gi pha rol gshegs pa'i rgyal// / thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog bstod pas// bdag
375a6(dkon brtsegs): gis 'dir ni bsod nams gang bsags des// 'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya shog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
375a7(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ stan las langs na sa gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
375a8(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das
375b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul
375b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong khyed ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyed kyi sems rangs par bya'o// 
375b3(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
375b4(dkon brtsegs): bo chos du dang ldan na chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur/ gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes dpa thob/ myur ba'i shes rab 'thob/ spobs pa
375b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par nges pa 'thob pas snang ba thob// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yid gnyis spong ba dang / sem nyi
375b6(dkon brtsegs): spong ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa 'thob/ sems can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / ldem po ngag yang dag pa dang / sems
375b7(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob pa dang / zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang / chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / myur ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par
375b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab nges pa// yang dag nyid du ji ltar nges 'byung dang / 
376a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rgya mtsho'i bka' mchid rnam nges pa// mi mchog rgyal ba bdag la bshad du gsol// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lta bu/ 
376a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dam pa bsod nams tshogs bsags pa// khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen lags// byang chub spyod mchog dri med deng bdag gsungs// gzugs dang bdud rtsi byang chub
376a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba yi// ye shes mi zad ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur// gang gis skye ba'i dgongs pa gcod 'gyur ba// shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag/ 'khor bas bskal pa bye ba mang por ni// 'jog
376a4(dkon brtsegs): rten sdug bsngal nyen pa blta bgyid kyang // skyo ba'i blo na nam yang mi bskyed cing // de dag don dge bsten par 'gyur da ba dang // dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang // 
376a5(dkon brtsegs): che mchog dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing dang // sems can che da kyi bka'o mchid bla med dang // byang chub spyod pa dra mid bshad du gsol// bdud 'joms mdzad pa lta ngan
376a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyong ba po// sred pa skegs pa rnam grol reg mdzad pas// chos kyi tshul yang bsgyur bar mi 'gyur ba// sems can rin chen spyod mchog bstan du gsol// gzugs dang longs spyod spobs
376a7(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs// snum pa'i gsung gis 'khor rnams tshim par mdzad// bde gshegs sprin ltar 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par bstan du gsol// 
376a8(dkon brtsegs): kal ping ka'i sgra snyan gsung 'byin pa// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blong na rab 'jig pa// chos 'tshal gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lhags lags kyis// gtso ba bdud rtsi'i ro yis
376b1(dkon brtsegs): tshim par mdzod// byang chub dam pa'i mchog la 'dun pa mchis// chos la 'dun pa bzlog pa mi rigs te// 'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags// rin chen dam pa bsgrag
376b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus la bab// thub pa bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis// bdag gi bsam pa rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen// rgyal bco 'dri ma lags don du gnyer// spyod pa dam pa legs par
376b3(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong khyed leg so legs
376b4(dkon brtsegs): so// yul 'khor skyong khyod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa'i dbyor zhugs pa dang / yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo ma dang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / 
376b5(dkon brtsegs): phan pa dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di dri bar sems
376b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni legs so// yul 'khor skyong khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yod la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol to// tshe dang ldan pa
376b7(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
376b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob po// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam
377a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi de
377a2(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ldan na yongs su dag pa 'di dgra 'thob bo// de la 'don chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// bsam pa thag pas rtag tu mngon brtson pa// byang chub lam las mi ldog yod
377a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa// g.yo med tha ba med ci sgyu med pa// ye shes mtha' med ldan la de dag yod// skye dang na dang rga dang 'chis gzir ba// sems can mgon med sdug bsngal mthong nas ni// srid
377a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyir// de dag chos kyi gru ni yang dag sbyor// nges pas sems can kun la sems mnyam pra// bu gcig pa bzhin 'gro ba rnams la blta// 'di dag
377a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bdag gis grol lo zhes// gang zag mchog/ gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// stong nyid rtag tu rtogs par/ khong du chud// bdag yod ma yin sems can yod ma yin/ 
377a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba la// byis pa mi mkhas 'di la rnam par rmongs// mkhas pa de dag ji skad tshig smras pa// de la nan tan byed cing kun du gnas// dul zhing zhi la rtag tu
377a7(dkon brtsegs): skyon rnams spangs// rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dga'// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe
377a8(dkon brtsegs): no// gzungs 'thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang / chos zab mo la mos pa thob pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag par spyod pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi pa de dag na
377b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gang gis sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog
377b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin 'gyur ba// gzungs rnams grags pa chen po de dag gis ni rtag tu 'thob// nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur phyir zhing blo gros rab tu 'phel// de dag ye shes chags pa
377b3(dkon brtsegs): med cing chos kun pha rol phyin// byang chub yan lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed// de dag 'dren pa rnams ni gang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog ston// de dag sdig
377b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs po dag la rten pa mo yin te// tshig byed bad dag nyid me ltar ring du rnam par spong // dpa' bo stong nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo'i chos thos nas// de dag bdag dang
377b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can srog tu lta ba kun mi 'byung // de dag tshul khrim sa skyon med dul zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan// sangs rgyas tshul khrims bla na med la sems can rnams kyang sbyor// yul
377b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong sangs rgyas mthong bas byang chub sems dpa'
377b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong rjes su mthun pa'i chos thos pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / 
377b8(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod
378a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'a'akhor ba nal pad pa rnams dga' bar byed pa 'chas te/ yul khor rgyung can pa dag na byang chub sems dpa'
378a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos so// 'di la 'di na chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gzi brjid kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzad pa'i// 
378a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun du de dag mthong // byang chub dam pa mchog tshol chen sems can dgrol ba'i phyir// dga' zhing gus par gnas na de ltar mi dbang
378a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mchod// 'dren pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su ma thun pa'i chos kyang nyan// thos nas bsam pa thag/ dpas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor// dmigs med
378a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems can med pa dang / 'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyid mi skye/ de ni bdog pa thams cad yongs gtong rtag tu kun 'dzin med/ 
378a6(dkon brtsegs): slong ba nye bar 'ongs pa mthong na sems ni rab tu dga'// grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang // thams cad gtong zhing de yi sems ni gang du'ang g.yo ba med// yul
378a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul
378a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang bkur bsti la blta bar bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar mi bya ba dang / 
378b1(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor stong byang chub sems dpas lus dang / srog la blta bar mi bya ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos ban po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o// 'dil 'don
378b2(dkon brtsegs): ches nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// skyon gyis gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor mo blta// yon tan ldan pa des pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang 'dul/ 
378b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gang du'ang bud med rnams dong skyes padag dang 'dris mi byed// bse ltar gcig pur gnas shing bsam pa dri ming dag la drim bral// de dag rked pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur
378b4(dkon brtsegs): mtheb sa zhun med// 'dod pa chung steng na ngon tsam la/ dga' zhing sgyu dang tshul 'chos spangs// sems can don phyir brtson 'grus yang ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu
378b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas// sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yin tan pha rol phyin// lus dang de bzhin srog la mo lnga sdug pa'i rtsalag rnam spangs te// bsam
378b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor// lus ni dum bu dum bur gcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba med// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid re ba phyir ning brtson 'grus shin
378b7(dkon brtsegs): tu brtan 'dir rtsom// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshul khrims skyon med pa
378b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dgon pa la gnas pa mi gtong ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos
379a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / yul 'khor skyong 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang mthun par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul
379a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong mang du thos pa thob par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung
379a3(dkon brtsegs): ba med par byed pa'i chos so// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing // tshul khrims dri med nor bu
379a4(dkon brtsegs): rin chen 'dra ba bsrung // de dag nga ni khrims ldan legs sdom yin mi sems// tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag/ tu sems can sbyor// de dag stong dgon par rtag tu
379a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas par byed// de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes med// gzugs kun rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa 'dra bar mthong // 'di la skyes pa bud med bdag gi med
379a6(dkon brtsegs): par mthong // 'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo med tshul 'chos med// bag yod de dag bsam pa thag pas rab tu sbyor// thos na yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par
379a7(dkon brtsegs): byed// bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthun chen don du gnyer// skye rga 'chi bas bcom zhing nad kyis gzir gyur pa// 'gro ba mgon med srid pa'i btson ra 'dir bltas nas// 
379a8(dkon brtsegs): ni bdam pa mchog go chos kyi gru sbyar te// sring pa'i rgya mtsho'i chulas skye ba sgrol bar byed// 'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten 'khyam pas skyabs mgon dang // dpung gnyen byed pa
379b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyis// bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgrol zhes// de phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam gdab// yul 'khor skyong
379b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas bzhi po 'di dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ bde 'gro thob ste de yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba phrad pa dang / bla ma la srid zhu byed
379b3(dkon brtsegs): do/ de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis bsten pa dang / pas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ste de yang rnyed pa dang bkur bstil mi lta ba dang / spobs pa thob ste de yang
379b4(dkon brtsegs): zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byad chub sems dpas bzhi po de dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de
379b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bya'o// brtan pa nags tshal su la na rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag rtag tu khor mo sa rnyed pa don gnyer min// chags med blo can rtag
379b6(dkon brtsegs): tu stobs dang ldan pa yin// zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing spros pa rnams dang bral// rtag tu khor mor bla ma rnams la sri zhu byed// de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin de dag sbyor// 
379b7(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyes par byed// rgyal ba'i ye shes ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed// grags pa chen po rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur// lha mi rnams
379b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tu sems can 'dzud// dge ba bcu po dag la'ang yang dag sbyor bar byed// sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag
380a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' 'gyur te// de dag ring por mi thogs dang nye bar 'gyur// de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas// sems can khrag
380a2(dkon brtsegs): khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'grol// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos te/ bzhi
380a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhini/ khong khro ba med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / khabasags dang thob kyis 'jal ba yongs su spangs te dgon par gnas pa dang / bdog
380a4(dkon brtsegs): pathams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang / nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul pa mo tshol ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi pa
380a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka
380a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa na// thab dri ma med cing khro sems med// de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed ma yin// g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing spros sems med// 
380a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim gyi blo gros yang mya ngan rtsa// skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin ring 'gyur ba// spangs te de la mi lta rab byung nas// thar pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed// dgon pa bas mtha'
380a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brten pa na// shes khe 'thob pa kun la mi rten zhing // lus dang srog la'ang lta bar mo byed la// sang ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal// byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol
380b1(dkon brtsegs): ban ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed cing // rtag tu bya ltar sogs pa spangs nas na// 'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no// dper na bse ltar gcig pu gnas byed cing // se
380b2(dkon brtsegs): ge lta bur 'jigs pa yod ma yin// ri dgas lta bur sar 'jigs yid mi rten// de ni mchod pas khengs par 'gyur ba med// g.yang sar ltung ba'i 'gro ba 'ang ltas nas// rab tu
380b3(dkon brtsegs): thar ba ba phyir 'bad par byed// gal te ngag yed dge ba'i chos spyod na// bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di yi dpung gnyen 'gyur// mi mchog spyad pa 'di dag 'dod pa na// 'dzum pa
380b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis rab snyan tshig smra zhing // sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rlom sems med// rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med/ par gnas// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med la mos
380b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas kun la sgyu ma lta bur rtog/ yangs pa'i blo can zhingang dul la dga'// de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i ro yis mguci nas byang chub lam ni grub med cing // de ni rtag
380b6(dkon brtsegs): tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong // gzungs dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na// yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag bzod// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di bltas nas// gang zhig
380b7(dkon brtsegs): du gnyer ba de dag 'gyur// gang zhig byang chub 'dil ma mos paso// blo chung de na nyes pa brgya yang bskyed// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i g.yangs ste/ 
380b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ yul la khar srung ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yangs dang / yul 'khor skyong byas pa mi bzo nang gsol brten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
381a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi g.yangs dang / yul 'khor skyong rnyed pa dang bkur bstil chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yangs dang / yul 'khor skyong tshul
381a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chos pa dang kha bsags gis rnyed pa dang bkur bsti bsgrub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang
381a3(dkon brtsegs): sa'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'phags pa bla med rnam dang pha ma lo// de dag rtag tu gus pa med pa yin// de dag byas pa
381a4(dkon brtsegs): mi bzo g.yo can te// rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams spyod cing rmongs// rnyed la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste// de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor dga'// kha cig tshul
381a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims brtul shugs ji ltar kyang // 'di ni bdag dang mtshungs pa med ces smra// de dag phan tshun sdang bar/ sems pa ste// glags tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin/ 
381a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag zhing gi las dang tshong la dga'// de dag dge sbyong yon tan shin tu ring // phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i// dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab ring ba// de dag 'tshang
381a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dru ba dang 'thab pa dang // phrag dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par byed// byang chub lam las rtag par shin tu ring // 'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin tu ring // 'phags
381a8(dkon brtsegs): lam gya nom rnam par spangs nas ni// de dag 'gro ba sngar ni 'khyam par 'gyur// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i
381b1(dkon brtsegs): chos te/ banag shen/ yul 'khar snyeng le lo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed par chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma dang pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
381b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong nga rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong pha rol gyi mchod pa/ 
381b3(dkon brtsegs): la phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
381b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la dgegs byed pa'i chos so// de nas bcomalda na 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag pa/ yul to// mdad le lo rtag tu rmongs pa'i sems// de
381b5(dkon brtsegs): dag mngon pa'ing can rtag tu khro// bzod ldan rtag brtson dade/ slong mthong nas ni// gtsug lag khang nas 'gre tshed/ khrug pas brdeg/ pha rol mchod phyir 'don phrag dog ste/ 
381b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag sems ni gnas pa yodang ma yin// glags lnga byed cing 'khrul pa tshol ba can// sul 'khrul yod gang la gleng bya snyam// de dag yi bstan pa 'di las ring // de dag yon
381b7(dkon brtsegs): tan sdang zheng ngan song gzhol// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni// ngan song shin tu mi zad 'bar bar 'gro/ de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang // chos man ldan 'gro
381b8(dkon brtsegs): rab sdig 'dir thos nas// rtag tu khor mar byang chub lam la sbyor// ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar gyur ta re// sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che// bskal pa bye mang brgya
382a1(dkon brtsegs): lam 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar ngal bdam pa rnyed pa la// gal te thar 'dod pag med spang bar gyis// yul 'khor skyong gang zag
382a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya ba ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gang zag bsten pararo mi bya ba dang / 
382a3(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos spang ba'i gang zag bsten
382a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems da dpas zang zing la brkam pa'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
382a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas brten par mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rnam spong zhing / 
382a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byed pa// de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel// dper na mkha' la zla ba yang ngo bzhin// dmigs par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang // bdag dang srog
382a7(dkon brtsegs): dang gso bar zhen pa dang // de dag dug phyis bzhin du rtag tu spang // gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi gnyer// gang dag mi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos// 'dod chags bral ba'i
382a8(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsi mthun spong ba// de dag dper nang na sngags rdzibazhin spang // gang zhig byang chub dam pa mtshang rgya 'dod// zang zing dag dang chos gas lhung bzed chags// rtag tu khyim la 'dris
382b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed 'artson pa// de dag rnams dang 'dres par mi bya ste// de dag me yi 'ongs bzhin spang bar bya// gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang // 'khor lo dam pad+ma med bskor ba dang / 
382b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sems can don yangs byed 'dod pa// des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya// gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// de yis rnyed dang sdug dang mi sdug dang // grags
382b3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'chang 'dru phrag dgang spangs te// sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin par chos te/ 
382b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug pa sngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong drag/ 
382b5(dkon brtsegs): dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' na/ mas kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yu la 'khor skyong ma mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
382b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang / bzod pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam
382b7(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su
382b8(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba// de la mo shes pas ni brnyas byed na// des na de ni sdug
383a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mtha' yas rnyed// yang bas na gang dag longs spyod tshul// shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dong // gang zhig rtag tung rgyal khengs
383a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur la// bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mo 'dud cing // sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min pa// chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med// bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de moms// sdig
383a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa// do ni mi nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas// las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs// dmyal ba'am 'on te dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam// yid btags/ 
383a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed// gang zhig 'jig rten smin 'gyur blo ldan zhing // mi'i dnga'abo sdug dbasngal mthar 'byin pa// de yis ngan song lam rnams rab
383a5(dkon brtsegs): spangs te// byang chub lam ni rtag tu bsten par bya// / bam po gnyis pa/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
383a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol la brnyas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis bsgom pa la sbyor ba dang mtshan ma'i 'du
383a7(dkon brtsegs): shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang ye shes dang bral ba dang bag med pa la brten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba
383a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching
383b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad nga 'di dag bka' stsal to// rtag tu gzhan dag lan brnyas byed tsang // rtag tu 'jig rten pa yis bsam gtan bsgom// ltar
383b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur 'di dag gis ni de btsangs te// glang po lus ring 'dam du song ba bzhin// khyim la 'dres byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang // gang dag bag ming rtag tu kun 'dzin sems// ye shes spangs
383b3(dkon brtsegs): shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa// mi rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings// gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jig pa 'di dag dang // skye rgan 'chil sogs las grol 'dod// brnyas par byed
383b4(dkon brtsegs): dang rlom sems bor nas ni// byang chub la ma la rtag tu brtson bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal mtha' yas ma lus bzod bya ste// bde ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas// sdug dang
383b5(dkon brtsegs): mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang // brtan pa dag ni sdig bra la sangs rgyas 'gyur// pha rol phyin drugs dang / yon tan dang // stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyor/ 
383b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur na// 'gro ba 'dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// bskal pa bsam gyis mo khyab sngon spyod tshe// sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don du// sbyin dang / 
383b7(dkon brtsegs): dul dang nges la rtag tu spyad// gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par 'gyur// bas mtha'i nags su rtag par dga' ba ste// byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par sbyang // brgya lam na
383b8(dkon brtsegs): yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur// skyes chen rnams kyi ye shes de 'dra'o// srid pa'i brtson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyams pas// sems can 'khyam pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni// sngon chad
384a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni snying rje rgya chen bskyed// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub dam pa bsgrungs// bskal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing // rang gi bu pho bu mo chung ma/ 
384a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug/ phangs pa'i srog dang shin tu 'byor pa dang // grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang po gtang // me tog 'bras bu chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'o// nags su thub pang ni bzod dgar gyur// 
384a3(dkon brtsegs): su mtshan rgyal pos lag pa rkang pa bcad// de cheng ni sdang ba'i yid ma gyur// nags dang sul na sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i// thub pas bla ma rgas pa gso ba na// mi yi dbang pos
384a4(dkon brtsegs): sra ba'i mangs bsnun kyang // yid ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur// legs par gsungs pa'i ched du g.yangs nas// lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongs par/ 
384a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// nga ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu yi phyir// lu/ sa dang srog la bltas par ma gyur to// stag mo dru dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir// lus btang nas ni rtag mo
384a6(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byas// na mkha' las ni lnga'i tshogs rnams kyis// skyes chen brtson 'grus brten pa legs shes bsgrags// gang tshe sngon chad srid par spyod pa na// sbyin la
384a7(dkon brtsegs): rab dga' bram ze khye gyur tshe// rin chen ched du rgya mtsho bskams nas ni// nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas// rgyal po zla ba'i bu zhes bya gyur te// brjod pa grags
384a8(dkon brtsegs): shing ngan spyod pa'i tshe// nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgya// bsad par byas pa myur du thar par byas// dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba yi mo mthong nas// nga yis phangs
384b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lus ni btang byas te// nga yis nor rnyed de ni drug por byas// de tsheng ni kun skyon rgyal por gyur// nga 'dir ma yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe// skyabs su 'ongs pa 'jug rnon mthong/ 
384b2(dkon brtsegs): nas ni// rang gi lus las sha yang bcang byas te// rang lus ngas btang 'jigs pas phongs ma btang // rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur tshe// sman pa mchog gis nga yi ched du
384b3(dkon brtsegs): ni// mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang // srog btang ngas ni de dag gzhan la byin// 'gro ba'i don phyir sngon chad spyod pa na// rgyal bu mche ba bzang zhes bya gyur tshe// 
384b4(dkon brtsegs): chung ma ma dris khyod las mi 'phyo ba// bur bcas bu mom chags ma bltas btang // gang tshe brtson 'grus 'a dbar zhes byar gyur tshe// nga sngon lo ni stong du chang bar yang // 
384b5(dkon brtsegs): bya dka' brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas// nor dang dang la yang sngon chad ngas btang ngo // rgyal bu gzi brdzi da dri ma med gyur tshe// nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod/ 
384b6(dkon brtsegs): rten bdun// mchog tu gus pas las la mi btang ste// stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la mchod pa byas// nga ni rgyal po zla 'od gyur pa'i tshe// mi bzad mig can khros par gyur nas ni// / 
384b7(dkon brtsegs): de yis nga yi mgo bo bslangs pas na// de tshe nga yis mgo bo bcad de byin// nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes byar gyur tshe// grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang sgo// thams cad du
384b8(dkon brtsegs): yang rgya cher sman gyi rnams// de dag sems can don phyir ngas bzhag go/ srid pa rnams ni spyod pa gang gi tshe// nga sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa na// bud med gzugs bzang
385a1(dkon brtsegs): gser dang mu tog gis// lus brgyan stong dgangs ni btang ba byas// gang ched sngon ma yi rgyal ba na// rin chen gtsug bung gyur
385a2(dkon brtsegs): spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa yi// tsid pan dpal ldan dam pangs btang ngo // sngon rgyal ba mes ldan gyur badzin// shing bar 'dab ma lam
385a3(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma'i 'dab mnyen lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i// lag pa rkang pa dag kyang ngas btang ngo // ded dpon seng gi 'dzin du gyur pa ni// snying rje med cing mi bzang rab gtum pa/ 
385a4(dkon brtsegs): srin mo brgyang ga shin tu char bcad nas// rgya shug glidu ma rnams bkod par gyur// gang tshe mig bzung zhes dbyar gyur pa na// byis pa 'dod dang ldan ning ying rmongs pa/ 
385a5(dkon brtsegs): srin mo dag lan chung 'du shes pa// tshong ba lnga brgyadad/ gzar par byas// gang che bsod nams 'od zer chu ra ba ni// lha la bu me lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa// bung
385a6(dkon brtsegs): med bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su// rgyal ba'i bstan pa la ni rab tu byung // sems can don byar ngan spyod pan// dri ming dag pa'i gser gyi mdog can gyi// rgyal por gang che
385a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa na// sor me dra bas 'brel ba rgya chen btang // rgyal po ut+pal mig ces byar gyur che// badz+rI ldan pa bzang ba'i mngag 'dra'i tshig/ yang du'ang ning snying du sdug gyur pa// 9
385a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don dung yis btang ba byas// sman pa'i rgyal po sgra 'drar gyur pa'i tshe// sdug dang bral bas nyen pa mthong nas ni// bud med cha byad gzugs dang blo nyams pa// nges ni snying rjes
385b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su thar pa byas// sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur pa na// nad kyis btab pa nang pa'i ma mthong nas// nga yis rang gi khrag kyang byin 'gyur te// mdengs ni nad dang bral bar byas/ 
385b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po me tog bzang zhes byar gyur tshe// nga yis lus las rus pa phyung nas ni// nad kyis rid par gyur la rkang byin te// ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo // rgyal po don grub ces
385b3(dkon brtsegs): byar sngon gyur tshe// rang gi mdzad rnams thams cad ngas btang zhing // phangs shing yid du 'ong ba'i srog btang ste// phongs par gyur pa'i mo ni thar bar byas// rgyal po phyogs kyi tog tu
385b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i tshe// byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/ 'khor lo'i mtshan can pad+ma lta bu yi// lag pa phrugs kyang mi blta rab tu byin// rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur
385b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe// snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don phan 'dod de// skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa yi// gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang ba byas// rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan
385b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur tshe// 'jam zhing mnyan la dri med dka' ba'i brla// dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis bcad nas ni// rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no// bud med gzugs ldan zhes ni byar gyur tshe// bud
385b7(dkon brtsegs): med bkres skom nyam thag ngas mthong nas// gser ltar ser zhing shin tu gzhan pa yi// nu ma snying du sdug pa gnyi ga btang // rgyal po dpal grags zhes byar gyur pa na// shin tu nyams dga' ba
385b8(dkon brtsegs): yi rgyan mchog dang // rin chen du ma gos dang shing rta bzhin// btang bar dka' ba rnam bdu ma btang // rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral// rin
386a1(dkon brtsegs): chen phyir ni de yis nga mig phyung // 'on kyang ngal khros pa'i sems med do// srog chags go d+har sngon srid gyur pa'i tshe// grog sbur dag ni 'chi
386a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur dogs nas// lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang bar byas// de che nga yi sems ni g.yo ba med// spyad pa spyod tshe ba sreg gyur pa na// rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtag dga' ste// nga ni
386a3(dkon brtsegs): rim 'gro gus la rab tu dga'// nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med// skyabs su 'ongs pa'i don phyir nga yis ni// snying rje bskyed pa byas nas lus btang ste// gdol pa mi yis mda' rnams
386a4(dkon brtsegs): bsnun kyang ni// spre'u gyur ngas ni mi de ma btang ngo // rgyal bo dbang du gyur tsheng yis ni// glang po bla ma rgan dran lus bskams te// shin tu yid 'ongs zas kyang ngas ma zos// de tshe/ 
386a5(dkon brtsegs): glang po bdag nyid thar par gyur// bgrod dga' gangs/ can ril dred dbang gyur// nga yis zhag bdun bar du/ bsrungs pa'i mi// de yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang // 
386a6(dkon brtsegs): ngas ni de tshe khong khro byas pa med// kha ba kun da 'dra ba'i glang por gyur// byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol// dug dang bcas pa'i mda' yis bsnun kyang ni// mche ba dam pa
386a7(dkon brtsegs): byin gyi khros pa med// dum bu'i gling du nags tshal spyod yul ba// sreg pa'i phrug gu byams la gnas gyur tshe// mthong ba tsam gyis me de zhi gyur nas// lha tshogs dag gis me tog rnams
386a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang gtor// ri dgas gyur tshe gang+gA'i rlabs shugs kyis// khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgril byas pa// de yis gsod phyir ngagan khrod de 'ongs// 'on kyang nga ni de la yid ma khros// rgya mtshor
386b1(dkon brtsegs): dbus son te mgon med pa// tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas nas// bkres pa de dag rnams kyis gsod gyur tshe// rus sbal skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan// nga ni byang chub spyad pa/ 
386b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa na// sngon chad chun rgyu ba'i nyar gyur tshe// sems can phan phyir nga yis lus btang ste// srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur// srog chags nges par gang tshe gyur pa na// 
386b3(dkon brtsegs): nad brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni// lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur byas te// sems can bde zhing nad kyang med par byas// ri dgas rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe// mthu stobs/ 
386b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur cing snying rje ldan// mda' yis bsnun kyang khros pa'i sems med de// de tshe gsod lang yis bya mas pa byas// dung dang ba mo lta bu'i rta rgyal du// nga sngon rgya
386b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshe'i ngogs su gyur pa'i tshe// srin mo'i nang du song ba'i tshong pa rnams// nga yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub spya dang spyod tshe// 
386b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dab chags kun lar ni nga gyur tshe// 'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs nas// bud med dbang dung ni song ma gyur// gel ba nags gnas ri bong gyur pa'i tshe// legs spyad
386b7(dkon brtsegs): bong tshogs gyur de la bstan// thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkres phongs na// de yi ched dungs ni gnas kyang btang // sdong po me tog 'bras rgyas ne tshe'i tshe// sdong po bskams kyang
386b8(dkon brtsegs): ngas ni de ma btang // de tshe brgya byin byas gzongs mthong nas// sdong po de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas// nga ni sgra yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe// mi yi rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste// sgra
387a1(dkon brtsegs): ma tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas// rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dgangs bstan no// nga sngon ne tser gyur te pa ma phyir// sA lu blangs
387a2(dkon brtsegs): mi yis bzung nas ni// ne co co phyir nga yi sA lu len// lo tog smon 'di ma rungs byar sems sam// ne tse des smras bzang po gsan du gsol// bdag gi rku bas khyod kyi 'bras mo len/ 
387a3(dkon brtsegs): pha ma rgan rgon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir// de la snying rje bdag gis sA lu blangs// gang tshe thog ma sa bon 'debs pa yi// 'gro ba kun la cha shas sbyin no zhes// de skad tshig smras de ni/ 
387a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag zos te// des na bdag ni rku ba gzhan mi 'gyur/ ne tse legs so sA lu ci dag 'khyer// sri nu 'din mi yi nang na dkon// khyod na ma yin 'dir dud 'gro yin// 
387a5(dkon brtsegs): legs so khyod ni dul zhing yang dag bsdams// byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na// sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs ba rnams// spyod pa'i tshe na dka' ba brgya la yang // nga
387a6(dkon brtsegs): yi yid ni skyo bar gyur pa med// nang gi ngag gam 'on te phyi yang rung // nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang med// tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan
387a7(dkon brtsegs): thabs dang shes rab ngas spyad do// sha dang lpags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag/ de dag rang gis lus las sbyin pa byas// bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe// ngas ni de tshe lus ni
387a8(dkon brtsegs): bskams par byas// nga la sbyar na rgyal bar 'gyur ba yi// sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad po// sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te// sngan spyod chen pa ni rtag tu 'jug
387b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod ba'i cha na nga yis gang bsten pa// brtul zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang // spyod pa 'ang thos nas ni de dag rnams// tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro// 28
387b2(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur nas de yi tshe na ni// bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur// de dag zas dang 'khrig pa lhur len cing // rtag tu gnyid non khwa ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags
387b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin chos la sdang // bstan ba sun par byed cing yon tan nyams// zhi ba'i chos 'di thos par gyur pa na// 'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes 'dzer// nga yi slob dpon thos// 
387b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rgya mtshor gyur// mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yin// de yis 'di ni rnam pa ji ltar yang // sangs rgyas da bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas// pha rol las
387b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang rgan par gyur de yi// bla ma de ni dpag med yon tan chung // des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyis/ 'di lam 'jug pa 'di ni nor ba yin// gang la bdag
387b6(dkon brtsegs): yod ma yin srog med dang // rnam pa cis kyang gang zag med bstan pa// tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la// gang 'bad med ngal byed pa don med 'gyur// gal te
387b7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po yod na ni// 'di la bdag dang sems can sheng skyes med// gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa// de la bdag gis ngal byas don med 'gyur// sdig
387b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs pas// rang gi blo yis rang bzo byed pa ste// dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni// tshig 'di gsung bar nam yang mi 'byung ngo // ngo tsha
388a1(dkon brtsegs): khrel da la mang bral ba dang // blta rgyun ma chel dang brgyam nang // drag dgang rgyal rgyags pachag pas// dge slong kun pa bsta/ 
388a2(dkon brtsegs): la 'byung // lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdob byed cing // chos gos grab rnams kyang ni dkyog par byed// chos gos thogs shing chang dang rgyags myos nas// grong dang khyim dag du ni rnam par rgyu// 
388a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni// khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo bsnyen par byed// bstan pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs nas// de dag rtag tu phrin yig khyer bar byed// 
388a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa lang rta dang bong bu dang // de dag phrugs dang branamo bran po bsrel// shing gi las dang tshong gi sbyar ba la// / brtson yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin// de dag
388a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags min chags kyang mi smra med// bya ba ma yind/ yang gang yang med// de dag rnams la mchod rten no/ dang ni// dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag nor dang mtshungs/ 
388a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthang nas ni// de dag la yang mi snyan brjod byed de// tshul khrims 'chal pa slu bzhugs nas ni// bud med 'jigs byed mi bzad rab ces brjod// rab tu
