388a7(dkon brtsegs): byung ba de dag bskam pa ltar// khyim pa 'dod pas bskam pa de lta min// khyim pa mtshungs pa de dag chung ma dang // bu dang bu mo dag kyang yod par 'gyur// gang gi khyim du de dag ches
388a8(dkon brtsegs): gos dang // lus dang longs spyang dag gis bsnyen bkur ga/ de'i chung ma las na yongs chags shing // nyon mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa min// 'dod pa 'di dag bsnyen byam yin/ 
388b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ dud 'gro yang btags dmyal bar ltung byed ces// de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra nang // de dag bdag nyid mdul nyer na min// ji ltar de dag bdag nyid mdul ba// de dag slob ma
388b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyang rab ma dul// kha zas dag dang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la// de dag nyin dang mtshan du 'gro bar byed// ston pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir min te// de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba/ 
388b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin 'gro bas rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas// rang gi slob ma tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor// de dag skye ba rnams la smra ba ni// bdag gis snying rjes 'di dag sdung byed kyi/ 
388b4(dkon brtsegs): slob ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni// rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra// de la nad kyis non dang mdzen mang // lus la sha bkra can dang gzugs mi sdug/ rtag
388b5(dkon brtsegs): tu 'phags min mi dag kha cig kyang // 'ongs shing lha ga pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur// lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams// de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson
388b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong min// de dag spangs pa dur khrod shing dang mtshungs// de dag so sor thar dang bslab pa dang // 'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur// de dag rang nyams
388b7(dkon brtsegs): rang dbang 'gro ba ste// lcags kyu btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra// de dag nags su gnas par gyur kyang ni// sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste// nyon mongs me yis rtag tu
388b8(dkon brtsegs): rab gdungs la// de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang // bslabs dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang brjod nas ni// rgyags dang nga rgyal
389a1(dkon brtsegs): grags pa yongs rgyas te// de dag mi ba mnar med ltung bar 'gyur// de dag rgyal ba'i gtam lartag dga' dang // rkun pa ga
389a2(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa la'ang rtag tu dga'// nye du bsten la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste// de dganyin dang mtshan du sems par byed// bsam gtan dang ni/ khadon btang nas su// rtag tu gtsug lag
389a3(dkon brtsegs): khang gi las la brtson// gnas la bskam zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed// de dag slob ma 'khor kyang mdul ba// nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag gi gla/ bdag gi ched du 'din
389a4(dkon brtsegs): ngas byas te// dge slong gang dgang yi rjes mthun pa/ gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do// ga dug tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan// chos 'dzin skye
389a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don la mngon brtson la// dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa// de dag rnams ni sdug par rma byed do// 'di ni nga yi gnas su bskos pa ste// 'di
389a6(dkon brtsegs): ning yi lhan gcig gnas pa yin// 'di ni nga yi dga' bar byed pa yin// khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyi song // 'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de// mal cha rnams
389a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma lus bgos zin la// 'di ni rnyed par 'byung ba yod ma yin// 'dir ni ci zhig spyod kyis dge slong song // de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba// nam du srid par 'byung ba ma yin te// 
389a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag khyim pa lta bu sogs 'gyur zhing // 'chog chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus nang yi bu de dag/ kun tu smad ba byas par gyur pa ni// de dag nga yi
389b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig ni dran 'gyur te// bas mtha' dag dang nags su de tshe gnas// kye hud rnyed pas zil non yon tan sdang // dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa// rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag / 
389b2(dkon brtsegs): ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur// byi dus tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag/ rtag par yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ba ste// de dgra grong drang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams/ 
389b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par 'gyur// 'byed dang zug zer thab mo dga' ba dang // yon tan nyams la rtag tu bsti stang byed// de dag skye ba'i ston par grags gyur te// de dag
389b4(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur// 'dir ning yi bsta/ ngan pa yon tan gter// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba// 'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog
389b5(dkon brtsegs): dang rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur/ ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas brum pa dang // pad+ma'i/ rdzing bu yongs su bskams pa dang // rin chen mchod sdong
389b6(dkon brtsegs): chag par gnas pa ltar// phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i chos// rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu mi bzang tshe// dge slong dul ba ma yin de
389b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba/ de dag nga yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin// spyod pa 'di la rten par dga' ba rnams// de dag bzang 'gro ga la yod de ring // 'di nas shi 'phos yid btags 'gro ba dang // dud
389b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas// lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa// mi bzad drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur// ci ste de yis mi yi lus rnyed kyang // rtag tu sdug
390a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur// sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la rtag brten pa// long ba'am 'on pa'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur// lus la rtag tu
390a2(dkon brtsegs): sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur// gang zhig ya nga'i spyod pa bsten pa ni// de la su yang yid rton mi 'gyur te// de yi tshig la yid ches/ 
390a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur zhing // de ni rtag tu sma 'bab par yang 'gyur// de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs// mtshan dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun// bkres dang skom pa'i 'jigs
390a4(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su gdungs// yang na de ni rtag par rab tu rnyas// sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni// // nges pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod bor ba// legs pa'i
390a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod la rtag tu brten par gyis// 'di nas phyin chad 'gyo dpar gyur te re// gang zhig sangs rgyas tshogs dang / 'phags tshogs dang // bslab dang sbyang ba'i chos la dga'
390a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// gnyen dang rnyed dang grags brjod spang byos la// de ltar rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis// 'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang // 'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang // 
390a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa kun dang mi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing // 'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtogs la// pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la// rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis// ji srid byang chub
390a8(dkon brtsegs): mchog sangs ma rgyas pa// de sring brtson 'grus nam yang nyams ma byas// gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'i// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sem
390b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag pal cher la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ mi
390b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dag ni mi shes pa dag la bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ zang zing la dga' bar 'gyur zhing / chags pa mang ba dang / khyim la ser sna byed pa dang / g.yo dang ldan pa dang / 
390b3(dkon brtsegs): bya khwa ltar mu cor smra ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / nye du lhur len par 'gyur/ phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas rnyed pa bsgrub par 'gyur/ rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ 
390b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag grong du 'jug go sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yi na par 'gyur/ de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag
390b5(dkon brtsegs): la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes par 'gyur snyam du bdag shes pa dang ldan par kha sa 'che bar 'gyur/ ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin
390b6(dkon brtsegs): du zhes med par 'gyur/ snod chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa dang / sbyor ba nyams pa dang / mi shes pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos 'gro ba
390b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pas ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang / rang dgar byed pa dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang 'gro ba byed pas bstan
390b8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur/ yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang / chos mnyan pa don du mi gnyer bar 'gyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur
391a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang
391a2(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur na/ ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag dge sbyong ngo zhes bdag nyid khas
391a3(dkon brtsegs): 'che bar 'gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong nga ni gang zag de lta bu de dag la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa yang mi smra na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lta ga la zhig/ de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring
391a4(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub lta smos kyang tsa dgos yul 'khor skyong gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa/ 'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ngan
391a5(dkon brtsegs): song gsum du skye ba dang / mtha' 'khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang / dbul po'i khyim du skye ba dang / rigs dma' bar skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang / 
391a6(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / nad mang ba dang / yang bam spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong chos brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub kyi bar chad
391a7(dkon brtsegs): byed par brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshig gis khas 'che ba lang byang chub ces mi smra'o// tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// g.yo byed pa la
391a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// zang zing lhur len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongasu dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// shes rab 'chal pa la/ 
391b1(dkon brtsegs): thetsom gcod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dgang zhes nga mi smra'o// mi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs thob ces nga mi smra'o// yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongs su
391b2(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba la bde 'gro thob ces nga mi smra'o// khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// spyod lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang phrad pab zhes nga mi smra'o// khyim la chags
391b3(dkon brtsegs): pal ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// mgus pa la sems yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// tshong mi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa
391b4(dkon brtsegs): la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes nga mi smra'o// yul 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la smad pa ltar ston pa dru ga la de ltar nga ma smod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni
391b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du smra ba la gzhan du byed pa'o// lha dang bcas pa 'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 
391b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can// mgus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che// nyon mongs zil nan tha ba nyon mongs bcas// de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring // chags
391b7(dkon brtsegs): ngas zil gyis nan na le lo 'phel// le los zil gyis non na dad pa nyams// dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams// tshul khrims 'chal par gyur na bzang 'gro nyams// dbul/ 
391b8(dkon brtsegs): bor gyur pas rab tu byung gyur te// mchod pa rnyed nas dngul las 'grol bar gyur// de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su// gse ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs// rnyed don du
392a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyer bas dgon par 'gro// der song nas kyang gos dang nye du tshol// mngon shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs// bor nas denin phyir yang
392a2(dkon brtsegs): nye du 'dzin// rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan songs// mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang // dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long ba dang // mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin
392a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos// bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams// g.yang sa chen po ma bzang ltung bar 'gyur// de nas skal pa bye bar thar pa med// gal te 'dir
392a4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'thob pas byang chub na// de phyir lhas sbyin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob// rnam par mthor rlung gis ni bya lta dang ltar// chags pas kyang ni mi ltar mi rigs so// 
392a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung ma chags// tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams// byang chu/ ba sems kyis ye shes gang ma thob// de dag bstan la
392a6(dkon brtsegs): mi dgos dur shing bzhin// byang chub don nyer sangs rgyas chos tshol ba// dper na thar pa de bzhin mi gnas so// de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam bcas ltar// nga rgyal zil non byang
392a7(dkon brtsegs): chub de 'dra'o// byang chub don du gnyer bas chos tshig phyir// nga yis rang gi srog ni phangs pa'ang btang // chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa// don med gyur nas bstan
392a8(dkon brtsegs): las ltung bar 'gyur// ngan sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir// g.yangs chen po me lce 'bar ltar mchongs// de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa// thams cad rnam par spangs
392b1(dkon brtsegs): te nan tan gnas// bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la// de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skyen// chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod// dper na long ba lam sel med dang
392b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs// yul 'khor skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ tshad
392b3(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu/ 
392b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ste/ na pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na
392b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan ni 'dzam du'i gling dpag tshad drug stong la rgyal srong byed do// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe des
392b6(dkon brtsegs): dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling de na grong khyer nyi khri dang khyim bye ba phrag stong yod do// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan de rgyal po pho brang gang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od zer ldan de grong khyer rin po
392b7(dkon brtsegs): che snang ba zhes bya ba shar nub du tshur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ lho byang rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir rim pa bdun dang / mig mangs ris su bris pas
392b8(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par byas pa yod do// de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba
393a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs bzang ba mdzes blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de btsas ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun
393a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to// rgyal po'i khang bzangs kyi nang du rin po che sna bdun gter mi bcu'i tshad tsam byung bar gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od
393a3(dkon brtsegs): zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad yid rangs par gyur to// sems can gang dag btson ran 'khod pa de dag kyang btson ra nas thar bar gyur to// 
393a4(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer des nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong
393a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gu nga gi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu bso nga nams kyi 'od zer la gzhon nu khyod bag yod gyis shog
393a6(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag par so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ gzhon nu mo rnams kyi srog ni chen po med pa ste tshe 'phos par 'gro ba yin gyis/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta bar
393a7(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis shig ces bskul te/ de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gzhon nu bag med par ni gyur ta re// bag med/ 
393a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang du song bar gyur ta re// bde bar gshegs pas 'og yod rab bstod cing // bad gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams kyang smang // nges pa gang dag 'di na bag yod cing / 
393b1(dkon brtsegs): legs sdom dga' la ser sna byed pa dang // sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan// de dag ring po mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang / 
393b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di na da ltar dag gang ma byon// de dag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags// bag yod lam nyid la yang shin tu gnas// bza' dang btung dang gos dang kha zas dang // gser
393b3(dkon brtsegs): dang dngul dang nor bu mu tog dang // bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang // byang chub dam pa 'di ni don du gnyer// rkang pa lag pa de bzhin rna dang sna// slong ba rnams la rab tu
393b4(dkon brtsegs): dgos byin na// byang chub yon tan kun gyis bos ma rdzo gas nas// de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// / rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud med dang // nor rnams
393b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du yang rnam spang ste// 'dus byas gar la blta dang sgyu ma 'dras// 'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis// srog ni brtan pa med de rtag tu g.yo// 
393b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can// brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu ther zug min// gzhon nu 'di la rtag med dge ma yin// ngan 'gror ltung ba'i chen 'di na ni// pa dang ma yang
393b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par byed pa med// de yis dge dang mi dge gang byas pa// de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyu yis skal mang rgya mtshor ni// don med par yang gcig
393b8(dkon brtsegs): gis gcig bsad de// khyod kyis mi phan ma byas ci yang med// don med nyid du nga la brten par gyis// da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chub ni// mtshungs med go 'phang
394a1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa btsal ba'i phyir// rkang dang sha dang lpags pa de bskams kyang // de lta na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems// bde bar gshegs pa 'jub
394a2(dkon brtsegs): bar rnyed par dka'// zhi ba'i chos thos pa yang shin tu dka'// bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi phyogs bsal na// sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs thob// bshes gnyen bzang la
394a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu yongs brten cing // sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis// de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed// lam gol las kyang rtag tu bzlog par byed// brtson 'grus shin tu
394a4(dkon brtsegs): brtan la legs byos te// lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnams spangs nas// rdo rje lta bu snying gi bsam gtan par// sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas par gyis// sngon gyi mi
394a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog dam pa 'od byed pa// kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med pa// tshol ba'i tshe na spyod yul dgon par dga'// khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs// dgon par gnas
394a6(dkon brtsegs): la rtag tu dga' bar gyis// pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen// skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spongs la// lus dang srog la srel bar ma byed par// bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen
394a7(dkon brtsegs): btsal bar gyis// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de nas bzung ste/ lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ nam
394a8(dkon brtsegs): yang rgod par ma gyur/ rtses par ma gyur/ dga' byed par ma gyur/ yongs su spyad par ma gyur/ nam yang bskyed mos tshal du ma song / nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar
394b1(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'dzin nam yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur/ rgyal srid dang / nor dang / khyim dang grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/ de ltar dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar gcig
394b2(dkon brtsegs): bu sems shing gnas par gyur to// nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang / 'jig pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / 
394b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa dang bral ba dang / byis pa 'drid pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba ro bro ba med pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde ba slu ba'i chos can dang / srid pa la mngon par dga' bas chog mi shes pa dang / 
394b4(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi mthun par rnam par sems shing / bdag ni byis pa'i skye bo mo brtson pa'i nang na gnas kyis bdag gis cang mi smra bas 'da' bar bya'o snyam nas de phyogs
394b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/ bag yod pa la sem sa shing sdug pa dang bral bar gcig pu gnas par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis
394b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir sa phyogs zhig tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byas te/ lho dang byang gi ngos su lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so// rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir dril
394b7(dkon brtsegs): bu g.yar ka'i dra ba bros pa/ mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i srog shing bla re dang ldan pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin po che'i srog
394b8(dkon brtsegs): shing stong btsugs so// rin po che'i srog shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa drug khris sbrel to// rin po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas shing rta la phreng ba bye bas sbrel
395a1(dkon brtsegs): to// de dag rlung gis bskyod de bskul na/ 'di sa ste dper na/ rol ma sal snyan brgya stong gi sgra snyan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // 
395a2(dkon brtsegs): lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa gar mkhas pa dbang po dang la dab pa skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// de
395a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag thams cad la rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis khyed nyid mtshan du glu dang gar dang rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing / 
395a4(dkon brtsegs): nas gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya ba ma gtog sra par gtam gzhan ma byed cig/ sems can gang ral yang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smra shig ces bsgo'o// lam
395a5(dkon brtsegs): srang de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la/ ni bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung kha/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa nas gos
395a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal dang / rgyabarten dang / 'tshe ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya
395a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul sil ma dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / nor dang rgyan thams cad
395a8(dkon brtsegs): byin zhing / skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su spyad pa'i phyir rin po che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur to// de'i tshe'i grong khyer gyi dbus su gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir khyim khor yug tu dpag
395b1(dkon brtsegs): tshang tsam yong pa rin po che sna bdun mig mangs ris su bris pa rta babs brgyas rab tu brgyan pa byas so// de'i nang du khang bzangs cag byas te/ der gzhon nu'i longs spyod/ 
395b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so// de'i dbus su bskyed mos tshal byas te/ me tog gi shing ljon pa thams cad dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad dang / rin
395b3(dkon brtsegs): po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkang ngo // yul 'khor skyong bskyed mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas dang ldan pa byas pa 'di lta
395b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel lo// gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs so// rdzing de'i seng ge'i kha
395b5(dkon brtsegs): brgya rtsa brgyad po de nas kyang chu 'bab po// me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar tshwa rnams rtag par rgyun tu rgyas so// khor yug tu yang / 
395b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i shing ljon pas yongs su bskor to// dus thams cad pa'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so// rdzing de'i 'gram du rin po che
395b7(dkon brtsegs): shing ljon pa brgyad brgya bskyed de/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa rnams kyis sbrel cing thams cad du yang shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to// de dag kyang
395b8(dkon brtsegs): rlung gis bskyod cing rlung gis bskul na/ 'di lta ste dper na rol mo'o sol snyan brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'thung ngo // gzhon nu'i lus la sa dang rdul gyis reg tu 'ong ngo zhes rdzing ngo
396a1(dkon brtsegs): steng rin po che'i dra bas bkab par gyur to// de'i tshe khang bzangs der rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te/ 
396a2(dkon brtsegs): khri thams cad kyi steng du yang ras bcos bu lnga brgya bting bar gyur to// gang du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur pa'i khro ron po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phad
396a3(dkon brtsegs): du mi bdun tsam yod pa bshams pa dbus ma der ras bcos pu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to// khri thams cad kyi drung du yang pog bor nas a ka rus bdugs
396a4(dkon brtsegs): shing nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog 'grems par byed de// gser gyi lda ldi bris so// gser gyi pad+ma rab tu dbyangs so// mu tig dang
396a5(dkon brtsegs): nor bu'i dra ba bres so// nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang bar byas so// rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu dbyangs so// rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams/ 
396a6(dkon brtsegs): cad la yang ba dan brgya brgya bshams so// bskyed mos tshal kun du yang nor bu rin po che'i 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa/ 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur te/ 
396a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong bskyed mos tshal de na bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du smra ba/ ne tse dang / ri skegs dang / khrung khrung
396a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / khu byug dang / rma bya dang / ngang ba dang / ngur pa dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shang te'u 'khod do// de dag skad 'byon cing sgra sgrog pa na dga'atshal
396b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi lha rnams rtags par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra 'thung ngo // gnon nu tshangs spya bya byar ra rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ro rnam pa lnga brgya pa'i khams rnams rtag par
396b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyun du bshams par gyur to// de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu drug lon pa lo nyi shu lon pa'i shed dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer du btsud do// thams
396b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas kyi bya ba shes pa thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang 'chog chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu grong khyer der btsud par gyur to// 
396b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma gnyis kyis de la bu mo bye ba byin no// nye du tshogs kyis bye ba dang / grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang / rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin
396b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ de dag thams cad gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa sha stag go// tha ma sa cad kyang na chod lo bcu drug lon pa glu mkhas pa
396b6(dkon brtsegs): rol mo'i sgra mkhas pa gar mkhas pa rgod mkhas pa/ skyes pa'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa drang ba/ gzhon pa mnyen pa yan lag 'jam pa/ gsong por smra ba bzhin
396b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum tshul mkhas pa sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi bya ba la mkhas pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang
396b8(dkon brtsegs): yang mi dkar ba/ ha cing yang mi sngo ba/ kha nas me tog ut+pa la'i gsung 'byung ba/ lus rnam las can dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ lha'i bu mo ltar gsal ba shin tu yid du
397a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba'i tshul dang ldan pa glu dbyangs len pa de dag gi nang na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gnas so// gru dbyangs dang / 
397a2(dkon brtsegs): rol mo'i sgra de las/ kye ma 'o bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste/ blta bar mi bya'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed do// 
397a3(dkon brtsegs): de de'i tshe 'di lta ste dper na bsad par bya ba'i mis mthong na/ ngo mtshar gyi sems mi bskyed pa de bzhin du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang bud med de dag mthong na
397a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshar du mi 'dzin to// grong khyer de la yang grogs dang da lhan cig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to// lo bcu po de/ dag gi bar du bdag na zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam
397a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par 'gyur snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing des bdag ra bar gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma
397a6(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par nam yang gzugs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur te/ sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to// de nas/ 
397a7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od zer ldan la lha gzhon nu ni mi rol to// dgyes par mi mdzad do// dgyes dgur mi spyod do zhes smras so// bam po
397a8(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa ste tha ma'o// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ gdong las
397b1(dkon brtsegs): mchim 'dzag cing lus 'ang te mya ngan gyis sa la skyel to// des las langs nas rgyal bu gnon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bu gcig rin chen dam par
397b2(dkon brtsegs): la ltos shig spros// nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nas sa la 'gyel// su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myu rang la smros// de 'dir de'ur chad pa chen pas gcad par bya// khyed kyi ched du
397b3(dkon brtsegs): ngas 'dir yid kyis gang smras pa// lha yi khyim ltar nyams dag 'grong khyer deng ltos shig/ 'di la yan lag mched ci yod de mur smros// brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan/ 
397b4(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyams thag pa// lha'i bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos// mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses// ci phyir zug rngus zug bzhin
397b5(dkon brtsegs): lus dman sems shing 'dud// de dag rab dga' tshul mkha/ sa dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan// glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes// khyod dag 'dus la deng
397b6(dkon brtsegs): bab mya ngan ma byed cig/ pad+ma rnyings pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman// me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas bskyed mos tshal// sna tshogs steng bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra// soms
397b7(dkon brtsegs): shig khyod kyi na tshed 'dini thog ma yin// dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis deng 'dir bu dgar gyis// khyod kyi khrus chen rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra// ut+pa la dang pad+ma dag gi tshal gyis gang // 
397b8(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma rnams kyang bung brgyags pa mchog gis brgyan// de la bu sems su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed// ngang pa rma byan tso khru drug ri skegs dang // ka la bing ka shang shang te'u dang kun la// mid
398a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ong sgra ldan gang nye spos dang ldan 'dra ba// thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur// gzhal med khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu
398a2(dkon brtsegs): gtsugs// gser dang bai DUr+yas spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra// rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba// gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i phreng ba sgra snyan pa// zab cing brtan pa
398a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi sil snyan sgra bsgrags pa// khyed kyi ched du srang rnams su yang sbyin rgya che// bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa// dga' tshal lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrogs/ 
398a4(dkon brtsegs): mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir// rnam pa dar g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'di la dga' mi byed// gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsed grogs lta bu'i bu 'dra ba// bu mo de
398a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis// khyod kyi pa dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug/ skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci// 'dus byas yid byung
398a6(dkon brtsegs): dor ba'i longs spyod don mi gnyer// yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa// 'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// thar par don gnyer ba la smras pa yab
398a7(dkon brtsegs): gson cig/ lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis// bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar lhung byed pa// sdug
398a8(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi bsrung // mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dga'// bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yangs che// rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de
398b1(dkon brtsegs): dag de ltar smang // sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bstan// bud med 'di dag lpags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam// bdag ni rus rgyus 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi
398b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyer// khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag/ gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi// glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi// dga' ba rmi lam
398b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba ma mkhas rmongs par bgyid// kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'di brtag gis// ciphyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bur nyin mongs khol// shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus thung / 
398b4(dkon brtsegs): na dgun dung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bas 'gyur ma lags // mi rtag 'di yis dpa' rnams thams cad ba shig rgyu/ dar te// srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med gyur/ 
398b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus// srid pa rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod// 'dzi nga rgyus phan tshun gsad pa'i 'gro ba bltas nas su// 'dir
398b6(dkon brtsegs): ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi bskyod bzhin// rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang // gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min// bdag cag thams cad rtswa rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste/ 
398b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur bag yod mdzod// mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung // srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung // 'dus byas 'di zangs glog sprin 'dra ste cir mi rung // 
398b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mkhas la srid gsum 'dod pa chags la ngan// lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul// 'jig rten
399a1(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i snying brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi// rgyal po bag med spyod la byang chub yod ma lags// rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen spyo sems
399a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khol ba// de ni bsod nams chud za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog/ 'tshe ba shin tu rgyags pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi// skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar dbugs phyin 'gyur// khams rnams sprul
399a3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 'dra// zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs// rgyal po 'di ni dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus/ 90/ chu bo rnams kyis 'das na bdag 'dir ji
399a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar dga'// rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba na mkha' lta dbu dang // 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas/ rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang // 
399a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyid log sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang // zug rngu rtsa nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir// bdag gis zhi ba 'i chos kyi gru ni rab tu sbyar// stong chen du na
399a6(dkon brtsegs): bcings pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi// ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang gdon par bgyi// long ba mig sbyin sred pa'i 'khri
399a7(dkon brtsegs): shing skam par bgyi// rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar me byas// de yis srid gsum gar la blta bar 'drar mthong 'gyur// byams dang snying brtses snying rje pha rol phyin pa'i

399b1(dkon brtsegs): po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te// bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis// byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi// gcig tu nges te bdag ni
399b2(dkon brtsegs): srid la dga' ma mchis// rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khod gnas// blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro/ mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sar
399b3(dkon brtsegs): lhung // byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro bdag ni rgyun bzlog pa// rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus// lhun po'i

399b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol// gang dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur// yab bang ga bag med rgyal srong bye ba 'tshal ma lags// bud med
399b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang // grub bde zhi ba bla med gnas ni thob mi nus// dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub brnyed pas na// bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis
399b7(dkon brtsegs): te gnas par bgyi// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khang bzangs kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig
399b8(dkon brtsegs): 'chag cing de spyong lam gsum gyis gnas so// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid yongs su spangs so// 
400a1(dkon brtsegs): khang pa'i steng du song ste sa brgyad la gnas nas de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dus kyi che gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa
400a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher brjod cing bar snang la 'gro ba dang / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba thos so// thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer sna

400a5(dkon brtsegs): skyong de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa// ga zhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam/

400a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra ba dag ni yongs su 'dri// de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa// de yi gtsug tor ri yi rtsel gser

400b7(dkon brtsegs): ci ka la bing ka khu byug ngur pa dang // rma bya ngang ba sgra snyan kun la ka'i sgra// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra// ma 'khrul sdig med don rnams thams cad rtogs
400b8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa// rmang byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba// sku lam 'dul bar 'gyur ba sbyong bdo gar 'gyur ba// gzhan gyi spyod pa mthun pa zhus na tshim byed pa// chos
401a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yon tan 'ang // ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum// dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de yi bdun
401a2(dkon brtsegs): yang mtho// phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams na rang shing bzlum// rgyal ba de yi sku na bcom gser gyi mdog/ ba spu g.yas su 'khyil cing gyen du re re skyes// lte ba mtha' dag

401a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsngags pa thos shing chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang bde ba skyes par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal
401a8(dkon brtsegs): bugazhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang / de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / des mngon sum
401b1(dkon brtsegs): du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang / de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba yang ba dang phrad pa dang / byas pa mi bzod pa dang / ji ltar 'khor ba na
401b2(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi bzo ba dang / ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa
401b3(dkon brtsegs): mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa spong ba dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun nag rmongs pa dang / ji ltar 'du byed rnams rtogs par dka' ba dang /

401b5(dkon brtsegs): shes te sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang / ji ltar tsher ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar sred pa'i 'chingab dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung
401b6(dkon brtsegs): bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na skye ba rgyun gcad dka' ba dang / ji ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / 
401b7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'dzag par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su mi bsrung ba dang / ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro ba chung ba dang / ji ltar srid pa mngon par 'grub pa nyes dmigs
401b8(dkon brtsegs): mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di mi nus te/ 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pas rmongs pa/ sems tha ba can bag med pa la dga'
402a1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ skye
402a2(dkon brtsegs): ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pa ni bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par sbyang bar mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rtag la
402a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sgo nas byung na ni nye du'i tshogs kyi bar chad byas su 'ong gis bdag khang steng 'di nas zur du mchod ngo snyam mo// yul 'khor
402a4(dkon brtsegs): skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su phyogs te/ khang pa de nas mchongs nas
402a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs she na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes kyang
402a6(dkon brtsegs): smras so// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ 'od phyung nas
402a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la reg go// 'od de las kyang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i pang lo tsam byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de las kyang 'od zer brgya
402a8(dkon brtsegs): stong byung ste snang ba chen por gyur nas snang ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad+ma de la
402b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
402b2(dkon brtsegs): lo zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des 'od de brtul ba dang / gzhon nu de sdong bu bcad pasgyel ba bzhin
402b3(dkon brtsegs): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal lo// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od
402b4(dkon brtsegs): zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blol tshagasu bcad de gsol pa// bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas gdod// tshegs chen sman pa'i rgyal po
402b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod rnyed do// ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas ni// bdag gis thob 'gyur mgon po bstan/ du gsol// 'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos
402b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni// mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te// thos nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na// mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu// lam mnyam pa la de ring ston
402b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ ldongs par gyur pa'i mig tu deng gyur cig/ dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan// g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung shig/ dbul por gyur pa
402b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni bsdu bar mdzod// mgon po bcings pa bdag ni deng grol mdzad// som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis gcad du gsol// byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston// 
403a1(dkon brtsegs): chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol// mun pa bdag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol// rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad du gsol/ 
403a2(dkon brtsegs): sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gzug rngu byung // khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzad// srid bar dmigs pa 'dzin pa bcang du gsal// yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam
403a3(dkon brtsegs): chen gyis// mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol// srog ni zad pa'i chos can che yang thung // dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung ba ste// bsod nams rnam smin ring por ma
403a4(dkon brtsegs): thogs 'grub// bdag gis dal ba gdod rnyed gcig de sa gsungs// byang chub sems dang 'ji ltar bag ma chos 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa mchog spyad na/ 
403a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las mthar 'gyur ba// 'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston// yul 'khor skya nga de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal bu gzhon nu
403a6(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// rgyal po gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de thos nas rnam
403a7(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo// mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste/ de nas mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul to// de bzhin gshegs pa de la
403a8(dkon brtsegs): gtor mngon par gtor to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la
403b1(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan mchog ldan padra med zla badzin la// gser mdog 'dra ga khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul bral khyod 'dra srad pa gsum ma mchis// 
403b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam med mkhyen chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang // khyod kyi gtsug tor 'do na ra rgyal bzhin// gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs
403b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// thub pa khyod ni smon mtshams mdzod spu mdzes// kun zla ba khab dung ltar dkar// thugs rje dbang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa// spyan mchog bzang po ut+pal sngon
403b4(dkon brtsegs): po 'dra// rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// ldag sa yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba// de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khabs// chos gsung bas na
403b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 'jam snum gsung ldan khya da la phyag 'tshal lo// tshems bzang shin tu brta/ na pa rdo rje 'dra// bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags
403b6(dkon brtsegs): bzang ba// 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis// 'od kyis zhing
403b7(dkon brtsegs): brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid// 'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag/ bcom ldan khyod kyi ci zil du rlag/ e na'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das// glang po'i rgyal
403b8(dkon brtsegs): po rma bya seng ge'i stabs// bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs// sa dang ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste/ 
404a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi lpags pa 'jam ning gser mdog 'dra// 'gro ba gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis
404a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang ldan// khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad// khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes// sems can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan// mchog tu
404a3(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje can la phyag 'tshalo// khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dges// khyed ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan// khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'// 
404a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// khyo dang ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'joms// khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs// khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal
404a5(dkon brtsegs): po dri gsum sel// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag/ pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos// khyod ni
404a6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs dbyangs ka la bing ka'i skad // srid gsum pho rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang // gar la lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang // bdag med
404a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can med cing srog 'gro med// chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen// stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul// ma shes pas na 'gro bar 'khyams 'gyur te// thugs rje
404a8(dkon brtsegs): thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis// de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags// 'dod chags la sogs nad mang brgya dag gis// skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te// bder
404b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing // bla med sman pa lta bu rnam par rgyu// skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non// sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas// rtag tu na pa'i
404b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gzigs pas ni// thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grol cing rgyu// dud 'gro yid btags dmyal bar 'gro rnams su// 'gro kun shing rta'i phang lo bzhin du 'khor// glen pa/ 
404b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pu ma mchis mgon ma mchis// de la lam gyi dam pa ston par mdzad// gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa// 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi// chos kyi dbang
404b4(dkon brtsegs): phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// 'jam zhing gnyen la yid du 'ong ba'i mchog/ tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa// dri za mi ci
404b5(dkon brtsegs): lha yi bu mo mchog/ sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsungs pa/ mdzad// bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs tshul gyis// yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung // de
404b6(dkon brtsegs): thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag/ theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid// khyod la mchod pas lha'i bde bas ni// rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yis thob// mi yi bdag po/ 
404b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro la phan bgyid pa// phyug tsang nor che 'byor pa chen por 'gyur// mtshungs med khyod la dad pa bskyed pa ni// gling bzhi bdag po 'khor lo bsgyur ba mchog/ 'gro la dge ba bcu
404b8(dkon brtsegs): po kun byed pa// rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pos ni// tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten pa dag po dang // yongs su dga' ldan
405a1(dkon brtsegs): lha yi bdag po dang // gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa
405a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang // thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te// gnas mchog rga shi med pa 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing
405a3(dkon brtsegs): lam mkhyen pa// 'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog/ bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni grags pa'i lam// bde bzhi pa rdul dang bral la 'god// bsod nams gter khyod bsod
405a4(dkon brtsegs): nams don gnyer ba'i// bsod nams bgyid pa rtag tu mibs te// byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni// bskal pa bye ba mang po bas mi 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul
405a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa// yongasu dag cing mdzes pa thob par 'gyur// dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis// sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// 
405a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs// yon tan rnam pa du ma thob par 'gyur// mtho ris thar pa mi yi bde ba dang // 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur// khyod
405a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis// rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags pa'i phreng ba ni// bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs
405a8(dkon brtsegs): rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa// mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa// bcom ldan dbang po zhi bzhi dges pa// mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis
405b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas// mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas// dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag gyur te// dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par 'byed// lha
405b2(dkon brtsegs): dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs// yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas// bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa des// 'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par
405b3(dkon brtsegs): shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas mtshan mo de'i nam nangs pa dang // rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi 'khor du ba'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs
405b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// khyed ci'i phyir du/ de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer mi gdara'
405b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du'o// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer lnga na gzhon nu'i phyir shing bcad pa skyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel/ ti/ langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su
405b6(dkon brtsegs): btsal lo// yul 'khor skyong de nas grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba
405b7(dkon brtsegs): dang phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logs su song ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor
405b8(dkon brtsegs): dang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar gyi phyogs cha ga la ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
406a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug
406a2(dkon brtsegs): go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa// srid gsum khyed mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la
406a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis// sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur// skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba
406a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag/ lhun po rin che/ ngan mchog gis spras ltar yongs su dag/ rgyal bsdu dag cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra// blta sdug
406a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs mnga' thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab brtul shugs spyad// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stang mdzad/ 
406a6(dkon brtsegs): sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam gyis mi khyab mdzad// des na khyod sku bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang // bzod dang
406a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus bsam gtan thabs kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags// chu shel nor bu glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags// 
406a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi ba'i gzugs kyang ston// chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags// rang gi phyogs rnams kun du rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'// bder gshegs rnams kyi sku'i
406b1(dkon brtsegs): tshad ni mda' ma lags// khyod ni dga' ldan dga' zhig na yang bzhugs par gda'// 'chi 'pho mdzad cing rab dga' glang por gyur nas ni// dpa' bo yum gyi lhumasu gshegs par gda'
406b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad// thub chen na mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs// bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltam par ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste// sa 'ga' dag tu gam pa bdun por ganga' ba mdzad// 
406b3(dkon brtsegs): nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso bo shin tu lha// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtshe las gdon ces gsung yang phyung // thub khyod chos gang la yang the tshom mi mnga' yang // yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig
406b4(dkon brtsegs): rten dag na gda'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba brnyes gyur kyang // kha cig tu ni bud med nang na zhugs brar gda'// yab dang yum dang sras dang bud med rnams
406b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang btang // gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing ngu// sems can dam pa bye ba brgya las yongs bskor nas// nags gnas gnas cig pu nas 'byung
406b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gda' ba'ang mdzad// khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang // zhing na bdud 'dul ba yang gda' ba ston pa mdzad// sngon chad 'khor los bsam gyis mi khyab
406b7(dkon brtsegs): bskor gyur kyang // khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad// rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// mya ngan 'das zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu
406b8(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// khyod ni zhi ba bsil gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung // khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med// 
407a1(dkon brtsegs): thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams dag na mkhyen pa khyod kyis bsngags pa gdung // kun tu spyod yul thub
407a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can kun gyi bgyi bar sgyu ma ltar gda' yang // thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa'am
407a3(dkon brtsegs): byon ma lags// sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i don du gang gis ni byang chub mtshig thob pa// lam mchog mi yi dang 'bo khyod kyis legs
407a4(dkon brtsegs): gsung // bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas// mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi// mi yi dga' bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba/ 
407a5(dkon brtsegs): srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig/ bdag gis 'dir bstod bsod nams mtha' yas gang sgrubs des// 'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob
407a6(dkon brtsegs): par shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
407a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don
407a8(dkon brtsegs): grub blong la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer du// gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal
407b1(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis
407b2(dkon brtsegs): pha ma de gnyis dang grogs po de dag dang bud med de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/ ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags
407b3(dkon brtsegs): par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig/ de dag gis sgra skad gcig du rjes su yi rang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer
407b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags bar de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// ro bro ba ba grod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge
407b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to// dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis/ g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chags bsham
407b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i steng du rin po che'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ g.yas g.yon du me tog go shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas pa me tog pad+ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa/ 
407b7(dkon brtsegs): ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams pa/ dge slong re re la gos kha na ma thob med pa gang yin pa de/ phyi nyin mi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig
407b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur bar byas so// de lo bye ba phrag gsum gyis bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas/ sangs
408a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir gzhan yid la ma byas so// bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 
408a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te/ lus dang srog la yang mi lta na dngos po gzhan la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bar skabs der
408a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gnyis su zhus so// bar skabs der khrus ma byas mar dang 'bru mar gyis
408a4(dkon brtsegs): lus la ma bskus rkang pam bkrus ngal ba'i 'du shes ma ba skyed do// zan za ba dang bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs pa rwa nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to// gang gi tshe de bzhin
408a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhen pa byas so// gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhen pa'i sa
408a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs de nyid du/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring
408a7(dkon brtsegs): bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas rgyu rkyen thams cad bsogs te/ phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so// mchod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna
408a8(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi rin po che'i 'dra bas g.yogs so// mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag bris so// mchod rten re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo// mchod rten
408b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad la yang sil snyan brgya stong phul lo// 'dzam bu'i glang khor yug tu me tog gi shing ljon pa bskrun to// mchod rten re re la yang mar me'i rdza bo brgya stong las mar me
408b2(dkon brtsegs): bus so// mar me'i rdzi bo re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mar drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gi mar me bus so// spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so// 
408b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul de lta bus lo bye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te phyis rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas kyang chos gos gsum par gyur cing rtag tu bsod snyoms spyod pa dang / rtag tu cog
408b4(dkon brtsegs): bu pa ste/ nam yang glos ma phab po// na ma ya dang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to//  de zang zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bye ba phrag bzhi'i
408b5(dkon brtsegs): bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin te/ de gzhan la tha na legs so zhes bya ba tsam la yang re bar ma gyur na/ rnyed pa dang bkur bsti lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de chos
408b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa'am chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to// de la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do// yul 'khor gyi mi thams cad dang / btsun mo'i khor dang / nang
408b7(dkon brtsegs): mi thams cad dang / grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rjes su bslabs te rab tu byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems
408b8(dkon brtsegs): te/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi rjes su slob pa'i yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu byung gis/ bdag cag gis de la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas na/ dkon mchog gsum la
409a1(dkon brtsegs): rim gro byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu
409a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te/ dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis thams cad yongs su bzung ngo // tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa ba ni la rnamapa
409a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsom za'am yid gnyis
409a4(dkon brtsegs): su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// yul
409a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nam/ sa kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin sna/ ma du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tshom za 'am yid gnyisu
409a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur to// grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni
409a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par/ 
409a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pas lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su spangs pa dang / bag yod pa spyod pas rgyal bu bsod nams kyi 'od
409b1(dkon brtsegs): zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// ngas bya dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// de lta bas na de dag mi brtson pa dang / rnyed pa
409b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bkur bsti dang tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang / shes kyi khel chags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs shing sha thang ba dang
409b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang / rab tu byung ba don med pa dang / dge sbyong sun par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dang / lus dang ngag dang
409b4(dkon brtsegs): sems mi drang ba dang / ltas lta ba dang / khas 'che ba nor ba dang / rang dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang / dgos dang zas dang mal cha dang na ba'i ched kyi sman dang / yo
409b5(dkon brtsegs): byad kyi mtshan ma chags pa dang ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khral med pa dang / cho ga nyams pa dang / dam pa'i/ chos ma yin pa 'jug pa dang / spyod yul dang bral ba
409b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas
409b7(dkon brtsegs): na rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos na sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rigs pa med pa rnyed pa don du gnyer ba dang / mi bsten par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
409b8(dkon brtsegs): tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag med na// snying ni thob dang shes kyi kha la song // byang chub yon tan rgyas khebs bor nas ni// de dag
410a1(dkon brtsegs): ze phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'// khwa'adra sdang ba khrel dang mos blo bral// shes kyi khe khyer bdud kying bang du song // nyon mongs pa/ 
410a2(dkon brtsegs): lus srid pa'i 'gro bar gzhol// bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhi skad smra// lus ni dgon na dran pa grong khyer du// thob phyir de dag rnam par rtog pas spyod// gnam dngas ltar
410a3(dkon brtsegs): thar las ring ba ste// de 'dra'i de dag sbrul ltar ring du spang // de dag sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun yon tan rgyas gang dga' ma yin// mtho ris bor nas ngan
410a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam du song // sdug pas phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro ba khyams// nga yi spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas// yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bsgrub pas 'di
410a5(dkon brtsegs): la sbyor// bskal pa bya ba mang pos rnyed dka' dal rnyed kyis// de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid ston pa dir brtson gyis// gang zhig theg mchog bying chub dam
410a6(dkon brtsegs): patshang rgyar 'dod// de yi rgyal po de yi yon tan 'dra bar bya// bsams te yang dag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gnas par bya// de ltar bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags med 'grub// 
410a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la brten// rang gis 'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya// bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dra ma spangs shig/ byis pa lta bur
410a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba sngar ni 'khyams sa re// 'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya// der gnas nas ni bdog mi snyes shing gzhan mo smad// sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag brgya
410b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyes ma byas// rjes su dran nas rtag par rgyun tu bdag la spyod// lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spang bar bya// gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par bgyi/ 
410b2(dkon brtsegs): nga yis mdo 'dir bsgrub pa bshad pa 'dir gnas ni// de dag rnams kyi phyi nas byang chub rnyed mi dka'// gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa// thos nas phyir
410b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing yid ni 'jug par bya ba'i rigs// de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya// rnam par rgyu ba'i chen phyis 'gyod gyur ta re// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpo'
410b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod la// yang gang zhig/ bdag 'di la brlab bo// bdag sdom pa 'di lag nas par bya'o snyam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis
410b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub na// bsod nams kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phu nga po 'di'i gnan brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba
410b6(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i lha
410b7(dkon brtsegs): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrig phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang
410b8(dkon brtsegs): chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams los sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul 'khor skyong
